links_reviews_text: This was a great jumpsuit for being out and about everyday and lounging around the house. The fit was great, and hit my waist perfectly - one pieces are hit or miss on my 5'5 high-waisted frame, but this was spot on and accentuated the right places with the elastic+ tie. The print made me so happy and is perfect for spring, it also elevated the look so that it wasn't too utilitarian (although my husband did ask me to change the oil in the car multiple times). Would totally buy this if I could!
Arms are flush against skin and then torso is weirdly unflattering. Once wore once given the fit. Otherwise nice color and great quality of wool.
This sweater did nothing for my figure. I have an hourglass shape and I think this sweater is probably more suited to women with a more straight figure that want to add a little bulk on top.
Very cute and elegant Easy to wear
Typical cozy fall/winter cable knit sweater- easy to wear and a great color!!! Rented for work and wore to a quick post work bite to eat- will get this again!
For well. Big but intentionally so
This was a fun oversized sweater. It is warm and cozy.
This cozy sweater is perfect for hot cocoa and marshmallows! I did not foresee the summer 90 degree weather in MA.

This is a true to size cute sweater which is a very vibrant red. It is made of high quality material and truly looks expensive. It was not long enough to go over leggings, but the sleeves were also perfect on my petite frame. The V is lower than it appears in the pictures and does require a shirt under it if you wan to wear it for work.
Loved this and wore it often. The shade of red is lovely and the sweater is high quality.

I rented this sweater to wear on casual Friday at work! The V-Neck was flattering without being too low cut for the office, and I ended up wearing it to the office but also out to bars with friends. I loved the color and it was nice and warm!

This sweater is vibrant! I'm usually an 8/medium in tops but large was all that was available and it worked. The v was deeper than I expected so I had to add a tank underneath for work. The sweater is really soft and though it is an oversized fit, still has a nice shape.
This was a nice sweater. The red is pretty and I found several occasions to wear it. It is a solid choice but nothing out of this world though
This was a really cozy everyday sweater which was a nice basic to order through unlimited.
Loved the vibrant color. Fit was a bit boxy to look good on me. It didn't look bad, still a good look but not totally in line with my preferred style. Nice and warm.

Overall pretty red color- just like the photo, but thought the fit was going to be more over-sized like on the model. I rented a S with this thought in mind and found the fit to be more true to size than baggier. If you want the over-sized fit, definitely size up. The quality is fine, definitely nice yarn and stitch pattern, but nowhere near worth the actual retail price tag!
good sweater
I thought the details would be a little more modern. This looks like your typical cable knit granny sweater.
fit was oversized and perfect. yarn soft and lovely. thumbs up.

links_reviews_title: Not as baggy as I'd hoped
links_reviews_text: Got this sweater it looked more like a comfy baggy sweater but when I got it was more form fitting. The color also wasn't as bright in the photo.

links_reviews_title: Exactly what the photo looks like
links_reviews_text: A nice warm sweater. A little itchy but not too bad.
Warm And cozy
I could have used the XS but the S is a nice over-sized look. The sweater is super soft. Love it.
Gorgeous earrings but they start to hurt after a pretty short time. Popped some Aleve and got thru the evening but yeowch!

Very nice pattern - it's more pinkish cream than white (which I thought it was white in the photo). Buttons on the wrists and detailing on the front AND the back. Is slightly boxy if you don't tuck it in. Drapes well. Thin material but not see through. Wore it out to see friends with skinny jeans and heels. Very fun and comfortable. I have long arms and it barely went to the wrists. Would also wear to work!

Love this! Can wear it for work or more casually if paired with a jean jacket (either way recommend tall boots!) Flattering somehow even though the dress is pretty shapeless (can size down since there's not a lot of structure).
Obsessed with all things Ganni! Very flattering cut and appropriate length for work, subtle pinstripe was great touch.
Liked the balloon arms and shift style of this dress. Simple throw on for work. Because there is no structure, could have sized down for sure. Good staple dress!
Runs large and is a bit boxy - definitely could have sized down! Will rent again for sure - perfect for work

links_reviews_title: Stylish dress, twist on a classic
links_reviews_text: This was such an easy dress to throw on and was great for work! My only complaint was that the sleeves were a bit long for me.
Na
A soft knit that's not quite as sharp as it looks on the model. Very very long as well. Hit mid calf on me

I actually was surprised by how much I liked this piece - it was fitted at the bust and torso which was incredibly flattering, and the length was just right for my frame. Like others said, the fabric was a little weird as in I've never worn anything like it before, and the bust can gape when you're leaning over so just be aware of that. Otherwise, I got lots of compliments and my husband was a fan too!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my civil ceremony!
links_reviews_text: Love this classic piece. Material was a little awkward, but I wore this to my civil ceremony and thought it was perfect. My boobs kept popping out so get some fabric tape.
I really like the minimalist vibe of this dress. It was great overall, but the fit was a bit loose in the bust for me and looked a little funky. Still totally rentable, but not quite the right fit.
Simple white dress perfect for the day. I loved the length and worried it was going to be frumpy. The cut was cute and the V neck kept it sassy!
Did safety pin for modesty.

links_reviews_title: My husband said it looks like fabric Jesus would wear, but in a good way?
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and on a casual date/spa day. Like everyone else said, the top gapes open. You can make it cover your breasts but as soon as you move, it opens. Wear a lacy bra, cami, or pin it and you won't have an issue. I am tall and have large legs/hips and this fit was flattering and comfortable. There's a slit detail in the front that isn't obvious from pictures. It stains and wrinkles easily, so not my favorite rental but it's still nice.

I really wanted to like this dress. It looks great in the online photos, and looks great on the hanger. The fabric is wonderful, the cut in design are interesting. There was something about it that just didn't fit me right in the bust. Despite loading it up with fashion tape, the fabric and the tape just would not get here, and the top kept falling wide open on me. Unfortunately, I chose to wear this for the first time to a traditional church service, so it was super uncomfortable. I'm sending it back after only one wearing, even though I had hoped to use it two or three times. I'm afraid that I would constantly fret about it even if I wore it to an evening social event where more cleavage would be acceptable, I just felt like I tugged on it all the time, to the extent that even in the photo I provided it looks like I created a little crinkle in the fabric. This is a very interesting and versatile dress, and I hope this review doesn't discourage others from renting it. It might fit others just right. I received it new with tags, and I'm so sorry that it didn't work out well for me.

The design accentuated my waist in a way I found very flattering. However the v-neck was gaping, so my bra showed. The fabric didn't lay flat so it took quite a bit of maneuvering and safety pins to keep it in place and avoid flashing. Also, the material is somewhat see through, so I'd recommend nude shapewear or bike shorts underneath.

This dress was cute, but the fabric was different than I expected. It's a rougher fabric and wrinkles easily, which wasn't a big deal to me. I have a bigger bust (D) and kept having to adjust the dress to keep it somewhat closed, which was impossible. I had to wear a cami underneath, which took away from the cuteness of the dress. I recommend sizing up if you have a bigger bust.

I've rented this twice now in two different sizes, 2 & 4. The 2 fit and I loved the piece, but the 4 gaped a little less at the bust -- a welcome change, as that's not something I usually have to worry about at a 34B. The fabric is stretchy and hugs your upper body in such a flattering way, while also having a nice not-too-structured flow on the bottom half. One of my favorite parts is that this is a great piece for travel -- yes, it wrinkles, but I just hung the dress in the bathroom during a hot shower, gently stretched the fabric to loosen the wrinkles, and it dried/aired out perfectly ready to wear in no time flat. I wore this to work and at the beach, and am seriously fighting the urge to keep it and add it to my permanent closet. One of my top three favorite pieces I've yet rented.

links_reviews_title: Nice flattering cut, not nice fabric
links_reviews_text: Flattering cut of the dress, true to size, v-neck a little low, but nothing a safety pin can't fix. My only issue was the quality of the fabric. It's linen, but it it felt like plastic linen. Was extremely stiff.
It's a little low cut up front, but the slit was a nice sassy touch! Material is light and stretchy.

I really wanted to like this dress. The fabric is so light and comfortable, but the fit on the chest back and waste is just so confusing. The chest is too loose and frankly the dress looks awkward with a camisole. The slit in the bottom is also a little funky which is too bad because the dress does flatter your waist/ torso and backside. Overall just kind of a confusing fit I would rent if you had unlimited that way you can swap it out quickly if it doesn't work for you but definitely wouldn't spend one of my four slots if I was a regular subscriber.
better for small chests
I rented this for a casual work day - but it was far TOO casual. The slit is very high, and the top is definitely too revealing. Would be great for a weekend dress, but not work.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering but shows a lot of cleavage
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and planned to wear it to my bridal shower but when I tested wearing it out for dinner the top kept opening up and my bra would show. The fit was very flattering though and made my waist look really small.
Not sure how it works for others in the bust area, but it was too long and showed it all I’m 5’2 -36-26-38

links_reviews_title: The looks I received in this dress was awesome!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. It had a bit of stretch to it. It was an amazing look!!

links_reviews_title: Chiara Boni can do no wrong 💯🙌🏼❤️
links_reviews_text: Hands down my favorite designer, so I already knew what to expect with this dress: pure perfection. Chiara Boni knows how to dress a woman, period, point blank. Im a 12/14, so ordered a 50, but will definitely downsize to a 48 next time... It still looks gorgeous, but one of the best things about Chiara is that the dress acts as SPANX- not this time. As my GF Sonia always says, "nobody likes limp body con". 🤣 Also the fuscia details in the dress are FAR better than what you see online ❤️🙌🏼
This dress is form fitting and super flattering, the belt is a waist accent as well as a little buffer for any tightness around the tummy. Boat type neck so I suggest a strapless bra.

Perfect dress for work in more formal professional office - classy with just the right amount of edge. Flattering silhouette for hour glass figure. Loved the stretchy scuba-like material for all day comfort. TTS.

I absolutely loved the fit and comfort of this dress. The material is so cool, it allows you to sit comfortably and move comfortably. Pure ease. It is conservative enough for work yet unique enough for an event. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Sleek and elegant choice for my company's uplist to Nasdaq.

links_reviews_text: Rented for a business trip where I had meetings all day. I felt so comfortable in this dress. No shaper needed with this scuba material. The only challenge was I had to loosen my bra strap to allow it to fall slightly outside of the wide boat neck. A bra strap keeper would have been perfect. No biggie. If it were a bit cheaper, I would have kept it. Will rent again.

Loved the thick stretchy material of this dress. I couldn't really tell from the picture, but in person this dress exceeds all expectations. It was perfect for my work meeting. I would rent this again in a heartbeat

links_reviews_title: Hugs and Holds in the right places
links_reviews_text: I wish I could have kept this dress. It was so comfortable and received many compliments. No zipper-you just pull it on. Nice fabric that hugs the curves. Will rent again.

Not as difficult to get it to as others stated but maybe I'm just used to sheath dresses (I do love them!) this one is amazing! As soon as I stepped out of our closet my husband said "wow! I think this is my favorite rental on yours so far! I wish you had somewhere to go today other than work!" I take that as a win! I'm feeling like a boss today - which I am at the office - so I'm going to conquer the world in this dress! Thanks RTR!
This dress was sooo cute and comfy to wear. The material is stretchy which made it great because it is form fitting. Loved it!

I got a lot of compliments on this dress. It made me feel so classy and badass all at once. The fabric is like a scuba suit, which was strange at first, but fits like a glove. The length was good for work and helped to tone down how form fitting it was. If this dress wasn't so expensive to buy I would consider adding it to my wardrobe permanently!
One of my favorites of all time.
This dress is fierce! So comfortable and flattering. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great material; not so big on pattern though it was dull on me
links_reviews_text: The material was thick and stretchy; I ordered the wrong size; it was too big. Also this would likely look better on someone taller
Like w/ all LPRDCBs, easy, flattering, and no shapewear needed. Size down though.

This dress like everything else from this brand is great. Plenty of stretch. If you are between sizes I'd recommend going with the smallest. No need for spanx and was comfortable and professional looking all day.
Stretchy almost plasticy type material. Fits like a glove. Perfect!
I cannot say enough good things about this dress. I wore it on Christmas Eve. It's such a beautiful, well-made, classy dress.
Very cool dress. Fabric was neoprene like. Loved midi length.

I loved this dress! I rented it to wear for a holiday wedding and was surprised by how comfortable the dress was. Based on some reviews, I rented the 40 and 42 (I'm generally a size 2-4). I ended up wearing the 40 with no problem. The dress is made of a really stretchy material that is thick, but easy to move in. I loved the darker colors with a fun pop of pink. Overall, a great dress, especially in the winter.

links_reviews_title: One of my all time favorites
links_reviews_text: Fits below the knee on a tall gal but still love it. The pink is an unexpected surprise.

Perfect fit! This is a thinner neoprene material...like a light scuba suit. Stepping into it is easy and the best way to put this on. Note that it has 'unfinished' hems. The interior lining, which shows on the belt at times, is a rich dark magenta color. I adore this dress!!

links_reviews_title: This dress fit so well! Comfy and very flattering! I
links_reviews_text: This dress is form fitting but because of the material and the well placed belt/sash, it helped hide any small belly bulge or bump. Loved it and will rent again!!

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. I received so many compliments. It is so flattering and chic.
links_reviews_text: Based on reviews I got a size 42 and 44. Both fit nice, but I felt more comfortable in 44. The 42 was a little tighter. I would recommend getting 2 sizes for sure. Note - no zippers. But the fabric is very flexible and the dress was easy to get on. Only con - the belt on both sizes showed wear. Only noticeable to me though.
Nice thick neoprene stretchy material ideal for winter party. Lots of complements
The fabric is super stretchy, but you can't tell by looking at it. The belt is thick and hides all the right places. Loved this dress

This is a fabulous dress for work. It's chic, conservative and comfortable. So many compliments. I sized up because I didn't want it to be too clingy but I should not have-- it was too loose in the hips but I wore it anyway.

I rented this for a be seen work event and ended up wearing it for a low key out of town meeting. It was comfortable enough to wear in the car for hours. I would rent it again for the right occasion (and flip the belt). I want more from this designer. Well-made and fun.
Loved everything about this dress. However, the stretch and material are A+. I'm broad shoulder, hippy so this worked very well for my body shape. Wore this for our holiday Xmas shoot.

I really liked this dress and whatever fabric it's made of. The only downside was it was a little big on me so what was supposed to be form fitted was bunching up at the waist and I hd to keep readjusting the hem that was riding up.
So thick and stretchy, super good quality! From looking at it, you wouldn't think it's made of stretchy material. So elegant and classy!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with cute plaid pattern and belt. Fit like a glove and was so flattering! Loved it.
links_reviews_text: I found this dress true to size. It is a little difficult to get on because there are no zippers, you just have to squeeze in, but once it is on, it fits like a glove and looks amazing! I loved the belt detail and the plaid print. So gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I twisted the belt so I could show off the pink! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was tight to get on and off but the fit was good and snug.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a work event and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and the belt detail. Really felt comfortable on and the colors were so fun. The dress has no zipper so you need to shimmy it on but did have a lot of stretch to it.
Extremely slimming, understated elegance with subtle flair!
The scuba material makes wearing the dress easy, and the structured belt added a touch of high fashion. Love this dress.
Fit like a glove. Loved the fabric and felt very confident in the dress

Great dress with a very feminine and classic look. Keep in mind, It's really just a very stretch fabric, and so I thought it was comfortable to wear. Received got several compliments on it too! Normally I might not wear something this long, but I thought the length helped make it more professional looking.
Everything about this dress is amazing. The colors, the print, the pink lining, the length, the neckline... I wore it twice and was so sad to send it back!

links_reviews_title: Buttery soft with great ribbing detail
links_reviews_text: Kept this jacket for most of winter. The ribbing detail is unique and is a fun detour from a standard leather jacket. Highly recommend.
I love this jacket so much- I wish I could own it. it's soft and comfortable. wore an xs but it fit more like a small.
It felt a little too cropped when I first tried it on, but it really wasn't. In fact, it was ideal. Great quality, tts and luxurious.
Wore this to a concert and loved it! I have rented other jackets from this designer and the leather is sooo soft and the cuts are flattering. Will rent again!
I rented M and the sleeves were too long/baggy. I reordered in S and fit perfectly. Took on a two week trip. Good quality but ended up liking it rather then loooooved.
Love this jacket as much as the puppy I'm holding in this photo. So easy and flattering. I always get nervous about fake leather but this one looked nice/not cheap. Solid rental.

My own leather jacket is a Schott Perfecto in large which fits perfectly. This jacket was much roomier and I probably needed a medium. That said...It looks tough as nails, it feels soft, it smells like expensive leather, and I love everything about it. I would have kept it longer if it was a smaller size and the weather wasn't finally warming up.

links_reviews_title: Amazing leather jacket. Wore it all fall and winter. Was hard to let go.
links_reviews_text: Beautifully made. It's a good weight and was perfect for keeping me warm and stylish through the LA fall and winter. Lined and even though it was fitted, i was able to wear light sweaters underneath.

links_reviews_title: Just the right piece to make every outfit hip!
links_reviews_text: Buttery soft, I got a large because medium not available but this one was fine! Loved it and just right for a spring San Francisco cool night.

This jacket is amazing... if I could have purchased it I would have. It fit beautifully, true to size, and light weight enough to wear any time. The leather was so soft and amazing. Other reviews talked about an odd smell... it must be from the cleaning. It definitely had an odd smell at first, but after a couple wears it completely went away. Don't be deterred by that because the jacket is so great.

links_reviews_title: Super soft, cute leather moto jacket
links_reviews_text: Fit great, super soft and comfy, my husband even commented he liked it. All around a great jacket! Wore it out and about for day and night.

links_reviews_title: Love love LOVED - will rent again
links_reviews_text: This jacket is everything - soft leather, stunning cut, plus all these amazing details that make you feel like a badass. Very versatile, works with jeans and tanks, maxis, and black tie dresses. Wore it so many times and will rent again when the weather makes sense. (Note - it was not as warm as I expected, a little chilly for under 60 degrees)

links_reviews_title: Soft leather and fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: This is the most amazing jacket ever!! Dress up or down, goes with everything!! And the details in the jacket bring it to the next level. Not to mention how soft the leather is. I would buy if it wasn't out of my price range. Ladies rent or buy this immediately!!!
Fitted and can be worn for many occasions.
Soooo stinking cute!!! I'm 5'9 and wore a small. My only complaint was length. Wish it was a touch longer. Otherwise, so so cute!
This jacket is great. It goes with everything and photographs well. It doesn't seem worth $1,000 and it's also 100% worth renting. @jessicapaige.la
Fit was good and would allow a sweater underneath. Color and quality was great. Wasn't super over the moon about it though.

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail but not the smell
links_reviews_text: I've been wanting to try out a quilted leather jacket to see if I want to invest in a piece like this one or a more classic style. I liked how the jacket looked, but it had some sort of chemical/rubber smell. The material also wasn't as buttery soft as I would've expected. Overall the jacket was good for the evening, but I wouldn't purchase this piece or keep it for very long.

Wow! So, this is what a thousand dollar leather jacket feels like. I never want to take it off. I haven't found an outfit yet that this jacket doesn't make better. Jeans, ball gown, shift dress, jumpsuit. It's the bomb.com

The padding made the arms stick out a little bit but it was clear this jacket is brand new. The xs was a little short in the torso. I wore it over a dress to a wedding and over a sweater for date night.

links_reviews_title: This jacket was really all that.
links_reviews_text: I would have bought this jacket, just out of my price range. It was sooooo yummy. Looked like a really expensive jacket.

I love this jacket. At first I thought it was a bit too moto, too much metal but it really grew on me. The leather is so soft, smells terrific. The jacket is warm, beautiful. Articulated and zipped sleeves mean it actually allows range of motion in the arms. I never thought I'd buy a $900 leather jacket but this may have convinced me.

links_reviews_title: Loved it...but it was too big!
links_reviews_text: Didn't get to wear this one! :( It's a great jacket, but it swallowed me!! I may try and rent again in a smaller size!
It's a teeny bit tight in the shoulders but overall true to size.

links_reviews_title: More cropped than I expected but still nice!
links_reviews_text: I like but don't love this jacket - it's more boxy and cropped than expected/shown in pictures. I'm going to wear it a couple of time before I return, but wouldn't rent again. I'd love to try her other jackets because the quality is fantastic!

links_reviews_title: Great jacket but was more like a cropped fit.
Beautiful detail and quality but short waisted
links_reviews_text: I loved it but it was too short on me so I only wore it once
Love the jacket, just need a smaller size.
The length his my waist weird. It made the bottom of the jacket looked stretched out for some reason.

links_reviews_title: it was to cropped did not wear it.
links_reviews_text: great jacket just felt too short

The leather is soft like butter. So warm to wear on a very cold day. Fits tts. Kept this one for a while now and wore it so many different ways. My go to jacket for the winter time. Would hate to send this one back once it warms up.

links_reviews_title: Loved the design and crop of this jacket. I could get it on but it was tight on the arms.
links_reviews_text: Right on the arms and I couldn’t zip it...which is ok, I don’t zip my motos
Fit was a little but that was fine since I wanted to wear a thick sweater. Amazing quality looked great . Definitely recommend. It's a little cropped which I didn't realize but still super cute!

Size notes on this jacket say XS-2X, but the 2X i ordered was really an XXL. fits true to size as XXL, but is nowhere close to a 2X. Jacket is beautiful soft leather and is perfectly cropped to wear with dresses. I would have had a hard time styling it with pants. It was very tight in the upper arm but I wore it for my event anyway.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and goes with everything
links_reviews_text: I needed a basic leather jacket as I've popped the seam on mine. This was a great choice for my vacation. I purposely sized up so I could wear sweaters under.

Love the quality, but the ribbing and somewhat loose fit made my shoulders looks larger than normal. The sides winged out, so the silhouette was boxy. Not impressed by the fit, but the quality of the jacket is good.
Makes ordinary outfits look put together

links_reviews_title: Great quality leather jacket - runs large!
links_reviews_text: This is really nice quality. Definitely more cropped than I was expecting, but fits large in the arms and chest. The shoulders of the jacket sort of round, so I didn't think it was all that flattering on me but very cute to wear over your shoulders or with a sweater underneath. Probably would look for another fit to rent again.
I'm 5'10 and this jacket hit around my lower ribcage. It looks far longer on the model in the photo. Had to return and did not wear. If considering and you have a long torso definitely size up!
Runs latge, i wore it 4x as it was very warm but it was extremely itchy! I had to wear with a turtle neck long sleeve under. Other than that it was cute!
Beautiful color. Worked for a 20 week bump.

Very comfy. It runs a little large, but I like oversized sweaters so it was perfect. Very warm, wore it outside without a coat in 50-degree weather. I wore it at least six times and it was hard to part with. Would definitely rent again.
This was a good sweater but it was definitely thick and warm!
I didn't end up wearing this because it was so itchy.
Nice cozy sweater.

links_reviews_title: Very nice but definitely a cold weather piece
links_reviews_text: Well made, nice fit. Long collar - can fold once or twice. I got hot in this pretty easily. No regrets but probably won't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater, wore it four times!
links_reviews_text: Great winter sweater- I loved the way it fit and only sent it back because it needed to be cleaned!
Nice quality sweater but the neck was super bulky. I also found it to be pretty itchy.
I purposely got this in a larger size because I did not want the fitted look. Very nice color, and casual but still looks like you put some effort. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Nice and thick. Comfortable everyday turtleneck.
links_reviews_text: I had to roll up the sleeves, as I'm short, otherwise I really like it.

links_reviews_title: Going to end up buying this in the near future...
links_reviews_text: This turtleneck was everything I hoped for! It was super warm, cozy, and stylish! It was so warm, that in 30 degree weather, I carried my coat while walking from the train! It was not itchy at all as sometimes turtlenecks/sweaters can be. I ordered the S and it was very roomy/comfortable, likely could have worn an XS. I wore this to work and received a couple compliments about how cozy it looked!
Beautiful jacket. I'm debating buying it now.
Form fitting moto jacket. Stylish and comfortable. You can wear this jacket everyday!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much that I bought it!
links_reviews_text: The quality and fit of this jacket is incredible. If you're looking for something a little more edgy than the standard moto leather jacket, I would definitely rent this. The leather is SO soft, the shoulder details give it a unique touch. I get compliments on it every time I wear it!

links_reviews_title: Beading is gorgeous! Love the detail.
links_reviews_text: Looks exactly like the pic.
so cute. great fit, lovely leather smell, love the detailing at the shoulders. slim enough to wear under another coat for winter
Felt a little Michael Jackson in this jacket, but fun for the holidays. Leather was buttery soft. The collar wouldn't stay open unless I wore it zipped up.
Great for every day wear! Loved this piece

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, unique, and sturdy leather jacket
links_reviews_text: I love the detailing around the shoulders. I got so many compliments on this jacket! Perfect combination of edgy and feminine. Quality materials, flattering fit.
I loved these jeans and literally wore them multiple times.
Totally in love with these jeans! They run a little large so by the end of the day they were a bit baggy but overall cute & comfortable!
Loved these jeans so soft. Super cute and the waistline wasn't tight.

A little less stretch than I usually prefer, but they are still comfy and more of a classic denim. I have long legs, and the crop was a great length on me still. I usually wear a 28 in jeans, but I sized up on these and am happy with the fit. Paired them with a RTR top as well :)

links_reviews_title: Too long but very nice jeans.
links_reviews_text: I liked these jeans a lot and wore them twice. They are "real" denim, not like all the cheap jeans I own that are made with a stretchy blend in an effort to fit the masses. The mid-rise fit held my tummy in, but I did have to pull them up throughout the day so I paired with a belt for round 2. I had to fold a couple times at the hem line, since they otherwise fit like "floods"--but I expected to have to do this since I'm 5'2". Dear RTR, please start offering pants and bottoms in petite sizes! I know I'm not the only shorty bc I see reviews from women my height all over. Thank yawww!!
Being Pear shaped I'm always hesitant to rent jeans but these fit like a glove. Such fun casual jeans. Will probably buy!
Loved the fit of these crop jeans so I decided to keep them!
The jeans fit perfectly, were high quality and super comfy. Would definitely rent again.
Great classic jeans.

links_reviews_title: The perfect pair of jeans for our Disney trip.
links_reviews_text: They fit perfectly. They were true to size. I would rent these again.
These were perfect for casual Friday. They fit me perfectly. I have an athletic build with strong legs and they weren't too tight on my legs and stayed put on my waist. Considered buying

I'm a size 28 but sized up to a 29 because a lot of reviews said they ran small - I wish I hadn't. The 29 is too loose for me, I think the 28 would have been perfect. Cute pair of everyday jeans but nothing special. I'll consider renting them again in my true size.
It fits exactly to size. I'm about 5'4.5" and the length is perfect (27R). Usually jeans are too long for me to have the cropped look. No problem here. Didn't even need to roll them.
The pants run really large! I wore them to work and after they stretched out they were almost falling off all day

Rent these! They are the softest and most comfortable pair of jeans and if it wasn't for the price I would've bought! I'm usually a size 27 in other brands (H&M, Lucky, etc) and a 26 fit perfect. They do stretch a bit throughout the day so you may even want to size two sizes down. Very cute and not too cropped, great to wear with ankle booties.
I'm usually a 27-28 in jeans and the 27 fit perfectly. LOVE these jeans.
Cute style and comfortable fabric
I ordered a size too big, but other than that, these jeans were perfect! Super soft denim, hit at mid-waist, very relaxed fit. Will have to order again in a smaller size!
I'm petite and folded over the hem once and it was perfect. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Amazing jeans for small booty gals
links_reviews_text: These are the perfect jean. It's a true mid rise, no stretch so they hold you in well and for those who don't have much of a booty- they fit nicely rather than flattening you out. Some reviewers said there isn't 'as much stretch as they like' - there is one what so ever. So if you're in between sizes you will want to size up. They will of course stretch out a little bit as jeans do, but there is zero actual stretch to these. Highly recommend for those with hour glass figures who have trouble with rise bc of their hips. If you have a booty you may have trouble with these though.
Perfect fit! I received many compliments on the color and fit! Perfect for everyday

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans, but not high enough for short people
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 28 and the 29 fit well, except that it wasn't high-rise enough. I'm 5'2 and it sit right under my tummy, which some may like, but I prefer a bit more structure and hold with my jeans. Sent back.

These jeans are amazing. I am petite so I have a lot of issues when it comes to the length of jeans. These are slightly cropped on me and don't make my legs look shorter than they already are like other cropped jeans do. They do run a tad big as I'm typically a size 25/26 and I fit into the 24 for these. I wish they weren't so expensive or I'd buy them in a heartbeat.

links_reviews_title: Fit a little too small for me.
links_reviews_text: Fit small, very cute though. I will size up next time

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and perfect for the weekend.
links_reviews_text: A cropped jean not an ankle jean.
I just love these pants, I will be renting them again!
These were fitted when I put them on and got super baggy after one wear. Very comfy and soft but don't expect them to stay right!!
Too small. Too low on the hips. Not good for anyone with curves
This was my second time renting these jeans. Love the crop and soft feel of denim!

This jean has no stretch, so I would consider sizing up - I am a 29 in some jeans, but need a 30 in these (not uncommon for me for Citizens). A really nice wash and feel to the fabric, and the cropped length is cute.
Mid rise fit, keeps shape well, love them!
Runs very small.

Got a size 27 which is my usual size in jeans. Good fit for first wear but stretch out very quickly. Were hanging off by third wear. Great length for shorter frames though - will rent again in size smaller.
These jeans were perfectly cropped not to short or long on me the waist was comfortable. Good vacation piece
These jeans fit perfectly and feel so soft and comfortable. I'm considering buying it, but even with the discount, it's a splurge :)
Good for every day
Loved the fit. True to size
Ran a little big but super comfy. Maybe size down if you're unsure.
Boyfriend jeans that stretch out shortly after putting them on.

links_reviews_title: Great every day jean with on trend ankle cut, love the high waist
links_reviews_text: Not a lot of give, but flattering on and true to size!

links_reviews_title: Comfy Housedress Mood (if your chest is small enough)
links_reviews_text: I rented this with the intent to wear it at home, while still being able to be presentable for picking up mail in the lobby and opening the door to retrieve contactless deliveries. My SO asked me where I was going all dressed up when I put it on, so that's a good sign! It's a little bit too tight in the band area (there is an elastic in the back but I actually need more give in the front), which is the only part of this dress that is fitted. Consequently, my chest is constricted in the front, loose below the band, and bulging out of the sides...However, everything else about the fit is perfect. Length is short enough to be a true midi, showing just enough lower calf/ankle to be very flattering. I will wear at home, but probably would not wear in public. If my chest was a cup size or two smaller, this dress would have been nothing short of fantastic for summer.
Loved the adjustable straps. Such a cute maxi!

Wore this dress to work and I received lots of compliments. Also, I love this designer because the dresses fit like shapewear. You actually step into the dress, and pull it up. It doesn't seem like that will work but it does, and I love it. I would say the fit is true to size, but the material is stretchy so I could have probably gone down a size. This is now in my regular rotation.... I might possibly weigh a few pounds more than my profile right now...

Loved this dress! Looks scary at first as it is made from a stretchy, scuba type material that I thought might be a little too tight for this middle aged mom of two, but it is deceivingly forgiving fabric! The touching across the front hides any little belly issues and the hook and eye detail makes this so different. Loved it and will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Flattering bodycon despite being very tight
links_reviews_text: Too tight in arms, shoulders, chest, and hips. I was shocked I got it on and off, but even more so how good it looked on me. If I order a size up I'm not sure if it will look the same, but I'm willing to try!

The material was structured but had some stretch to it. The ruffled sections were spaced perfectly. I am looking forward to trying more from this designer. My favorite rental yet. 5'7" and about 160 lbs, 36C. Fit perfect. (I didn't wear it with the tights shown in my pic).

links_reviews_title: The cut of this dress is amazing!!!
links_reviews_text: #9to5 #womeninbusiness #fashion #workwear

I was anticipating this dress would be made out of tweed. The material is like scuba suit. This dress makes you look skinny! It's so comfy and flattering. It was def a little too dressy for just a regular day at work, but this would be great for some of my more formal work related events, or if you work in a very dressy office. Definitely a winner!

links_reviews_title: Fit and structure is amazing!!! I felt like a million bucks!!!
links_reviews_text: There's no zipper so getting in and out was a bit strategic, but worth it.

This dress has no zipper which I prefer and even though getting it overhead is a bit of work once it's on it fits like a dream! Lovely detail in the front along the trim and great length for us taller women (I'm 5'9"). Lots of stretch while maintaining the quality of the fabric and it runs true to size.
Very comfortable and flattering - loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work or after-work drinks
links_reviews_text: Great dress for work and can easily transition to after-work drinks or dinner. Form fitting but it’s long (past my knees) and covered my chest. I got compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Fits beautifully & it's stretchy, soft & comfortable
links_reviews_text: I will rent this designer again. The dress was flattering and incredibly comfortable. I was able to get in and out of chairs & a car without dress hitching problems. I was also warm enough in winter weather and not overheated inside a packed party. I'm tall (5'8"), and I liked where the waist fell & the length of the dress.
Wow! This dress is amazing and perfect for work holiday party. Very flattering.
I love the fit, lots of stretch, on designer dresses with no stretch I could wear an 8 but I read this was stretchy so the 6 (42) was a great fit

links_reviews_title: So much more comfortable than tweed
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and looks good. A little concerned that the hooks on the front will get caught on something, and long enough to necessitate heels.

Love this brand and fits TTS as usual. I was concerned that the details might overwhelm my petite frame but once it was on I loved it. I was particularly concerned about the exaggerated ruching at the midsection but it worked for me. The length is on the longer side for someone my height, but nothing that can't be addressed with a good heel.

This dress fits beautifully, like a glove! Because of the material, I think it can stretch to form comfortably to a lot of different body shapes. I was worried about the no zipper aspect and stretching it up around my shoulders, but it was easy enough to get in and out of. The ruffle on the front was surprising and bigger than I expected, but I liked the edgy detail, so it didn't bother me. Great dress!
I love this designer. Great if you like fitted clothing and are curvy. This dress was formal b it had fun fashion forward details and a great professional length.

Classic La Petite Robe de Chiara Boni dress. I.e. very stretchy fabric, NO zipper. It is a little busy (black, blue, grey, black stripe, with hooks, and a ruffle detail) but I quite liked it. Definitely a statement piece. I'm short (5'4") and found the dress to go below my knees, which was perfect for a cold day and a cold conference room.

I loved this dress. It was so flattering! I looked like an executive and I look like a million bucks. I could have sized down for a more body-con look but I liked the fit this way. Lots of compliments!

The dress does not have a zipper so it's a little interesting to put on but it's that super stretchy scuba material which I was not expecting. It is a very flattering cut especially with the little bit of rushing across the tummy area. I got endless compliments

I thought this dress was more textured like a tweet fabric, but it's actually a smooth spandex type of material. It's stretchy so it's forgiving while also holding you in at all the right places. The ruching around the stomach area also helps disguise any less than perfect tummies. I felt confident and pretty in this. I'm usually a size 6 and a 42 worked for me. I'm 5'5" and it falls a couple of inches below my knees.
Loved this dress, very flattering
I was worried about this dress being too tight for work, but after sizing up 1 size, it was fine.

Ohmygoodness, THIS DRESS! I loved everything about it -- the tweedy print on the material, the stripe with its decorative eye clasps, the gathers at the side, the hints of green and lavender... Stretchy and pull-on like all Chiara Boni dresses, it's comfortable and flattering. I very much wish I could afford to keep this beauty...

This dress is incredible! The material is amazing, the dress gathers in all the right places, and the length is great if you're tall! Wore to a work event and got so many compliments!! Will definitely rent again!

My male coworker said this dress gave him anxiety. It's pretty busy and I didn't notice in the picture but there are hooks all down the stripe. It was a little too long on me (I'm short), but I liked the way it hugged my curves. I'm usually a 2 or a 4 depending on this brand and I wear a 40 IT (4 US) in this designer. I probably should have worn a strapless bra but I wore a regular one and had to keep adjusting the straps.

Rented a size 48 it was super big in the hips and butt. I have a bigger chest and normally wear between 8-12 this dress has a lot of stretch to it and it's over shape is super forgiving in the midsection where I carry most of my weight. I'm returning the size 12 for a size 8. 🤞🏼

I am 5'7" and 130 pounds with a pear-shaped body. The 38 fit perfectly. The cut was extremely flattering on me. I love a midi skirt length that falls right below my knee. I’m on the tall side so I worried that it would end up falling at my knee or shorter, but it turned out to be just the length I wanted. The detail is not only unique, but it camouflages your belly so no sucking in even after a big meal! From the photo, I thought the material was going to be tweed, but it’s actually a printed stretch material. The material makes it comfortable to wear all day.

links_reviews_title: Omg LOVE this one. Beautifully made. Got so many compliments - even strangers stopping me to say

links_reviews_text: Ok...not gonna lie...this dress was more than I expected. Fit beautifully and fabric is good quality and thick. I sized up based on reviews and was very happy with how it looked. It's a spin on the everyday generic gray dress.

links_reviews_title: The fit of the dress was remarkable. It held everything in and looked incredibly polished.

links_reviews_text: This is a brand that seems to fit perfectly each time no matter the style of dress. The material is thick and high quality. I love the ruching detail.

links_reviews_title: Great style, but longer than expected
links_reviews_text: The dress style is very flatter in the silhouette, however it was very long on me and hit well below the calf (I'm 5'5"). Would recommend for taller ladies, but wouldn't rent again.
Fit like a glove

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, runs true to size
links_reviews_text: Dress is incredibly flattering and I loved the material and shape. RTR suggested a size larger than I normally wear and I wish I had stuck with my usual size as this dress was a little big.

This dress fabric is confusing but in the best way. It looks like it is going to be some tweed but it is stretchy and comfy and smooth. The detail down the front is flattering and different. The hooks can be a little stymieing depending on if you have a knit scarf you are wearing, but I was comfortable and felt confident in this. The length is perfect and the sleeves are great. I would absolute rent this again! I wore it a couple of times, including to a meeting that I had to dash to - perfect!

This is such a well made garment and appears to be universally flattering for most body types. I wore for a church event and could easily wear to work. It's so comfortable and unique. You won't regret renting this one!
Too long for my 5' 1" foot frame. Even though the size was right the length was overwhelming. Too bad, it's a beauty. Not for shorties like me.

links_reviews_title: This dress looks like money. So many compliments. Cool scuba fabric.
links_reviews_text: A little bit of a boatneck, which sometimes means the adjustment of bra straps. Fits over the head - scuba material with no buttons or zippers. Slightly ruffled front is very unique. You won't see anyone else wearing your dress at an event.

links_reviews_title: It is work appropriate and special all at once. Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love Chiara Boni, and the black stripe down the side with the hooks was such a unique and "artsy," elevated thouch. The fabric is so smooth and form fitting you feel fantastic in it - so comfortable! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Grabbed on a whim and became my favorite rental!
links_reviews_text: Grabbed this jacket on whim and it ended up being my most worn rental! Wore it to workouts, running errands, and an outdoor concert on a chilly night. Could have gone with a Small but Medium worked just fine too! Ties on the sleeves could get a bit annoying since they are silk and kept untying but overall very pleased with this piece!

links_reviews_title: Loved this coat. Fit perfectly, and can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_text: RTR recommended the small but the shoulders were really tight on me. This is an issue I have a lot so I wasn't super surprised. It was cute but nothing special. If you have broad shoulders, maybe go up a size.
I love this jacket so much I'm considering buying it
There's really nothing special about this Sherpa. It does the job, but it's very simple. Rent if you need a basic black jacket.
Liked it but didn't wear as much as expected, mostly bc it weather and the lack of pockets. True to size.
I'm short with a short torso so the length was perfect. Cute jacket for day or night!

My favorite coat rental so far this winter! The quality is excellent. It's very warm and is perfectly fitted. The lining and sleeve ties are an interesting detail. The gold accents really stick out against the black. After struggling with oversized coats this winter, this was a welcome rental. Gorgeous!
Great casual Friday jacket. Inside has very soft lining. The only downside is the bows at wrists are hard to keep tied. Would rent again!
I love this top! Super soft and silk and looks great with jeans or dress pants. Super flattering and a great springy color!
Cozy sweater, fun colors. Worked well with a bump, sleeves were different and overall I liked it a lot. It stretched out during wear but was soft and cozy. Great casual but fun pop of color.

links_reviews_title: Easy to throw on, wear with anything!
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater! It's heavy material was nice for colder days, no jacket on top was needed. Cute sleeves that gather around the wrists to make it look more unique and super bright colors to make winter more fun! Wore to a friend's 21st birthday dinner, sorority chapter, etc. It worked for everything! Pair with light or dark wash jeans and some trendy sneakers for a casual look.
I love the colors and the balloon sleeves, very on trend and perfect for renting. I'll wear it a couple of times and then send it back, but it's a great trendy sweater to brighten up winter.
This sweater is a good classic throw on with jeans sweater but nothing more than that. I probably wouldn't rent again but it was good for what i needed
It was a comfortable yet thick enough to keep you warm. Casual. Colors were colorful yet neutral. Will wear again!
It fit as it did on the model but with the volume you have to be careful which bottoms it pairs with.
Very cozy, warm, beautiful colors! Wore numerous times and got lots of compliments. Runs large but just size down.
Cute colors and very cozy. Wore a few times!

links_reviews_title: I really loved the bright colors of this sweater, but it was a bit bulky.
links_reviews_text: The sweater was really nice and very warm, but also bulky. The arms kind of ballooned out, which I wasn't expecting but was a nice touch.
Loved this sweater - I'm short so it was oversized but I liked that! Great for winter or fall and not itchy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for everyday wear and work.
links_reviews_text: The sweater is a little shorter in the torso than shown and expected, still super cute! Love the color way and the big sleeves.

links_reviews_title: These sleeves will give you life!
links_reviews_text: Perfect sweater with statement sleeves! No cons, I loved this piece!
Runs a bit baggy and long so perfect for tall girls

links_reviews_title: Color and cut a modern showstopper
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color! Draping at neck and angles on shoulders very contemporary. Arms long enough even for us tall girls. I'd say runs true to size to slightly over because the cut is loose. Liked tucked in and loose. Paired with plaid fringe Ralph Lauren pants also from RTR.
The color is vibrant. The fit frumpy. Did not find this flattering.
Felt confident and loved the color
Never worn yellow before but this shirt struck me. Great way to make your work day brighter. I thought it ran big and needed to be tucked in. I'm an XS/S and 2 fit a little large.

I wore this to the Andy Warhol exhibit at the museum. The bright yellow perfectly fit the theme. While the fit is supposed to be loose and flowy, this size was just too big. I'm going to return it and get a smaller size next time. Love the color!
Such a great pop of color. I wore it with gray jeans, but it would go with so many things. The fit is loose, even with my broad shoulders. Got loads of compliments. Don't want to send this one back.
This shirt is a gorgeous shade of yellow, high quality material. The neck is a bit tight/scratchy but manageable. Non-stop compliments in this.

I wore this bright shirt to work with black pants and heels and I got many compliments. I do not love the fact that it is polyester but I realize that polyester seems to be everywhere even in department stores. The neck is comfortable and the arms are a little on the long side but I like that look these days. I enjoyed wearing it and love Tibi modern Styles.
Loved wearing this top. I got compliments all day. It's boxy, but drapes so nicely - you don't feel like a linebacker. Didn't want to send this one back! The neck wasn't tight at all.

A very aggressive color - true lemon yellow. I liked the shape of the blouse very much but it’s pretty long as well as voluminous everywhere. I wish the neck had been a little tighter so it fit more like a true high-neck and was less droopy/puffy around the collar. A fun piece to wear - renters who want clothes to make their body look smaller or to accentuate their form in a traditional way will probably not like the fit.
OMG this shirt is AMAZING and I would have snatched it up if it wasnt HUGE on me. Size down. I will next time and will probably have to purchase!

Got a lot of compliments on this pretty top! Wore it to work with a pair of slim cut suit pants. The sleeves are a little long but I am in between typical and petite sizes. I normally wear a 4 and I ordered a 2, which fit perfectly in the shoulders and draped nicely from the neckline. If you do not have a slender neck, the neckline would probably be massively uncomfortable. I've got wiggle room and I'm not crazy about the construction of the neckline. It feels a little strangley.

Nice crepe fabric (not see thru) and looks great with dark jeans. I actually rented it twice, but did not get to wear it the second time. I considered purchasing it too. It's a typical Tibi quality top.
Great for, sleeve length and color. Heavy material. Got a ton compliments. Wore for every day with jeans and for work with a skirt. Great neck pinning detail. I would buy it but was too expensive.
It does run large, both by style and fit. Will definitely rent again!
I have a pretty small frame and the shoulders were just too wide.
This is such a headturner. Love the high neck. I was expecting it to be a bit thinner than it actually was, but it was nice that it wasn't see through.
Fun and different top for work. Got quite a few compliments

I felt like a boss b***h in this shirt! I loved the dramatic neck and bright color. It is definitely oversized, but with skinny black pants it looked amazing. I rated it as a slightly large, because even though it is supposed to be oversized, I thought it was a little wide in the shoulders and long overall. But I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and fabric - so elegeant
links_reviews_text: Way too big

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this! Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful material and great fit.
The color and fabric of this top are amazing but it runs big - however I still wore and loved it!
Loved this coat!! Will size down next time

links_reviews_title: The color and fit is fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Definitely a statement coat but I loved the rich pink and the slightly oversized fit. I paired it with an all black outfit. I was warm and it was around 30 degrees. Definitely would rent again!

links_reviews_title: loved how versatile this coat was. I rented it for over a week and didn't want to let go.
links_reviews_text: I wore it with casual and formal clothing. Can't say anything bad about the coat. It doesn't have closure so it was perfect for the 50-60 degree weather we were recently experiencing in the DMV.

Loved the color and overall look. Could be dressed up or down. Wish the lining was a little softer. Good for moderately cold weather (40-50 degrees F). Pleasantly surprised that it wasn't too heavy, didn't feel like I was wearing a ton of fabric.
The jacket is nice and big and warm. It's a little on the heavy side so I would rent for those 50 and lower temps. Super cute to wear into meetings
I wanted this to be softer but the "fur" was just ok. It was warm but wouldn't wear it on a super cold day. I felt that the color washed me out.
This coat is thick, heavy, and massive! But I totally loved it. Even though I had to hold it closed (no buttons/zip) it kept me warm during my public transit commute on a below-freezing day.
I loved this coat. It was so cozy and really a fun addition to any outfit.

links_reviews_title: Incredible coat, fit for a rock star!
links_reviews_text: Got this coat new with tags and I may never give back! This coat is to die for! The blush pink is an unexpected, unique color for winter, but very plush and warm. I only docked one star because there's no way to close/zip the jacket so not ideal for abnormally windy days. It also runs pretty oversized so would prefer it in XS, but it was so gorgeous that I didn't mind keeping it in the small. Definitely a well-made quality piece that stands out from the generic teddy or puffy coats this winter!
Absolutely loved this coat. Makes you feel like a million bucks
big oversized, can be worn over any sweater or jacket. Felt very glamorous
Warm, great color, conversation starter.

Intended for a snowy Valentine's Day getaway, I ended up leaving this coat at home as it was just much too bulky to be attractive on me (5'6", size 8, ordered a M). It was soft and felt like it would be warm - although note there's no closure), but the way the bottom half flared out was very unflattering.
Such an easy process. At first I wasn't sure how it would work and a little worried but, so worth it! This coat was fabulous! Kept me warm in New York.
Totally renting again - obsessed with this coat
This coat is like wearing a very stylish, very warm robe. I didn't keep it as long as I anticipated because the lack of a closure made it a little impractical here in Chicago.
Runs big, feels a little overwhelming. But its is warm and cute. Had a slightly weird smell.
It is large but I read the other reviews and got an extra small. Only thing I liked out of all the products.

Michi makes the best leggings I have ever worn. Immediately after trying these I felt the difference from my regular workout clothes. The waistband is amazing, it holds you in and stays in place when I went for a run or during my HIIT exercises. The fabric moves with you and holds its shape. The pattern is loud and super fun too!
Love the way they fit. I did a sit-ups workout and they didn't move. Comfy too.
I wore this on a 13 mile hike and it worked well, was comfortable, and cute!
Definitely rent these if you want to stand out in the gym. Comfortable enough to sweat in and stylish enough to hit the streets. I wish I kept them!

I was debating between the small and medium and I'm glad I went with a medium. Small still would have fit but medium was comfortable. The waist band is very comfortable and high waisted. Really thick legging not at all see through Versatile. I wore to brunch and to the MET with a black sweatshirt. Also wore to actually work out.
Fun and cute for gym. True to size and comfortable

This set was unbelievably perfect. So comfortable. Pants were stretchy and structured in the perfect way. I forgot I was wearing them but also felt supported by how form fitting they were. I can't wait to rent these again!
Took these on a ski trip and wore to the gym. Little on the short side (I'm only 5'6 and they were upper ankle) otherwise great stretch, soft (ish) material

links_reviews_title: So soft, stretchy, comfortable, fabulous. Compliments everywhere! Obsessed. Never returning.
links_reviews_text: Fits nice and stretchy Not restrictive Thick-ish material so no see-through butt during downward dog or something. Quality!!! OBSESSED. Got with unlimited and legit may keep for months and months. I'm 5'11, 137 lbs, broad shouldered, flat chested (34A), slim/athletic build. I got medium and it fitsamazing and comfy but I could prob squeeze into a small considering how stretchy the set is.
Fun leggings for the gym or casual day wear.
Show all your Flaws
I rented these for the gym but also wore them for lounging around the house. They are thick quality, not see-through and comfortable.
Fit perfect. Fabric extremely soft

links_reviews_title: Got compliments each time I wore these. They're eye catching and comfortable too!
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Mid rise pant, not too high waisted. Didn't camel which is always a pro with athleisure!
Michi runs a little big (I'm usually a medium) but these leggings really make your butt look fantastic

Wore this with the top for a barre program, and I loved it. There were only larges left in the store but I decided to try it out. So glad I did! It was just a little bit loose but there is so much stretch in these leggings that the sizing is flexible. I'm usually a small in michi leggings, but the large fit okay. Medium would probably be perfect. The material is thick and it makes your butt look great!

links_reviews_title: Super cozy and easy to wear jean jacket
links_reviews_text: Really flattering cropped cut which is hard to do since I'm curvey. It was perfect for our annual New Years San Diego trip. The wool sleeves and collar made it cozy and warm. The jean jack part was soft and easy to wear with everything. Wanted to keep it.
Soft and not boxy at all. Really comfy and got lots of compliments!
Way softer than your typical jean jacket! The sherpa top/sleeves were a fun twist that also made it extra amazing because of how soft they made the jacket.
This jacket was unique and cute to wear. I enjoyed having it in my rotation for the month! It is surprisingly warm due to the fabric up top but does run in the short side in length.
Comfortable and trendy, ended up purchasing! Very flattering and fun

Loved this jacket, I'm usually a large but I got the xl to be a bit oversized. The cuffs are a bit bulky so they are hard to roll up like a normal denim jacket. Super comfy, and warm- would rent again!
This coat was SO warm. The shearling goes a long way. My one issue was the pockets - they're weirdly so far back on the torso and mine weren't sewn in on the inside so they just kind of flapped.

I love this jacket so much, it really is now one of my prized possessions. I wear this to go out, casually with a hoodie & leggings.. No matter what, someone compliments it! This jacket is so comfortable and the sleeves are a really thick fleece so it's warmer than a denim jacket. My only real con for this jacket is that the side pockets, for me, are almost entirely unusable. They are so far back and don't open wide enough.

links_reviews_title: Such a versatile jacket and surprisingly warm
links_reviews_text: Jacket can be totally casual or dressed up a bit— the combo of black denim with the black teddy bear is interesting. Jacket is surprisingly warm, too (much warmer than a denim jacket).

I've always wanted a furry jacket but thought the fur might not be flattering but this jacket is the best of both worlds. It's flattering and extremely comfortable. Not constraining at all. Also as someone who is on the shorter side, the length of this jacket hits perfectly.
For great and it's super comfy!
A nice, basic dress, but nothing special about it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and cut but DO NOT SIZE UP
links_reviews_text: I sized up one size as I typically do with this designer but it is not necessary. Runs true to size maybe even a little large. Beautiful color and cut! Perfect for workplace and lightweight material for warmer weather. I just couldn't wear it due to size.

This is the quintessential RTR moment for me- I loved this jumpsuit but I would NEVER buy and honestly only wear once. It's so fun and cool- very baggy but that's the style. Highly recommend stepping out of your comfort zone for this highlighter jumpsuit moment!

I ordered 38 which said it was a size 4! It was ginormous and I had to tight roll the pants and roll sleeves several times to make it even close to fitting. I tried to style it out but friends said it looked like a prison jumpsuit. Couldn't argue. I only gave it 2 instead of one stars because the color is fun and much brighter than I excepted.

I really thought I could make this look chic. The color is awesome. It's just baggy and wide-legged. Big all over. Droopy on the booty. The legs are long (I'm 5'6"). Couldn't even fathom how to style it to make it look good.

links_reviews_title: My husband said I look like a Peep
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is not for the faint of heart. My husband said I looked like a peep going painting. I embraced it. In these crazy COVID times I loved the bright color and it was super comfortable. I probably could have sized down. I rolled the cuffs and sleeves to take away the heaviness of it.

links_reviews_title: The actual Color is fluorescent pink. Way too bright for me. And the fabric is very heavy.

links_reviews_text: I wore this to brighten up Easter Sunday in quarantine and loved it. I'm usually a 4-6 and the 6 was a bit big on me. The pants were long and needed to be cuffed. It's a thick denim so it has some structure. It was comfy and I loved the bright(er than pictured) pink color!

I wanted a comfy soft wfh sweatshirt but was a little disappointed. The one I got had a stain on it but since I was at home I didn't care as much. It also is a little short overall and short on the arms. The material was not soft but actually pretty scratchy and uncomfortable. Cute saying and design but not something I wanted to wear a ton.

links_reviews_title: Needed a little work from home sweatshirt that will boost my mood. This is it - comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: Super comfy material and the saying is adorable. Runs big on arms and shoulders - just enough to be "oversized." Must rent!

links_reviews_title: Nothing special and larger than expected
links_reviews_text: My first time renting this brand and I should have sized down. It was very large and not in a cute and oversized on purpose way. The color was just okay and I didn't especially love the branding on the front.
Flowy and cute! Loved the collar. Quality fabric.
I adored this, got several compliments. Pretty simple design but well executed and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top - Simple and Chic
links_reviews_text: The top was great paired with the matching pants. It runs a little big, but I liked the baggy look. The material is light, good quality. Highly recommend with the matching pants, or even jeans! Also wore it with a blazer for work and it looked great.
Very easy to wear with leggings and pants
Theory stuff is so well made. I felt so cool wearing this. I paired it with green trousers like the model.
I wore this top for a presentation and it was a dream. The color holds up nicely and the fit was perfect. I'll definitely be renting again.

I didn't end up wearing this one because it was too bulky for me. I'm 5'2" + 120 pounds and I was swimming in the small. The amount of space around the shoulders, too, made it look goofy even when tucked into a high-waisted skirt.
The cut, fit and flow of this style is very flattering. I loved it!
Obsessed with this top. I would purchase in every color. The shirt is a bit long, but tucked in works with anything. Love the high neck, color and quality
This top was so long it went down past my butt. Could have been okay tucked in but it was so wide that wouldn't work either. Definitely size down if you decide to give this a try.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt for work or an evening night out.
links_reviews_text: I paired the shirt with the matching pants. Great fall color. It does run big, I am 5'9 150lbs and a 32 DD. if you want it really loose stick with the small but if you want to tuck it in like the photo size down.
True to size. Tight in the upper torso and flows in mid. Loved the shade of green. The fabric is thick and doesn't wrinkle easily throughout the day. Overall great top.
classy

If you are usually between sizes do NOT size up, this top is enormous. Size down at least one size depending on the fit you like. Really bad gaping in the armpits- and I have a broader chest/shoulders so this was a particularly unusual experience for me.
Too big.
Comfortable, some sort of material that doesn't absorb sweat so good for summer. Worn with a skirt tucked in - would have been extremely long if I hadn't tucked it in.

Loved the cut probably could have sized down to a medium since it showed part of my bra in the armpit area. Fabric is not sweat friendly! Found this out, while I was walking in it on a very humid day. Overall great work shirt.
These jeans were really flattering and fit true to size. My only complaint is that they kind of stretched out after a few wears but not a huge deal.

Well these would look better if I were taller (sigh) but I am what I am. I could only wear these with knee length boots because all my booties looked weird with wear edge hit. Also wore with converse and they looked cute. I believe designers are going to have to create ankle & cropped lengths for the 5'3" gal - literally that is the average height of women in US. As they are fringed I am unable to alter them. Fit is great and fabric stayed nice did not stretch out with wear.

PROS: These jeans were so soft and fit so well. Had they been a different style I would have bought them. CONS: The length of these made me look boxy. The length on the model is perfect, but I am not that tall. I'm 5'6" and they were just too long. I only wore them once.
Love these high waisted flared jeans! My fiancé said I looked like a bratz doll lol
Cute/okay/nothing really special- fit was fine.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my outfit - a little too big
links_reviews_text: So stretchy and comfy, but so stretchy that I actually wished I'd gone down a size
I wore these cute flared pants for 2 weeks straight. They were tight my first wear but really stretched out. I wish they were a little shorter but I'm just 5'4"
The cut is super flattering, but a little stiff and not the most comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Unique jeans. Fun flare and fringe.
links_reviews_text: I really liked these jeans. I ordered up and wish I had stuck with a 29 instead of the 30. They had a lot of stretch and got pretty big after wearing a couple of times.

These jeans have a great wash and cut.. they were just a tad longer on me than the crop shown in photo falling joke inch above ankle but Instill like the look. Also run a little small because I'm normally a size 27 but ordered these in 28 and they fit perfectly. Matched in photo with an RTR Madeqell top. I plan to hold onto these for a while!
I usually Am a size 29 but 30 felt GREAT! Super trendy. Got a ton of compliments. Will rent again for football tailgates etc.
Nice but a little tight on the waist.
Cute jeans with a unique hem. Nice everyday jeans nothing special but a cute addition for a week or two!
Super flattering, I have muscular legs and was worried about fit, but they fit perfect and were great for daytime or evening!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and will shape you, but a bit tight at the top!
links_reviews_text: The jean itself was amazing. A bit tight at the top, but helped shape very well.
Love these jeans! I'm curvy with a big butt and they fit perfect. Look soooo cute
Loved the style but too small. I'm normally a size 26. Couldn't get them on. Disappointed because they are a great looking Jean for boots or flats.

links_reviews_title: Loved these jeans! I wore them so many times on vacation!
links_reviews_text: I should have kept them! The fit and frayed hem are so amazing :)

links_reviews_title: Not for people with a butt
links_reviews_text: These jeans fit everywhere else but were very small in the butt area. It seemed odd because they fit well everywhere else but then were very very small there.

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit and fun to mix it up

links_reviews_text: Loved these jeans. They were super flattering. My only complaint is they don't have a lot of stretch and feel a bit constricting after several hour of wear.

links_reviews_title: Loved these jeans - kept them for 2 weeks!
links_reviews_text: Could wear these forever - May rent again and keep. So flattering and excellent fit, while being very stylish! Rent!!

Got these for a concert I went to with work with clients. These pants are so fun- got so many compliments! I really loved the flare bottoms and the fit was really nice. Would rent again or consider buying!

links_reviews_title: relaxed comfortable fit with cute trim on legs
links_reviews_text: comfortable and great wash color
I loved these jeans so much and wore them almost everyday. Rent them.
Fit more like a 10/12, the style is really cute though

I read other descriptions about the jeans being too big but these were too small for me. They have no stretch at all so they definitely weren't budging. Have to send back. They're super cute otherwise though!

These jeans came up quite high, in fitting with the return to the "mom" jean style. I do tend to favor lower waisted jeans and I felt that these were a bit tight if you sit a lot during the day (as I do at work). Otherwise, they look nice and are definitely petite friendly. I am 5'1" and these came down almost exactly over my shoes.
I loved these but think I needed to definitely size down 1-2 sizes

These jeans were great. A true high waist with a good amount of stretch. They did stretch out throughout the day but not enough to size down. I loved the flare bottom - they made these more interesting than just a plain jean.

links_reviews_title: Trendy and fun. Soo many compliments!
links_reviews_text: High waisted and fun cropped flare legs! Another reason I love RTR, trying styles I never would have before. Perfect with booties or full boots.

Some of the reviews said these ran large but I disagree! I ordered a size down and they were too tight around the waist. Painful! Didn't stretch out much. I couldn't wear them for a full day and ended up sending them back early. Fun cut and color, I just think they're true to size!
Runs big, feels like it's going to fit when you first put them on, but they stretch out tremendously during the day.
Got my normal size and couldn't get them over my butt - i would order a size up. These are cute but not for me!

links_reviews_title: I immediately tried it on and it fits very nicely!
links_reviews_text: I immediately tried it on and it fits very nicely! It is very comfortable, but snug fitting.
Such cute jeans, have a lot of stretch!

links_reviews_title: Cute style, fit wasn't bad but not particularly flattering
links_reviews_text: Would size down

links_reviews_title: The waist was very big, so unfortunately I couldn't wear these. Very cute style, though!
links_reviews_text: Cute style, runs large.
the easiest, snuggliest staple. this orangey-red color palette is bold but flattering. the knit is thick and warm but still workable enough for a front-tuck.
Cute sweater - love the bright orangey red. It is more red than orange. The perfect rental sweater, bc I liked wearing it but wouldn't have really wanted to wear it more than once or twice.

I loved this sweater so much! The color is vibrant and beautiful and I received compliments all day! The fit was perfect, and the material was nice + warm, (but not itchy, uncomfortable or bulky in any way). Dreaming of owning this perfect red sweater.

links_reviews_title: Don't want to give it back!
links_reviews_text: This is a great cozy winter sweater that goes well with jeans or skirts. It's also a fun, bright color that doesn't feel over Christmas-y or dull. Super soft, my only complaint is that it leaves little red fuzzies around. I wore it a handful of times and sending it back is giving me separation anxiety!
Not for tall gals though. Wasn't able to wear it because the sleeves were too short. I'm 5'6 for reference. Otherwise, a beautiful sweater! Loved the color.
Baggy fit and nice length. I loved the turtleneck. The shade of red is bright and beautiful, making it perfect for a Valentine's date.

I LOVED this sweater! I wore it a number of times during the month I rented it, and got so many compliments. If you're looking for something to spice up your winter look AND stay warm, I highly recommend this sweater!

links_reviews_title: Cute and well made. Great color pop.

links_reviews_text: This red is everything!! Such a perfect orange red, great cut (I wore It tucked for a more cropped look) and sleeves were a good length. Loved the mock turtle neck, so flattering and didn't mat up the back of my hair ;)
Love the color of this sweater (especially for the holidays) but the cut is super weird- the sweater felt cropped and was not full arm length. The fabric was stiff for a sweater too.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, boxier but still good length.
links_reviews_text: Loved this soft sweater! Great fit.

Fit is slightly oversized, longer than I thought based on pictures and I'm tall-ish. Sleeves have nice details not obvious in pictures. The first time I wore it received so many compliments, the second time I wore it not so much. It pills really badly. Bummer. Other than the peskky pills it's lovely.
Color is amazing!!! Got it with tags but by the end of the day it was already pulling a little bit under my arms. Overall really cute and a fun sweater!
I loved this sweater! It added a pop of color to my day, and was extremely soft and kept me warm! It does pill easily, so be on the lookout for that
The fabric balls easily
Was sent brand new sweater. Adorable on but sheds everywhere! Could have sized down

I rented these in 10 bc I wasn't sure about sizing. I usually wear a 28-29 and am thicker on bottom. The 10's worked fine but I ended up buying a pair of 8's that I think are more flattering. If you are super curvy like me, Order your tts and a larger as backup. They are very high waisted so pairs well with cropped tops. I wore with a cropped leather jacket. Very versatile jeans.
I loved these. I sized up based on other reviews, but I could have gone down a size. They were very high waisted and so flattering. Khloe does jeans right!

links_reviews_title: Stretchy and just what you'd expect from camo pants

links_reviews_text: These are the perfect camo jeans! I wish I didn't have to return them. I love them so much, and I got so many complements on them when I wore them!
The jeans are flattering and trendy but run extremely small. I should have listened to other reviews and went up a size. I wasn't able to wear these but would consider renting again in a larger size.
