Fits like a glove and very high-rise, creating a very flattering, tummy-shaping fit. But, the fabric doesn't have any stretch, so it's not the most comfortable piece to move in. For a rental, great! To own, maybe not? I loved trying it though, since I wanted to try this brand out.

I had been wanting to try Good American jeans for a while and these did not disappoint. I love them except the item description is way wrong. The ones that I received have a 27" inseam. I'm still giving them 5 stars, though, bc if it weren't for the inaccurate measurement, these would be my dream jeans as far as how they fit everywhere else.
Great fit for a woman with some hips and medium waist. The fabric was stretchy and flattering. Awesome!
I was so impressed with how well these jeans fit and how flattering they were. Made my butt look awesome. I will definitely rent again.
I could not even get these over my hips! Will return and size up because the jeans themselves are adorable!
Love these pants!! They are slightly high waisted and so flattering. Perfect camo print!
I considered buying them, but the price stopped me. I wore them multiple times to work, out with friends, etc. They are incredibly comfortable with just the right amount of stretch
They have a little stretch and are nice and high waisted! They're a bit long on me, not cropped at all but fit well and are comfortable.

These are the kind of jeans that are so comfortable you feel like you're wearing leggings. I have wider hips and a thinner waist and they fit me great. Loved the look of these and would wear them again and again.

I have been wanting to try the good American brand and fell in love with these pants. The fit was perfect and I love the stretch as it hug every curve. I normally wear a size 6 in pants and went with the reviews of going up a size in the 8 fit great!
Very stretchy. I seized up after reading reviews but I could have stayed at my original size. I'm considering buying I like these so much. Fabric is amazing and definitely a fan of good american now.

Ordered these as part of RTR Unlimited and wore a few times to casual events. They look great and fit very comfortably. I normally wear a 27 in most brands and the 4R fit perfectly. The waist hit right at my bellybutton. They are definitely very form fitting but the material was soft so they didn't feel tight at all.

links_reviews_title: Fun spin on jeans and a tee!
links_reviews_text: I wore these several times when I was running around but also had potential work activities to do. Easy to dress up with a sequin sweater or down with a basic tee. Super high waisted.

When I held these up, I thought that there would be no way these jeans would fit but the fabric is miraculous!!! Not only did they fit but they made my post-pregnancy pudge nonexistent! Totally recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, cimfy jeans. I want to own these!
links_reviews_text: Really smooth fit and it feels like you arent even wearing pants
These are super thin jean material, stretchy legs, stiff non-stretch waist, so a little bit of an awkward fit, I made them work under a large shirt and sweater, so they looked more like leggings.

From the high waist to the tapered ankle the cut is perfection for my curvy figure the fabric is what takes them over the top! The perfect amount of stretch and thickness to provide comfortable flattering fit

links_reviews_title: Fabric is thick, holds everything in the right place.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, runs a little small, so order a size or 2 up.

Lots of stretch, comfortable high waist, subtle print. Very flattering. I wore around town with a grey sweater and sneakers then dressed them up for dinner with wedge booties and a black silk camisole. I'll be sad to send them back.
Its just tight enough and doesn't dig into your stomach in an uncomfortable way

links_reviews_title: The jeans looked great and I looked on trend with the camo at work then out at night!
links_reviews_text: They do run a little small- I chose 14R and normally wear 12 R, so sizing up worked out well. There was a good amount of stretch to them even through the calves (which can be tight on skinny jeans). The print was easy enough to pair with many tops- these jeans would be a great buy for anyone who has thick legs.

Loved these, they are tts. I wear 25-26 in denim and wore 0R, which fit perfectly. They have just the right amount of stretch and are great for anyone with a booty. There was a touch of extra room in the thighs, but it made them all the more comfortable because they hug your curves but don't feel like sausage casing.

They are true to size. I probably wear a 14R in most US sizes, but I measured according to Good American and I was an18. Glad I did b/c there was NO stretch. SUPER flattering, no gap/muffin top. These pants rock. I didn't take pics, sorry, but I wore with tanks and also more dressy with blazer and heels.

links_reviews_title: Traveling was uncomfortable for high waisted
links_reviews_text: First time wearing high waisted pants.. pretty uncomfortable, but cute fit

I sized up because I heard that these jeans might run a little small. The fabric is really soft and stretchy and I love the high waist. It hits me right at my natural waist line. I'm going to be keeping these for a few extra days and I'm debating actually buying them!
perfect for a casual night out

links_reviews_title: Made for thick thighs & small waist?
links_reviews_text: This was an odd fit for an hourglass shape who typically fits most size 32 pants. It was designed for a smaller waist than mine, yet had extra room in the thighs? Didn't receive any compliments wearing these, but I liked the color and print.
Pros: Great fit, tight around hips and smaller waist so there is no gap in back. Fun print worn with black t-shirt, jean jacket and tan flats. Cons: Runs small. I wore one size up.
Even though these are smaller than other 18s, they have an amazing fit. Perfect hug on curves, love them!

I LOVE these pants but they run very small. I'm usually always a size 14, even in skinny but I could zip these up at all. I'll be sending back and getting a size 16. Love the print and feel of these but hate that they ran small.

links_reviews_title: Most comically small pants in the world
links_reviews_text: I thought these pants were miss-marked when they came because they were so tiny but then thought maybe they stretch? Nope, they do not. The waist was the size of one of my thighs. Really disappointed.
This is a fun top but one of the ones I'd never buy myself, so renting is perfect!

links_reviews_title: So cute and got so many compliments! Flattering
Perfect for a nicer lunch date in the city
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a lunch date at a chic cafe tucked into some vintage denim and a heel. The material was thick and structured which helped the silhouette look bit more sophisticated while still being feminine.

links_reviews_title: BIG Sleeves - but not difficult to manipulate
links_reviews_text: Styling is important with this blouse- the sleeves are VERY puffy, but the top, shoulders and body is slim and the fabric has a stretch. Can look a bit like "Amish woman meets NYC" but with the right pops of color looked stylish. Packs well

links_reviews_title: Beautiful work to dinner blouse. Comfortable, interesting and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved it, size 14 was too big, but I think I would only go to a size 12. Love fabric + design.

links_reviews_title: Easy for a day working from home
links_reviews_text: I'm not usually one to wear big logos on my clothes, so this was pushing the envelope for me. But it was subtle enough and it was so comfortable to wear all day!

I was presently surprised when this arrived - it is much more sweater than the sweatshirt it looks like! This is a fantasticly woven sweater with bright colors and contrasts. Warm, cozy and basic fun! Paired it with pink hair, coral glitter eyeshadow, and a brazen cheek highlight for my Zoom calls...perfect Tuesday!

Love this! So warm and the color is vibrant! The sweater is kind of boxy and not very flattering. I am usually a size 4 or S/M and easily could have gone for a xs if I wanted a more form fitting look.
The sweater quality is great. I like the color combinations and the subtle Coach pattern. I wear either a medium or large in sweaters. I'd recommend the medium as it runs large.

What a fun sweater! I wore this twice, once with jeans and sneakers and once with a pencil skirt and flats, and I received a lot of compliments both times. It's very comfortable and cozy. I sized down based on the other reviews and was glad I did. Perfect sweater!

I am in LOVE with this sweater. It was so comfy and the cut of it was sleek. I wore it with jeans and booties so it was appropriate for my casual work environment. I wish a medium was available because it would fit a bit better, but large was fine for an over-sized look.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and warm but runs pretty large
links_reviews_text: Sweater is a cute winter basic. Nice and warm and pairs nicely with shoes because of the various colors. It does run quite large though. I was wearing two layers underneath and still had plenty of room. If I rent again, I will size down. I typically wear an XL/14-16 in tops for reference.

This sweater was a perfect pair with jeans to bring splashes of color and comfy to a cold overcast day. It doesn't cling but it doesn't swallow you either. Could also go nicely with a cropped pant and heels for a super cute look for work. Very impressed!
Super soft and cozy. Love the print. Nothing to complain about, I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Felt stylish even while taking care of kiddos with the flu at work!
links_reviews_text: Really love this one! So soft and warm and the colors are really bright and beautiful! I like my sweaters oversized but went with my normal size medium based on other reviews that it ran large and happy I did. Plenty of room to be comfy. Got a ton of compliments!

There's a reason this sweater retails for like $500 - it's perfect. Super flattering, great material, not too heavy, cute pattern and I could pretty much wear this everyday. Definitely size down with this one, it runs pretty large.
I loved the pattern and colors and the fabric is thick and comfortable.
Cool sweater but it's boxy. If you don't like the chunky look don't rent it.
Ran so large! I was swimming in it-had to sent it back and the smaller size was not available.

links_reviews_title: So warm and comfortable. Not to mention adorable.
links_reviews_text: I rented this sweater for everyday wear. It's really warm and comfortable without being too thick. It does run loose/ large. I can't wait to rent again in a smaller size.
I loved the feel of this sweater and got a lot of compliments on it. However, it was very baggy and I wish I would have gone a size down.
Unique sweater for a casual Friday at work. I am a 0/2 and XS was perfect (with room). Not itchy.

I was excited to run this fun sweater. I rented the recommended size, however when I tried it on it was way too big. Arms were too long and just too much fabric. Would like to try again in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: nice pattern, received compliments, very warm
links_reviews_text: fit true to size, a little heavy but really nice quality
Slightly large but still looks nice.

links_reviews_title: I saw. I wanted it. I bought it.
links_reviews_text: Was not disappointed when it arrived. So pretty and sparkly! If you want to get in on the Lucite bag trend, this is a great one@
Cute sweater. Cool details. Not a showstopper but a good staple piece.
Fit great, was warm but breathable. Love it! Want to keep it!

It's a cute sweater and pattern, but given it's heavy material it is kind of stiff and boxy. It was shorter than expected, including the sleeves. I was hoping for something more oversized. I didn't wear it as it just wasn't very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little large but still comfy!
links_reviews_text: I would have worn this over and over but says to dry clean only otherwise would have been on constant rotation while quarantining at home!

links_reviews_title: Very thick and stiff and the turtleneck collar was very tight. Ran very small overall
Very thick with a small neck hole
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this sweater, but the neck hole was pretty small and constricting. I only wore it for a few hours and had to fold down the collar to make it more comfortable. The material was super thick and not itchy, but not soft at all.
Super boxy, thick material, but wearable (although not super flattering). The head hole is TINY TINY TINY so put your sweater on before you do your makeup or you'l get it all over your white top :)

I loved the look of this turtleneck and it was a cozy transition piece for finicky NYC weather! Removed 2 stars because the neck was so hard to get over my head (and I have a small head!) it literally scraped across my face when I put it on. It had no stretch to it.

links_reviews_title: Great, comfortable cozy sweater. Very wearable!
links_reviews_text: Flattering and comfy... a great staple!
This sweater was thick and a bit boxy. I was actually getting a little too warm and stuffy in it, typically I am cold in my office.

This is a beautiful sweater. For a neutral, chunky, knit sweater - you wouldn't believe the compliments I received. Please be mindful that it is really thick! Though not super soft but not scratchy, it was a classy piece that could be worn with jeans or dressed up with a skirt.

links_reviews_title: So soft and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.
This sweater was perfect. It isn't too oversized but has the right amount of room. Beautifully made.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for work and the start of the cooler fall season in Oregon.
links_reviews_text: Wowwww, I did not like this sweater. While the material is really nice (soft, thick, flexible but not cheap), I thought the fit was super strange. Oversized? Not a problem. But the neckline and shoulder/ribcage fit made me feel like I was in football gear. No thanks!

I'm pretty sure something was wrong with the sweater I received. The material was soft and heavy and overall it appears to have a wonderful loose fit but unfortunately the neckline is so tight I couldn't get it over my head.
Loved everything about this sweater but it is HEAVY so I didn't wear it. Will definitely rent again for the winter!!

links_reviews_title: Great piece but a little big
links_reviews_text: The vest has pockets and is very soft and warm. It is big, though. Only downside. Size down.
Very cute style but be careful wearing with a sweater sheds!!
Not normally something I would choose but decided to include it in my unlimited shipment. It was really cozy and perfect for a cold dc night out.
Warm, soft, has pockets. Can dress it up or down. Love it!
Fits well and is very comfortable. No button so it's always "open" but I basically lived in this for two weeks. It sheds a little bit on dark clothing but not terribly.
Loved this ! Very fun

links_reviews_title: Great accent piece when it's chilly out
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed bringing a little variety to my jeans and boots with this piece. Wore it to dinner, a date night and to work for casual Friday.
I've been looking for a vest like this and was so glad it was on RTR. Super warm and soft. Loved this
Very trendy and oh so warm. Plus it has pockets, covers the booty so it is perfect for leggings and a top. Would absolutely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great stylish piece. It can be worn as a dressy piece for an event or every day piece.
links_reviews_text: This fits true to size. I am a size large with broad shoulders. It was just the right size, it wasnt hanging off of me, it fell loose perfectly.

I totally loved this vest. It's super soft and cozy, and feels high quality. I usually wear between an 8 and 12 in dresses, so I got a size large, but since the vest itself is oversized, I think I could've gone with a small or medium. Because it's oversized, it does hit below the hip, so next time I order this vest, I'll probably get a smaller size so it hits a bit higher. Overall, super warm and comfortable, and it goes with everything!

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy! Looks high quality

links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this and went with so many things. I dressed it up with a turtleneck and heeled boots, but also went with a more casual look with a flannel and uggs. It does shed a bit so be aware when wearing black

links_reviews_title: Cute & Warm, but left hair on everything!
links_reviews_text: First time I wore it with black pants and top, and I had to lint roll and wash everything twice. Next time I wore it with blue jeans and white shirt and wasn't as bad or noticeable. Renter be aware!

links_reviews_title: Soft and comfy! Got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Fabric is soft and felt really well made

This was a remarkably versatile vest. I wore it with work clothes, I wore it with jeans, and I wore it on a variety of days when it ran hotter and cooler. I suggest renting this vest, it is very chic and great for fall / winter.
I love the feel of this vest. It does run large so it is not meant for petite women like me.

This vest is amaaaaaaaazingly soft inside and out. It's softer than real suede and it's very well made. My only issues with it are that 1) it gets white lint all over anything you wear underneath it, so a dark/black top ends up looking awful. You have to wear a light top. And 2) It's not very flattering to an hourglass figure because it adds bulk around the hips and there's no waist definition whatsoever. When I wear this it's only for errands, etc. I wouldn't want to be photographed in it lol. It is super cute and cozy though.
Be aware these are clip on - I liked it so they didn't pull down my ears but they did pop off twice. It was the perfect pop of pink with my dress and stood out in my dark hair.

These. Are. Huge. I was expecting a dainty earring for Valentine's Day. They were about 3 times the size I had in mind. So large, in fact, that they are clip on as to not rip out your ear hole. But I wore them because they were festive and glad I did! They photograph really well.
Perfect earrings to bright up an outfit! They are clip-ons and pretty comfortable for their size!
Wore all day to work and out to date night, and the clip ins did not bother me at all. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect coat for a week around Madrid in Feb
links_reviews_text: Light weight, easy to pack, keeps you warm -- loved this coat.

This jacket is light, soft, and comfortable. I took it from work day to workout in cold SF. A little short and loose in the bottom, but has adjustable bungees. The wrist elastic was also a bit tight and sleeves short, keep in mind for the XS.
fit well, good color

links_reviews_title: Fun and simple jacket for running around town. Very casual.
links_reviews_text: True to fit sizing.
Runs large and not flattering..cute color though!
I like the fit and it was light. Only thing it runs a little large, recommend sizing down. I wore a small and generally a medium would be comfortable for me. Small was still pretty loose

links_reviews_title: Truly great. The packable travel pillow capability is so great for traveling.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Love this jacket. Perfect light puff for a casual but not too sporty look.
I thought this jacket might be too wide but it's great. I wear it all the time - color is perfect. Might purchase since it's sold out at Madewell.
Love this color, the jacket is a nice medium puffer - looks awesome for everyday wear!

Cuter in person than in the picture. Great for travel because it is so lightweight. True to size and room to fit a sweater under. Kept me warm in weather approaching freezing. Might have bought it except for two things, no hood in case of rain and no zippers on the pockets.

The color is a neutral olive green and goes with anything. The fit is a little loose so I went with the XXS so it was more fitted. I could still wear a sweater or vest underneath. The material works for 50-60 degree weather and in the 40s with a vest. Would be good for traveling. It's too light for cool NYC weather right now (30s) but I'll rent again in the Spring!
Fits well. Feminine.
It a basic shirt for work or day but the front v has flaps on the inside that were extremely annoying to me
I loved this top! Wore it to a beef steak for very comfortably and I loved the detail on the sleeve. Already thinking about renting again

Immediately loved this shirt the moment I tried it on! It's nice and lightweight, perfect for layering under a blazer for work and the cute shoulder and sleeve details make it fun and different for the evening or weekend. Plenty of room to breathe for my DD chest, stretchy material.
This was pretty tight and the slit was super high.
Great color, fit, slit is maybe a little high for work but super cute dress!

So obsessed with this dress. So form flattering (I'm not very curvy and it gave me shape). Loved loved loved the buttons. So many compliments. I do have pretty muscular legs/butt so it was kind of tight through the butt/quads when I sat down, but that was my only complaint. One of my favorite rentals!!!

The material feels so soft to wear. The solid green color gives the classy look. However, the stylish slit and buttons (on the right shoulder) give the playful look! I love it! I normally wear a size 4-6. At the time. size 12 is the available size left to rent. So, I still rented it for my sister to wear. It ended up to fitted for her even though she normally wears a size 12. I tried it on - It fits for me (size 4-6). Please see photo attached. Hope this dress gives you joy :)
Awesome fit and color. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Slit too high, not appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress but sadly the slit was too high, and combined with the tighter fit, it was not appropriate for work. I sent it back unworn!
I loved this dress although it was a little tight fitting. Runs a bit on the smaller scale. Beautiful embroidery beads on the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Honestly I just rented it because it was green and I can't wear it to do the weather normally.
links_reviews_text: This dress is pretty but runs wayyyyy small. I am usually around an 8/10 and had to size all the way up. Split detail is pretty. The green isn't as vibrant as I would have liked but a nice structured dress. Rides up when you sit though so be careful!

great dress - runs a little small. For work - needed to size up. If snug - go with the suggested RTR size. BUT the slit in the front was too high for the office - it went back unworn. If you are shorter than my height - it would probably work for you.
Cute dress, too small
Slit way too high and dress too skin tight for work- maybe ok for more of a date night party but was too tight for me.

Love the dress but it runs very small. Black Halo is very inconsistent with sizing. I wear between an 8 and 10 with them and ordered a 12 and it was still small. I wonder if the size is mistagged? I couldn't even wear this dress. RTR customer service was fantastic at allowing a quick replacement so thank you but if you are considering this dress, go up in size.

I wear a 4 or 6 in all RTR dresses. This one because it is stunning and a beautiful green which is hard to find, I will reorder when the 8 is in stock. I wore it for a two hour meeting and then went home and changed because it was way to tight.

links_reviews_title: Good but runs on the small side
links_reviews_text: Good dress great color. If you have curves order the next size

I got a size 8 as recommended but could have sized down to a 6. The slit in the leg made me slightly self conscious at first as I work in a conservative government environment but once I put on boots and a statement necklace with the dress it felt very work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS! So form fitting and perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress for a formal event. The color is beautiful and the dress fits like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Was unable to wear dress because it was so small. It was skin tight.
links_reviews_text: Color was very pretty. However dress was too small and I was unable to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for work or cocktails.
links_reviews_text: This dress ran small. After researching the company I found that most of their items run 1 - 2 sizes small.

links_reviews_title: I was very disappointed in the dress. Super cute but ran super small.
links_reviews_text: This dress is not true to size order a 4 based off measurements - however needed a 6.
Color in this dress is beautiful. The flit ran a little high for work--crawled up my leg when sitting in a meeting.
Couldn't wear :( tight in shoulders and thighs. Thought about sizing up , but seems like cut is just more for a slender build.

links_reviews_title: Great color but Slit too high
links_reviews_text: The slit along the left leg comes up much higher than shown in the picture I picked it for a charity dinner that was cocktail dress but not black tie. The color was nice, but didn’t like the material or the fit on.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress but high thigh slit
links_reviews_text: I really liked the dress. It's good quality and beautifully made but the thigh slit runs just a bit too high for the office especially when you sit down. Otherwise really loved it. Would definitely rent again for a dinner or party not with my coworkers.
The color is so vibrant and I love the buttons on the sleeves and the slit. I got so many compliments. A little fitted in the hips and butt for hourglass women. Definitely had room in the waist still
The dress fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I felt like Joan Holloway. Got tons of compliments, even from complete strangers
links_reviews_text: It fits snugly but true-to-size.

links_reviews_title: Great color but a little tight
links_reviews_text: Other reviews here are right - it's a pretty dress but runs small.
Very close fitting, but super pretty

links_reviews_title: Great color with a classy design.
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Split just enough to be sexy without being inappropriate for work. Peekaboo buttons on one side of sleeve great pop of style. Loved this dress will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but not great fit on 14-16
links_reviews_text: Super pretty dress but did not fit well on my size 14-16 bod. A bigger size (16) would have fit well but was unable to wear size 14.
Love the style, need a larger size.
The side slip was a little too racy for me to wear at work.
I didn't wear this dress. The shoulders fit strangely and made the look more dated than it should be.
Beautiful dress and material. Really liked the design. I run between an 8 and a 10 and the 8 didn't zip. I'm going to re-rent in a larger size

links_reviews_title: I should have trusted the reviews
links_reviews_text: Such a gorgeous color and design, but runs too small--I didn't wear it and was so sad!

links_reviews_title: gorgeous dress that ran a little tight
links_reviews_text: usually black halo runs TTS but this one was weirdly fitted. the slit is also kind of high and if too small can look bad. but pretty color/shape/buttons were interesting.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, high slit might be too risqué for some
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous! It fit a little too small on me however I would wear this to a wedding and not at work. The slit is definitely high up on the thigh.
This ran very small for me. 18 wouldn't even come close to fitting.
Great color

links_reviews_title: This dress was a perfect pick me up for my virtual work days!
links_reviews_text: Great print dress! I can see myself wearing in while on vacay or just out for stroll around town. Fits TTS and very roomy.

links_reviews_title: Cute! I should have ordered my true size which is a 2R
links_reviews_text: Was too big in the waist. Long, comfortable in the sleeves. Overall length reached my ankles. The material is a little scratchy but overall it's a nice day dress with an adorable summer pattern.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments but tight in the hips
links_reviews_text: I got so many wonderful compliments on this dress (regal, chic, professional, elegant) and overall I like it! But I'm very pear shaped and it was a little tighter in the hips than I had anticipated. Would definitely recommend for tall women of all shapes though!

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite dress - not as flattering as the model pic shows
links_reviews_text: Fit was a bit awkward on - felt both too modest but also too clingy in less-than-ideal places.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress - does not show too much leg
links_reviews_text: bit large overall.

The dress is fine - it's well made and not see through, which I liked. Overall, it's just a regular black dress with the button detail in the back. I wore it with a small belt at the waist to give it more shape. I didn't find anything really special about this.

I am a bit pear-shaped, but dresses usually work on me. This dress was too tight in the skirt and huge on top. It also reminded me a bit of an Amish dress. Beautiful fabric, just overall, not a good fit, and not my look.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing as too big.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but was way too big in the waist. I didn't end up wearing it as the extra fabric in the wrap around ended up looking very unflattering.
Very comfortable and flattering dress for work, can be worn with flats (which I did) or dressed up more with heels. Multiple colleagues asked where I bought it! Will likely rent again :)

This dress is very flattering and even though it is simple, the little touches add a very nice effect. I wore this to a business dinner and it was perfect. Could have been worn to any semi formal event.
Fit is fine but it's unflattering, no standout details that make it an interesting rental. a little too nunnery for me.

This has a typical A-line fit, very comfortable and easy to throw on and go. I wore it a couple times both casual but this would also look nice worn with sandals for a dressier look. My only complaint was the inset of fabric is not pure white but off white. Not a deal breaker though-will rent again in warmer weather!
Great cut, fit, fabric and so flattering! Will be renting again.
Material is thicker than expected. Overall, quality is good. Not much stretch; dress sizing runs smaller than other brands. 4 fits me perfectly.

I did not care for this dress. It ran very large. It was a very conservative, however because it was so big it gaped around the boobs for me. The dress was just big all over. It did not flatter me at all. It has a zip back which I was able to do myself. The color was nice and I received a lot of compliments but it was not a favorite of mine.
This dress is high quality. It was pretty fitted but still looked professional. I will def rent again and also want to try the green one!

links_reviews_title: Quality fabric and well made! Perfect for special work event.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Very comfortable fabric. Love the length- just below the knee on me and I'm 5'5". Would rent more from this designer.
The neckline of the dress was way more modest than it looked in the pictures. Was very difficult to zipper and unzipper without the help of a second person so I ended up not being able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Dress looked very nice on me. Everyone loved the dress and wanted to know where I bought it from.
links_reviews_text: I loved how the dress fitted and everyone loved the dress

Rented this for a headshot and overall it was great. The fabric is thick and suitable for work. It is true to size and color matches descriptions. It is a little long and overwhelming for my 5'2 frame though and if I size down the bust would have been too tight.
perfect for work and evening function
Fit ok
This dress has great form and fit, made me feel like Kate Middleton! Got lots of compliments on this one.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear it, too big
links_reviews_text: The dress was too big, was not able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Nice fabric, next time one size up may fit better.
links_reviews_text: Nice dress, but it's too busty for work.

links_reviews_title: Something about this dress didn't fit right
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 6, so I knew this dress might be too large. When I pulled it on, there was something about the way it fit across my back and shoulders that made it really hard to move my arms. The quality seemed very nice, it just didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: High-wasted - not for tall or big chested gals
links_reviews_text: Not a dress for anyone with a chest. The waistline is so short on this
Love the color and fabric of this dress. It's perfect for winter. This dress did not work for me at all. I am very square and this dress has very distinct hips.
This is a nice professional sheath. The Vneck is not too deep for work. It is a nice heavy material that laid nicely and was easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Top fit great, bottom too baggy
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a work holiday party. The top fit but the bottom part was very baggy.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but tight across the bust
links_reviews_text: Amazing quality. Stunning fabric. Very little give and tight across the bust - I should have ordered 1 size up from my usual.
The fit is a bit snug (especially the size of the arms) but the quality of the fabric and tailoring is fabulous! The fit is super flattering!

Ordered size XS and it looked like I needed to gain 25lbs before I could properly fit into this jumper without it being too baggie. This truly would have been a very cute outfit if it were to fit. If you're 5'7 and weigh somewhere around 108lbs, xs will not fit without some serious hemming.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for important NY work meetings and also to speak on a panel at a conference
links_reviews_text: This dress fits REALLY well. I got a ton of compliments. It looks great with both booties and with a taller boot.
Fit was very comfortable and warm. Form fitting in a good way.

The tie is very wide and odd. A bow or a knot turns out huge and the way they have in the photo comes undone. Also too big, too wide, made the v neck uneven and dress bunch on the side. Comfy material. Maybe not great for a petite woman
The front twist makes it unique. A good choice for casual office day. A little bit clingy so wear something smooth underneath.

links_reviews_title: Cosy, warm, very comfy, and just OK sweater dress for work.
links_reviews_text: This sweater dress sort of disappointed. Maybe gray isn't my color. I love how warm and cosy and comfortable it is. But I just feel it doesn't flatter my curves like other sweater dresses. I feel this would look better on less bustier women- not that it doesn't have room for boobs. It does. But they way it shows off my bust is more in a frumpy way than in a boobilicious way.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I kept it!
links_reviews_text: Comfy, sexy, cool. To me, this is the perfect dress. It hugs your curves yet the fabric is super breathable. Perfect for fall and winter. Fits true to size or maybe a little large. I fell in love the moment I tried it on and hit "buy" faster than on any other RTR dress.

I really liked this cozy dress for a blustery day. It's a perfect length for work and the material is warm without being too hot. It's also conservative in the neckline. The only reason I'm giving it four stars is because I wouldn't wear this out on the town, it's not flattering enough on me, but I would 100% rent again for work this winter.

links_reviews_title: Professional for office and work event...
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Adorable. Wore with spanks and felt great!
Great work dress but a little short
links_reviews_text: Very comfy but still dressed - just a little but too short for my taste. But absolutely doable.

links_reviews_title: The top part is beautiful, the bottom is a bit unflattering but the material is super comfy
links_reviews_text: If I was wearing this for a special event I may have felt self conscious as it does nothing for my butt. Totally pretty and fine for a regular work day.

This dress was not really outside my style zone, but it was a very soft, warm material and easy to wear. I paired it with black boots. I found the cross of fabric in the front to be a bit awkward--one side was higher than they other. But it was a chic, classy and conservative dress. I am tall and found that it hit above my knee.

links_reviews_title: The most comfortable, flattering and warm dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is one of my favorites. I was hesitant to wear because I don't like v neck dresses but the neckline was high up that it didn't bother me. This is the perfect cold weather dress for work or any casual day!

I feel blasé about this one. My husband and I both were like, eh, it's OK. Fit is fine, tie thing prob needs to be adjusted now and then. I'm 15 mos pregnant, and it didn't flatter or unflatter, per se. I look to RTR for high quality clothing that is ideally outside my regular spending range and feels luxe, and this kind of feels like Club Monaco level to me. Ended up not wearing.

links_reviews_title: A sweater dress with a twist
links_reviews_text: Wore it to a family holiday gathering - it was a perfect dressed up casual look. The knit is nice and thick (it was warm!), but slightly on the itchy side.
My husband complimented me in this dress, which doesn't happen often. Very cosy and comfortable, yet dressy enough for work. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Everything about this is so flattering and great for work.
links_reviews_text: Thick material , great for cold weather .wore with patterned tights and looked great
Nice fit and flattering, I wore a spanx.

Unfortunately this dress fell short of expectations. It's an awkward fit, there's lots of extra material along the back. This dress is made for a slim figure, not for pear-shaped gals. The material is on the thinner side, not heavy.
I wore this to work, church, and a university alumni event. It was perfect for all occasions and I got compliments each time I wore it.

So being curvy you get to know what cuts are flattering. Typically the wrap dress is the most flattering on curvy figures ; however, this accentuated all the wrong areas. Not too mention it was very itchy!

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a basic dress.
links_reviews_text: I sized up and probably didn't need too- would have worked in my regular size. The twist front is a great detail on a basic dress. I wore with tights and tall thigh black boots.
This dress is gorgeous and warm but was overwhelming in my 5'0 frame. I will try a size smaller. It will likely be too snug across the bum for work but hopefully good for the weekend
SO Cute!!!!! Stretchy material yet tight material. Will accentuate your curves.

links_reviews_title: Cute transition to a boot-cut jean.
links_reviews_text: These jeans are quite rigid, with no stretch. I found the 29 in another cut to be a bit big, so I sized down, but found these far too tight. Size up!
These run SO small with no stretch - definitely size up!

As everyone else has said, I ordered these two sizes larger than my normal size and the waist/hip area is so tight I couldn't zip them. The denim itself seemed kind of thin, weird/ill fitting in general.
These jeans have no stretch whatsoever. I am a 28 in almost all brands (sometimes a 27) and could not even come close to zipping the 28's I rented.
I ordered this pair and another in the same size. These didn't even come past my hips! If size up 2 sizes

links_reviews_title: Blue and SPARKLES. Still loved it!
links_reviews_text: I read the previous reviews that said it had way more glitter than the pictures show, and it's true... LOTS of sparkles. And I'm not usually a sparkle kinda gal. But I loved the fit, wore with Spanx leggings and high waisted denim. The slits on the sides do go rather up high but is fine is you have on a high waisted bottom. SO cute!

links_reviews_title: Work or home. This sweater is so fun!
links_reviews_text: Shorter in front and falls right at my waist- linger in back. Cool slits on the sides that shows the shirt you wear underneath. A bit itchy but worth the cuteness!
Adorable sweater with fun sparkle and great hood. Lots of compliments and was hit at Thanksgiving.
Loved this sweater, great blue color with an obvious sparkle to it. A little cropped, but fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cute but would prefer it without the sparkle
links_reviews_text: Wasn't expecting the sparkle but it looked very cute on. Slightly itchy but generally didn't bother me. The fit was great.
It was really glittery than the photo- not my style!
This sweater does have a subtle sparkle to it. It paired perfectly with leggings and booties for a travel day to the mountains. It was warm and cozy.
Cute sweater but was not a fan of the sparkles in person. In the pictures they aren't that noticeable but one you get it I felt the sparkles made the material look cheap.
love the thick neckline! Very cozy
Super cozy. Hood is more of a look then functional, but very cozy and perfect with jeans!

links_reviews_title: SWEATER IS SPARKLY - NOT CLEAR IN PICTURES
links_reviews_text: I thought the sweater had white hints of threading but it's completely sparkly. If you're into that, it's a nice fit and quality. Runs small - so I would size up if you want a cozy look. I did not wear because of sparkles.

links_reviews_title: Cute but side slits are higher than I thought
links_reviews_text: Had to wear really high waisted jeans with it so that too much skin wasn't exposed for work but this sweater is great. Super comfortable and love the color
You can't tell in the photo, but this sweater has sparkly,tinsel type material in it. Might be fun for Christmas, but that is not what I thought I was renting so I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: look close. it sparkles. hoodie/neck area tight
links_reviews_text: the body and arms were great. The neck was tight. To be fair- this came with tags. It'd be cute for a party in the fall.
liked the fit of the sweater. Lighter weight and has a slight stretch to it.
very flattering, perfect size and length
This sweater was cute, but seemed to run a little small. It was on the short side, but worked well with a longer tank top underneath it.
Perfect and flattering fit! I love black and white stripes so this was really my style. I wanted to buy it til I noticed a hole in the sleeve.
A little faded but good quality. Very comfortable. Warm despite fairly thin material.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. Lightweight and classic. Fun piece!
Stylish, true to size, everyday Top
links_reviews_text: Great fit, soft and paired nicely with high waisted skinny denim.
It's just a basic shirt but I really liked it. Soft and flattering. Not too thick or thin. Kinda like a Goldilocks shirt.
I was a bit concerned that I would not like this. But it fit really good and it made my waist look smaller.

links_reviews_title: Everyday and work sweater, so soft
links_reviews_text: Great material, nice fit. Wore it to work and could throw a blazer over it as the material is thin enough, but also plan to wear over the weekend. A bit on the longer side on me.
I wore this with jeans and cropped work slacks. Nice but nothing too special

links_reviews_title: Cute and classy, but runs small and slightly itchy
links_reviews_text: Cute and classy, but runs small and slightly itchy. Not a crop top but slightly on the shorter side. I did like the striking black and white pattern. Wish it were softer and cozier material.

Cute, form-fitting sweater. If you're busty, definitely go with your larger preferred size because it's a piece intended to be tight. Styled it with high-waisted jeans so I wouldn't have to worry about tugging down the hem.
I wish it was a tad bit less expensive, so I could buy it! Very flattering.
I got compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little tight in the arms/shoulders; otherwise comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_text: Would rent again. TTS
This sweater is just "fine." It runs small, even for a lux brand. It did not feel or look any more lux or high quality than your basic chevron sweater from any mall store. It was disappointing.
Easy and striking pattern
This was just a little snug to wear to work. Seemed a little cheap. I feel like I could have gotten a similar sweater at Target.
Size up for a comfortable fit!
Flattering. Comfortable.
This top definitely runs small and tight. I couldn't wear it and will have to order a large.
So flattering. Wore it multiple times.

links_reviews_title: Love this, rented twice. Looks great with a pair of black pants or skirt
Stretched out by the hanger, terribly misshapen arms/shoulders
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, higher quality sweater in absolutely terrible shape. It had clearly been hanging for too long and the shoulders and upper arm areas were completely misshapen to the point it looked like they were flopping puffy sleeves.
Fit true to size, style was flattering however nothing too crazy. Something I would have purchased.
Love! Wore to a Raconteurs concert with NVLT Red Oversized Houndstooth Coat then wore around the house all weekend with yoga pants. Comfy and cute.
It is really flattering on and the fit was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Adorable but not for the long-waisted
links_reviews_text: Loved the style but it was a little short. Got several compliments!
Thin knit that works well with a blazer. Size up for the shoulders to look right.
This sweater was well made and super comfortable. It wasn't itchy and it fit well. I sized up just to give me a little extra room and I was happy.

This sweater is a little out of my comfort zone, but I really like it. I usually prefer oversized sweaters, and this one is definitely not that. I didn’t think it would work for me, but the chevron pattern really is quite flattering. My only complaint is that the sleeves are a little bit too short. The sweater is thin enough to layer with a cute blazer or a jean jacket.
Really nice sweater! Definitely flattering.
This sweater fit very nicely, perfect length and soft material. Kept me warm and looked great for work and dinner!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, currently trending and higher end than most "striped sweaters."
links_reviews_text: It fits great, looks great. I am planning to wear it with jeans and boots and also black jeans and heels. Love it!
Super cute. A little thin, so don't expect it to keep you warm.
This is a nice fitting, bold pattern top. The weight is very thin, more like a heavy weight top than a sweater.
When I saw how small it was I was worried it would be unflattering but it actually was quite cute on. the chevrons are flattering. It's pretty thin.
True to size chunky sweater may be a bit itchy to some but it was not itchy enough to bother me. Check out my IG @justsuperb for more fun fits
Warm and cozy sweater but it seems a little worn out in person.
Wore this multiple times! Very warm, great with jeans and navy leggings!
Fit TTS, fun warm sweater. Wore with jeans and also to work with dress pants.
Great for work and very warm
Love the details, looks expensive, and is not itchy at all! Would rent again.
Comfortable, great length and fit.
This is very thick and warm and very soft. Got lots of compliments.
The perfect fall sweater to stand out. Run a little large but also has that sweater cozy charm. Received so many compliments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Previous renter shrink this? Terrible sweater.
links_reviews_text: This sweater was terrible. I question RTR's quality and review process. This sweater was covered in sweater pilling and looked like the previous renter washed and shrunk this sweater. I can't even wear it, it looks like a crop top with three quarter sleeves!
Such a fun sweater for the slopes. Got lots of compliments and I loved the bell sleeves.
The sweater worked well with jeans and the colors looked like they do in the photo.
fit great

links_reviews_title: Stands out. Good rental to mix up the work wardrobe.
links_reviews_text: Warm, comfortable. Very pretty. Looks like pictures.

So cozy and unique! Love the poofy sleeve and overall look of the sweater. I kept it for 3 weeks and wore it at least 5 times while shockingly, taking no photos :( I would definitely buy this sweater if it was selling for under $200.

Loved this sweater! I am usually a large sometimes fit xl better. Should have know this is oversized already so a L would have sufficed. Still it was fine to wear and really loved it. Go your size or down one if you want it to be slightly fitted.
Love this sweater! So warm and cozy
The short torso combined with the large sleeves did not make for a flattering look on me.

This sweater is covered in pills. I have rented this in a large and a medium and the large is a huge size jump from the medium. I'll go back to the medium and next time RTR get a hold of a pill shaver!
It wasn't terrible, but the sleeves were way too long. I wouldn't recommend it for someone with a short torso. I returned immediately.

Depressing to go up to an XXL when I wear a 10 in normal clothes and a 12 in Designer clothes. But the recommendation was correct. Great fit, not too bulky and not too snug. Lots of compliments today.

links_reviews_title: Great take on a simple sweater
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this sweater! Everyone (me included) loved how simple the sweater was but how modern it looked with the color block. I sized up per reviews and definitely needed to. This runs small. The sleeves were plenty long, however the body is not nearly as long as it looks in the stock photo. I didn't mind the length, but it wasn't a top I could wear with leggings. I didn't find this itchy or cardboardy as other reviewers did. I loved this and would rent it again!!

links_reviews_title: So chic, I had to buy it!!
links_reviews_text: Not sure why this sweater has so many negative reviews. I thought it was the perfect dressed up turtleneck. I didn't find it scratchy and it's super cozy. Wore to a winery with friends and loved it so much I bought it!
I rented this for a trip to Alaska and loved it!
This sweater is just a great everyday winter sweater, perfect for a mountain weekend!
Runs large but true to size

I am not a turtleneck fan but I LOVE this sweater. The sleeves are intentionally longer to allow for the color block detail. Warm without being overly hot making this a great fall or winter piece. I would keep this but I can't justify $177 on a sweater (and that's with the sale!). Planning to rent again in the fall
I love this brand! But the sweater runs large and felt itchy and like it was made of cardboard. Wouldn't recommend.

I didn't realize this from the photos, but the sweater is a lighter navy blue than pictured. The fabric is super stiff and the arms are long. It fit awkwardly on me (pear, 5'2") and was bulky around the waist. All around not flattering.
I loved this and want to keep it. I didn't find it scratchy like other reviewers. Fit great. Very warm
Paired w black pants and red cords - very versatile. Simple.
Perfect sweater to make any fall outing memorable! Not itchy either.
a little bulky for an apple body but warm and cozy

links_reviews_title: This sweater was warm and cozy but didn't look overly bulky. It is a bit itchy so wear a camisole.
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose but looks great with a pencil skirt, leggings, or even jeans. So versatile but just be ready to wear something underneath because it is itchy.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater. It was a lovely piece without being too statement.
links_reviews_text: Slightly less warm than other sweaters, but looked great.
Super warm. Looks very sharp with a red lip and earrings.
Will definitely rent again. Sleeves are long but cute when rolled up/
Amazing sweater

links_reviews_title: It is a fun fall sweater. Wore it to work with dark slacks, for work and denim for a fun afternoon.
links_reviews_text: The sweater is great for this time of year. It worked for work with dark pants, with jeans for an outdoor fall gathering and again for a clambake.
Loved this cozy fall sweater!
Itchy sweater , not flattering
Waited for a while for this and it did not disappoint. Cute classic and very warm
Nice sweater but a little scratchy on the skin.

links_reviews_title: Just not a good look for me
links_reviews_text: I generally enjoy oversized sweaters, but where the color blocking line hit was in an awkward spot. Very not flattering. I can see where it looked good on more slender people in the pictures. It was very comfortable when trying on, however—no itchiness.
If your going for comfort this might not be the best choice for you.

links_reviews_title: Slightly itchy but very chic sweater
links_reviews_text: Loved the structured sleeves, which I wore both rolled up and down. The collar is flattering with hair up, and the navy/cream combo very versatile to wear. I received compliments from strangers when wearing this.
Since it has a high neck there really isn't a way to not let it touch your skin. The fit was fine, not that flattering. I won't be renting again.
I normally wear a L or max an XL in sweaters. This fit in a XXL. It's warm for sure and a nice winter sweater.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater and wore it often.
links_reviews_text: Really well made and cozy. I wore this several times in cold weather. I hated to send it back.
Its a little rough but not itchy and I'm SUPER sensitive to itchiness. Very warm and so cute. Considering buying it.
not great for wide hips - it accentuates them in a non-flattering way; didn't wear it, but wanted to love it

links_reviews_title: Fun, cozy, casual sweater perfect for winter!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater and would have purchased it if it wasn't so expensive. I received a ton of compliments on it. I would size up one size if you want the slouchy look that is pictured on the RTR site. The material has potential to be a little scratchy. I wore a long sleeve t-shirt underneath and had no issues with comfort. I highly recommend this as a rental!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this because I wasn't in love this one - itchy and didn't seem that special.
links_reviews_text: It wasn't as oversized as described in other reviews. Itchy. Boxy.

links_reviews_title: So itchy and uncomfortable, really terrible sweater.
links_reviews_text: Do not rent - so itchy and uncomfortable, very cheap wool.

It fits rather large and loose. The wool is also quite scratchy so it's best to wear a t-shirt or cami underneath it. I like the style but am giving it only 3 stars due to the fit and itchy wool fabric.

links_reviews_title: A good toss on for a cold work day.
links_reviews_text: Basic. A bit itchy.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is warm, cute, and comfortable! LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately I don't have any photos of me in this gem because I had it on under coats most of the time. But is was so nice to be bundled and cute! Great sweater, can't go wrong
It's way too itchy to wear
warm, wonderful, well made sweater
Not as itchy as some reviews, the fabric is a little stiff but still flattering. Extremely warm!

Flowly dress that I probably could have sized down in but at the same time the larger size didn't hurt because of the flowly ness of the dress: size up or down...it's stretchy and fun! Perfect for the beach
I normally wear a 2, but this still fit perfect in a 4. The bust was a little loose since I didn't wear a bra. It was super flowy and very flattering. Very bold and bright colors!

I loved this dress so much. I wore it again and again, sometimes with a t-shirt under and sometimes without. My one complaint is that the straps sometimes got loose (the straps are adjustable) and the chest slipped down a bit, but with a t-shirt under it wasn't a problem. The material is so soft and lovely, the length was great for me, and I love a dress that flows easily over my hips. Will rent again!

Rented this for my vacation in Jamaica. It was comfy but I agree with others, lots of fabric and the top should have been extended just a little lower to cover the entire chest for those with a larger bust. I still received a ton of compliments on it.
Loved it! I went a size up and enjoyed the extra room. Steals are adjustable!
A-line fit, not super fitted. Very cute and easy style for vacation. loved the pockets!!!
Perfect for a warm weather vacation. Enough support that not need to wear a bra, so comfy.

This dress has a lot of fabric and also cut off my chest area awkwardly so the skirt flows out from mid-breast making me look much larger than I am. I'm an A cup so cant imagine how it works on larger chests. Beautiful fabric though...
This dress had plenty of room to hide all the thanksgiving food I ate! Comfortable and adjustable straps
Stunning dress, incredibly flattering and easy to wear. Runs quite big and the straps kind of loosen as you wear them so fashion tape helps. Looks great with a leather jacket and boots.
Dress was so comfortable and fun! It was little poofy so it does make you look a little larger than normal. But overall super fun dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for exploring the Amalfi Coast!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner for a wedding in Colombia and for a vacation in the Amalfi Coast of Italy. It was perfect for both! The colors are so vibrant and it's flowy and comfortable without making you look bigger than you are. I definitely recommend this dress and it was one of my favorite rentals from RTR!
I ordered the 10 based on reviews to go down a size. I'm usually a 12 but the 10 fit perfect. Love the print plus it has pockets! Will def get again!
Great for vacation. Light and airy (silk and cotton blend dress with linen lining). Size down!

This dress is so comfortable and versatile! I paired it with leather sandals and a red lip for work, and with heels for dinner. Great piece for summer to fall transition. The straps are adjustable and there are pockets. If you have a larger bust, the dress may fit differently. I found that the bust ruching was just long enough for me.
Loved this so much. The coloring is great and it has pockets! I wore it to a summer wedding.
I wore this dress for my kids' Moana themed birthday party. I would wear this even if I wasn't hosting a tropical birthday soooo file that under WIN.

Love the print and the material but it was just massive. Also the bust area was just weird with the ties - even though the dress was massive the top part wasn't quite long enough to cover my bust if I moved at all. Just ok
Something was off- shoulder straps didn't fit properly, bust was a little small, and the fabric felt very heavy.
Fit perfectly, a little big I'm between a 14 and 16. Will size down next time
Great summer dress for day or night. I rented my normal size despite being 5 months pregnant, and it was still roomy. I'd definitely recommend sizing down. Loved the pockets, print, and easiness.
Had so much fun in this dress!
Totally delightful and true to size.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a party at the beach
links_reviews_text: Cute!
I wanted to wear this everyday but alas couldn't. True to size.

The only reason I sent this back is it really needed to be dry cleaned. I wore it over and over. Got a ton of compliments every time I wore it. It has pockets and is lined. There is a lot of material so it can get hot. You can adjust the straps but it ran a tad big so they fell sometimes.

links_reviews_title: Will rent again and size down
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful! It was also very comfy. When I brought it out of the bag, I could tell it was a LOT of dress. There's a ton of fabric and you can tell it's nice quality. My only issue was that I thought it made me look a little larger in the mid section and it was really hot under the dress because of all the fabric. I wore once out to dinner and I ended up really loving the flow and I got compliments from my sister (who is a stylist). I didn't want to keep cause of how big it was so I'll definitely rent again and maybe size down to an 8.

Fit was good for my small chest, but a little stretched out. Not sure this would work for larger chests. The straps are adjustable but super thin. I never got to wear this but will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fun beach dinner.
links_reviews_text: Love the full skirt and pockets! I paired it with a denim jacket to break up the busy pattern.

I'm typically a small/2 and was swimming in this. Not sure I wld be able to wear a 0 so if you're small than me I wld avoid entirely because the chest area needs to be snug enough to stay on properly. The colors are great though!
This dress is stunning. I wore it on vacation and get soooo many compliments. I will rent this again!
I wore this for thanksgiving in mexico - it's beautiful, easy to wear & has pockets!
Beautiful colors and details. Easy to wear without a bra and strappy sandals.

Such a cute transitional piece with a jacket thrown over, and the straight cut over the chest makes it a good work piece. But it's a lot of fabric to hold up with those tiny little straps, and I could definitely feel the weight of the material while wearing it.

I rented this for my vacation to Spain and wore it twice on the trip. It was super comfy and ran TTS but the dress is a lot of fabric so I did get hot in it. Otherwise I loved this pice and all the fun colors!
Fit like a glove. Extremely flattering! Did not want to send back, will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress. Flowy and made of a beautiful material. Would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, with pockets, that I wore mostly on the weekends. I'm 5'4 and it hit me at about my ankles. It has adjustable straps which was perfect. As I said, I kept this for a full month and would keep it longer if the weather wasn't getting colder.
Never wanted to take it off! Wore on the plane home from vacation and it was incredibly comfortable!
Beautiful dress but tried to wear it 7.5 mos pregnant. The combination of my height + where the ruffle hit just didn't do anything for me. Maybe next year!

Def fit large on smocked top, I recommend sizing down. Beautiful, flowing maxi with gorgeous floral print. Pockets are a bonus! Would also make a great transitional autumn dress with an orange or red toned cardigan. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! Received a lot of compliments. Definitely will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Fit great with high waisted pants! Casual, fun but also classy!
i love this sweater. i want to live in this sweater. it is super comfortable and warm and cute. got a lot of compliments when i wore it to family dinner.
Perfectly cropped, really warm. Almost purchased. Will definitely rent again

This sweater is warm and perfect for winter!! The design and colors are stunning and I love the big sleeves! My only negative is it is pretty short in the torso so I had to keep pulling it down at work. It's also slightly itchy and not the softest material.

This sweater runs smaller than I expected, it is very cropped. Hit right at the waist. I wore it with high waisted black pants for work. It's thick and kept me very warm (it was below 30 degrees today!) fun print :)

links_reviews_title: Cozy funky mockneck for work or home
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, got compliments the first time I wore it. Great for casual office

Okay I hate turtlenecks and this is one I can bear to wear because it's SO CUTE! I bought this once I received it as a rental. The Louna brand has honestly never steered me wrong in fit, pattern, or having the most people go "wow! I love your sweater!"
I got compliments but I'm glad I rented because this piece is super memorable. Very cute.

Ordered this sweater for everyday use, and it didn't disappoint. It is trendy and cute so it really looks cool on. It fits me perfectly, but want to note that it is on the shorter/cropped end. It's a bit itchy but doesn't really bother me. If I thought I'd wear it more, I'd buy it.
This sweater was so pretty and cozy. I was the first to wear it. Wore it multiple times
I wore this with a high waisted black skirt, tights and boots to work. I felt comfortable and sexy. The sweater is very cropped, but wearing it with the right matched pieces felt great.
It's cute I just struggled with what to wear it with because fit is kind of awkward

links_reviews_title: Cute, definitely cropped. Compliments throughout the day.
Comfortable and warm but a little short for me
links_reviews_text: Hit just above the waist which I think is perfect for some but I'd like it a few inches longer

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a pasta place and still looked put together but not over dressed, would recommend.
links_reviews_text: The collar of this turtleneck was a little itchy at times but other than that it was wearable and cute. It is pretty cropped, I am 5'5 and have a small torso and it fell just above my bellybutton. I paired it with medium washed jeans and platform docs for a sunny but windy Los Angeles day!
This sweater was really fun and super warm! It was more cropped than I anticipated based on the picture but all in all a solid rental!

links_reviews_title: Super cute, just not flattering on me
links_reviews_text: Really wish this one worked out for me. The quality was great, loved the print and feel of the fabric. Unfortunately this pattern just looked really unflattering on my bust area. I'm pretty busty (F/G) and the stripes accentuated that area in a weird way. Otherwise, super cute!
I really like this sweater. I rented a size XS but the sleeves were I bit too short for me. Size up if you have long arms or if you don't like to wear crop sweaters.

This is a warm, soft sweater! I wore it with high waisted jeans and it just touched the top of the jeans, so it's definitely shorter, but not a crop top by any means. It's so unique and everyone I saw complimented me on it!

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing for everyday and office
links_reviews_text: Unique, fun pattern. Sleeves are a bit billow-y so it will make your arms look bigger but that's the style. Quite cropped. I wore it over dresses.

links_reviews_title: easy to wear and to dress up and down! Ski weekend.
links_reviews_text: A little loose at the bottom, but love the cropped fit. The sleeves had nice structure. People love this sweater! Lots of compliments, even though it is not at all formal. NOT itchy.
I enjoyed wearing the sweater. It was super cute, but the turtleneck was very scratchy.

This is a great sweater to throw on with anything. I wore with light jeans casually and also dark for a more formal look. The print is eye-catching and the sleeves are cut a little wide making it unique. I almost bought it!
Standard, warm, patterned sweater. Would rent again.
Super cute
It was cute, nothing out of this world. Fit as expected.
I love this sweater!
I really loved this shirt, great color and fit. Once the cooler weather hits I will definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Super cute shirt for work or everyday!
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt! Was planning to wear it with a pencil skirt to a conference but then it got canceled so just wore it with leggings and it was perfect. It's a bit oversized and a thicker material, would be perfect in the fall!
This top could not handle my swimmer's shoulders.
Great top for work. Unusual style. Clean. Great material. Looks new. Feels a bit too tight on your hands. But very stylish. Enjoyed it.

This top reminded me of the Scooby gang. It had sweet throwback vibes and flowed nicely. The fabric has NO stretch, so it would be tricky if you have a larger busy. The ascot element also sometimes comes undone, it needed to be adjusted throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: Cute cut, nice details, lovely color
links_reviews_text: I liked this top, but didn't love it. The caramel color is beautiful, and the neck tie and arm stitching is really sweet. The issue is the lack of stretch and tightness in the arms, as others have reviewed. I have slender arms, and the forearm area was still tight, even when the zippers are open. It's tightest right below the elbow. I chose to push the sleeves up over my accessories, and it gave a little more room in the shoulders and gave the arms a blousey look. You can't raise your arms very high, though. Also - make sure to knot the neck tie! It comes loose if you don't. Overall, I may rent again for an occasion (interview, etc.), but not for everyday.
Love this shirt many compliments. It runs small especially tight in the sleeves so size up.
Runs slightly small but so flattering and a unique color! Great for work

Gorgeous saturated carnal brown color. Multiple ways to wear the boy I went with loose and wispy with a brooch. Great Fall metrical in fact a little warm for early Autumn in the desert. Looks great without a jacket and against navy blue. Fit is perfect for my long arms and large chest. I didn't notice the sleeves have zippers which is nice For a tight tapered sleeve.

Looked and felt like a power player in this. Nice heavy material, falls beautifully and doesn't wrinkle. Color is rich and warm. Wore it once untucked with a leather mini, and again tucked in to a midi wool pleated skirt. Perfection.
I liked the color, and the interesting style of the bow. Other than that, I didn't like the fit or the style of the arms.
n/a

links_reviews_title: Elegant color and neckline. Misshaped sleeves
links_reviews_text: A soft neutral color that pairs well with a black cardigan or jacket. Sleeves are oddly shaped--ballooning around the upper arm and very long and tight (with cuff zipper) at the lower arm. I covered them with a 3/4-length sleeve cardigan so only the wrist part peeled out, which worked well. Fabric is a bit scratchy but length is nice to wear untucked over pants.
Fit Great, didn't always tie bow

This was a very odd fitting shirt, There's not much give in fabric and it's cut high on sides so if you don't wear a cami under it you'll end up with exposed side of torso when you sit down or turn. It also runs very small so definitely size up.

Interesting cut and color, fun way to mix up the wardrobe for a couple weeks. I could never get the tie to stay tied - I tucked the ends in once, and another time used a pin. Very tailored on the forearms, which I thought was a cool look. Ultimately was happy to have it in this month's mix.

links_reviews_title: Wore it a couple of times--very sharp, great color.
links_reviews_text: A little snug around the chest if you are big busted. But I had a size 10; might have been better with a 12.
Glad I read the reviews, it's a very cute shirt especially the sleeves, my only struggle was the tie, if it wasn't tied appropriately my cleavage showed

links_reviews_title: Follow the reviews and you'll be all set
links_reviews_text: Reading the reviews others wrote really helped me select the right size. I went a size up, since everyone noted that it ran small (and sleeves were tight), and it all fit perfectly. Would rent for work again!

Loved the unique shape of the "dress shirt" for work. the zipper sleeves are a bit tight so I left them unzipped. I do have big wrists though ;) Loved the color and fun elements of the whole thing. Also left the bow at the neck untied and hanging, but didn't mind it tied either.

This playful blouse was the perfect color and fabric for fall! Loved the muted pumpkin color! The fabric is thick with a little stretch to it. The cuffs of the sleeves are tight, and they have a zipper for you to get them on. I was unable to close the zipper 100%, but it closed all the way up to the hem. The neck tie stayed put most of the day with only a basic knot. It wasn't too tight either! I highly recommend for a cool fall day around the office!

Love the color of this top. The sleeves are much tighter than I would have expected and found it uncomfortable. I have long arms, so I think the sleeves were also a bit sort for me (which didn't help). Otherwise the fit and cut are very flattering.
Fits like a glove. It's a great color with blonde hair. The material is high quality. I wore tucked in with high-waisted jeans and pumps for the office.

I wore this blazer for a work event with an 80s/90s theme and it worked perfectly. I am usually an XL, and I found this ran pretty big. I could have worn the L, but went with the XL because I wanted an oversized look. The blazer was comfortable and stretchy, but not too hot. I was super happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: Pretty big blazer that was strangely slimming
links_reviews_text: I really liked this blazer, but the slippery fabric and huge size meant I didn't wear it as often as I thought I would. When I did, the effect was really slimming, and I felt like I was having a lot of fun at work. A security guard even told me I was livening the place up!
Rented this blazer for work and it is amazing. Oversized just the way I like and extremely comfortable! It does run pretty large so if you prefer a tighter fit I would size down.
I loved this blazer! Super comfortable & stylish! Got tons of compliments at work! Fits true to size. I could've worn it open as well. I recommend!
Loved the jacket! It does run a little big through the body.

links_reviews_title: Runs large but that is the style of this jacket. I belted it and loved it
links_reviews_text: Runs large but that is the style of this jacket. I belted it and loved it
Originally rented for a night out but that all changed with covid. So decided to do a #fancyfriday at home during the quarantine. Sized down and fit perfectly. Love the detail on the sleeves!
Shorter on taller girls so size up but obsessed with this dress. Fun details make it the perfect LBD you can wear over and over again.
The sleeves and shoulders kept slipping on me, not a great fit for a tall person. Short waisted and short in the legs. Pass if you're over 5'5". Thin material, too -- not really winter ready.

This dress can do it all! Dress it up or down, it's a LBD with a twist. The fabric has a subtle print and the ruffles add an unexpected touch. The dress was certainly more fitted than it appeared on the model so if you want a loose fit, size up. There is an elastic waistband that cinches the dress in at the middle. I'm 5'9 and the dress was pretty short on me.
So chic, extremely soft silky fabric, lots of fun with the button detail, shoulders and arms, and tie at the neck. Highly suggest renting this is any season!!
This dress is so fierce! I loved the detailing on the sleeves and the length was perfect on my 5'6 frame.

I loved the material but the entire dress seemed to run short. It was very short on the legs and fit high on my waist - above my natural waist and I do not have a long torso. Also the sleeves fit a little weird in the seems. That being said, I still liked it and would recommend renting. Sizing up might help but then it would also be pretty big in the chest area I would think. Great material!
Can be dressed up or down. Too short for work, but a closet staple nonetheless
Cute, but needed tights underneath
Wore this for my birthday and it fit perfectly. It was on the shorter side, but not to the point I was worried about it/ had to wear leggings.

The fabric is lovely and the sleeve detailing is really unique and makes this more than a basic black dress. The buttons in the front also make this dress look a bit more delicate (but beware it's low cut). My only issue is that this dress was SO short. I'm only 5'4" so I don't usually have that issue but I couldn't raise my arms because of how short it was, and I was tugging it down a lot! Would consider sizing up.
LOVED this dress, wore out for date night, and added a camisole underneath for a fun work outfit.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my quarantine/housewife series
links_reviews_text: This was a fun little neon top! It is tight fitting. I don't recommend if you're bloated! 🤷‍♀️ Also, the tag kept sticking out which was a bit annoying! But I really like the open back and puffy sleeves!
Absolutely loved this top! Wasn't too tight, and hole in the back was th perfect detail. I dressed it down, but's it's definitely something that could be dressed up with the right bottoms.

links_reviews_title: This day to tight top is everything
links_reviews_text: I loved the material, it was very flattering for my shape. I also wear this top to work, and it's very comfortable for running around all day as well.
Really cute, stretchy tight fitting material great for high waisted pants and tucked in

This top was very flattering! Was comfortable and fit really well. It's not really my style (which is all black) but that's why I love RTR because I can try so many different ones out with little risk. Still gave it five stars though because if this is your style, you're gonna love it! I usually wear a small for tops and this small fit well.

I really wanted to love this shirt. Following the reviews that it fit like shape wear I ordered the L. I definitely would have been suffocated in the chest in a M, but with the L I had loose fabric around me waist. The big open back was a fun twist but I felt like because it was pulled right over my bust my straps were showing more often. The sleeves were so fun! I just couldn't get past the color! It's definite day glo.
Top has great structure (no bra required) and the sleeves are very flattering. Loved the color/pattern - but the shirt was fraying a bit at the bottom ... womp womp.
Great fit and slimming

I got this in store and didn't know it's size. It's also petite and I am not. Shocked this top fit me but it did. Its definitely tight but worked for the look I was going for. It's a stretchy comfy fabric.

This is a super cute bright yellow gingham top. The top is tight but stretchy so I did feel like it was slimming. I ended up wearing it work, and it was a cute switch up from my normal dark wardrobe. I'm 5'2 and 120 pounds and the xs was a good fit
Fit was accurate
Super cute top - love the fit, it's very slimming. It's a little long on my torso, but looks cute tucked into jeans. Will rent again.
Fit like a glove. Great with black jeans. Be sure to have a bra with wide straps due to opening in the back.
Fit well with a lot of stretch and flattering on the body

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but couldn't make the tag stay hidden
links_reviews_text: I loved this top, as everyone said it was super flattering and stylish. My biggest complaint, and the reason I took off 2 stars, was because I couldn't make the tag stay hidden. No matter what I did, it was continuously sticking out and people all day told me that my tag is showing which was annoying bc I was at work so not super appropriate.

I enjoyed the bright color and puff shoulders on this top. But be warned that the back had a large open cutout that is bra- revealing. I normally avoid any bra reveals, but this one skimmed just below the top of my bra back so I decided to go for it. I also wore a faux shearling vest over it, so it was not a big deal. The fit is tight, but stretchy. It was snug over my larger bust so it was bodycon in style in me. I didn't mind with the vest for some coverage.
stretchy and comfy but if you wear a bra it will show in the back
