links_reviews_title: Loved the color and style but too body con for me
links_reviews_text: I rented this in hopes of wearing with black jeans and boots for a Christmas party. I loved the funky neon green with the classic gingham print. The open back is super sexy and would still allow you to wear a normal bra without it showing. Based on other reviews, I sized up to a Large from my normal medium. It was still way too tight for me to wear. It showed every imperfection of my less-than-flat tummy. I would recommend only for fit ladies due to the spandexy tightness.
Wore this out on a cold evening in NYC. Very easy to go from dinner to bars. Got lots of compliments on it from strangers.

I have not been impressed with Lululemon. This jacket is very thin, not practical for cold weather below 50 degrees. I liked the mixed materials of quilt and wool but the wool was very stiff! It felt like there was cardboard in the jacket. Also, the buttons are super shallow and hard to close. This was a disappointment.

Honestly, rented this for casual days of grocery shopping in active wear / running any sort of errand around town. It was great for that, but ran a bit big and the wool was super stiff. Not super comfortable.
The style was cute but, honestly felt cheap. This jacket is perfect for 50 degree weather. It would not substitute for a winter coat.
Thin but warm. I'm usually a 6 in all lulu but I wore this over a chunky blazer comfirtably

links_reviews_title: This jacket is not very warm and a bit square.
links_reviews_text: The look of this jacket is nice, but does not have much of a shape. It is meant for cool weather, but not cold weather!
The material is VERY thin. Not warm at all
This is a lightweight jacket. Definitely not for cold weather. I wore it dressed up and dressed down. Looked good both ways. Sleeve are pretty slim, making it hard to wear a sweater underneath.

I spent Christmas in London and this coat was perfect for the occasion. Classy, lightweight but still warm and definitely water proof. I was actually sad to return it. Fit was perfect for layering a sweater on colder days and pockets zip which is great for travel
I love the flowy yet fitted combo of this dress! Very easy to wear! Such a bright happy color and feminie. One of my very favorite rentals!

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly and made me look skinny!I added a little extra padding and had no worries of exposure.

links_reviews_text: Not all wrap dresses are flattering on me but the ruffles were a win! Loved this one

Aside from size 10 being too large on me (my fault - i took a chance on what was available), this dress is very special. Beautiful fabric, flattering cut and excellent quality. All the things we expect from DVF. I would rent again in size 8.
Lovely wrap dress of intense color. A bit low cut up top. Styled with some cowboy boots

This dress was a big hit with my husband, but I was a bit self conscious with the low cut (I wore a camisole) and the lift in the front. Beware- the material is a bit clingy, and when wearing tights, the back can get stuck up after sitting. Worth a rent!
This dress is just beautiful! The fabric is light and flowy, and the pattern and color are gorgeous and vibrant. I loved wearing it and I got so many complements!

The ruffles and tie closure gave it a boudoir nightgown vibe. I received several compliments and the fabric is a beautiful color. For me, this would have been a better date dress, and not really appropriate for work.
LOVE this DVF wrap dress! It was a silk jersey material with a touch of chiffon.

Today's dress! A Diane von furstenberg wrap dress. I friggin wrote a paper on these when I was in school for fashion! It fits like a glove! Highly recommend and will rent every one Rtr graces us with. Pattern / color is beautiful in person. So many compliments! I needed a tank but a pin would have worked as well. It's chilly here so the tank was good. Styled with tights and booties for work but would skip all that to dress it up

links_reviews_title: Flattering but maybe a little over the top
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work. It was really comfortable and flattering; it made me feel both thin and curvy. It's definitely a "loud" dress though: bold color, animal print and big ruffles
I did not live this. Too much flounce. I don't like the way DVF wraps for across my chest. Some friends loved this dress on themselves, just not me.
Was a bit low cut in the front, but beautiful color and received lots of compliments!
Easy to wear dress. I wore this to a concert and it was great.
Way more animal print than I normally wear, but I still liked it

links_reviews_title: LOVE!! Colors, cut, all of it!

links_reviews_text: This dress arrived with the tags on and fit beautifully. I wore a cami under this but the ruffle gave a bit more coverage to the neckline than a standard DVF wrap dress. Came to just below my knees. Lots of compliments on this.
Sized perfectly
Cute jeans. Made for small waists as they fit tight at the waist. Denim does not stretch. Hugs hips and thighs nicely. I wore a 27. Might size up if I rent again.
Perfect high waisted fit. The denim color difference is not as extreme in person as it appears online. I would have liked them either way. Highly recommend!

These jeans are very cute in person. The contrasting shades are much less noticeable than the photo shows. Unfortunately, I wasn't able to wear these as they are doll-sized and cut for those with no hips. I normally wear a 29/30 in jeans and I could barely get these over my hips with no chance of buttoning them. If I do rent again, I'd need to go up 2 if not 3 sizes.
I really loved these! I typically wear a 28, but the 29 was snug. Made for girls with curves and this fit like a glove. The contrast on the back is much greater than the front
No stretch. If you don't have a small waist, size up. Fit fine everywhere else. The half/half is hardly noticeable in person. Wouldn't recommend these jeans.

links_reviews_title: Original and Versatile, but size up!
links_reviews_text: There is absolutely no stretch in these, so RTRs, beware! Size up at least one size. I am semi pear shaped with a small waist and wide hips and thighs and normally a size 27...but MAN were these itty bitty! BUT they are so fun. The two-tone is actually less noticeable in person but it is still super fun and adds a great pizazz to any outfit. My mom loved them, because she also wore Jordache when she was younger! Just a little fun fact. Will probably rent again.
Couldn't even get these on. I'm curvy, but normally wear a size 29 in jeans and I got a 31 in these and they didn't fit! Super bummed because they are cute

These jeans were awesome! I would recommend sizing up if you have a straight body as they run small in the waist (high waisted). I am 5'4" and the length hit right at the ankle, so they may be slightly cropped for the taller ladies. Overall very cute and loved them! Will rent again!

These make your butt look so good and fit your waist like a dream BUT, definitely not as contrasted as the pictures. You can only really tell the color difference on the butt and on the waist/ crotch area.

links_reviews_title: Did not get to wear. Too big
links_reviews_text: Loved the detail and design of this piece however was not able to wear, it just was too big and not flattering for my athletic short stature. Definitely size down.
Super sexy, my husband hates my Rtr addiction bc of all the animal prints I rent, he actually liked this top a lot. Breathable and very form fitting.
Like another reviewer said, this is great for layering because it's so thin. Also looks cute on its own. Not itchy at all, and stretches comfortably. A really nice top!
This had a very tight, form fitting fit. I couldn't have worn it on its own, but it was great under a blazer, cardigan or bomber.

I rented this as a piece under a lot of black and browns I own and it was perfect. It's thin material, and perfect for the office. I also wore it to a museum and it worked really well. My boyfriend kept telling me I looked great, so that's always nice.

links_reviews_title: made my chest look HUGE-I didn't wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fitted-sleeves were a nice length. emphasises the bust area.

links_reviews_title: Looked great on. Lots of complaints
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect.

I love that the front bodice is lined in nude mesh and that the cut on the turtleneck is quite generous for ruching or folding. Can't recommend this piece enough, it's the perfect layering piece that breathes and won't let you overheat.
I liked these because they were different but the fit was a little awkward on me. They were a bit too much like pajama pants.
Is stylish, comfy and has some sheering. I would love to own it! Goes well with formal and weekend attire

Beware, they are long!!!!!! I cuffed them three or four times and then had to use safety pins to make it stay up because the material is too thin to stay up by themselves. But other than that, i loved them! They were super comfy, and because of the elastic in the waist the size 36 also fit me.

These would go all the way up to my bra if I let them. They were ok. I think if I got the matching top it would be a great summer outfit in dark colors. I liked the material but it's actually a little sheer.
these are so cute they're actually a tad bit reflective as well! <3 ganni
Yes they're comfortable, and cute and have pockets. But with my short torso they make me feel almost clownish, just not flattering on my body type. Le sigh
Pants come up very high on the waist and the fabric is thin! These are definitely more so a summer pant but I loved them all the same :)

links_reviews_title: It's a darker green than it appears in the photo
links_reviews_text: The fit was nice and the fabric was an interested texture.

The fit is so strange. They go up very high (which I usually love) but then puff out at the waist. I thought I had put them on backwards at first. If I were trying them on in a store, I guess i'd try again in a size up because they were pretty tight through my thighs, but i'm not sure if that would help.

links_reviews_title: Waist is great but very narrow in hips
links_reviews_text: Not flattering over the hips. Very high waist.

This skirt is perfection! It's so comfy and flowy and can go well with other prints or with solids. I wore it endless times and would've bought it wasn't dry clean only. True to size! One size down also works due to the elastic waistband.

I loved this skirt. I rented for a baby shower and it was perfect. The material is very light and thin, but not see through. The waist is a skinny elastic and did not make me look like I had any lumps or bulging. It runs a little big and I probably could have sized down, but it was fine with a belt. Highly recommend.
I wore this to church on Christmas weekend with a black sweater I already owned, and it was perfect! Lots of compliments, and so comfortable that I wore it all day!

Super comfy and stylish. I ordered a size 14 because 12 was not available, but the 12 would have fit perfectly. I love the flow of the skirt (I could twirl in it all day long lol). I will be ordering similar styles!

This skirt is light with an elastic waistband. It was longer than I thought it would be but comfortable. Wearing this skirt felt a bit like wearing pajamas. The pleats stayed in place all day. I would rent again.
This skirt is so versatile. It was perfect for Christmas weekend.
Perfect for the holidays. Paired with a velvet bodysuit. Amazing fit. Wore it twice!
Such a classic skirt. I never find pleated the best fit for my body type, but this wasn't the worst.

Loved this skirt and wore it for Christmas! It was nice and lightweight, didn't wrinkle despite a lot of floor sitting and was perfect with a bodysuit, wait belt and sock booties! The midi length was perfect for my 5'8" height and the elastic waist it's too tight like many similar ones can be.
This skirt wears so well. It is such great movement and is really very comfortable. Incredibly lightweight.

Loved this. Very light and flowy, and the elastic waist allowed me to wear 20 weeks pregnant (I sized up as well). It's very slightly sheer so I wore a slip underneath just in case, but would probably be fine without thanks to all the pleats.

This skirt is beyond cute! I originally wore it with a high neck body suit and leather ankle boots and got so many complements. I ended up wearing it again for a high tea with my girlfriends and switched up the top for a blouse and the boots for some strappy red heals and loved the look just as much. Very versatile piece.

I really liked this skirt, I kept it for 2 months and wore it several times. It's a great everyday skirt; so easy to coordinate. The pleats makes it easy to move around & it doesn't wrinkle. The only drawback is that it's made of thin polyester material, and it's not lined, so although it's more of a fall/winter look you always need to wear tights/leggings to wear this. The elastic waist also runs large, so you might want to size down. If it had been the right size at the right price, I might have kept it.

Loved the print and comfort of this skirt. However this skirt is A LOT of fabric and did feel overwhelming at times. The waitlist band is very stretchy and comfortable. If I rent again I would size down.

links_reviews_title: It was great but a little long and caused some challenges walking upstairs.
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and the material but it was a little large and a little too long for my body.

Amazingly comfortable and I got so many compliments. I rented this in October bc I knew it would be in high demand for the holidays and thought it might be an item worth purchasing. I returned it bc it was only 10% off. BUT I did get it on RalphLauren.com with 40% during cyber week.
Was a bit long for my height, but that's the only negative. The pleats fell nicely and it was a flattering skirt.
Rented for work and loved it. Received lots of compliments.
Love the color and the material, but it was too long for my height. Description and photo described it as midi length, but it was more like maxi length on me.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and simultaneously classy skirt.
links_reviews_text: Pleats and full flowing skirt make it classy and elegant. Elasticated waistband makes it very comfortable. Wore this a number of times during the week as a from desk to dinner piece. Will rent again.

Love this skirt! So pretty with a tan sweater (forgot to take picture!) I love that it has a flexible elastic waist (which appears to look like ribbon, so OK to tuck shirts). Only SMALL negative - it's a lot of fabric & found myself rolling over it with my desk chair, etc. I would def rent again.

This skirt is beautiful and comfortable. It moves really beautifully when you walk. If you are looking for something to rent that will elevate your everyday workwear, this is it. I wore mine with knee high boots and a black turtleneck tucked in.
Skirt felt too conservative. A lot of material. Beautiful print and fabric.
This skirt is so easy to wear and stylish. I wore it to work and felt so comfortable the whole day.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt and got lots of compliments. Very comfortable and easy to wear in a number of ways.
links_reviews_text: It's quite staticky, however, so beware of the cling.

Good fit. Appropriate length for work. Nothing flashy or spectacular but a pretty staple dress. Fabric is thick and comfortable but can snag easily on jewelry. I wore the M and it fit well. I’m 5’6” 145lbs. I would rent again and would love to add this to my wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work dress but way too short
links_reviews_text: This was an extremely comfortable and perfect work dress, except for the length. Too short for work unless wearing tights.

links_reviews_title: Fits great, comfy, perfect for work
links_reviews_text: Flattering in the top half, was a little more fitted so it gave more of a shape. Paired with tights and booties (not pictured) for winter work day. Would rent again!

I sized up so I could wear with my growing belly and it worked great. Will definitely rent again even when not pregnant. As my belly gets bigger though, prob won't be an option to wear during maternity :)

I'm typically a 2 and this S fit great. I don't like very form fitting clothing and so I appreciated this was a bit bigger and more comfortable. The fabric is a bit stretchy. I was surprised to read others wore this in summer - it is on the thicker side- perfect for fall/winter with tights! I sometimes find that arm sleeves on dresses like this are tight - but did not have that issue with this dress! I gave this four stars only because it wasn't the most flattering I've tried from here
This is a well executed, classic shift dress. Fabric has great texture while not being overly heavy. It's on the shorter side but still appropriate for work.

This dress was very comfortable! A bit short, it was JUST long enough to be work appropriate, so could be an issue for taller women. A little loose in the chest and tight in the hips for me, but could just be my body shape.

links_reviews_title: Staple but elevated basic work dress
links_reviews_text: Love the material, perfect for warm Texas fall weather. Dress runs a little small for a shift dress, had to wear a jacket to feel a little more comfortable wearing to work. Looks cute with dressy shoes and white tennis shoes.
Not form fitting, hugs just in the right places and perfect length for me
Worked great for a work dress, but ran a little big in the top. Ended up pairing with a blazer and it was perfect! Would probably size down if I rented again.
Love the look of this dress and it was very soft, but it was shorter and tighter than expected. Paired with a blazer to feel comfortable for work.
Great with black tights for a winter day in the office. Fit is true to size and would work with most body types (though will be a bit short on taller ladies).
I loved the fit of this dress. It was just right. Great to pair with colored heels or a blazed. Great length for work.
Thin but nicely made! Simple and cute
Nice fit for a simple work dress
Perfect for a work party, it ran just a little bit short but still professional
5'4, 125lbs, sized up to a M and it was perfect.
I normally wear a size S but this one was not a good fit. It was very cute but tight in the chest and but areas. I would size up next time.

links_reviews_title: Great comfy basic for Christmas festivities.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit that was flattering and worked for formal dinner and playing with toddlers.
The medium fit me perfectly. Super comfy work dress!
I wore with black tights and boots. Super cute for a normal work day. Dress is lined which is nice and made of quality fabric.
Love the texture and color. Very very short. Arms are tight. Might try again bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Too short for work! Tried this on and immediately knew it was too short for work.
links_reviews_text: Hits more mid-thigh than just above the knee and with the slim fit, this was too short for work.
This dress was classy and comfortable. I will rent it again.
True to size and super comfy. I threw on a blazer and it was perfect for work.
Not to long or too short. Fit perfect.
This was a.nice simple dress for work. Nothing overly special but fit well.
It is much tighter / slim fitting than the model image suggests. The fit is also off - much bigger at the chest than the legs / butt area. It was tight on my bottom but gaping on the chest.
I should have sized up but I'm not sure if that would have made a difference on the length. It was a little too short for work! I liked the fabric though. I didn't end up wearing it
Wore this dress to work! Was a perfect fit, very comfortable and appropriate for work. Would rent again!
Great dress. I am 5'1 and it was just right to wear to work
Cute dress and nice cozy fabric for cooler weather, but way too tight in the tummy. May try to rent again in a large and see if that's a better for.

Great dress for work! Nice and simple and really comfortable! I am glad I read the reviews though and sized up! I am typically a size four, but I sized up to the medium and it's perfect! Maybe a little loose, but I prefer it that way, especially for work! Would rent again!
It was really comfortable and I it looked great ! Loved it

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work with flats.
links_reviews_text: It was a little tighter than it looks like it would be. Combined with it being on the shorter side, it was not as ideal for work as I would have liked but was still ok and was cute for drinks after.

links_reviews_title: cute but I could have gotten a larger size
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress, perfect for work, but if you have any curves it definitely hugs them.
This was pretty much brand new. Hangs well - hugs figure without it clinging and good colour. Very nice work outfit

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, well made, SO many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for our St. Patrick's Day party at work but truly would wear every day. Color is stunning, fit like a dream, I received so many compliments. LOVED this one so much I almost kept it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color! Got lots of compliments.
Not my style but perfect for event
links_reviews_text: This is not my personal style but it was perfect for an international themed party where we represented Ireland. I chose the 10 as the 8 was a little too tight in the bust for me. The sleeves were also long for me so I folded the cuffs (perhaps that's what is intended).

I rented this for a baby shower and it is one of my favorite rentals so far. I found that the dress ran a little big so I ended up wearing the smaller size. My friend said it looks like something Kate Middleton would wear, so that's a positive! I got lots of compliments on the color as well as the fit. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: A dress I got compliments on all day long!
links_reviews_text: This dress falls under my absolute favorite category of dresses, which is "Makes Me Feel Like Kate Middleton." This dress fits like an absolute glove, & now I'm happy I know a 2 in LK Bennett is TTS, since many designers I end up being in between sizes. The material has no give at all so anyone with a larger chest may want to size up. The buttons are decorative too which is nice. Only negative is it wrinkles extremely easily so I had to pack my steamer to travel. Definitely want to rent again!
I wore this to work then to the White House Christmas Party. It was appropriate for both and I received many compliments. I would rent this style dress in another color again.
The green is so vibrant and pretty. The tie neckline is fun. Rent this!
Got a ton of compliments, winkles easy

links_reviews_title: I felt so beautiful in this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit so well and it was even more beautiful that I could imagine. I was worried about it being frumpy, but it wasn't at all. I'm 5'10" and it hit just below my knee.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but the fabric crushes
links_reviews_text: Lovely dress in a beautiful bright green. Loved the details -- great construction and fake buttons on the front so no gapping. I get like Kate Middleton in this dress! Only issue was that the fabric crushed/wrinkled really easily and quickly -- by the end of the day, it looked sloppy.
This is what I would describe as a power color! I was at a work conference and stood out! So simple but adorable! Sleeves were a little long but that was a small thing!
Chic, stylish, very Kate Middleton
Sleeves are a bit long and I needed to size down in order for it to fit best.
I received so many compliments on this color. I probably could have worn a size smaller.
Beautiful fabric, nice cut. Favors a fuller figure with the aline skirt. Gorgeous color-got lots of compliments!
Beautiful color and I think I would've loved it, but it was much bigger than I expected. I usually wear 14, but sized up. Should've sized down.
Beautiful color, I received so many compliments and seriously considered purchasing it.
flattering, flowy
I got so many compliments on the color of this dress and loved the classic feminine style. It was true to size for me.

links_reviews_title: If hourglass shape, this runs large.
links_reviews_text: For certain styles , I can fluctuate between sizes. I ordered normal size, and it is too large, everywhere. Color is vibrant, and style timeless for work. Wished it would have worked out
This dress runs large but fits well even if a bit large and is comfortable. I had many compliments!

Rented this for Baptism. Very appropriate dress for church affair. It's a thin fabric so good as I'm in Georgia and it's warm. A good warm weather winter choice. I would say you need to be pretty fit for this dress to feel flattering as it's a thinner fabric. I tried wearing Spanx with it but it really shows everything. Best for fit person.

I got so many compliments on this dress- the color is rich, the fabric is easy to wear and it fit perfectly even though I'm pretty short. I would buy it if it wasn't such a statement piece, but this is one that I would wear once a month easily. Love it.

I wore this dress to take photos for my family's Christmas card and it was perfect! The photos only show the top quarter of the dress upwards, which is very flattering. The lower 3/4 of the dress was rather unflattering, in my view, as it was quite big and hung off my body. However, despite the fit issues, I received tons of compliments when I wore it. Plus, I felt like Kate Middleton in it, so that's a win.
It was not flattering on me

links_reviews_title: Great retro style dress! Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Loved the green and wore with black tights and booties for a great fall look
Only down side is it does wrinkle after sitting, otherwise would've purchased. Super flattering fit, professional and elegant. Timeless looking. Will rent again!!
Pretty in concept but on this curvy girl who usually looks good in this style dress, I looked like somebody's great grandmother.

This dress was everything: color is true to picture and beautiful on. It's even comfortable. Very flattering for bustier girls. My only complaint is it wrinkled almost immediately, so by the end of the work day, the dress looked as if I threw it in my purse before putting it on. Still beautiful though. I'd rent again.

This ran slightly larger than this designer usually does, even though I sized down. I am between a 4 and 6 and the 4 had more than enough room I love the flow of the dress and fabric and the button and neck tie detail. Highly recommend!
Beautiful color, but the dress runs very big. Since size 4 was unavailable I decided to grab a 6. It was huge on me. Definitely size down. I'm thinking next time I will opt for size 2.
I was surprised by how much I loved this dress. It fit perfectly and was very flattering. I got lots of compliments on it throughout the day. My only complaint is that it wrinkles easily.

links_reviews_title: Too much green, too much fabric
links_reviews_text: I did not like this dress and didn't end up wearing it. First of all, it was way too much green for me in real life and the green is quite vibrant. Maybe would be a nice top but way too much all over. Second, the buttons were really big in personal, like on a clown costume, and it was the first thing I noticed. Also, it ran a bit big, so even if I had wanted to wear it I would've needed to size down one.
Perfect, classy and flattering dress for an hourglass figure. Keeping this one for a while...
I reviewed so many compliments. The colors vibrant and the style is classic. Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this brand!
links_reviews_text: Based off of other reviews I ordered a 29/8. I'm normally between a size 6 or 8 and went with the larger size. They were perfect! They're stiff and thick like true denim should be. They did stretch out over time and fit more like a boyfriend jean then skinny but honestly I didn't care. They arrived NWT and I've had them over a month and I'm not sure when I'll return them. If it wasn't for the cost, they'd already be a permanent staple in my closet.
Great fit! Real jeans, felt good!
Love these jeans! They run a size small so be sure to size up for best fit. Nice heavier fabric looks amazing but no stretch! Will rent these again!

links_reviews_title: Small around the waist compared to other denim brands of same size
links_reviews_text: Tried it on, really like the fabric which felt stiff without being uncomfortable. didn't seem to have much stretch. Was really tight around the waist so didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: from work to date night perfection
links_reviews_text: These are the most comfortable & cute jeans I have had in years. Perfect wash, perfect amount of stretch, nice cut (the waist comes up higher on the back to cover the tush fully) without being high-waisted. I am 5'4" and they are a little too long to be cropped.

links_reviews_title: I wish they don't run so small.
links_reviews_text: I love love love the style of these jeans but they just run too small. If they had a little more stretch they'd work.

links_reviews_title: Nice style and quality, but they run very small!
links_reviews_text: I got these jeans brand-new with tags still on (in March 2020). I like the style and cut; I think they're meant to be cropped, but since I'm 5'0", they came just to my ankle. Unfortunately they ran *very* small. I'm a true size 29/8, and while I could button the jeans, they were tight and uncomfortable. Since they're a thick cotton, they might relax as they get more wear... but at least if renting within the next few months, I'd recommend sizing up.
They were too lose at the bottom. They were long too. I am 4'11". I did roll Them like mom jeans with pumps and they were ok but they weren't flattering.

links_reviews_title: Crisp summer top, nice material. The collar just isn't flattering on me.
links_reviews_text: Might fit slightly large in the shoulders on petites.
Adorable! So fun and cute. Was shorter than I expected, but so cute.
I wore this top bra-less and found it very supportive but a little bit thin since it's white, but loved it layered under overalls!

I wore this top to a Super Bowl party. The sleeves were so cute, and the neckline was really flattering. It definitely puffs out at the bottom and fits like a crop. Perfect for stretching out with extra Super Bowl snacks!
I rented this top for a fun casual vacation essential. It was very cute and fit great. The only negative was the color was a little washed out and looked a bit too worn for my liking.
Absolutely love. Considered purchasing. It is the perfect length for high waisted jeans otherwise it will be cropped. Very flattering
Fit true to size and the sleeves add a fun touch. Material wrinkles easily though

Such a cute and easy shirt. It fit perfectly! The shoulders can be either worn up or as an off the shoulder look. I played around with both. Super easy shirt that puts a trendy spin on just a white tee!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Super versatile and stretchy
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a night out and absolutely loved it! It was stretchy and I was able to wear a regular bra with it which is a win in my book

links_reviews_title: A super chic and statement top!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are so fun and ruffly, but not too overwhelming. It's a crop top fit. IG: @noellevenegas
Wore once with super high waisted jeans because it was so short on me and did nothing for my figure- in Simon Cowells voice "it's a no for me"
Wore this like 5+ times. Makes you look great, you can wear a bra without straps showing, stretches so it's comfortable and not constricting. Definitely have to steam it
Great quality and so flattering! Will rent again and again to go with all different bottoms!

I LOVED this top - I literally had it for 4 weeks. You can dress it up or down (I paired it with RTR skirt in the photo) and you can do on or off the shoulders. I wore it both ways - totally changes up the look!
So cute had lots of stretch fit will even with a large bust. Very cute for a summer night
A fun flirty top that fits well and comfortable
Fun top that dresses up any outfit. I have a long torso and a small waist - it wasn't the perfect amount of "crop" on me (aka not too cropped)
This crop top was flirty and cute. I wore a nude strapless bra underneath and high waisted pants to complete the outfit. Super comfortable in the chest and arms area.
I thought this was going to be a bit too skimpy to wear to work, but it hit me at the top of my hips! Love the large white flowy sleeves -- and the ruched bodice. Would rent again!
Fit was great, material was comfy, can be worn on or off shoulders! Pairs perfect with a pair of skinny jeans. I loved this!
Loved how you could style this shirt either more casually or formal! Wore it out for brunch on the weekend and received so many compliments on it.
Very cute! A little floofier than expected but probably could have been steamed to lay easier. Very comfortable and not really see through. I wore it off the shoulder all day also
A little see through in the chest and had to wear a nude bra but cut doesn't show straps!

links_reviews_title: Sleeves were very big, ended up sending back.
links_reviews_text: The top is more cropped than in the photo, and the material makes the sleeves pretty stiff.

I planned on wearing this on vacation with high waisted jeans but it was not flattering on me at all so I sadly did not wear it. It looks so tiny when it arrives, it does have stretch to it. Having a larger chest, I thought the smocking made me look even bigger was I was not comfortable wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Cute for vacation! Easy with shorts
links_reviews_text: Rented too big of a size in the rtr store but wore it anyways! Wore it with jean shorts and it was cute and comfortable
So cute with high waisted shorts! Loved this top

I loved this too for my Miami and Costa Rica trips. It's cute with jeans, linen pants, shorts, etc. i dressed it up & down. I found it to be super flattering on my body type and felt covered in the right places. And it was so lightweight and comfortable in hot weather. Am considering purchasing

ohhh girl, this was way too small for my 34Ds. I thought the stretch material would give more give, but would recommend going a size up from what you would typically wear. Also, this shirt was shorter on my torso than that it looks like on the model. Cute shirt overall, just did not work for my body type.
Looks small but fits great! Wore it to ACL and felt great in it.
Very cute top. Works well with high wasted jeans/pants. Hit right around the belly button.
Cute top to wear either day or night. Love that you can wear the sleeves up or down.
cute but i didn't wear it ...i ordered a size up but it runs true to size so it was too big

Loved this top! I was worried because upon trying it on it is on the short side. I paired with a higher waisted skirt though so only showed a sliver of belly every now and then. I'm a new mom and was amazed at how flattering g this was! Shows off collarbone and neck and makes waist appear small! I wore this to a concert and felt so good!

VERY short. Loved the sleeves but the bodice was way too short for everyday wear even with high waisted jeans. And I did not find the stretchy material of the bodice to be flattering especially in white and with a larger chest.
Not great for large busts
I loved this top. Unfortunately the weather didn't work with me and I wasn't able to wear it more than trying it on. Would consider renting again in a warmer month than May.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this top! I almost bought it...
links_reviews_text: So cute, can be worn off the shoulders or with sleeves pulled up. Very cropped so must wear something with higher waist. Might buy it!

This runs short, so you'll need to pair it with something high-waisted or be cool with flaunting your stomach below the belly button. I think I got an older shirt, because it's not as bright white as the photo - it's more muted and faded. I didn't find the sleeves to be too big/too much as other reviews stated. I sized a little bit down on this item so I'd avoid the sleeves slipping like other reviewers said, and it worked. The bodice is totally stretchy so you can definitely size down.
Didnt wear, was way to small
Not for women with boobs and long torso
Flattering sleeveless dress. Fitted, added a long sleeved t shirt to wear to work in the winter and looked cute. Would probably need to wear a cami in the summer since the v neck is a bit low cut.
Easy to style, very forgiving cut. As other have said it gaps in front but mine was safety pinned by a previous renter (I assume) and it worked great.

The material is thick, high quality and flattering. I typically wear a 6, but am wearing the 4 in this pic. It fit me more tightly than I'm comfortable with for work so I should have stuck with my normal size, but it wasn't available.
This was a cute, simple black dress. When I sat down the front gapped and showed a bit more than I normally feel comfortable with. Look fabulous standing and was figure flattering.
Great black professional dress that has a bit of a tux flare. Fit well. Several complements.
I added a safety pin to ensure the top stayed closed, but this is a great work dress.
I wore this to get new headshots taken and for a work event. I loved it. I usually wear a 2 in most brands but I wore a 0 in this and it fit perfectly, so I'd say it runs a little large.

Rented this as a work dress and it came new with tags still attached. Love the shape of it. I sized up since I'm an apple shape and it's a sheath dress. Wish there was a little more room in the busy. It is secured by a thin piece of thread where it overlaps, and that pulls some when I sit. Overall great dress. May end up buying.

I honestly should have probably sized down one. I normally wear a 12 but was concerned about the chest area. But very cute dress. Hits the knee and could be both work or going out for a dressy date appropriate.
Fits well and hides tummy

Very basic, comfortable dress for work. Nothing really special. A little big in the mid section/low belly area. Also, the tack thread that holds the v-neck closed was broken so I had to pin it. Wore it once then sent it back.

links_reviews_title: If you're between sizes, size down.
links_reviews_text: Probably would've liked and worn this but I was between sizes and they only had the upper end size, and it ended up being too large for me.

I loved this classic dress for work and going out to dinner. The fit is perfect, not too baggy and not tight. The neckline is modest but the slim and tailored cut kept it from being dowdy or basic. It received thumbs up from coworkers.

links_reviews_title: Every time I wore it loved it
links_reviews_text: Fit great, looks great
Great sheath dress for work. Highlighted curves and hid less flattering parts!
Fit well. Nice fabric.
Very cute dress - if busty, be prepared for it to fall open at the top. I wore two undershirts to cover up due to the issue. It fit great everywhere else, so just be aware!

I love Jcrew and found this dress to be a pretty standard representation of the brand. It was comfortable and flattering and fit true to size. I wish the bust had a clasp instead of a stitch to keep it closed though, as I though the neckline was a bit high and tight for my larger bust. Would definitely rent again!
Gorgeous- classy, versatile, just can't say enough
Loved it !

I LOVE this dress. I got so many compliments on it! I wore it to work at a small law firm, and even my client commented on how pretty it was. I'm typically a 2P at J. Crew and generally a 0 Regular works well for me - that was the case here. I was happy with the length; the chest was a little roomy (but I'm a 32A, so that's expected) and I did feel that it needed to be pinned (an easy fix), but overall it fit great and looked chic and professional. This dress would transition very well to dinner or cocktails, I think it's a very versatile piece. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: You will get plenty of compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! I got lots of compliments on this dress. I would consider buying it as a staple item. Definitely recommend for work!
Very classy and professional look. LOVED how it may my body look, but did need to wear an undershirt to make sure my breast would not show if the neckline buckled a bit
Not for the full-chested. If I went larger, the rest of the dress would have sagged too big but the bust was quite tight.

links_reviews_title: Overall great dress for a fall wedding. The front is quite low and need some pins to keep ladies in
links_reviews_text: Low in the front, overall great dress. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: The fit was perfect ,color and looked elegant. thinking of buying this dress was so in love.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect ,color and looked elegant. thinking of buying this dress was so in love.
Wore to a funeral. Perfect fit, length and appropriate coverage in bust area.
Wore this to work. Great work dress good fit, modest enough for work.
Very flattering fit.
This dress fit very well and was perfect for an everyday work look. I look forward to renting again as the weather gets cooler and pairing a turtle neck underneath.
Runs bigger on bottom than on top, will work well for pear shape.
Beautiful dress and high quality material! Just too big. I'm usually a size 4 (ordered a 6), but will probably size down to a size 2. Reordering for sure!
This is small in the chest. I recommend sizing up to have the look in the photos. On me it was tight at the top and flared out more peplum-y than I would have wanted.
Fits great. thick t-shirt fabric. the flounce and pearl button make a comfortable t-shirt look stylish

links_reviews_title: Easy top to pack and wear
links_reviews_text: This top was perfect for bringing along on vacation. It travels well. Can be dressed up or down. Versatile, stylish and comfortable.
Wore for casual Friday's at work and is the perfect way to dress up jeans! So comfortable and cute
This was easy to wear and very comfortable. The back was a bit awkward due to the front being pulled together but overall a cute shirt.
The skirt is nice. I am usually a size 10 but the 12 was comfortable for me. Fit nice at the waist and allowed for me to tuck in my shirt. The ruffle takes it up a notch from a plain black skirt.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous skirt! Classic with a little twist.
links_reviews_text: I sized up but want to try a size down as I'm dropping a few pounds. Love this skirt! Will look to buy nice I get to a steady state size wise.
need tan legs

links_reviews_title: Mostly wore it for work, really flattering, comfortable, and beautiful design!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love the fabric and the ruffle design is to die for. I might even buy the skirt to keep forever!
I LOVE this skirt and I'll definitely rent it again. Beautiful slit and ruffle...definitely rent it!
This is a pretty skirt, but the fit (0, smallest size available) was too large on me and the length & waistline were unflattering.
Cute for someone else?
Slim skirt, true to size, love the feminine ruffle
Loved it!
w

links_reviews_title: This is dressier than it appears in the picture.
links_reviews_text: It has a slit up the thigh and the ruffles are much bigger. I didn't notice the slit in this from the reviews, and I did not wear this.
High waisted. Ruffle detail very flattering. Hard to send back. TTS.
This is a beautiful and flattering skirt and fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable, but very high-waisted.
links_reviews_text: I am two months postpartum and about 20 pounds over my normal weight. This skirt is very forgiving and stylish. It is quite high-waisted, but stretchy. There is a slit on the left, but it's not inappropriate for work due to all the ruffles. I recommend it!

links_reviews_title: This runs 1-2 sizes small. I couldn't zip it up.
links_reviews_text: I had to return it right away because it runs small.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for tango lessons
links_reviews_text: wore for tango and work. Nicely made, pretty detail, enjoyed it, true to size but so many items I have rented have been too small so this was big
Stretchy and flattering style
Adorable ruffled skirt! High waisted. Love it!
Beautiful!!! It does run small around the waist for me. I would have to get a shaper of some sort to make it work.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress and color, a tad snug
links_reviews_text: This designer is always a tad on the snug side of any size, but I think this one was a little more so at the hip? Regardless, it's a nice weight and color and was fun to wear! Perfect for work.
Beautifully flattering cut (princess seams), which means this dress drapes and moves with your body without any awkwardness.
Fit great but too low cut for a work presentation in my opinion. Loved color.
Great fit. I generally wear a size 2 and thanks to other reviews, chose a size 4, which was perfect. It's a little tight in the armpits, so be sure to wear antiperspirant.

Form fitting. It was tight through the upper body and chest, surprisingly. Maybe it is just a little extra holiday weight? I usually size up for this brand with straight skirts, and I probably would for this dress if I ordered again. I may, it is very cute.

The fabric is surprisingly heavy, which makes the long skirt hang beautifully. Had a slight vintage feel overall, which I liked. Note that the collar was wrinkled and didn't want to stand up straight.

I wore this dress to family photos (this snap was post). I found it to be very trim through the lower waist. I had to wear a couple of pairs of Spanx to keep my belly button from outlining. The size was fine. There was the perfect amount of room in the hips and bust. I wear a 12/14 36D. It felt like a very original dress even though the fabric and color were subdued, maybe even office appropriate if cleavage isn't an issue for you.
Great silhouette, beautiful color.
It fit beautifully. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it, but will get the 8/r another time.
links_reviews_text: Was too small, needed the 8R

I'm between a 4 and a 6 and can usually squeeze into a 4, even if it's a little tight. I couldn't even get the zipper closed on this 4 though. Had it fit, I think it would have been a little under whelming.
Wanted to wear this so badly. Very snug and the neckline was cut too deep for week

I think you have to have a longer torso. I'm short, small torso, so it didn't really hit int he right places. Also, the cuffs of the sleeves looked like it was sewn on inside out. I'm sure it was intentional, but I didn't like that.
This was way tighter than expected and I rented in the hopes of wearing to a job interview so it did not work out. My husband loved it though!

The fit is perfect and flattering. I added a black 2" belt with a gold circle buckle to emphasize the waist, black snakeskin pointy toe Stuart Weitzman shoes, simple gold and brown leather watch and small pearl drop gold earrings.
Good for work

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn it...
links_reviews_text: The size fit, but the fastening at the bust was just off, it was gaping & not properly secure. The cut & style of the dress was beautiful & the fabric very high end, but ultimately I couldn’t wear it because of that fastener.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, but not for petite woman with curves.
links_reviews_text: The length is too long for someone below 5 feet. The way you put it on is also fairly restrictive if you have curves. It did however feel high quality and tailored nicely, just not for my body.
This item fit my hourglass figure, but was tight all over and would not have been comfortable to wear. I may re-rent in a larger size later.

Nice, weighty fabric, but it does run small. The hidden zip in the back is also very challenging if the fit is snug at all- especially by yourself. Was very sorry to not be able to get to wear it. I'll have to wait for the size 10 to free up.

I typically wear a 12 in dresses that have this style cut-- but this one would not fit over my 36D boobs lol . Size up if you have a larger chest. Material is lovely and the dress looks true to the pictures. Wish I could have worn it to a holiday party-- great color for that.

links_reviews_title: Neck lower cut than it appears
links_reviews_text: Perfect, gorgeous color green, but unfortunately way too low cut for me to wear to work. It would be fun for a date dress, though!
This dress runs very small and I could not wear my normal 6. I would recommend going up at least one size.
I wore this to a 1940's gala- it was perfect! It does run small as I'm normally a 14 dress size and the 16 was snug.

links_reviews_title: Well made dress, runs very small
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and fabric for the holidays but runs extremely small in the waist. I normally can wear an 8 in all designers but this one was just too tight. Recommend sizing up.

Well tailored, heavy fabric, clean lines. This hit mid/lower shin on my 5'9" frame, so may be more of a maxi than a midi on those more petite. Overall very trim conservative dress for work. The colour was lovely.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic color, cut, fit and flare
links_reviews_text: Rave reviews every day I wore this beautiful dress. Considering purchasing. Fits snug in waist and I have a small waist. Comfortable thick fabric, great workmanship, the color is stunning. Overall a hit.
I'm tall, and this dress was a little bit too long for me - too matronly looking. Also it was tight, but it fit!
Cute dress but definitely a handmaids tale vibe. Also oddly tight at the top of the him so not the most flattering cut.

This dress was very small - probably would have gone up 2 sizes. It was ok in the hips but really tight in the arms and bust. I am large chested but usually a 10 will fit. If you rent it I would recommend sizing up.
Beautiful fabric and dress, well made -- runs SMALL SMALL SMALL!
This dress came new with tags and is very pretty, but runs small. If you have a larger rib cage or broader back, order up. Sadly, had to return.

links_reviews_title: Sadly had to return but love the color, style and quality
links_reviews_text: Sadly am returning this pretty dress as it is way too small in the bust. I am a 36-38C and it won't zip up . I'd say this dress runs a good size or two small in the bust. Other dimensions in dress seem a tad small too - shoulders, arms, etc.
Beautiful dress but SO SMALL around ribcage that I couldn't wear it.
Too low cut for work event. I'm 5'6 and it was quite long. Great color just didn't work.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but runs even smaller than Black Halo usually does
links_reviews_text: As with most Black Halo dresses, this is a really well-made dress with a flattering cut in a great color, but it runs SMALL. I am a 16 in 90% of other designers and usually an 18 in Black Halo. When it came to this one, even the 18 was really snug. I would recommend going two sizes over your usual one. Other than that though it was a really great dress for work or a conservative special occasion.
It fit well on the top. I wish it was an inch or two shorter.

I rented this for work, but I'm sending it back because it's really more of a party dress! That being said, I would definitely rent again for a winter party. It's pretty fitted at the waist and hips, and the flared skirt makes for a super flattering shape. I love the pearl details at the shoulder and the cuffs, too. The shoulders/sleeves have just the slightest puff.

links_reviews_title: Top was good. Bottom was meh
links_reviews_text: The design around the skirt wasn't a fan.

links_reviews_title: Starry eyed for this cozy sweater.
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater. It is straightforward; as in, it looks cozy, long, oversized, and littered with stars and it is indeed all of those things! It's not my favorite rental but I've reached for it to wear for warmth, style, and ease a handful of times. I've gotten tons of compliments when I've worn it. I have paired it with mostly black leggings and a black cami. Black flats or nude booties. Or a pair of black and nude loafers. Happy stargazing! (By gazing I mean wearing...)

I have never rented a Shoshanna dress I didn't love, and this is one of my new favorites. Classic with a fun touch on the shoulders and cuffs. Fits me just like all of her other dresses do -- reliable, flattering, comfortable. May buy when the price goes down ...
Loved the fun skirt on this. I'd stick with the 8 for an event but would probably go up a size for work next time, for length and a slightly more relaxed fit.

Interesting contrast between the pearls and and the rest of the dress which gave odd punk vibes. I feel like the puffed shoulders may have been a bit too exaggerated, but I have been seeing this on a lot of dresses so I guess it's in! Almost felt like I was wearing a costume though. I'm usually a 2 or 4 depending on the brand/dress, and the 2 fit great (loose as it should be)

links_reviews_title: Wore it for family dinner. Was a huge hit. Fit was flattering and fun.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit. Beautiful lines.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but ruffles make it feel short
links_reviews_text: Rented this to wear to work and then to a fundraising event. I love the look and got so many compliments--the pearls, shoulders, and ruffles are fun without being too much. However, the dress felt too short for work, I think because of the ruffles at the bottom. Would rent again for an event but not for work.

links_reviews_title: Adorable but not for my workplace
links_reviews_text: Would love to have kept it and actually worn it but it just seemed too fancy for my work place.
Really nice fabric, great fit. I was pleasantly surprised at how cute this dress was. I wore it several times

It fit like a dream, I loved the ruffle at the bottom and big button detail on the shoulder. I wore to work with tights (it is a bit short for my work), and it was perfect. I felt like a million bucks in it and got loads of compliments.

I am so mad I forgot to take a picture in this dress! I wore it to my daughter's baby naming at 10 weeks post partum and it was absolute perfection. A size 12 fit well over my nursing chest (if you know, you know), and I wore it with patterned tights and black pumps. If you are looking for something appropriate but super stylish, this is it!!
Absolutely loved this dress. Classy and fit perfectly.

I don't want to send this dress back. It is so flattering and classy. The material is appropriate weight. Pearl details and the flared skirt are all perfect. I'm a 6/8 and the 8 was appropriate for work setting.
These jeans are super comfortable and the buttons make it POP. Will rent again.
These pants were really well made and fit like a glove (true to size).

links_reviews_title: Having the options in my wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: This suit is fun, the fabric is stretchy not the usual fabric. Important to know that the look is slightly distressed looking so not for a formal occasion. The sleeves were a little long and the buttons are very cool but also cumbersome.
I love the look of these pants. They are very fitted; however, they are a bit on the short side. I realize they are cropped but I would like another inch on them

links_reviews_title: Nice pants with a little fit issue
links_reviews_text: I really liked these black pants as an alternative to regular black dress pants and really liked the look. They were TTS but I felt the crotch area was a bit long and I couldn't pull them up enough to be comfortable. Still wore them and liked them, but not quite perfect.

links_reviews_title: everyone LOVED my pants :) they are navy tho
links_reviews_text: Definitely would say if you are between sizes, go down! so comfy and hugging with a good amount of stretch!! would DEF rent again

Decent work pants! Didn't realize these were navy blue when ordering them. Not bad looking, but the buttons were extremely loose and it took the elegance of the pant away. Great quality! Like other reviewers said, they run big.

The pants were sturdy, well made, and flattering. I was a little bummed, from the photos I thought it was a high waist pant and it def is not, but other than that, very nice. The material is very thick, so it will hold all your bits in, but by the end of the day I was eager to take them off.
I wore these to an event after work. They fit great and the gold buttons add some fun. Slight flare at the bottom and shorter/cropped length create a very slimming look. You won't be disappointed.

I've rented multiple styles of Derek Lam cropped pants and I just love the way they fit on me. They're comfortable, flattering, thick but not hot, slimming, stretchy. I like the way the cropped and flared legs look on my body. These pants made me feel like a cute sailor at work lol.
Looks great with a pair of jeans. Rented matching pants but they weren't flattering.
Loved everything about these pants. Cute, nice fitting, quality fabric, comfortable, different. One of my favorite items so far.
Loved this fit and style!
We're a little bit tight so didn't bring them on vacation as I was trying to save space. But I LOVED how they looked and feel. Once I lose a few pounds I'll definitely get them again!
Fit great. Really nice stretchy fabric that didn't bunch or pull.
The pair that I rented had a missing button on the right side front pocket. It had 3 buttons instead of 4. The left side had the correct 4 buttons.
Loved them for work with jacket.

Seriously considering buying these. They fit so beautifully, amazing quality, love the buttons. As others have said, these definitely run small so size up and you will be very pleased. I am usually a 4 in pants, but the 6 was perfect.
Very fitted. These are navy pants that feel like stretchy jeans material. I would order up a size.
These pants fit really nice and true to size!

These pants are very flattering. I felt very comfortable and there's some stretch to them. One of the buttons on the belt loop kept popping off which was frustrating, but I think that was with wear from others. Overall, I loved these pants!
No way. Probably should have gone up two sizes. Stylish. Great buttons. Cannot knock it down because my thighs are too big!
Fit was great. Fabric was stretchy and nice and heavy. great fun pant
These pants have the perfect amount of stretch, fit beautifully and the gold accented buttons make them even more stunning. I wore them with and without a belt! Love these and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: WOW! These are a show stopper!! Order one size up!
links_reviews_text: Wow. Like another renter said, these are the most flattering pants I've ever put on. I haven't even worn them to my event yet - just tried them on as soon as they arrived and I am so happy I rented them. I am a true size 8 in most clothes but they only had size 10 available so I rented the 10 and they fit like a glove. I definitely recommend to go up one size from what you usually wear. I'm 5'6" and the closure hits right at belly button so I'd say they are high waisted. I can't get over the quality of these pants - they are made so well and the fabric is gorgeous. The photos of these pants don't do them justice. The gold buttons are gorgeous!

These pants fit so well and are the most flattering pants I have tried on. They fit a little tighter through the thighs and looser on the waste but they are stretchy. Normally I am a 4 but I got the 6 and they fit (were even a little bit big in the waist). Highly recommend!
Usually a size 6. Could get on but needed an 8
I thought these were black but they are navy. They run a bit small. Received new with tags but did not wear; nothing special.

links_reviews_title: I unfortunately wasn't able to wear them.
links_reviews_text: With my petite athletic build they just ran a little too small.
The pants were supposed to black but were faded pretty bad and looked navy.

Got these to get black work pants, but ended up being navy (which is actually not bad). Fit really snugly but in a way that is waist snatching and very flattering for someone with curves! Will Keep longer than expected because they're so comfy as well.

Cute fit. Material was thick and stretchy so they were really flattering. High waisted. It is not obvious from the picture but these pants are navy - which I was not expecting. I thought they were black. Wore them twice to work.
Lovely fit right above ankle. Fabric luxe. So cute.

Fabulous fit and fabric. Love the detail with the buttons. Best with a tucked in shirt so you can see the buttons in the back. True to size. Nice stretch in the fabric. Still can't decide if they are black or navy though...
This piece is extremely well made and fits like a dream. It looks very professional.
Loved this pants. People stopped me to compliment the pants. The fit was amazing. I wore them twice in 1 week.
I was not expecting this to be so lightweight and thin. Was great for running errands or hanging around the house.
Great Saturday casual sweatshirt type top. Wore it a few times but nothing to get overly excited about!
This is a cozy sweatshirt, super soft, although it is really more like a pajama top. Thin and soft material, not thick like a typical sweatshirt. I wore this out on errands and to lunch, casual top.
Fit well, comfortable fabric. Could work in its own or under a blazer or hoodie, depending on the weather. Would definitely rent again.
Perfect casual shirt - so soft, so thin and yet so warm. Great detailing. I would consider this more of a sweater than a shirt shirt as it's a knit material but regardless it's great.
This top is sooo soft and comfy. I wore it to work and to bed lol.
These sweats are made from a pretty thin material- a little bit see - through- but are the perfect lounge around the house sweats. I wore them for a week !

The fabric is thinner than I expected so luckly I was down south for the holidays were it was warmer. I wanted something cute and comfortable to wear so this was great. Nice style. I ordered the large but should have gotten the medium. The picture shows the model's ankles but mines came down over my sneakers so was longer shown but may have worked better in smaller size.
So soft and fun piping makes it look skinner on
So comfy and cute! Love this style. I'm waiting for the pants to be available And then will buy the set. Another RTR hit!

links_reviews_title: Love the style. Back is tricky to do alone.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress and the style. Very short length. Anyone over 5' beware. Back is interesting how it buttons and it's not very convenient. Overall super cute dress. Love the style.

The dress was a really nice material and very flattering. It did run on the bigger size but I still wore it. It was just a bit big in the waist so I think next time I would get a size down. Otherwise it was great!

links_reviews_title: Huge slit in back. No way to wear bra.

links_reviews_text: Looked well put together for my meeting and received lots of compliments. Wore a cami under as the dress is partly backless. Would rent again to go out for dinner as well
Easy to dress up or down and easy to match different pieces with but I wasn't thrilled about the length...kind of short for office wear.
I love the style and sleekness of this dress. Very classy
I am giving this dress 4 stars because, for a tall girl, it's pretty short for a work setting. It would be ok for a night out with tights.

links_reviews_title: Nice twist on basic black dress
links_reviews_text: But the open back meant I had to wear some sort of sweater/blazer

links_reviews_title: Great for work meeting! Paired with tights and boots in winter.
links_reviews_text: Nice little black dress. Had to wear cami underneath due to open back for work purposes. Would rent again!
I couldn't wear this to work because the back is open!
Dress was a bit short and appeared low quality.

Loved this dress so much! Was very flattering and could be dressed up and down. The open back was fun, and I loved the sleeves. Wore once with OTK boots for a night out and another time with tights and booties for work - loved it both ways. Material is nice and thick. Just know that the zipper stops at midsection and can be a little tight for sitting / eating.

links_reviews_title: Cute and sexy at the same time
links_reviews_text: It's not too sexy or too cute but works for both. The back is open which I didnt realize, I wore a tank underneath.
Nice fabric, very comfortable and stylish.

I rented this for work. It looks great from the front, but the back only zips halfway and then there is a button at the top leaving your entire upper back exposed. Do not rent if you need to be covered up. Otherwise, rent!

links_reviews_title: Not a great fit on my shape.
links_reviews_text: Material on the thin side and didn't lay nice on me.
Really cute dress but I rented it for work which was a no go. Hard to see in the pictures, but the upper part of the back is open and shows the back of the bra.

Fit: oversized. Sleeves were long as in the picture, probably were longer on me since I am petite. The dress felt baggy - I'm normally a zero and wore the zero but it was probably a size too large. Dress is made of a knit material. Good for an evening event but wasn't as dressed up as I expected.
I love how they fit.
I love these pants, the black ribbon piping is very slimming. Great for work to happy hour. They are slightly lighter than you'd expect but it's winter in Chicago and I wasn't cold.
These are so cool! The fit is great, the material is interesting & comfortable & the ultra high rise is to die for! The subtle print was great with this larger bolder print top
I wore these pants several times before returning them. The fit, material and design were great.
at first the fit was a little tight like the other reviews stated but they loosened up as the day went on.

links_reviews_title: These will be perfect for causal work day.
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little big and the fabric was a lighter weight than I expected for winter months

links_reviews_title: Love these. Would buy them if they weren't so pricey.
links_reviews_text: Length is great on petites. Nice stretch. Cool pattern.

Love these pants! They're the perfect work pant. They have plenty of room for a booty but weirdly are a bit tight in the thighs, but they stretched out just enough as the day goes on. No stretch in the waist but it was still comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The style was great, not the fit
links_reviews_text: The pants are awesome with the tuxedo stripe. Unfortunately you the pants stretch throughout the day making the suit look sloppy. I didn't think the fabric was too great and surprised to see how much the suit is. If the pants would have kept their shape, I would have considered buying the suit.
I wore these with the matching blazer multiple times for big meetings. Great, modern alternative to a boring "power suit". The pants do run a little big in the rear.

links_reviews_title: Runs Small? I normally fit fine in size 8 pants, but these were very snug.
links_reviews_text: Not for short, curvy gals.
These pants are great for dressing up or down, so comfy and fun to wear!
Nicely made and stylish , just a bit loose in leg and behind

links_reviews_title: Very cute with Kaufman Franco slouchy black cable knit.
links_reviews_text: It's high rise, which I liked. It was a little too roomy in the waist.
boxy fit
Great fit
These pants fit perfect and added extra appeal to my outfit. They don't have much stretch, but honestly they don't need it. They fit perfectly through my thighs and waist.

links_reviews_title: I loved these pants. I would rent them again in the spring or summer
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit, the style, the material. They were lighter than I thought they would and the temps just dropped here a few weeks ago so I was a little cold outside, but I really liked these pants and I felt really good in them. I might rent them again in the spring or summer.

I loved the look of these pants but they ran large. For shirt girls (I am 5'1") the cropped look ran pretty close to my ankles, so the length was perfect for work trousers. I paired it with a Jcrew white blouse and it was such a comfortable outfit!
This skirt was cute but had trouble finding a top I loved with it. A one and done, wasn't sad to say goodbye.
Loved this skirt for work! Could definitely be dresses up or down for a more casual vibe. The slit was sexy without being too revealing!

links_reviews_title: Great statement skirt !! Got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: This is a great everyday/work skirt. The slit is a little high so keep that in mind. But I overall love this skirt and wish there was more patterns. It fits true to size and had a little give in the waist but fitted on the thighs. OVERALL I LOVED IT !!
Loved this skirt but ultimately ended up safety pinning the back of the skirt to wear (pictured). Wish I ordered the 0!

links_reviews_title: Perf go to skirt for everyday or a party!
links_reviews_text: Rented this on a whim for my holiday party and ended up LOVING it! Brought it on vacation with me. Could be styled up or down, super comfortable, has a sexy element with the high slit, and the pattern is flattering.
Wore this skirt to work with tights and also on a date with high boots. Super cute, snug in the right places and comfy! This is a great skirt for going out or work in the winter months
Wore this in California for a holiday dinner. Very fun and more exciting than your typical silk midi.
I'm in Chicago so was limited as I had to wear tights. Would probably rent again in warmer weather for more options to remix. Wore to work with a bodysuit. TTS.
This skirt was cute and comfy. The leg slit was high enough that it gave it a little bit of sexy but not so high that it would be considerate inappropriate
This fit perfect if you wear it a little higher. Classy, yet not too much coverage! This can be paired with any kind of top too!
Wore this for NYE I'm obsessed! Too bad it's so expensive if not I would totally purchase
Beautiful fabric and fit.
The slit is pretty high and wasn't the most flattering.

I liked this skirt but didn't love - it felt a little stretched out (usually a 0 would be perfect or even a little snug from Joie). But, it was very comfortable and the length was perfect - the slit comes up to a nice height, not too high so that it's still appropriate but high enough that it feels sexy. Wore once out to dinner with my fiance and once to work with high suede boots.
Fit was good except the waist which sat at the hips rather than the actual waist. Pretty but thin material. Size down one size.
Fit perfect around the hips and waist, and the fabric was super silky, only thing I felt it was a few inches too long on my shorter frame.
Unfortunately I was unable to wear because the skirt was larger than I expected. I will say the slit is higher than I thought in the photos.
May rent again when it's warmer. Thin material. Cute style.
Rented with my unlimited. Loved the silk fabric and that it was nicely lined. Looks exactly like the picture. Tons of compliments.
Great fit and length, slot not too high. The ruching is super flattering.
Felt chic and pretty. Great cut and length!

links_reviews_title: Love love love love love love love
links_reviews_text: Looking for a skirt that is mature, sexy and different? This is your skirt. Such a flattering gorgeous skirt, fits so perfectly. I wore this with a black turtle neck and muled heels. The slit is sexy but not too much and its soooooooooo flattering. Rent now!
Gorgeous skirt but runs small, no stretch and not for a curvy girl.
Great sweater! Lightweight but stylish.
I wish I had sized you to have it more baggy otherwise I loved it
I love this top. Super cute fit.

links_reviews_title: So fun, runs a little small
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so fun, but it does run a little small. I got tons of compliments on it and felt very trendy wearing it with a leather jacket.
The graphic elements and message of this sweater are super fun. I liked the fit because it was roomy enough to be comfy, but fitted enough to be flattering.
Not a feature piece but a great shirt to wear a few times.
Super comfortable. The sweater has an eye catching color combo that turns heads. Such an easy piece that pairs with everything.
runs small in the chest
Such a great fun sweater. I wanted to keep this. The details on the sleeve and back were really cute. Good weight for fall weather or a cold movie theatre
Love the yellow "peace" on sleeve and design on back. Nothing super special but cute!
This was my second time to rent this sweater. If it was not the end of the season, I would purchase this sweater.
Runs a bit small
Definitely warm, best for winter.
Cute details on this sweater but it was very tight fitting and not flattering. Should have sized up to probably a medium.
True to size
Fits true to size. Very comfortable
I had an issue with quality in this, but not about this cute sweater. It's fun and different
It is a casual sweater but it is so cute and received so many compliments on it. Even considered buying it for keeps it was so nice
I got a lot of compliments- unique piece

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater I wore a few times.
links_reviews_text: Fitted. I have broad swimmer shoulders and it was snug on me in that area.

links_reviews_title: Nice message, medium a bit lacking
links_reviews_text: Perhaps I should have ordered a larger size than normal? The shorter front was too short to be worn without a tank underneath which added a bit of bulk. Just kind of meh for me.

Wore this sweater a few times...to work and out in the evening to a concert. It's a departure from the normal look, so it was fun. The only really I have it 4 instead of 5 stars was the arms were pretty tight (I have thin arms too) and after wearing it all day at work, it did feel itchy.
This was a little snug, I probably should've gone with a Medium, but I'm usually between an XS-S so I'd say this runs small. But the color and material is nice
Fun sweater, runs a little small

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work (I'm a high school teacher) with dress pants I also rented from here.
links_reviews_text: It fit exactly how I would expect it too. It wasn't too tight, but also not too loose either. The length was about near upper thigh length, so it covered most of my butt. The color is a pretty olive and I love all the details. Perfect for a fun work shirt.
Fun sweater. Runs true to size. Comfortable and cute.
Really comfortable and cute. Would rent again.
Great top lots of compliments. I’d buy it but it’s a bit too pricey
So many compliments. Great color. Fun sweater
I think this sweater was meant to be fitted--probably could have sized down to look more like the photo. Loved the bright pops of yellow and fun pattern. Will rent again.
Sleeves are tight, but the torso portion is billowy. Good if you have a tumtum.
So cute and unique. Fun and hippy style I like. Soft and not itchy. My husband loves it too. Hopefully will be able to buy it at some point.

links_reviews_title: wore this a few times, conversation "peace", pardon the pun. :)
links_reviews_text: very versatile
Nice weight and material. Very flattering on. I received lots of compliments on this sweater.

links_reviews_title: I wore this out shopping and to a casual dinner with friends
links_reviews_text: I liked this sweater. It fits tight in the top of the arms. If you are bigger chested and wider in the back size up. The material is a great weight for a fall day. I received several compliments.
Loved this sweater. Perfect weight for wearing indoors in the winter.
Arms were a little long but good weight and loved the design on both front and back
great for the gym
Should have sizes up On this one. Fabric is also a tad itchy
I liked the nude shade and the laser cut out. Nice pants for a fun outing or yoga class.

I worse these around the house to work from home. I found them to be comfortable with a little bit of compression, and a very pretty color. The only thing I did not like is that there is a design on the bottom that had holes in it, that I really could not see in the pictures.
The color was a bit more flesh toned than it looked in the pictures. They matched my skin too much that they looked weird. This would vary by skin tone for sure, but for me it was a no go.
Retro and fun

links_reviews_title: Cute glasses but too big for my face!
links_reviews_text: Rented these since they are the exact pair the Duchess of Sussex (née Meghan Markle) has. They looked cute on her, but on me they take up half my face. But this is why RTR is awesome-you get to try things and if they don't work out, you're not out too much money :)

links_reviews_title: Not my style but it's nice!
links_reviews_text: Favorite thing about RTR is being able to take risks on clothing/patterns I wouldn't normally pick. This would fall in that category - it's cute in its own way but just not my thing. Fit well, comfy, and unique. Likely won't rent again though.
This sweatshirt was SUPER wide and very unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Super cute houndstooth print with gold trim details.
links_reviews_text: Loved the bloucy sleeves, gold thread details on the cuffs and waistband. A great alternative to a sweatshirt. Tons of compliments. Fits true to Size.
Love this sweater. Wore it a few times before giving it back. Its baggy but the pattern is awesome and bold

To me this is the perfect RTR rental. I lived the houndstooth print and shine details at the neck and wrist. I wore it on an anniversary trip to Italy with my husband, to a meeting, and once more on family vacation. And now I'm sending back as I'm sure I'd tire of the print. Great fit, arm length is king but banded wrist makes this work for different body types. Blouson fit through the body is flattering.
Perfect condition, overall really good quality is evident. Thick but not too heavy. Can dress down with leggings or wear to work like I did in pic. I almost bought!!!!
I'm having a hard time giving this one back. The fit is relaxed but the print makes it very edgy. I've received numerous compliments. Love it!
Fun statement sweater that I wore numerous times throughout the month. Highly recommend!

Super cute sweater! Runs true to size and is definitely a shorter length. Easy and comfy to wear. The bold houndstooth print is fun and the stripes of metallic gold would make this great for the holidays.
Super cute and great quality I ordered an XL it was pretty big so go a size smaller.

links_reviews_title: It is a great sweater to throw on, can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: It is a great pattern, and sweater to have to throw on. I wish the small would have been available, but happy I ordered it. It runs large.
Shocked I didn't get a good pic wearing this because I LOVED it. So comfortable and trendy. A little baggy, but that's the look. I debated buying this one!

links_reviews_title: Cute comfy sweater, perfect for work
links_reviews_text: Loved the look of this sweater and it was perfect for a casual work day. Perfect for a short torso, although the arms are a little long so shorties be ready for some arm poof.

links_reviews_title: I loved the cold stitching detail on the sleeves and waist!
links_reviews_text: Fit was good - a hair short if you're tall. Very comfortable and yet fabulous.
nice sweater, took the wrong size
