This was tight on my chest but huge everywhere else. The houndstooth pattern was cool but I did not care for the gold threading on the bottom . Looked sloppy and unflattering.

I have a longer torso & it Hit just at my belly button, Don't rent if you like to cover your butt. So so cute and SO COMFORTABLE! Great for work with dress pants and black heels. Make sure to pair with high waisted pants
little big in general. Arms are definitely a little big, but that's on purpose.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print. It can be worn at work and on the weekend.
links_reviews_text: Cute oversized sweater. Definitely can dress up with black skinny jeans or with sequin leggings for a GNO outfit. I wore it to work with camel color pants, and then wore it during the weekend with cuffed jeans and white sneakers. I would definitely rent again.
I loved this sweater! It was a great choice for a long day of travel. I will absolutely be renting this again!
Nice fit.
I wore this about 5 times and got so many compliments! Super cute for casual or dressy options

links_reviews_title: Dressy enough for work casual, fun enough for a weekend. Fits so comfy. So many compliments.

links_reviews_text: This top is very cute! Great quality and material but is a cropped sweater and not appropriate for work. Perfect for a dressed up casual night out!

Loved the print and weight/feel of this but it was a little too cropped/short on me but that's just my long torso problem. Not scratchy or itchy at all. I paired it with high waisted skinny jeans and booties for work. I would have purchased it if it was longer.
This is so cute, but short, I couldn't wear it.
Loved the and movement of this skirt. It was a little long but I wore it above my waist. Will absolutely rent this again.

The fit was a bit looser than I had anticipated so a 6 fit great at the natural waist (ba my usual 8). I wore this for a work conference and received a ton of compliments. It was comfortable and flowy -- very fun to wear. My industry sector is business-casual/casual, so I paired with a T-shirt and cardigan. This would be easy to dress up for a more formal occasion. I'm a big fan and wish I had this in my closet to keep!
Loved loved loved this skirt. So flowy, great colors, and the back didn't wrinkle after a day of sitting at my desk. Will rent again!

I wore this to a baby shower. I ended up sizing up for comfort, but the 14 was a tad loose, perfect for sitting and relaxing and eating chex mix. If I was dressing it up for a party I would have worn the 12. Skirt was complimented at every turn, in pictures it is very vibrant. Very well made, the pleats stayed put and no additional wrinkling through a lot of sitting. Flows nicely, has excellent movement. will definitely rent again should an occasion arise.
I rented this skirt for an event and it was absolutely perfect. It was flattering on + everyone loved it!

links_reviews_title: I'd give it 10 stars, if I could
links_reviews_text: "Momma! You're wearing a rainbow!" My five-year-old son loved this, along with absolutely everyone at work. This is such an eye-catching and fun skirt! You can Dress it up or down. I really was going to keep it, but decided it's just a bit too memorable and I could only wear it on occasion. Still wondering if that was a bad call. It's not warm, but can be worn in a lot of seasons with the right under-layers.
so many compliments at work, perfect flattering waist which isn't always true with these kinds of skirts, loved!

I wore this skirt to a work retreat. Our team mascot is a unicorn so I thought this would show team spirit. It just fit a smidge big around the waist. I wore with a belt because it sat on the lower part of my hips. And I didn't like how that looked. Material is good quality. I got so many compliments. Would definitely rent again just in the next size down.

Wanted to love this but was underwhelmed. Most brands I can wear a 6 but size up to 8 for comfort. I would size up to a 10 next time I rent JCrew... I could zip the skirt but didn't have room to tuck in a top so had to wear a loose sweater which was not the look I wanted with this high-waisted skirt.
Fit was perfect!
I LOVE this skirt and I received tons of compliments. I'm definitely thinking about purchasing it.
I loved everything about this - the fit, the flare, the compliments! Absolutely recommend.
Loved this skirt. Flows and comfortable and so pretty. Small in the waist so glad I ordered up. But great skirt.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Beautiful bright colors
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt! I styled it similarly to the model except with boots and a hat because it's freezing at my job! Got tons of compliments and people saying they wanted to buy this skirt :)
Pretty skirt. No stretch in waist or fabric.

links_reviews_title: Trendy pleats with pop art vibe
links_reviews_text: I love this skit and it's pleats plus pop of color. Here - I'm at the Museum of Modern Art and, as you can see, fit right in! I also wore it with a blazer to an after-work event. Memorable. You'll feel great in it in all setting - get ready for compliments. True to size. Good for petites.

Am I swayed by the compliments of my peers and coworkers? Yeah, but who isn't?! This skirt garnered the most compliments of any rtr piece yet. Navy waist and with no give, slip is a scoch shorter than the overlay. Very light, flowy, chiffony fabric. Really cute muted rainbow. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Literally brightens everyone's day
links_reviews_text: This is a great skirt for work/date/walking around the city looking cute as hell. Very versatile and the colors pop. I got a ton of compliments and felt very comfortable in the skirt. The material is cheap so not worth buying, but perfect for renting.
Very light, material was a bit too thin for Nov but made me so happy and cheerful it was worth being a bit chilly. Compliments galore. Even from men lol!

links_reviews_title: My skirt never got returned to RTR :(
links_reviews_text: I've always had good experiences with RTR, and no problems with returns, but this time they did not receive my return! I was quite surprised! They were accommodating and kind once I explained what had happened.

Statement skirt (especially for J Crew!), but this was too big on the waist for me (and a tad longer than typical midi length). I couldn't make it work, tried a top tucked in, half tuck, out, no luck. In addition to being a little big in the waist, the fit (and maybe lining?) made it bulky on my hips. All around not a good look for me. Didn't wear it.
I decided to rent this to see if I really wanted to own it. The colors were bright, yet subdued, & I received so many compliments. I went ahead & ordered it!
This was perfect for my daughter's rainbow theme birthday party! The skirt is soft and light; perfect for a warm day. The waist band was a little snug (not elastic).

links_reviews_title: so many compliments! great and fun skirt.
links_reviews_text: very flowy and comfortable.

Such a fun skirt! I wore it with a slim-fitting white shirt and got so many compliments from practically ever person I saw that day. Seriously, friends, co-workers, and several kindergartners. I found it fit true to size and was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Fun rainbow colors brightened up a gloomy day.
links_reviews_text: There is no give in the waist - I checked the J Crew size chart and ended up ordering the 12, which fit comfortably. I'm 5ft4in and it hit mid-calf on me.
Size 6 was ok under my belly button. I wore it with boots and black sleeves sweater. So nice!

links_reviews_title: The most fun skirt to wear ever
links_reviews_text: Fitted in the waist, but then very flows

links_reviews_title: From Christmas Dinner to Work--this skirt is so versatile!
links_reviews_text: The skirt fit true to size, can be matched with so many tops/shoes/accessories to dress it up or down. Every time I wore it I received tons of compliments. It's a lighter fabric so perfect for the weird warm winters in the South but for a cooler location I'd stick to renting this for spring/summer
Great colors. Easy to dress up or down with a variety of options. A bit small in the waist, no stretch.

I got so many compliments on this skirt and ended up wearing it to almost all of my holiday parties this year. The colors are vibrant but not so horribly bright that it looks like a little girl's skirt. Pair it with a black or navy blue top to mute it down a little more. Can be dressed up or down. Loved it!
perfect, although waist is not elastic
The jewel-toned rainbow skirt is super fun and easy to wear. Can be used for work, but I dressed it up for an art party!
Dress up dress down with sneakers. This skirt is just perfect.
You will feel like a ray of sunshine sparkles in this skirt. It can be dressed up or down - don't hesitate to rent! I got tons of compliments - you will draw attention!

I didnt really love this originally trying it on, but I got more compliments on this skirt than almost anything else I've ever worn. I still don't think it was super flattering for me (I felt like it emphasized my wide hips), but it grew on me.

links_reviews_title: Colors and comfort. But I thought it had a black stripe & waist band, it is actually blue. No black
links_reviews_text: Fun!!!

links_reviews_title: Nice, heavy fabric with sophisticated ruffles at neck
links_reviews_text: Alas, this dress/top can only be worn without anything on top of it due to the structural integrity of the neck ruffle, which was more like a halter-style in terms of the closeness to my neck than in photo. Also, fabric is a black denim, with fading - photo here is not super accurate. It's sophisticated in style, but casual in fabric. So, will re-rent when the weather warms up.
great fit...fun and flowy

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Definitely a tented fit, but so cute!

links_reviews_text: The dress is heavy but it's got a really great flowy shape. The arm holes are very big. I needed to size down!

links_reviews_title: this looked so cute in the pic-
links_reviews_text: was going to take on vacation in the Caribbean - it's a black denim-like fabric so waaayy to heavy. Would be good for a not too warm summer day
Yes, I felt a little Amish but in like a sexy rom-com way. Husband laughed at it but loved it. Not great for running up and down stairs, but otherwise wonderful around the house rental.

I'm always in between a SMALL and MEDIUM. I could have easily gone down a size, but not enough to say it runs Large. I would order the size you usually stick to in order for the short to be flowy and comfortable.
Fits great! Sleeves are a little longer than I thought but its comfy and looks super professional

links_reviews_title: Baggier than expected but still professional
links_reviews_text: This was nice and comfortable for my postpartum tummy, but it was just a little baggy for my taste. The sleeves were very baggy which isn't my preference. Still, I wore it under a fitted cardigan and it was fine for the day.

links_reviews_title: I'm larger up top and apple shaped so this fit perfectly. It was large on the "average" person.

links_reviews_text: Cute top. Flowy. Wore to work with a high waisted pant.
The top was cute, but a little tight in the arms for me
Lightweight, cute top great for work or a night out for happy hour or dinner. Would rent again!
Easy and comfortable to wear
This top was fabulous! Beautiful material that draped perfectly, not see through at all even though it was white and lightweight. Loved it! Wanted to buy...
Perfect for work! Fit well and received complements!
Cute, classy shirt. Appropriate for work and very basic.
Such an adorable top! Was perfect for my friends 30th bday party!
Effortless basic shirt for everyday or work! A little boxy but very comfortable.

I didn't end up wearing this because it didn't feel "special enough." It's a solid basic. The fabric is polyester and has a lot of static cling in the dry winter weather. It has a very loose fit so if you want to cover up, this will work for you.
Wore this shirt with some black pants and a black blazer. Loved the sleeve details. Super soft and fit well under a blazer.
Cute but medium was too big for me and I didn't end up wearing. Would be great for business casual

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this top! I felt very classy wearing it.
links_reviews_text: It fit very nice. I wouldn't change anything about it.
I wore this shirt for thanksgiving dinner and to work. It fit a little loose but I was ok with that. Very comfortable.
This was SUCH a cute top that you can easily dress up or down. I wore it to work but it would be adorable with jeans and booties as well.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a holiday dinner with family
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Not too loose, not too tight.
I loved this shirt, would rent it again. Fit perfectly and was flattering.
This shirt fit great, exactly as expected. Love a windowpane. Size 42 (10) was a bit large but still worked. I would have sized down at least one size but it wasn't available.
Cute. High quality. Great fit. Not as exciting on as I thought but classy.
Loved this shirt. Wore it with slim black jeans and flats. Felt really good in it!!
Fit is loose, and double layer of top adds drama when worn with a jacket.
This was the perfect touch of class to a more a casual work environment.
Cute, flattering and versatile. Would definitely rent again!
Loved this easy to wear staple. Could dress it up for work with a blazer, or down. it's fully lined - a plus for an all white shirt. Crisp and professional
Really liked this one. Double layer material gives it a flow, the length was right for both tucking in and wearing out.
Easy to wear and breathable. Super simple. Nothing very exciting!
Comfy, pairs nicely with black jeans and is a good work top. Will definitely be renting again.
Fit was okay. A little tight in the neck. Good for work.
Very comfortable work shirt, looks great with jeans
It was a little oversized, but still very cute and work appropriate. I received several compliments on it throughout the day I wore it.
Good for everyday or a casual workday.
Rented this shirt for work. I live in Texas and its August and this shirt is sooo light and perfect for our hot weather. very comfortable while still looking classy. I'll definitely rent again.

This was really cute to wear to work with some black pants and colored shoes. It was a little tight in the arms and by the end of the day, taking it off felt so good. Fortunately, I sized up anyway so wasn't unbearable. If you are someone who normally has arm issues on shirts, definitely get a bigger size.
I looked sleek and chic during all of my photo shoots while on vacation.

links_reviews_title: Wore this all over Paso Robles!
links_reviews_text: Nice moto jacket. I really enjoyed the fit and different fabric textures.
I wore this jacket over a gold silk blouse with pencil skirt. Felt very put together! Cropped with various patterns of leather/suede. Modern. Jacket runs large so I wore the small. I'm a 6 on top

links_reviews_title: Beautiful leather jacket, makes you feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: I rented this piece for a month and got so much wear out of it! Perfect to add to any outfit!

This jacket fit like a glove! Not a lot of room for a bulky sweater underneath, but I paired it with a bodysuit and some joggers and felt like a million bucks in it! I'm a 10/12 and the large was perfect, I could zip it up and it hugged my body without feeling too tight in the shoulders.
Arms ran a little tight, but this was otherwise very comfortable and chic. Loved the way the different fabrics lined up.

Cute, cute, CUTE! Fits very well with a flattering, tailored look. The different textures make it more visually interesting than the standard zippers and buckles you find on a moto jacket. It's moto elevated and I am living for it! ;-)
Such a fun and chick jacket
I like my leather jackets a little tighter. This was a loser, motorcycle look.
Soft leather, high quality, fits amazing (shoulders just a little pointy, fyi). This jacket felt luxurious and expensive and fabulous.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Nice fit and soft leather.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit and soft leather.
Fit well and a good length for petites.
High rise, actually true to size, flattering in waist and butt. Only thing I'd change is make them a little longer but I'm on the tall side so I have this problem often.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Super comfy for casual weekend or date night
links_reviews_text: A little on the short side since I'm tall but still great. Can be dressed up or down. AG for the win again!

Super flattering, great high-waist fit, nice slightly off-black color, a little stretch but not too much so they still feel like denim. I was really looking for something a little more relaxed fit and these are basically a skinny jean but they were nice. They’re a little on the shorter side - if you want something to show a few inches of your ankle in the summer and to fit shorter than an ankle boot in the winter, these are a good choice.

links_reviews_title: The jean you want to wear everyday.
links_reviews_text: Super true to size! Extremely flatting and I love that they're off-black. They're the type of Jean you want to wear every day.

Thought I would try a pair of high waisted pants...and promptly realized why I don't wear them! I have a smaller waist but larger hips and they looked huge in these! I'm 5'10 and the length hit at a weird place but the bottom of the jeans flared out at the hem. Couldn't cuff it because they were already short! Sending back.
These are just okay. I got a 28 but should have selected 27 as they're very loose in the waist.
Perfect high waist, might need to buy
I really liked these jeans. They fit really well. They have a button up front and are a flattering high rise cut.

I was skeptical at first ... but after wearing once, fabric stretched a bit and became more comfortable. They were a bit stiff at first. Waist is long and high, which I like. More charcoal colored than black. Good length. Happy enough with them overall that I am considering purchasing to keep! Love this brand and have a couple other pairs from them.
Fit is stiff, but loosens after the first wear. Great inseam length for my petite (read: short), but athletic legs. Really love the washed black color. May buy these in the future!
These were way to tight on me though 30 is my usual jean size. Otherwise they were fine. Cute enough.
Fit fine. No stretch and too short.
I've rent the denim; white and black versions of these Nico jeans and have purchased them all. Great fit and quality. I wear them out, to work and dress them up and down.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not amazing for pear shaped gals
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of these jeans. My issue with most jeans however is most jeans fit me loose in waist and tight in hips. this happened with these jeans but i mostly enjoyed wearing them! won't be purchasing since they weren't 100% perfect but got lots of compliments and they fit well enough for a day out in the city.
I love love loved these jeans so much that I bought them. They fit my perfectly. Would recommend for someone with a smaller waist and wider hips. They are high waisted and really flattering.
I'm usually a 29 in jeans and got a 30 and couldn't even get them over my hips. Definitely go two sizes up.

These jeans are amazing. True to size, though when first putting them on they were hard to button and pretty stiff. After about a day of wear, they immediately broke in and are now sooo dang comfortable. Very flattering all around, but really cinch the waist without creating any sort of muffin top/pooch. I'm strictly a high-waisted gal and this isn't always the case. I've worn so many times already and they haven't lost any shape. I ended up purchasing the ones I rented, and then buying a brand new pair from AGOLDE in another wash. LOVE.

I loved these jeans! I almost bought them but I needed the smaller size. I would say they run pretty true to size because I am in between a 28 and a 29 usually and the 29 stretched a little and ended up being too big. They are super soft and comfy.
Fits so perfect-high waist, button fly, length hit right above ankle and so flattering
So comfortable and cute. May have stretched a bit but otherwise love

High waisted jeans are so cute but can be uncomfortable. These are super comfortable, have just a bit of stretch, but not so much that it stretches out. Trying to figure out a way to justify buying them.
Great Jeans! They were a little faded from being worn so many times but overall a great item to have! They didn't stretch too much and could be worn with everything!
Love these jeans, but my complaint is that they stretch out quite a bit. Snug in the am, loose in the afternoon made me send them back.
I love these jeans. The high waist is perfect. Not a huge fan of the button fly - but it's fine. I might buy these.

links_reviews_title: True to size and very cute
links_reviews_text: I wore these several times because they go so well with tons of different looks. I liked the slightly distressed black color and they fit well.
Got this pair of jeans new with the tag but they stretched out after 2 wears and didn't look as great
Amazing quality, great high rise jean. They ran a little big on me so I would just consider going a size down!
They fit perfectly- True to size! Made me feel confident and trendy.

The picture makes the jeans look dark black, however it was more of a faded wash than expected. Overall great jeans, they look great with almost anything. These are not skin tight jeans so you cant really pair these with any type of boots. Mainly look cute with flat shoes

These fit pretty tight especially in the thighs (good in the waist). I'm normally a 4 and went with a 27. Although they're tight I would not size up as the waist will probably be too big. They're very good quality, I would definitely re-rent!
I'm normally between a 27-28 but I always size up in agolde. I got a 28 and they are perfect. They have more stretch than other agolde jeans and are so comfortable! I might have to buy them

Absolutely loved this jacket! Wore it to a weekend brunch and was so sad to send it back! Layered it with a sweater and was perfect for a sunny but cold Chicago day. Material is really thick and good quality.
During tough times this warm jacket helps things feel better. Heavy, tts and able to accommodate a sweater underneath. I added a little woodsmoke for the ultimate in outdoorsy fashion.

Ran a little bulky on me. But I liked it a little oversized. Kept me VERY warm. And got many compliments! Only thing negative I would say was the fleece material seems to collect all sorts of random stuff-hair, lint, etc.
Kept me super warm during a fall night football game. Stylish and oversized.
great fuzzy, warm, and stylish coat! i'm typically a small but got the medium so it'd be even more oversized

First off, size down. I almost always wear a small, but in jackets I will sometimes size up since I hate that tight shoulder/armpit feeling where you can’t reach forward or up easily. Anyways, despite this, I sized down based on user reviews, and I’m so glad I did. I can throw this jacket on anything I’m otherwise wearing (like I did with this photo) and somehow it always works. Also feels truly upscale, unlike a lot of the other fuzzy coats available.
Loved this coat so much! It kept me super warm on our windy snow day this weekend. - I probably could have gotten away with a M but I like the oversized look!

links_reviews_title: Never want to return! Very warm and totally stylish!
links_reviews_text: The review headline says it all. Very tall, and the medium fits extremely well. This jacket is incredibly warm and downright beautiful.
This jacket was amazing! So stylish! It is very warm and cozy. Only thing is that it's a little heavy (actual weight wise) and you feel it while wearing it but worth it in my opinion
I know the reviews say this jacket runs large. It was perfect with a sweater underneath.

links_reviews_title: Great jacket but i personally would have sized down
links_reviews_text: Great jacket but I would have gotten the large instead of the xl.. was just way too big and heavy in the shoulders, made me look really large. The material either fur or Sherpa is a cute color that would go with a lot of colors!
Cute but the jacket runs large and is crazy heavy! Too heavy to feel comfortable. Feels a bit like wearing a polar bear
I'm 15 weeks pregnant and feeling extra busty, so this super bulky jacket was not a good one for me. Made me feel extra large up top.
The coat is in excellent condition. It was very warm and cozy. Worn on a 32 degree day and was very warm.. received many compliments. Stylish.

I loved this jacket for a weekend getaway in a colder climate. I rented an XL (I'm normally a L) but I would have been happier with a L, as the XL was a bit too oversized (especially in the arms). I layered some sweaters underneath so it worked overall, but I would have liked a more fitted look. Super warm and very chic!
Runs large but the oversized look will work for what I'm wearing it for!

Excellent thick coat, very warm and simultaneously not bulky. Luxurious material makes you feel comfortable and confident. The fabric makes it look well both with formal pieces as well as sporty or casual ones. 10/10
Wore this for several days straight and didn't want to give it back. It's huge but it's a look. Shockingly warm (wore it on 40-degree days with no chill).
Very warm, nice jacket. I didn't end up wearing because it was very bulky and meant for colder weather than where I live. Would recommend for a formal event in very cold temperature
This jacket is massive. I ordered a medium and definitely should have sized down. I felt like a polar bear and not the cute kind. Will not be wearing this & will return. Very warm though

links_reviews_title: Flattering and trendy, and insanely comfortable - WFH perfection
links_reviews_text: This runs a bit big - a 0 would have been a perfect fit, but the roominess of the 2 is just what I want for WFH during the coronavirus lockdown in my state. This is the second time I've rented these overalls! I love these. When I wore them out, I got so many compliments - even this time over video chat! These are soft and stretchy and absurdly comfortable (I was able to sit cross-legged on my couch). They look cute and trendy, though. I love the adjustable straps for my long torso. Love this!
The straps are loose but besides that this jumper is great
A lil baggy on shoulders for me

Might have to keep this jumpsuit. Got so many compliments and fits great. I am tall with long legs and long torso so I have a hard time finding jumpsuits that fit. This fits TTS/slightly large. I think I could have gone for a 2 to be more fitted but otherwise it's perfect.
Runs slightly big like all madewell items. This was perfect for the office, got lots of compliments. I also matched perfectly with the couch (the material is that of the Andes couch from west elm).

Cute style and I tried to make it work, but it was really large. By the end of the day I felt like I was swimming in it. The straps are a little fussy too, I wore them crossed (otherwise they'd have been WAY too long) and when I had to adjust them they'd twist in weird ways. Probably just better for someone really tall.

This was a simple piece that felt really comfy but had a classy look that you could dress up or down. I chose to wear it with my boots but you definitely could rock this with sneakers. Also the straps are adjustable in the back I had to wear mine on the tightest setting (there's three different button holes).
I always love Madewell and this piece was no exception. It was true to size and so comfortable. I wore it with a T-shirt and another time with a sweater and heels.
Wore this on Christmas, loved it! Could've been dressed up even more! Very versatile
The fit was flattering. Comfy fabric with the right amount of stretch and weight. Would be perfect for work.
This was so close to being great but the top fit a little awkward to me. Not quite a romper not quite overalls... super comfy while still being stylish though

Got this to wear as a cute but still very comfy piece for working from home, and it did NOT disappoint! It's so cute but really comfy, and the pockets are a game changer! Could dress up or down easily

links_reviews_title: It was alright, but runs a bit large
links_reviews_text: This was alright, probably wouldn't rent again, but enjoyed wearing it. Definitely was a bit big, but overall it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering jumpsuit!! Loved it!!

links_reviews_text: I loved this style and wore it like the model with a plain white turtleneck and black boots. It was extremely comfortable, roomy and easy. I would recommend and rent again!
Wore these to work and to a nice dinner by dressing it up with a ruffly blouse. The waist was a little big, but it really didn't matter too much, still wearable.
Cozy and comfy! Versatile with what you wear underneath. Definitely runs large.
Super cute and fun! Glad I rented to try out! It's fun and trendy and you can def wear to work for business casual. But it's oversized and doesn't do much for this hourglass girl!

I am between a size 10-12, and based on other reviews, I thought this might not even zip. I took a chance, & was pleasantly surprised. The size 10 fit nicely, & didn't even accent my belly, as a previous review stated.

I should have ordered this in a 0, but it wasn't available at the time. I wore these with a black body suit and black booties to a brunch. They fit very loose in the waist, but that was actually kind of nice for brunch and it made the jumpsuit look more casual. I also criss-crossed the straps in the back, which helped raise the neckline a little bit.
loved the fit and style was perfect to throw on with a pair of jeans for everyday wear
Fun colors for winter. I like bright pops of color in NY winter. Nice and warm.
I loved this. Flattering, different, and exceptionally comfy. I got compliments:)
I've gotten lots of compliments. It's a good length on me (long torso) and the colors are fun. The sweater is pretty heavy in a good way. Medium fits true to size for me.
This sweater was so cozy. A bit on the bigger side, sleeves and lengthwise. Got compliments on the cool color combo. Soft.
Unique fun sweater, sort of stiffer material but not uncomfortable. Fits true to size.

This sweater is perfect for casual days. I'm a size 8 and RTR recommended a Large - the large fit perfectly. It's slouchy and more importantly - it doesn't itch my skin (I have super sensitive skin & sweaters are the worse). I would buy it if it weren't so pricey.
Got lots of compliments on this sweater
Not itchy!
very comfortable. Not too warm. Also thought it was going to be way bulkier. Will def order again in the future

This is seriously one of my favorite sweaters! The colors are so vibrant, and I got a TON of compliments all day from my colleagues and patients. I love all of Chinti & Parker - they're made with excellent quality materials and the sweater is super warm & cozy. It is a relaxed fit so if you like your sweaters tighter, size down, but I'd say this is very true to size for what the look is supposed to be. I got to wear this sweater brand new, and I'd 100% buy it if it weren't so expensive!
Really cozy and comfy and the colors make it really fun!

Working from home doesn't stop me from getting dressed up. Wore this Kate Spade to a Virtual surprise birthday party "at work". Colors are happy and make me smile. This is a small and it's about 2 inches too big in the waist & hips for me. I'm a Size 2 and was worried the XS would be too tight but probably not given how this shifted around on me. Scratchy when I first pulled it on but fine one it's on. Friends thought is a cute dress for Easter.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work, but LOVED it
links_reviews_text: I would easily wear it for work or an evening event . The fabric has a little bit of shimmer ( but it doesn't look silly). It fits like a glove , looks nice on the curves but not vulgar at all . I'm seriously considering buying this one!

Currently WFH due to the COVID-19 pandemic concerns. Rented this to try and bring some pizzazz to this whole situation. Unfortunately this dress is clingy to my problem areas (stomach and butt) and the material is itchy. The sleeves also feel short and the dress length will feel short if you have a bigger butt. This dress is cute, but items like this make me wish that Kate Spade extended their size range :(

Rented for work and worn during quarantine instead! The sparkles were unexpected, but I loved them -- the only catch is that the sparkles make the dress kind of itchy. It's still a fabulous dress, fit perfectly, and was fun to wear!
I want to own this! So cute! Not too short for work
I rented this for work but it was kind of a weird look. It is a casual cut but a sparkly fabric. The fabric is stiff and not all that comfortable. I didn't wear it.
I love this top so much! I've worn it to work, on the weekends, etc. I may need to buy it! It's just pricey.
Beautiful shade of green on this blouse. It's very appropriate for work or date night. The puffy sleeves give it a retro feel. True to size
Loved the colors and pattern. A bit short. I wore it twice while I had it.
Pretty bright pattern, nice fit and fabric

Love. Comfortable fabric and fit. Gorgeous print (greener than in the pic I took - the lighting was off). My only complaint is the spacing of the buttons. If you unbutton the 2nd-to-top button, it shows too much. But having it buttoned is a bit too conservative. Wish there was a middle button, or they were just placed at different intervals.
Perfect fit, perfect colors lots of compliments! Would rent again or purchase.
Tight across the shoulders and loose in other places. Would have liked it better if it were more of a tunic; too short for my torso. Didn't like it in person nearly as much as in pictures.
Love the pop of color without being too bright for the office. Pairs well with dark pants. Fabric isn't too heavy.
Love the colors, pattern and texture.
Great top
Really cute top. Fit well - perfect for work.
This is a really beautiful top. The colors are vibrant and stunning. Loved the princess sleeves. Pairs well with black or navy bottoms. A true winner!
So pretty that i might purchase it
I chose an XS vs S for a more fitted fit. The shirt was great for work and I wore it a few times before returning it.
I love this blouse. So cute!
Fits well, comfortable and is a good color.

links_reviews_title: Great top for work or everyday
links_reviews_text: Another cute top from Joie. Fits true ton size and is a looser fit overall. Great color, interesting piping and details.
Beautiful color, not too tight in the arms or chest! Slimming!
This blouse fit nicely, the color is pretty, it just isn't super exciting. A solid office top

links_reviews_title: Love the deep green color with red
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love the color of the shirt. Wore it work. It was very simple to wear. Super comfy and very forgiving.
Love this top. The colors are stunning. Definitely my new favorite!

links_reviews_title: Great pattern and colors in the fabric.
links_reviews_text: Didn't love the polyester fabric. Wasn't breathable.

links_reviews_title: This was a wonderful work top that can go with any dark pants!
links_reviews_text: This top was super comfortable and flattering. The buttons seemed a bit worn and some of the plastic parts were worn off.
This ran a bit small for me but overall a great upscale blouse.
Comfortable and cute. Shoulders have some structure which is flattering

It fits well, though a bit gappy in the chest if not careful. It was very comfortable though and I loved how it hung on my figure. It was flattering. It can't really be tucked in very easily though, as the picture shows unless you wear your pants a bit higher. There's just not enough material for it. Overall, I would rent this again!
Fantastic color, feminine cut, easy fit and pretty choice for a day at work. I will rent again.
Liked this top a lot for the Fall at work.
I'm a busty lady with a smaller frame. This shirt pulls severely at the buttons while also being pretty shapeless everywhere else. Maybe great on a less curvy lady?
Love the colors, fit and flow of this top. Looks and feels very professional. Pairs well with pencil skirts, slacks and jeans. I'm loving the versatility of it.

links_reviews_title: Just might have to buy this!
links_reviews_text: Paired this top with my Diane Von Furstenberg navy blue pants and I felt like a million bucks. I wear a size 12-14 in tops and the Large fit me just right. I might have to buy this because I will regret sending it back!
Worn with black pants. Pros: Love the print and shoulders.
Great shirt. Comfy and rich colors.
Great fabric, shoulder cut, pattern and colors. Felt confident and comfortable.

I was hesitant to write a glowing review for this shirt because I want it to be available to rent again and again. Beautiful fabric, beautiful cut. True to size if not a smidge big. I will certainly rent this again.

links_reviews_title: I haven’t worn these yet but can’t wait with nicer weather !
links_reviews_text: Fitted but longer than most shorts

I was very close to purchasing these but didn't need another pair of leggings, although they would have been one of my favorites. They stayed in shape and held me up, slim, the entire time. They are more for workouts though and less lounging.
I wish I bought these! I wore than as many times as I could. As with all Lululemon, size up.

These Lulu's were excellent, I wore them for a weekend away and I was so happy. One day with bright white kicks and a oversized sweater, one day with a fitted top and booties. Any which way I couldn't believe how they shaped me (curves I didn't know I had LOL) Definitely going to buy them.
These are the kind of workhorse leggings Lululemon does best. They look and feel great.
Great fit, stay up during workouts- I ended up purchasing! Love them.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, stretchy but can't see through
links_reviews_text: Great fit, not shiny, can't see through and comfortable stretch

links_reviews_title: LEGGING WITH BEAUTIFUL FIT AND FEEL; well-constructed

links_reviews_text: comfort oozing cool vibes. softest cotton in a worn-in gray hue with full on americana flare. runs a tad big so size down if you're between sizes.
So comfortable and soft. Perfect as a base for a suede, leather, or denim jacket.

links_reviews_title: Don't usually like t's with writing but....
links_reviews_text: Stylish and vintage looking,

Love this shirt and plan to keep for a while! It's so easy to throw on and be comfy but still look cool and a little edgy. The material is in the heavy side, which I like, and the shirt has a seam down the back which adds to the basic-with-a-twist appeal. Fits a little large but didn't bother me.

links_reviews_title: Love Annie Bing! I ordered this shirt to wear over the weekend to a basketball game!
links_reviews_text: Def runs true to size! I wore it to a basketball game and another event over the weekend. It's the perfect shirt to dress up, or dress down! Worn with black skinny jeans and distressed Levi's. Will be buying!
Fit well great with jeans and boots
Everything you want in a graphic tee- soft, fitted but oversized, and mildly distressed
In love with this dress. It was gorgeous. Wore this for a winery day in Napa. Definitely runs a little big. I am between a Medium and Small and really glad I got the small.

I wore this several times as both a dress and and to add interest to tshirt and jeans. I don't have a picture wearing as a dress but it's super flattering. I'm usually a medium but this was huge. I was able to tie at the waist so the shape wasn't overwhelming.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful material and an interesting concept...but the side tie creates an odd shape on the body.
links_reviews_text: Perhaps if it weren't oversized to begin with (I think it runs big), the drawn side tie could work. Without it, it looked very, very odd. Couldn't get away with it, even though I loved the material and print.

links_reviews_title: Still in love with this dress
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit, great dress, so simple and stylish, I'll be renting again for sure. And I even think this would look good with a baby bump

This dress was huge. I'm a size 4 or 6 these days. The MR I rented is more suited to an 8 or a 10. If you want a fit like the model, I suggest sizing down. I did not wear it because it was so voluminous on top. The print is great, and I will try to nab the SR if it comes up in rotation.
Very comfortable and fashionable.
Wore this twice--once to a party, and the other work/date. The fit was great, a bit snug around my hips when I sat down, but not bad. The material isnt that amazing, but the print is very nice.
I have been opting for sweaters with nice sleeves and l loved this one. It's a small change that helps the sweater stand out.

links_reviews_title: A thicker, more structured sweater for every day.
links_reviews_text: Pros: thick material, color scheme was versatile with accessories, and the sleeves were puffy but comfortable and not bulky. Cons: I didn't expect the sweater to be rubbed which I personally didn't care for in combo with the structured sleeves and horizontal stripes.
This sweater is high quality and cute but I didn't end up wearing due to the fit. Ordered a medium and I felt like the horizontal stripes were not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Cozy sweater with Puff Sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Perfect sweater with autumn colored stripes and fun puff sleeves that don't look droopy or weird fitting. Fits true to size.

I decided to go with this sweater for family photos. Then I wore it later while I hosted a dinner party with another family. I was comfortable all day. This sweater works for all of your casual weekend activities. RTR suggested a size large, and I probably would have been better with the Medium as a size 8. Runs big but cute if you get the fit you prefer.

Seems as if puffy sleeves are in this winter. I think they make me look like a box; however, I did get loads of compliments on this sweater. Love the color of the multiple stripes. Extremely thick and warm sweater.

links_reviews_title: Got compliments and was asked where i got the sweater from
links_reviews_text: Really thick and heavy material, perfect for winter/cold weather. Got kinda warm cause i wore the beginning of fall. But its stylish and comfortable to wear!
Got a lot of compliments when I wore this (several times and in different parts of Finland). It is warm enough when inside an establishment and I like the sleeves.
Comfortable and felt good on. Received several compliments!

I am almost always a S or M, but the XS fit perfectly, even with my relatively broad shoulders. The sweater fit my long torso well, hitting just past the top of medium-rise jeans, while still looking tailored. I liked the puffy sleeves more than I was expecting. I will almost surely rent this one again!
Adorable striped sweater with a fun sleeve, but it was just a little too small for me and it wasn't flattering.
This sweater is cropped so be aware. Comfortable and the puff sleeve is an awesome detail. Great way to add a little style/detail to an everyday sweter
At first I hated it, because the sleeves are silly, but it grew on me towards the middle of the day and now I like it a lot.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, wore this a lot. Fun without being crazy.
links_reviews_text: I wore this a lot more than I thought I would. The material was very comfortable, and it was more flattering than I thought it would be on my smaller frame. Seemed to hold up really well to lots of wear. The only negative was that due to the larger sleeves, it was a little tight when I had a jacket on, not a huge deal though.
Wore to Xmas family photo shoot. Really cute, warm and comfortable. Loved the sleeves.
I wore on a girls trip. Super warm, cute sleeve detail. Was able t tuck into my high waisted jeans. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments. Warm and soft.
links_reviews_text: A little short but not a problem with high waisted jeans.
Comfy got plenty of comments

links_reviews_title: So precious! Wish I could keep it.
links_reviews_text: Cutest fitting sweater. Good weight and pretty colors. Lots of compliments, I wish I could keep it.

I wore this sweater repeatedly while I had it and it was super comfy and versatile! I loved the statement sleeves and multi-color stripe. It was warm but not itchy which is rare to find. The fit was smallish - I usually wear a size sm/xs in sweaters (JCrew, Loft) but I got this in a medium and I'm glad I did. The length of the medium was great and hit at my hips, a small would have probably still fit but had a more cropped feel/look.
Sweater fits well and is thick and warm, but isn't anything too special. Still cute for a one time wear though!
flattering
Love this sweater - great quality

Heavier and thicker than it appears but still a nice feminine shape with the bell arms and more fitted waist. I didn't wear as often as expected as it wasn't quite the I wanna wear this everywhere because it goes with everything kinda sweater.
Perfect fall sweater

links_reviews_title: Fun top, a little hard to style
Cute top for under a blazer.
links_reviews_text: As others have said, comes in short but worked well with a tank underneath. Wouldn't have worn it on its own, but was perfect under a blazer.
Renting this I thought I'd wear it with high waisted leggings but I liked how it looked with jeans and ankle boots! Definitely recommend as a casual top.
This was a great shirt for work and fit really well. It is rather short so if you're in a formal workplace I'd suggest high waisted pants.
Closure around the back of the neck is super hard to open. Length is good- switched between tucking it in and out. Slight run in the front of it but It was hard to see
It's a good top, fits true to size, very work appropriate, and lightweight for summer but it's just OK, nothing special.
This top fit perfectly and paired well with a simple black pencil skirt. I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Nice top, wear with high waisted pants
links_reviews_text: The top is a bit short so you need to wear with higher waisted pants, but I quite like this piece. Felt very classy!

links_reviews_title: Cute blouse to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: This blouse fits to size. It's definitely on the short side, but looks great with high waisted work pants or jeans. It doesn't wrinkle easily and goes easily from day to night. Great rental choice!
I didn't take a pic but this was very flattering, comfortable, felt great, nice material. The buttons on the neck are a pain but not a big deal.

links_reviews_title: Nice work top - yet it is a little puffy.
links_reviews_text: You may want to wear it with high waisted pants so you can tuck it in.
This piece is modest and appropriate for work. Runs a bit larger. Wasn't my favorite but for work meeting it did the trick.

links_reviews_title: I loved this shirt- it is very short so I paired it with a high waist ed skirt and it was cute.
links_reviews_text: Its not a shirt meant to tuck in really idk why the model is wearing it like that
Runs small. Could barely get it over my head. It was very cute and would rent a size larger.

links_reviews_title: it was work. very forgettable day.
links_reviews_text: This shirt runs quite short. I had to keep my blazer buttoned or else my stomach would show.

links_reviews_title: Short and Boxy, like a good MMA Fighter
links_reviews_text: Didn't love this fit--it was short and boxy. Paired the top with a pair of high-waisted culottes and it worked for work, but it wasn't flattering enough for me to want to wear it more than once. The pattern was a bit strange too. Idk, this top could work for some people, but it just didn't work for me.
Classic and versatile. I wore with black, wide-length pants.

This top is really cute. I ordered it to go with some high waist jeans I have but it was too short even to wear with my high waist jeans. It is probably personal preference but if you don't like a short top I would stay away. The quality and style were really cute if the fit works for you.
Wore this to work. Would wear again
Top is to short. Most of my work pants sit at my hips/waist or just above. The top waas too short to bridge the gap. The quality was nice, just not a good fit.

links_reviews_title: Think about this as a crop top...not really appropriate for my workplace without high waist pants.
links_reviews_text: Fit a little small.
This was a really cute top! I wore it 3 times once with jeans and the other times with wide leg back pants. Love it and would recommend!
A little cropped and tight around the chest but still a cute work shirt!

links_reviews_title: A bit of a crop top but cute otherwise
links_reviews_text: I had to wear it with really high skirt because it was so short but it looks cute in the end. A bit small so maybe go up a size.
super cute, went on over the head fine, could not get it over my chest with the tight fitted tapered waistline
Cute versatile top, nice pattern but, the top comes up a bit high. Need high waisted pants or skirt to flow well with the shirt.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work and the after work dinner.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Super flattering. Love this top.
I paired this with Trina Turk camel tailored pants and got so many compliments. It was super flattering and hit the top of the high-waisted pants perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Very short and requires high waisted skirt/pants
links_reviews_text: While the fabric and color are beautiful, the cut is excessively wide and short. This shirt may work well with a high waisted pencil skirt, but did not work for any pair of pants or jeans currently in my closet.

links_reviews_title: After work event. Cool and Classy.
links_reviews_text: Very classy, but short. Wear with high waisted pants or skirt.
I loved the slightly cropped length of this top. Looked really cute with high-waisted black jeans

links_reviews_title: Loved look. Wished it was a little longer.
links_reviews_text: Hits just above belly button on me

This was a fun shirt to wear, but it's cropped more than I expected. I rocked it with white pants the first day. Later in the month, I tried it with a skirt. Not bad, but the shirt didn't stay put the way I would have liked.
The fabric was silky and soft. I personally should of sized down. I ordered the wrong size so it was a bit big on me but I believe runs true to fit! It os definitely a day to night piece
A beautiful top, it does skew a bit short / cropped. It's roomy enough in the chest without being baggy or gapping at the underarms, which is nice for the bustier ladies.

links_reviews_title: Good fit, wore with black pants to work.
Beautiful top but a little short
links_reviews_text: I loved the top. It's great quality and is really cute. My one complaint is that it was a little short on me. I'd have to wear it with high waisted pants for it to be work appropriate.
Short on the torso.

Wore this on the only day I've actually made an effort in the recent weeks and felt so great on our Quarantined Easter. It's so soft and comfortable. No lining, so I recommend nude undergarments. It fit my chest perfectly (I'm a 34C and a true size 6), but the waist, was slightly loose. If you have a smaller chest I would recommend maybe sizing down but I still felt the dress was very flattering and I felt so comfortable.
Cute jeans. They are supposed to be high waist but they are not as high as some high waists I've worn. The button front is kind of a pain. They stretch out and are very comfortable. I like the color.
Pretty much perfect. I'm 5.3 117# and the 26 for perfect. I want to own these

I have such a hard time getting jeans that aren't weirdly long on me. These hit just at the ankle at 5'4" but would also look stellar on a taller gal in cropped fashion. Quite comfortable. Had to steam them upon arrival due to the pant legs being all weird from shipping. Steamed out perfectly and didn't wrinkle while wearing. It has a button fly, so be aware of that. Found it easy to work with, however, so no problem here. Hat is Electra by Physician Endorsed on QVC.

links_reviews_title: Wore these to work a couple times, super comfy.
links_reviews_text: These pants are comfortable and cute, though at 5'-4" they are not cropped as shown and I have to roll them up. Love the button front and classic wash.
Love these jeans! I still have them at home. I have short legs and usually have to have my denim hemmed and these hit perfectly above the ankle. Love the high waist too @leisa_michelle

links_reviews_title: Sits perfect on the waist and hips
links_reviews_text: Love these old school jeans with actual Denim fabric! High waisted, fitted through hip and legs, super comfy, moderate stretch, will stretch loose after a days wear ( like normal denim should do)
I would buy these in a heartbeat!
Nice pants they are just short and big on waist size down
I really liked these jeans. They're a nice weight with a loose, baggie fit. I wore them twice - once straight and once with a messy cuff. Great both ways.

links_reviews_title: These were more distressed than I like, even for at home wear.
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit of Levi jeans much better.
I was skeptical about renting jeans since it can be so hard to find the right fit. These were perfect! I totally trust the RTR suggested sizes!!
I love that it fit without a waist gap. Not absolutely sold on this particular style but it's great for casual everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: I'm a size 12 probably jean and these fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I've never been a fan of the high waist or mom jean, but these really look good on. They don't squish in at that place in the middle. I got a lot of compliments that I looked like I'd lost weight. I have short legs and these were great. Could work on longer legs too as they are a tad cropped.
I liked these because they were cozy -- the high rise makes all the difference

links_reviews_title: The jeans are good for curvy women. I love the comfortable feeling. I didn't have to pull it up ;)
links_reviews_text: Love the fit, perfect fitting. I wear a size 6 in lulu's and got a size 29r in these jeans. I love them so much I am going to purchase them to keep.
Fit great but I should have sized down as I Normally wear a 26. Great jean, so great I ended up buying it (in the right size though)!
Very flattering at first; then stretched and began to sag a bit.
Too large for me

I'm usually in-between a size 27 and 28 in jeans, but decided to go with a 28 in these jeans. I wish I would have gone with a size 27 though because these jeans are very stretchy! Because of this stretch I found myself repeatedly pulling these jeans up. Overall, great color and fit but definitely consider sizing down.

links_reviews_title: Awesome jeans with stretch that I think run big
links_reviews_text: I saw the reviews and planned to travel in these jeans so ordered a size larger than normal (I was not interested in being uncomfortable on the plane). They were huge! They are supposed be high waisted and they are hanging by my hips. I am probably going to order them again one or maybe 2 sizes smaller! They definitely have stretch and are nice and soft in my opinion, what u expect from COH.

links_reviews_title: I love this brand of jeans. They have just the right amount of stretch and structure.
links_reviews_text: I have none! I love the way these fit and I'm probably going to buy them.
Smaller in the waist by a size and hit below my ankles, which were baggy . I'm 5'2 and usually we're a 27. I hope this helps.

links_reviews_title: Stiffer than I thought they'd be.
links_reviews_text: I though these jeans would have some stretch to them, because of their composition, but they felt stiff. I am curvy on bottom and could put them on, they were just uncomfortable.
Love this silk top. Super comfortable. Sleeves a little long so folded it. Great for work and going out.
The drop shoulder seam on this shirt (coupled with the boxy fit) unfortunately made this look pretty unflattering and ill-fitting in person. Nice material, though.
Was long in the arms

links_reviews_title: only go to war once - too big
links_reviews_text: beautiful but really big and therefore not very flattering. high quality and gorgeous - just not on me!

links_reviews_title: High high quality and simple classy staple
links_reviews_text: Comfortable elegance love the tie back. If weren't so expensive I'd buy!
Soooo stylish and looks expensive. Really beautiful on
Heavy silk is lush and perfect for winter. Sharply tailored cuffs and delicate tie collar detail make this blouse really special.

This blouse is exactly what I expected: simple, elegant and super quality. I used it for office+Christmas party. It runs large, though. I'm a middle-of-the-road medium and size 6 hang on my shoulders (more than it should) and I had to push the sleeves up all day. Will rent again but take a size 4 next time.
I was swimming in the torso, sleeves were too long. But a beautiful, graceful piece and the material is lovely. Would definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun but not my favorite
links_reviews_text: The guy is great and adjustable. Loved the black slip underneath and that it was separate. Pattern is fun and funky. Got some nice compliments. But I didn't fall in love and I would never spend this much for a dress like this. It is a perfect rental.
rip it was cute but idk how to tie wrap dresses AND the sleeves were too tight for my arms 😔

I feel like this dress is appropriate for a lot of occasions. I love the cute print and it's got a nice classic silhouette. Goes with tights and boots during colder months. Not see-through since it comes with a slip.

My favorite part of this dress is the fabric, hands down. It is very fun and unique. The dress is two parts: the outer sheath and a black slip dress underneath. The slip dress has adjustable straps. The material is like a silk, and I was worried that it would get wrinkled when I sat it in, but it never did. I would absolutely rent this again!

What an adorable wrap dress! I'm a huge Anna Sui fan and this dress does not disappoint. Bless Anna Sui for making a size 6 that truly fits as it should. This dress made me look like I lost a good 10lbs and I'm so ok with that. With a super fun original print and great fit... what's not to love? FYI: it's 2 pieces- a silk wrap dress + a black slip dress for underneath.

I absolutely love the print of the dress. Because I've been having fit issues on RTR, I sized up but didn't need to. Thankfully it is a wrap dress so I was able to make it work. I love this dress and would happily purchase it if it was cheaper. It is unique and extremely flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic- Anna Sui for the win!
links_reviews_text: This is my 3rd Anna Sui dress this month. Absolutely love the print, the fit, the comfort. Lightweight material- would be cold in the winter. Sexy and punky at the same time. Wore with combat boots and black tights- it looked very 80's. The wrap is plunging, too much for me (32F) for work, but great for a party. Really fun- totally love this rental.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves so small I could not wear it
links_reviews_text: I work out regularly and have muscular but not gigantic arms. The sleeves would not go over my biceps and the rest of the dress was cute but it was deeply cutting into my arms.

links_reviews_title: I loved how comfortable and sexy the dress made me feel without it being to revealing
links_reviews_text: It's slip with a sheer wrap top layer, that is very flattering on all shapes.

links_reviews_title: SO SO SO cute and flattering. My hips looked like a size 6 ( iam a 10)
links_reviews_text: flowy but not too flowy- nice wrap dress without too much fabric that clings to all the right places
Loved the shoulders on this. Just a little puff, but not too much. It is a bit sheer. I wore a black bra under it, and it was perfect. Great rental.

links_reviews_title: Perhaps my favorite rental - it's so great.
links_reviews_text: I would have purchased this if I could. I will definitely rent again. It's amazing. TTS.
So flattering and amazing on. It's chic and has all the right details from the buttons to the sleeves. I would buy this!!!

links_reviews_title: Great Top, But a Little Short for Long Torsos
links_reviews_text: Great top, and perfect for going to see Gwen Stefani in Vegas. The shoulders are a bit "poofy", but it fits the vibe of the style.
Love love love this blouse! Great structured shoulders! On trend animal print. Thin fabric.
Really versatile. I wore this to a work conference but with high waisted jeans this is a great date night shirt too!

Tastefully sheer (could wear with just a nude bra without feeling inappropriate. Great for work, and a night out on the town. Shoulder and neck detail were beautiful and not overwhelming. Only downside is that there are quite a few buttons down the back that are a bit difficult to fasten yourself.

links_reviews_title: Work meetings are always fun! Leopard print makes them more fun.
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt! the 3 buttons on the back of the neck were hard to close but it was worth it for the overall effect. Nice stretchy button holders for wrists and neck and the shirt overall was flowy, true to size. I wanted to keep this one!
Structured shoulders kept its shape all night. Made my broad shoulders look broader, but didn't care since such a fun & unique top. Slightly sheer.

links_reviews_title: Sheer but not too see through. Flattering and sophisticated!
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt- I just need the right place to wear it. Sleeves are definitely poofy, but it's a flattering cut. It's cut a little short for a large so it may run a little small, if you're in between sizes size up if you don't want to show your belly.
Love this blouse! It's just the right amount of sheer and looks great with skinny jeans and heels! I love love loved the puff sleeve and high neck!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this shirt. Got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It was extremely flattering.

I wore this with black jeans and boots. The neck detail and poofy shoulders make it a stand out from standard leopard print tops. I'm often a small and sometimes a medium in tops and am glad I got the medium in this one. It fit perfectly, even thought I have broad shoulders and long arms. I would rend again.
This is sooo pretty! Looks pretty make you feel pretty! Fabric, colors everything! Run a bit large but nothing to worry about it! Just order your normal size!
Great blouse to dress up or down (tucked in or out). I loved the light puff sleeve. It really pretty and delicate.

This is a blouse that will have everyone asking where it's from… Absolutely gorgeous. I wore it with a high waisted gray skirt but is so versatile could be worn with jeans or dress pants really anything - dress up or down. Only downside is at the top of the sleeves where they are puffy have scratchy material.
Shirt runs short.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get a chance to wear, so bummed!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and pattern but I never got a chance to wear as it was a little fancier than what I'd normally wear during the day and I didn't go out at night this month. So cute though!

I have worn this everyday since I rented it. I received compliments left and right. It's so soft and fits well. I definitely had room in the medium for chunky sweaters underneath. Love it more than anything I've rented.
The fit was a little big for my petite frame, but I️ liked the oversized look. It was incredibly warm and versatile both for everyday wear or a night out. Loved it!

I thought this coat was so fun. It's very warm but only has two small hook closures instead of buttons. It's very big and roomy and fit comfortably over a chunky sweater. I thought it was fun and would rent again.

Random women stopped me on the street complimenting my jacket! This would be so fabulous to wear to a party. It was warm and has two front clasps. So soft to touch! I'm only sad I live in a very cold climate, or I would have gotten more wears out of it. Would rent again.
Perfect jacket for NYE- wore with a dress and with leggings for more casual. Very warm and big.
Super fun coat for winter going out! I wore this out to a party and got so many compliments! It is an actual coat though so it got pretty hot indoors.

OMG. I cannot tell you how many compliments I received on this jacket. It is so fun to wear and looks good with almost everything! I got the medium because that's all that was available but I'm happy with it because I like the oversized feel of it. It's a lot warmer than you think you so this is definitely not a spring jacket it's more late fall and winter.
A bit too boxy in shoulder area. Could be slouchier, this almost felt like a blazer on the inside
Everyone including me loved this jacket! It's so soft and the stars are eye catching
Great coat, warm but light enough to wear with just a T-shirt to a bar during the day!
The compliments do not stop when you wear this awesome piece! It's warm - but it does only have hook and eye closures. I wore it on a ski trip and loved it! I want to keep it all winter!

links_reviews_title: A great blanket when the going gets tough

links_reviews_text: Rented for a trip to the UK in January. Was surprised how warm and snuggly it was. Got pockets. Would have preferred a L but only the xl was available. Fastens slightly awkwardly with hook and eye so takes some thought to fasten and unfasten. Does shed fibers so wouldn't wear it with pale clothes. Wore it all week - loved it but does make you look a bit like an insta obsessed wannabe. You just got to own it.

I love this jacket! It's a statement maker without being too loud. I wore it to a work event with the Nicole Miller black lace pants and then again with jeans and OTK boots out for coffee. It's warm and cozy and adds the perfect amount of pop to an outfit. It does run a little large. I wore the XS and was swimming in it around the middle, but I think it looks good oversized.
Super cute and cozy. It also kept me warm in 15 degree weather. I got a medium, but I think a small would have fit better.

links_reviews_title: Tough to match with but funky for a 1x wear
links_reviews_text: Warm, comfortable, easy to layer. Not short jacket not long either.
SO MANY compliments on this coat... be warned, you will be petted 😂 Warm, cozy, super stylish and a great body & arm length. Can be dressed up or warm casual. LOVED!!!

I don't want to send this back!! So cute and warm. I'm usually a S but that wasn't available and the M fit perfectly for an oversized look that I was going for. It did shed quite a bit but since the coat is black and I was wearing black it wasn't too noticeable.

Fun, warm, just long enough. When fur coats hit too short they can make you look like a linebacker. Not this one- just long enough to cover the hips and flatter as much as a faux fur can. I loved this!
This is a fantastic jacket. I received compliments from strangers on the sidewalk. Seems well made and very soft
Wore this for New Year's Eve! Sooo cozy and cute. I rented it larger on purpose, but it's a longer and roomier coat for sure. Would absolutely rent again for another cold weather event

I cannot even begin to tell you how amazing this coat is. I ordered it when I was tipsy on Thanksgiving for my first RTR Update order. I am thanking my past self to no end. They recommended the medium, which at first I was apprehensive about, but I am so glad I did. It is the perfect oversized look. I wear it every freaking day. Good with jeans, good with midi skirts, good with casual and even with a fancy dress! It is the softest faux fur I have ever touched and is warm when it needs to be (30s) and cool when it needs to be (no more than 65 degress I'd say). I think I really am going to buy it. I already am keeping it for my "next month's" order, so now I only have three other things to rent, but I wouldn't have it any other way. Rent and try it for yourself!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, so warm!! It could be 20 degrees outside and this coat kept me warm
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, looked great, SO warm!
This jacket was so warm and I got tons of compliments on it
I love this jacket! Such a fun pattern for a night out. Very comfortable and warm. Received endless compliments!

Very comfortable jacket, I wore a M even though I usually wear a SM because I figured I'd be wearing it over bulkier sweaters but there was still plenty of room. It's warm but not too warm. lots of compliments (but was told I looked like a sorcerer from harry potter). The black fuzz sheds a little so I probably wouldn't wear it with light colored pants-I only noted this on my white iPhone case while it was in the pocket of the coat. Would definitely rent again.

Literally one of the best things I've ever rented on RTR. It's such a cute statement piece for everyday, work or for going to drinks with some friends. Non stop compliments all the time. Got my roommate to get herself one too!

Runs large and I definitely would've sized down if I knew but I don't think I looked ridiculous in my normal size either. Got so many compliments and strangers stopping me asking the details on this jacket. Such a fun statement item for a night out. Fairly warm. It was mid fifties and I wore it with just a tank under and was a little hot at times. Find more RTR reviews and pics on @leahgay
A girl yelled out to me on the street that she loved my coat! So cute but runs big. Pretty cozy
Super cute coat but looked ridiculous on me! The shoulders were huge. I wouldn't recommend for petite girls
I wore this several times during the week I had it to dress up and dress down. It was my outerwear for NYE and was worn out to bars on a few occasions. Every time I wore it I was complimented!

links_reviews_title: I LOVE this coat!!!! I wore it out at a bachelorette in Montreal. It was so cute and warm!
links_reviews_text: This coat is surprising VERY warm. I wore it out at night in Canada in January and I was not cold. It is also sooooo cute and matches with many going out outfits/dresses. I want to buy this coat. Everyone I met loved it and I got A LOT of compliments.

LOVED. This is soooo not my normal style, but I decided to include it in my Update picks for a bachelorette party and then New Year's Eve in NYC. It's just the right amount of over-the-top fun with the faux fur and in-your-face star print, but it also was oddly practical. It was comfortable, warm (I didn't feel a chill until it got under 30 degrees F), and had sizable pockets. Got lots of compliments! If I could redo it, I would get just the L instead of the XL. I wanted to make sure I had the oversized look, but I ended up swimming in a LOT of jacket. I'd recommend true sizing for this one. Definitely a fun, unique piece!
So insanely warm and snuggly! This coat is definitely extra, but I loved it!

This pros are that this coat was very nice. I got two compliments on it when I went out one night. It is also very warm and puffy. My cat thought it was another cat and kneaded it. The cons are that it doesn't really go with a lot of things in my wardrobe as the large stars design requires for this coat to stand out, so the rest of the outfit needs to be a bit subdued to not over-do it. Overall I liked this coat, best suited for colder climates.
This coat is what dreams are made of! Get ready to receive all types of compliments. I so wanna keep it!
Love this jacket! Was a little big on me so if I rent it again, I'll rent a size small.
This jacket was SO FUN. I used it to spice up super casual clothes, and the fit and feel was so cozy in the Boston cold. I wish I had bought it!

I wore this to a concert and got compliments on it the second I got out of the car. It's a little oversized but I don't think i would have wanted to size down to a small. It is so cute and warm. It sheds a little so don't wear it with white.

I have long arms and these sleeves fit very well, so that was great! I love the design of this jacket, but when it's zipped up it looks a little baggy and unflattering around the stomach. That's not noticeable when unzipped though! Definitely go a size down.
Loved the shearling on this leather jacket. It was so comfy and warm.

links_reviews_title: Perfect edgy addition to my wardrobe
links_reviews_text: Fit is great. Love that it's a little longer than the typical leather jacket and the sheep detailing made it look extra cute and perfect for cold weather. May actually debate buying this one!

Not the best pic but this jacket is amazing Unique not your typical leather jacket warm good for 40s Soft Sherpa on outside wish that was the inside but it is shiny inside Fits true to size good length arms on my long arms Great coat for early winter without the bulk

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this gorgeous jacket! I love it!!

links_reviews_text: Love this super cool, super soft, super quality jacket!! Fits great, is comfy & a must rent!!! I want to buy it!!!
The jacket is quite warm - perfect for about 40 degrees. Arrived in great condition.
Sadly I rented this when I couldn't go anywhere but I still LOVED IT.
cute hip soft!
Hard to wear if you are apple shaped. Bulky and boxy but when zipped, emphasizes all the wrong thing. Great style though. Maybe good over a body con dress or tight jeans with tucked in tight shirt.
This fit great! I loved the extra detail and wore this until I felt like I wanted something a little different. Tons of compliments!
Jacket was perfect for mis 40s and low 50s. I'm usually a 4/6 and the Medium fit well.
This jacket was huge on me. I don't think I'm rock 'n' roll enough to pull it off.
I sized up and got a size L, so it would fit a little bigger and so I would have room for a chunkier sweater underneath. I'm glad I did. This jacket is SO cute
Fits great. Sherpa part is super soft, wish I could buy!

This Boden dress totally fit the bill for a professional talk. Traveled well, fit pretty well (a little baggie through top and waist but not a problem). I generally prefer stretchy/looser stuff so this felt a little more constricting than my usual outfit but I felt very put together and polished. Only challenge was getting the hook and eye closure at the top of the keyhole opening on the front to stay closed. Almost needed a pair of pliers to crimp the hook and eye so it didn't flap open!

links_reviews_title: Great for work and flattering fit!
links_reviews_text: Usually size 6 is good for my rent the runway dresses, but they only had a 4 available. Ended up fitting snugly. Great material and compliments like most RtR dresses. Would rent again possibly buy.
This was great for work and was a beautiful tweed material. The only downside was the lining was a bit thin so it was scratchy against the skin. Would be perfect with a slip.
Nice work dress.

links_reviews_title: Solid work dress, a little itchy
links_reviews_text: Tts or maybe slightly big, a little itchy (although fully lined) but generally easy to wear - no need for spanx and regular bras work fine. Not the most flattering but not the worst. Recommend for work.

links_reviews_title: Spice Up Your Fall Work Wardrobe
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size and is not only cute, but also work appropriate! Win win!
This dress is great for work - the only negative is it is a bit itchy... :/

links_reviews_title: The plaid is dark navy, but it paired well with black tights and boots. Its lined so not itchy.
links_reviews_text: The size 14 was a little small in length and shoulders, I'd order up a size next time

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, looked good, received several compliments
links_reviews_text: Not too tight or constricting but not too baggy. Warm despite the short sleeves. Does not fit well under a sweater or jacket, however.
It was super cute but I couldn't zip the back. Would recommend ordering up

links_reviews_title: Great for a work meeting. Felt very polished and received lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, would suggest going up a size if you're in between sizes.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small in thigh area
links_reviews_text: I found that this dress ran very small in the hip/thigh area and I felt it was going to be too uncomfortable to wear to work. If you're larger on bottom, definitely size up. The pattern is cute but I returned without wearing.
Too small. Will try sizing up.
I sized up because I'm between two sizes right now but the fabric has no give. It was super small

This was a very flattering, work appropriate dress. I sized up because of my pear shape and was glad I did so. I was afraid the top would be too large and it wasn't. No stretch to dress. Length was just below my knee. The front top of the dress has a hook and eye closure to make a keyhole look. I preferred it undone as the picture shows.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress and good for work
links_reviews_text: Wish the fabric is a little stretchy, size 8 fits me fine, but the chest area is a bit stiff. I have a wide shoulder so it's not very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color: and just the right length.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments wearing this dress! Very easy to move and walk quickly in. I am 5'6 and it was just the right length. Any shorter and I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing to work.
It was slightly snug through the hips (I have wide hips and a booty), but fit was great otherwise. Would look good with a navy blazer over.
This dress fit like a glove. There were no reviews so I was unsure how it would work, but it was great. The only thing to note is the dress is navy, not black like I thought.
Love this dress very nice work piece

The dress has a lot of nice details like grosgrain ribbon trim on arms and waist, and the peep hole neckline makes it interesting and not stuffy. For me, it was a bit tight across the back but very roomy through the hips. As the day progressed and the (itchy) tweed stretched a bit more, I didn't like the fit as much because it became unflattering. I also believe I'm not the right body type for Boden.

links_reviews_title: Bad quality, too tight around the hips.
links_reviews_text: tight hips, no give, bunches at the stomach unattractively.

I was the first wearer of this excellent dress! It fits true to size, looks very professional and is quite flattering. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is that the zipper sticks (when will dressmakers ever learn?) and it was a bit scratchy to wear all day (wool, high quality). But other than those two things, I recommend this dress for work!

I'm normally XS/S but I ordered XL given that reviews and photos implied this was way too cropped and ran extremely small and I like oversized slouchy fits. The XL sleeves are the correct length for me but the length is so cropped, you could not wear this except for casual weekend duty or with very high waisted pants. MSGM has major fit problems. I could honestly wear an XXL.
super cropped, so pop on over a dress and turn it into a "skirt". pairs perfectly with the fifteen twenty leopard slip dress. colorful, unique pattern upgrades any look.
