links_reviews_title: This crop was just a tint too crop, but I absolutely fell in love with this sweater!

links_reviews_text: Very cropped fit (although I am pretty tall). So many compliments loved the colors. Wore with leggings during the day and a skirt at night.
Loved this sweater so much!! It was so cute and looked so good. It fit so well and the material was awesome. I got so many compliments.

Loved the brightness in this sweater. I liked that it wasn't stretchy making it a great fit and not stretched out in the sleeves or neck. This is definitely a higher cropped sweater! Cropped isn't usually my go to but it paired well with high waisted jeans. I would size up if possible!

links_reviews_title: Cute and a pop of color
links_reviews_text: This is exactly the sort of thing I love RTR for, a $500 cropped sweater would never live in my closet but I enjoyed wearing it for the day, pretty warm material, so a nice balance for the cropped style.

links_reviews_title: Very warm! Super cute. Got a ton of complements!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Super well made and warm Cons: The neckline is more of a turtleneck than it appears in the photo and looked a bit stretched out after pulling over head. Very minor but something worth mentioning!

links_reviews_title: Fun, bright, and bold - Bowie in a sweater!
links_reviews_text: David Bowie in a sweater! Bright colors and a bold pattern. It’s a high crop so I paired it with high-waisted jeans. I loved it and got tons of compliments. This easily fit in my regular M but I think I could have sized up as well. This kept me warm and was so much fun. A stand-out piece that I would rent again for sure.
Loved this sweater and got so many compliments on it!!!! I wish I could've kept it! Definitely worth it!

links_reviews_title: High-quality, comfy sweater but it was too hot for me to actually wear out.
links_reviews_text: Very cropped, even on my 5'3 frame, so if you don't want to show any belly, this might not the the sweater for you. Otherwise, really beautiful and warm!

links_reviews_title: Was a lot more crop-top than expected...
links_reviews_text: The white on the sweater was more pink....like someone had washed it and the colors bled... it was also a crop top sweater... was planning to wear it with ski pants but barely covered by boobs. I didn't end up wearing it.
Definitely pretty cropped. When I raised my arms you could see my bra peek out. But so cute and not see through or thin at all! Such a cute sweater worn with high waisted jeans
Way too boxy. If you like boxy then this is for you.

Wore this to a concert in the winter and got so many compliments! Seriously random girls stopping to tell me they liked my sweater. It is fun colors, thick material & a good crop length. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cute but very cropped and scratchy
links_reviews_text: I thought this top while not too tight was very cropped. The shirt stopped around 4 inches above my belly button. Additionally, the tag on the outside made it look inside out, and multiple people stopped me to tell me my shirt was inside out.
This crop was adorable, but I couldn't wear it because it was so itchy. Not the knitwear I was hoping for.

links_reviews_title: Great quality, nice message on sweater
links_reviews_text: This is a great sweater, the fit is perfect, the color is nice. I liked the yellow heart and the words on the back. The sweater does keep you warm and would be great for layering. I like the fitted look of the sweater. I highly recommend it.
Heavy weight. Well made. Great detail on front and back.
This sweater fits great. I probably would not have rented if I knew it had LUV in big red letters on the back. Additionally, it's super scratchy and itchy, I can't wait to change out of it!!

links_reviews_title: The graphics and turtle neck w/ zipper style. Slimming fit, loved the color and material
links_reviews_text: Great sweater overall! Loved the style and graphics. Fun and warm at the same time. Not too bulky or heavy. Wore in CA and then in VA
Wore on airplane and super comfortable. The neck was kind of strange though. Liked the sweater a lot

links_reviews_title: Very cute but the material is itchy!
links_reviews_text: Fits great
it had severe hanger marks. These sweaters should be folded over a hanger! Esp XS and S sizes. I don't know if your dry cleaning solvents have changed but this was also way too itchy to wear
I have rented this before. It is a fun little sweater with a lot of forgiveness.

links_reviews_title: Cute fun sweater. Mine had very deep hanger ridges.
links_reviews_text: I should have gone with a small. The shoulders were huge.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, lots of compliments. Loved wearing it for Valentine's Day!
links_reviews_text: It was a little big on me, but I loved wearing it.
Sooo comfortable...warm, soft and fun.
Love this sweater. Great for everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: It fits great, is very warm. Got lots of compliments at work.
links_reviews_text: Fits well

links_reviews_title: It did not fit me, it is best for a taller person
links_reviews_text: Too big for my body type
It was a little bigger then I expected. I wish I had sized down.

links_reviews_title: Fun comfortable sweater. Loved the zip front so no worry about getting makeup on it taking it off.
links_reviews_text: Loved it

links_reviews_title: People will want to hug you
links_reviews_text: Very comfy, runs a TINY bit big. Just don't expect a fitted sweater, its loose and lovely. You feel like a ball of joy wearing it.
Such a fun and comfy sweater Great fit
It says LUV on the back, which I didn't realize when I rented it. At first I wasn't sure about that detail- but I wore it twice and got SO many compliments!
This sweater fit excellent. I received tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Love the heart on the front of the sweater and the LUV on the back
links_reviews_text: Navy sweater

links_reviews_title: The heart was dear and received so many smiles!
links_reviews_text: Fit was a loose fit.
Nothing great about it but was comfortable

This is a fun sweater with a lot of character to it. It does run a little large for a small, but it hangs like it should - a smaller size would negative the casual, cool look. I recommend ordering in your usual size.
comfy and casual
Got the xs. Still was a loose enough fit if you wanted to wear a tee or tank underneath .. wore it a couple times while traveling..
Luv this cozy over sized sweater!
Nice

links_reviews_title: I LOVE this sweater! but could have done without the explicit LUV on the back!
links_reviews_text: This is a cozy, comfortable and fun to wear piece - from the front. I rented it once and would have kept it but for the LUV on the back. I work in the arts and this kind of casual piece is work appropriate. However, I found myself trying not to turn around in front of colleagues and clients because I was embarrassed by the LUV.
It was a little itchy. But I have very sensitive skin, so may not bother others. Wore a shirt underneath and it was okay.
Wore with jeans and it was very comfortable. Would rent again.
great sweater for everyday. It makes you feel happy wearing it. Loose fit but perfect with straight jeans or leggings
It was a little bit itchy and the day I wore it, it was too warm to wear a tee under it.
This sweater is perfect. It fits perfectly all over, is a cozy winter weight, and I love the graphic on the back. I'm going to wear this as much as possible before sending it back!

links_reviews_title: Love the reverse pattern on the inside.
links_reviews_text: The top is short. Should be worn with something high waisted. It is tight in the arms but I like the color and pattern.

links_reviews_title: Cute sleeves with reverse color pop!
Fun sweater for more casual day at work
links_reviews_text: Super soft and love the long sleeves! Fold them back for the opposite pattern!

I wore this a couple times with a maroon dress underneath. It fit well and was really cute. I liked the long sleeves because you could fold them over for a splash of color in reverse (maroon with blue markings).

It was a little boxy and not very flattering. It was tight in the arms, but looser through the middle. I have a long torso, and it was a little short for me. The color and pattern were really nice though.
Clearly had been washed incorrectly at some point - the red dye had leaked onto the blue parts of the sweater making it unwearable
cropped but still good with high waisted work pants

I loved the contrast of colors used, but when I put it on the proportions seemed a bit off. The sleeves were way too long compared to the waist. I tried rolling the sleeves up to show the red pattern on the inside, but again, just way too long. I also had a hard time pairing it with pants in an unique way.

links_reviews_title: It was too long in the sleeves did not wear
links_reviews_text: see above

This sweater is fine but pretty boring. I wore it one morning running errands then sent it right back. It would be good if your work place has a more conservative dress code. Mine does not so I try to wear more fun clothes to work.

I loved the pop of maroon with the light blue of this top. It was super comfy. Sleeves are on the longer side but are folded up to add extra flare with reversed pattern. The length hit just at my waist but in a flattering way - not too boxy.
Loved this sweater
Wore this with a dark burgundy Theory suit that looked great, as well as alone with jeans. The sweater is thick, warm, and soft. Loved it!

The fabric wasn't clingy or pilled. The sweater hit near the top button on my jeans. Color combo was different/fun. Long sleeves are comfy, I rolled the bottom for contrast while out. Wore twice before returning. Would rent again for low-key activities.
I received many compliments when wearing this top. It fit great but was a little long in the sleeves. However, They looked fine rolled up a bit.

links_reviews_title: pretty, but not for a long torso
links_reviews_text: this sweater is really cute, but cut pretty short. I am pretty long-waisted so this just looked awkward on me
You can def tell it's high quality. Not shown in pics is that the cuffs flip to opposite color/pattern
I loved this top. Quality construction and nice colors. Only wish is that it were slightly longer so would be more comfortable, but otherwise perfect
The top is low-keyed, but since it's from RTR no one else had anything like it. I wore it with dark wash jeans and a burgundy leather jacket. It looked sharp, but casual.
Very comfortable, lightweight and cute! Perfect for WFH, and cute enough to rent again once we're able to go outside!
Love this..starting to get a little worn down

Wore this to celebrate Remember The Maine day while my partner dressed as Teddy Roosevelt. The sweater had a small stain in the bear's right ear but honestly you could barely see it. It's a great cut, a little fitted but still loose. Really wish it was a bit less $ so I could buy it! Will rent again! Here's to the Maine!
Good quality, feels cozy + stylish.

links_reviews_title: Very good quality, warm and comfy
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, and stylish

This didn't photograph well (it made me look huge in photos) but in person I freaking loved it. I wore it to work and to a community play and it easily worked for both. I seriously considered buying it. Great color, unique and comfortable.

This sweater is amazing! It's warm and soft and the fit is really flattering, you can wear it tucked in or tucked out. I love the uniqueness of it and the color. It goes with a lot of outfits, it's the perfect statement piece!
Super comfy, love the neckline and the length of this sweater. Gives off some good retro/varsity vibes and can be styled many different ways! Does stretch out a little with multiple wears.
Wore this on my honeymoon in Montana, seemed like a good theme and we did see a Bear! Anyway really comfy and an easy cute look. Sort of short but wide but it fit well.
Love this shade of green and the roll neck. Adds a fun statement to casual outfits.

links_reviews_title: So many cute ways to wear this!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is fab! I wore with a layered plaid under it. However, it's adorable with cute sneaks and leggings. Or a skirt, with a white collared button down and heels for a business casual look. Highly recommend this little gem!
Maybe one of my favorite sweaters of all time. So warm and comfortable. Perfect fit. Love it!
Although it is just a basic pullover sweater, I had so many compliments and loved how comfy it was. A little cropped in the front, so it did not feel so boxy.

links_reviews_title: Sudi Green SNL kween also wore this!
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater dearly. Also went to a comedy show with SNL kwén Sudi Green who was wearing it and she looked simply DV (divine). John Mulaney made a surprise appearance. Everyone was maximum comfy AND giggly. A dream. The Great Indeed.
I love this sweater! It's so cool with the graphic and it's so comfy as well. Pretty warm.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for hanging out in town during a ski trip
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater and wore it three times. Next time I'd order a size down.
Got compliments on it in general but it was pretty worn out. Comfy to wear but looked like I've owned it for 10 years.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a cool vintage college sweater!
links_reviews_text: This sweater was really comfy with a casual cool vibe! It's cropped but long enough to not feel too young. Wore with cropped high-waisted jeans and leopard boots.

I was so excited to get this sweater - great for a Friday at work and then a weekend with friends! Its a little cropped (but perfect length on my petite frame). Love that its a little bit of a twist on a classic sweater with the brand + bear on front. Would definitely rent again!!
I love this sweater! So comfy, not itchy, great all around. Wish I could buy!
I wore this to work, but planning on wearing It on the weekend as well. It is so cute and comfortable - a perfect slouchy fit without feeling too oversized. So cute!!!
Wore this sweater SO many times, I had to return it just to keep myself from wearing it again! So comfy and a bit oversized - perfect for chilly fall days. Will definitely be renting again

I usually wear go between a medium and large, and sized down to a medium. It is kind of a cropped sweater, so if you're taller you may want to go for the larger size. I love the color and style - will be wearing this a lot!
Fits great is totally cute, its kind of cropped so better with high waisted bottoms or skirts.
great to wear casually, or more dressed up for work.

links_reviews_title: So cozy! I wanted to live in this
links_reviews_text: So soft and cozy! Tons of compliments. Color is phenom! Would rent again but a size smaller!

I loved this sweater! Soft and definitely would keep you warm. I am long waisted and it was slightly cropped on me and had an oversized look, but I loved it. Cute, comfortable and love the green color. I would rent again!

Fantastic color. Very thick material to keep you warm in the winter. I believe this runs large, I would have liked the sweater more had I sized down. The arms were very large and stretched out after multiple uses. I had to roll the sleeves multiple times.

links_reviews_title: The color was beautiful, but the shape was a little boxy and unflattering
links_reviews_text: The orange color is gorgeous! It was a little boxy though, and not that flattering, so I only wore it once.
Just a lovely, comfy sweater in a pretty color when you want to be warm in winter but also look put together. The color was a little more golden than orange in person but I didn't mind.
I loved this sweater. It was comfortable, stylish and perfect for every day wear.
Wore this for a photo shoot for work. Our color is orange so it was perfect! Very comfy but does run a little bit. It was pretty oversized on me so I'd size down one.

This sweater is soft and comfortable to wear. It is very boxy though and I could have gone down to a medium but I like the oversized look. It's also more of a burnt orange than in the picture but overall a good pick.

Amazing color if you love orange! Perfect weight-not too thick but very cozy. Feels amazing. It is oversized but I think it fits TTS because it's the look like on the model. This one might be a keeper....

links_reviews_title: Looks and feels like a high-end piece
links_reviews_text: Not too cropped, even on a tall person like me. Slightly higher in the front for a chic, flattering drape. Not the least bit scratchy! Looks just like the model photo. Will probably buy. I would wear this a million times.
LOVE this sweater. Very warm and cozy and a beautiful color. The fit is oversized as intended -- I'm generally a M and thought the S/M was perfect.
The color of this sweater for beautiful, the fit was just very boxy. As a woman with curves and long arms, this was not a good fit for me.
Comfy and great for everyday

links_reviews_title: really pretty color, great for maternity
links_reviews_text: comfy, lots of room for maternity. wearing in third trimester, plenty of room and makes me look polished and put together with leggings!
I love that rent the runway has been adding some fun color sweaters, as a new englander sadly about 9 months of the year is sweater season, cute spring color.

links_reviews_title: Love the Sweater, Hate the Sizing
links_reviews_text: I ordered the size S-M. I typically wear a size 6, and I definitely should have gone with the XS-S. This sweater is very oversized, but to the point that it was hanging off my shoulders. The neck never laid right because it was so stretched out. It's a great sweater to wear in the dead of winter, and works for any casual occasion. I never could have worn this to work because with the over-sized look, it just looked too sloppy. So, worth a rental for a casual weekend but consider sizing down two sizes.

links_reviews_title: Nice, comfortable and cozy warm sweater.
links_reviews_text: It fits slightly bigger than true size (M) but overall I loved how it looked with jeans and for casual wear. I also loved the color and I would rent this again.
Loved this sweater. Lived in it for days and received many compliments on the color.

I wore this sweater several times over my month of Update with it. The color is gorgeous, the fabric is cozy and warm (maybe just a little itchy), and the neckline is unique. It is built to be more oversized, but it fit the vibe I wanted. LOVED it!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but so large! Get at least one or two sizes down.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful but this one was pilled and worn somewhat.
does run large so size down but super cute on a snowy evening.

links_reviews_title: Cozy sweater in a fun color
links_reviews_text: Definitely size down a few sizes. Cozy sweater, fun pop of color. Not too itchy, wore a camisole underneath with jeans and slides for a day at the aquarium. Wore tucked in the front and out. Definitely adds size to your frame
Very cute, stretches a bit so I would order a size down

I loved the light teal tone of this sweater, and the fact that the yarn appeared 100% wool-like and yet didn't pill and was very gentle on my skin. I felt like a little bit of a linebacker, though, and could have sized down. I'm a 12-14 and would have done better in the M. Oh yes -- the collar stands up a bit and frames the face very nicely. If price goes down I might purchase the smaller version.
Perfect size - loose around the body, but not too loose and bulky around the sleeves. Easy to wear. Neck sit just like in the photo. Wore this many times.
I wore this multiple times - work, travel, vacation...I wanted to buy but will settle on renting again.

Super loose, definitely could have sized down. Very soft. The neck didn't quite lay right for me, but it was good for a one time wear just to work (casual dress). I got two compliments, so I will count it as a WIN! The color did appear more green in person, versus teal on my computer.
Great color on this slightly oversized sweater! I liked the neckline too. Will probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color, perfect fit, brilliant and cozy!
links_reviews_text: A bit intentionally over sized but flattering, great color, really warm and cozy. I wore a ton!
Extremely soft and perfect with jeans and booties.
I really liked the fit of the sweater and considered buying it. Thick and quality fabric and wasn't itchy. I did need to wear a cami underneath as the knit was a little wide.

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much i bought it!
links_reviews_text: You always need a practical And comfortable white sweater. I new i wanted to buy this right when i put it on! I have worn it weekly and with skirts and joggers and jeans. I love this sweater! And reasonable price!
Fit was perfect

I agree with other reviews that this sweater is warm, which in the northeast winter is a great thing! Fit perfectly and paired well with jeans or a skirt and boots. Wore it multiple times during my rental period.
Layered over thin base layer and works great with leggings. Nice soft material.

links_reviews_title: Staple piece when the weather is unpredictable
links_reviews_text: Wore this sweater several times with jeans and work pants. Light weight but with good structure. Received multiple compliments each time I wore it.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater for everyday! Easy to style. Goes with everything.
links_reviews_text: I love the quality. Feels soft, not itchy at all and a good thickness, not too heavy or too thin. I love the oversized cuffs. I normally wear a size L but ordered XL when L wasn’t available. The size is fine...a very relaxed look. I wore it with jeans and booties for a great Fall weekend look, but also plan to wear this sweater with dress pants and skirts.
Comfiest sweater and looks amazing. Wore it over a slip skirt and received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It's really cute & can dressed up or down based on the occasion! Also pretty warm in 50-ish weather
links_reviews_text: Fit was TTS and was long enough to be partially tucked in to jeans. The sleeves are really cute with how they taper at the wrist. It's really soft and like I said, warm when layered with a jacket in the high-40s, low 50's weather I wore it in over the weekend.

This arrived new with tags. It's not particularly soft. Pretty thin (can see a black bra through it just slightly). It's alright. Nothing special and not at all luxe, but fine for a weekend day running errands.
I can't believe how much I love this top. I think I wore it backwards, but it was so flattering, and I loved the buttons down the back and the longer length. I would buy it if it were a solid color.
This is such a unique jean jacket and very comfortable! The denim isn't stiff, perfect for spring

links_reviews_title: Fit around hips was weird...did not sit right and felt more like a paper bag
links_reviews_text: Sent back without wearing. The very top tier around the hips just fit oddly, kinda baggy. It just made the entire skirt look terrible and bulky.
I found this top easy to match, and it definitely made work outfits more interesting. It's made of a light, stretchy fabric. You could layer under it or wear it as is.
Lots of compliments
So comfy, so cute! Runs true to size and is something unique and fun!
Great top great fit
Wore this with a high waist jean to counter the crop. I loved the colors , the flattering fit and it's so on trend, but nothing about it felt like a 400 dollar sweater to me.
Gorgeous colors but really runs small in the armpits/shoulders/arms. Would size up if I rent again.
Sleeves were more of a 3/4 length! Was comfortable though! Wore it to work
The three-quarter sleeves keep this sweater sporty rather than hippie. The colors are lovely. It is quite thin and clingy, so beware.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, sleek and stylish dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The goldfish pattern made it a great rental- too memorable to buy. The cut was great for me and made me look slim. I wore with high waist spanks undies to fight the belly bulge in the side view. It is very slimming from the front as it accentuates the dimmest part of my waist. The top was nice- not too blousy but stylish and as little unique. I wore this twice- to church and brunch and to work, dinner and the theater. Will rent again!
This dress hugs your body in the right places. Super cute. Did not know it had as much gold but still enjoyed it.

I rented this for a cocktail attire work party. It is form-fitting (but not too tight) and made me feel sophisticated and elegant. The shimmering black and gold colors are flattering, but not too "loud." It kept me warm and comfortable on a cool evening.
This is warm, stretchy, and sassy! Loved this dress, will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could give this 6 stars!
links_reviews_text: I felt like Audrey Hepburn meets Meghan Markel in this dress: absolutely smashing. A flattering fit, a lovely, classy material. This is perfect for a dressy work event where you want to stand out.
One of my favorite rentals thus far. Incredibly comfortable and many compliments at work. A bit on the long side, but fine with boots.

This dress is perfect for work and then head out for a night on the town. I wore this while hosting on TV and the colors were beautiful on camera. The gold is more of a gol foil and its beautiful. Hugs in just the right places!
While the fit and design of the dress could come off matronly, the fabric and print modernize it. I loved also how it cinched at the waist and really shows of your figure in a flattering way!
Great quality and good fit The size 6 was a little loose, plenty of room in the chest and waist.
Wasn't heavy but was surprisingly warm. Good fit and forgiving. Little long if your short but looked fine with heels.
The material was amazingly comfortable and stretchy. True to size, I was in meetings for 12+ hours and it was fantastic the whole day.

This is a stunning, unique dress. I wore it for an evening cocktail event that was business/cocktail attire, and it was perfect. Easy to wear and a head turner. Definitely glad I sized up, as recommended by RTR. It was the perfect fit. Also, the fabric has a nice weight and metallic shine.
Was too boxy on top - wasn't my style. Sent back.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous! Classy fit with a stand-out fabric.
links_reviews_text: The long sleeves, long skirt, and high neck make this a great dress for work. I worried the gold would be too much, but just loved how it brightened my blond hair on a dreary overcast day.

I wore this at my swearing in ceremony as i became an american citizen. I thought it was beige and black but its actually gold and black. Cute silhouette and has a bit of stretch. It was a hot day but would be good for cooler weather.
The fabric had a rich patina. Almost too dressy for work. I wore it with a black jacket and got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Shinier than pictured, but so glam and comfortable
links_reviews_text: The gold is pretty shiny, so it was a bit more glam than I intended for work. But it's gorgeous, and soo comfortable (very stretchy, internal lining is super soft). I'm between a 6 and 8 and went with the 8. Glad I did. So if you're between sizes, size up.

This dress was nicely fitted. It was a professional length. It zipped in the back. It had a bit more of a sparkle to it then I thought by the photos. I wore it with some black slip ons. I threw a black blazer over it to go to court. It was a nice dress, but nothing spectacular. It was a little stretchy and the cowlish neck was a nice detail.
This dress is wonderful. Great for work, but on the edge of being formal. It felt great on. I love the detail on the neck. I'd rent this again definitely.
This dress is beautiful. Shape wear is needed for the tummy area if that's a problem for you. The length is great!
stunning for work event.
This is the most flattering, appropriate dress for even more formal work settings.

links_reviews_title: Wish this dress were still available on unlimited.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress! #everydayglamour

links_reviews_title: This is a classy dress. Great for an hourglass. Very stylish.
links_reviews_text: Note that the gold threads may make it look just a little too extra for work if you don't work in an environment that needs or likes a little flash. It would be perfect for a work event. I wore it to a party, and it fit right in there, as well.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a awards banquet.
links_reviews_text: Great fit for a curvy gal. Had many compliments at the banquet.

links_reviews_title: Really nice dress; not good for my super fair skin tone
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress, fits well, flattering for the hourglass (and I would also think for other shapes) yet not toooo sexy. A bit flashy in its fabric for quiet me, but not over the top. The problem I had was that my extremely fair skin tones looked washed out and pasty. Darker skin would be beautiful in this dress.

It's definitely better in person though than the photos give credit. Material is structured, but also has the perfect amount of give to be comfortable. Lines were perfectly modest for work, but easily could transition to evening event as the gold has metallic sheen to it. I definitely could have sized down and still been good, but the larger size was fine for work. If you're in between sizes, I'd reco sizing up for daytime/work but down for parties/evening events.
a little sparkly for day, but I went with it anyway and got a ton of compliments. Very comfortable and flattering. Fabric is stretchy!
Beautiful dress! Colors are luxurious, fabric is high quality, and fit is beautiful. Didn't get a chance to wear because it was a bit too tight on me, but would definitely rent again one size up.

links_reviews_title: Bit too glam for work but comfortable
links_reviews_text: The gold was a bit too glam for my work environment but the dress was pretty comfortable with its stretch. The semi-stand up collar neckline fit a bit odd and felt a bit choking during day...I was constantly pulling on it to try to adjust.
I thought this could be a work dress, but the it is black with gold on it, way too dressy
Fit was perfect & the dress is good quality. Perfect for wearing to the office, would definitely recommend

links_reviews_title: Not for work, but great for party
links_reviews_text: Rented this for work but it was a touch too dressy. Ended up wearing it for New Years and it was the perfect dress!
Got lots of compliments on this black and muted gold pattern dress. And it was so so comfortable!
I wore this to a Christmas Eve party. The material was festive, and the dress fit like a glove - runs true to size and has some stretch.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern, loose top, true to size bottom.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful pattern, loose top, true to size bottom.
My husband wasn't a fan of this dress, but I loved it. Very flattering.
Wore this to a holiday dinner and it worked well. Not my favorite rental. It runs slightly large, and the fabric is a little underwhelming.

This dress is a nice dress for work but if you have an hourglass body, the dress gaps at the waist and the material folds over. I would recommend this dress for those that do not have an hourglass figure.
Was snug but not sure if it runs small or ive gone up a size lol. Tons of compliments. Beautiful fabric, fit and pattern let's you play with many colors in chose burgundy to pop!
Material and colors were perfect. The bottom of the dress was a bit snug for this hourglass, no back slit. Very flattering, would order 1size up for my body shape.

Very form fitting, almost like a pencil dress. The 8 fit me well, 5'6, 135 lbs. felt a little tight at times but I liked the length for sitting and walking upstairs. Great pick for a cold weather event.
Pretty damn tight, with spanx panty hose and black heels this dress was a killer - waist wasn't defined (for all that small size) so I added a thin waist belt and got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: The sleeves are so big and the dress is so small
links_reviews_text: I just can't understand why the sleeves are so long! You would have to roll them up. Weird. Lovely cold weather fabric and winter print, but the dress runs ultra small.
Was very tight and there was no slit which was annoying but overall decent dress

links_reviews_title: Structured perfect fall dress for work
links_reviews_text: This fit great and looked good. The only problem is that there's no slit in the back of the skirt, which makes it a little difficult to walk as it shortens your stride.

links_reviews_title: It is fantastic fabric and design. Unable to wear due to work closure for COVID19
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small for size

links_reviews_title: The dress is not made for hips
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this dress, but it is made for very narrow hips. I ordered up and it fit perfectly on top but was extremely snug on the bottom. Got through one day and sent it back!

I really liked this dress, and I received compliments. It was a little tight on my hips (hourglass figure 38-29-41), but I don't think I could size up considering the waist. It was comfortable, but I had to pull it down several times during the day. If it weren't for that detail, I would have probably purchased the dress.

I have worn other Black Halo items and am a size 4 in those. I tried this dress but it was uncomfortably tight. I did not end up wearing it. I should have gone up one size and would consider renting again but the size is not currently available.

links_reviews_title: did not wear, I like the dress but it was too snug
links_reviews_text: too small

Loved this structured dress and received many compliments. The long sleeves were a nice change and surprisingly they were not short or snug on my 5'9" frame. I wear a 4 in pretty much every dress on RTR except Black Halo. I always size up to a 6 in this brand and it fits perfect.
I really wanted to wear this but it was too small. I'm going to get it again in a size 6 because I think it's well made and quite form fitting. Conservative but also fun for a night out.
Runs small and there is no slits, so walking and getting in and out of car was difficult..

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a business meeting with heels and tights.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! It was just a little snug but not where I felt like I couldn’t move or uncomfortable. If you’re between sizes, definitely go up. I highly recommend!!
After sizing up, this dress fits beautifully. The fabric is high quality with a great pattern. It was flattering in all the right ways.
Very form-fitting and flattering. Pretty tight but still work appropriate. Love that it has long sleeves and is thick enough material for cold weather when paired with warm tights and boots.

links_reviews_title: Rented for Baby Shower but runs too small. Order size up.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, well made but could not get on.

This is a very elegant work-appropriate dress, but I didn't end up wearing it because it runs small and I felt like I'd have to take it off every time I used the bathroom. The fabric was thick but more comfortable than I'd expected.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit, but was snug on my hips. It felt great. Loved the material and structure!
links_reviews_text: If you go between sizes, then get the larger size.

I opted for a size 4 in this dress based on reviews, but it is definitely tight, wearable, but tight. I almost always wear a 4 in most brands with the exception of Reformation and HVN where I wear a 6. If you like stuff tight, stick with your size, if not, you may want to size up.

links_reviews_title: Either runs small or I'm fat from thanksgiving and in denial
links_reviews_text: Really high quality, multiple levels to the fabric print. Will hug your body so maybe size up for the office

Loved everything about this dress. Fit true to size and I felt sucked in and comfortable even though the dress was tight. Shoulders have a little great detail. Looked good with tights and booties for the office and event after.
Great cut. Thick fabric. A little too tight in expected size.
Nice dress perfect for an after work event but really tight

Dress is beautiful, material is thick and nice, dress is flattering. As with all Black Halo, the sizing is a bit weird. I am a 4/6 pear shape and rented the 6. The top fit perfectly, but the bottom was TIGHT. Like, almost too form-fitting for work tight. I made it work for a work event. I think sizing up to the 8 would have been too big up top, but definitely size up.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated and sleek choice for the office
links_reviews_text: It runs really small and there is no stretch whatsoever, so recommend sizing up. Great texture and nice length for petites, although the sleeves run long.
Unfortunately it was too small, but beautiful dress with a great material.
I was excited to wear this, but I found the fabric very itchy
Sweater arms were a little tight, but loosened up after wearing. I would rent again.

Very warm, perfect for the 20 degree weather we just had. It is 100% wool, I did not find itchy but I wore a t shirt underneath. Not sure what size a med correlates to (4/6, 8/10, etc) but it fit me perfectly, I generally wear a 4 or 6.
I only wore half a day because it was too itchy around my neck. Quite a warm sweater. Like the colors though...
Cute, but the sweater I received seemed overworn so I wore something else.
Very itchy & did not keep me warm even just sitting inside at an office desk

links_reviews_title: Pretty warm wool sweater. Perfect for Valentine's day.
links_reviews_text: The washed color gives it a nice vibrancy.
fit very small without any give in the material. Did not wear though I would maybe try again with a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: I'm 6 months pregnant and a XL was big enough for me.
links_reviews_text: Looked great for my casual office. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Ombré made the knit look like it was faded by the sun
links_reviews_text: Wasn't very flattering especially if you're busty. The knit was thick comfy and warm. But the ombré just made the sweater look old and faded. Traded it in for a cuter winter knit and never wore it.
Perfect
Wore this out on date night. Very comfortable true to size.
Cute color and looked great with jeans. It was very warm so I would only wear when its cold!
Classic while forward, comfy and stays true to size throughout wear. Super solid material, cozy, cute and warm.
Soft cozy sweater for work or weekend. I got a large because I wasn't familiar with the fit for this brand. Could have gone with a medium.
The are cute, runs a little big. But perfect boyfriend blazer
This does run small but the perfect piece for casual fridays

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Unique but still every day blazer feeling.
links_reviews_text: Fit is perfect. Might buy this one.
The fit is perfect, will make you feel so ready for work! Great fit and very sophisticated.
Very professional and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Needed the 12, although I'm usually a 10
links_reviews_text: too small for me.

links_reviews_title: Pull together any denim+blouse combo with this blazer!
links_reviews_text: It was exceptionally easy to pull together my denim + blouse combo with this blazer and be work-ready in a snap! I always look for a unique detail or silhouette when renting pieces, and adored the extra "oomf!" this shoulder gave my work outfit. I paired this blazer with dark skinny jeans, a long sleeve lace top, and black suede pumps. I work at Rent the Runway and constantly see new pieces - this one I would rent again as it's a staple with a touch of an upgrade. Fit Note: I have broader shoulders and slender arms and did find that while this blazer ran true to size through the chest and shoulders (I'm typically a SM/6R) I did feel the sleeve length was a bit short. The sleeve hem sat just above my wrist and I would have loved another 0.5-1.0" to the length for it to not feel as though it was riding up.
Looks very professional on, great fit, and trendy with the shoulders
This blazer is quality, very well tailored and great non-wrinkle material
Love this for of this blazer, but I did notice that the material attracted fuzz and lint quite easily.

links_reviews_title: This is cute looking, with the puffed up shoulders but runs very tight and the sleeves are short.
links_reviews_text: This is cute looking but not wearable. It runs way too tight in the shoulder width, and also the sleeves were too short. It seemed like it was a "petite" in sizing. I was not able to wear it unfortunately.
These jeans are very comfortable but they are very long! Definitely need to wear tall boots or tall booties with them because they bunch up at the bottom

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - runs long, I'm 5'8" & had to cuff
links_reviews_text: A quality pair of jeans, good stretch. Just long. Average. More stuff i didddd Love on @thanksitsrtr

links_reviews_title: I love these pants might have to buy them
links_reviews_text: tight but hugged in all the right places
I wear 29 in all of my jeans and while these fit and I wore them a few times, I feel like they were on the tighter side. Good jeans overall, would upsize an inch next time though.

links_reviews_title: They are stretch and since my weight fluctuates I love that about them!
links_reviews_text: Fabulous fit and I want to buy it in more colors!

links_reviews_title: Too long for a short person
links_reviews_text: I had to roll these 2x for my 5'1" height.

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear with anything!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and as comfortable as wearing leggings.

links_reviews_title: Easy go to jeans for everyday
links_reviews_text: Fit like glove but not to tight on the high waist. Would have purchased to keep but there was a small hole on the left leg

I LOOOVED these jeans. I'm using my unlimited to help fill in gaps of my wardrobe, while I am getting back to my pre-baby weight. My jeans are Mostly size 27-26 and very tight, So it was amazing to wear a size that truly fit me where I am at now. The ultra high waist, was so flattering, especially when I paired it with a belt. I wore these everyday during my rental period. I will definitely rent again!
The perfect light wash jean for everyday!
Dressing them up or down is so easy. Love the color of the denim so much!

links_reviews_title: No pic needed, EXACTLY how they are picture. Some important things to note for sizing...
links_reviews_text: Loved this light to medium wash jean. These are high waisted, ending right above my belly button. Don't bag out at all, no matter how many times worn. Has SOME stretch. If you're typically the same size no matter the brand/stretch of a jean, then order your true size. If you are even slightly between sizes, I would size up. Usually a 12 so I ordered 31r & they were uncomfortably snug. Tried 32r (technically size 14) & they fit PERFECT! Length was also perfect, not too long or too short.
Overall loved the style but runs small consider sizing up.

I got it and it still had the tag on! (was new!) So I was the first to wear it (and the last loll)! It's a staple in my wardrobe. Very comfortable. But I wouldn't wear it into the winter. It's a great Fall/Spring weather jean for a midatlantic coastal state person (me). I wear it for work or play honestly. They're Levi's so it speaks to the quality and the versatility. My skin can be sensitive to some fabric but this wasn't irritable at all. It's a great everyday addition.

links_reviews_title: These felt current and retro all at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. I am not used to high waisted jeans, and always feel they make your belly look big -- and I have a flat tummy. But these were awesome. Brand new when they arrived so that was a plus.

links_reviews_title: They looked great but I didn’t feel comfortable wearing them.
links_reviews_text: Wanted to try a different style of jeans but these were just too “skinny” for me.
This sweater is everything I want in a sweater - cozy, soft, warm, stylish and fun. Love the thumb holes, the drop of the shoulders and the stitching detail. Love, I said!
This sweater is awesome. I sized up to a large for a more cozy look/fit. Perfect with leggings!
Didn't give 5 stars because a bit scratchy and the neck is a tad strange. Large fit, but supposed to be and looks great with leggings.

Love this sweater. Got 2 compliments just running errands around town this morning. Runs really big, I am wearing a size L here and should have done a M. Thoughtful baseball stitching along rear of shoulders. Comfy, warm, and perfect for everyday. Funky hem but very boxy.
The fit is a bit boxy, but I like how comfortable it is.
Cute sweater. Slightly oversized. Loved the thumb holes in the sleeves!

This sweater was so cozy. I got so many compliments on it. Yes, it is oversized a bit, but the seams and design overall creates a very flattering look. I thought it might be a little itchy but it wasn't at all. I stuck with my regular size for the oversized look, but definitely could've gone a size down.
Fun, but very oversized sweater. Looks best with fitted pants.
Perfect for nyc in fall, very warm, loved the cozy neck and long sleeves with thumb holes. Lots of compliments! TTS
I love this sweater! The detail is amazing..I would definitely rent again. I am very small framed so boxey sweaters can often drown me but this is well cut!
This sweater is wonderful! Adorable yarn embroidery, great "over sized" sweater look. The material was a little itchy/rough but over all a great pick for an everyday style.
Fits larger than normal - go a size up. Initially the sweater is slightly itchy to wear before subsiding the rest of the day. Extremely cute and matches well with any outfit!
It was in better condition than some of the other stuff I ordered. It's basic.
Loved it all!
Runs a bit big but it's perfect this way and cozy
Wore for work/weekend/thanksgiving etc
Looked good with jean shorts and with a sassy skirt. Also over a slip dress
wore with skinny jeans - maybe Large was too Large - I normally wear a M or an S on top but thought I'd go in all the way for the baggy look.
super fun (but not comfortable !!) great for a statement

Classic black skinny jeans that really hug the body. As soon as you put them on you can tell they are good quality. I sized down 1 and was nervous when I took them out the bag but they are stretchy so fit just fine. I can tell I'll be renting for a while!!!

links_reviews_title: What can I say? Paige denim is the BEST!
links_reviews_text: High rise, super flattering, no slipping, no weird hem, just a perfectly executed pair of black denim!
Seemed snug at first but nice stretch to the fabric made for comfortable flattering fit - great for casual day at the office & will keep for the weekend.
I wanted to love these! RTR even shipped me a never been worn pair! But they are too big. Too big in the waist, too long, and not slim cut enough for me.

Love the high waist and good stretch to these jeans without getting stretched out after a long day. I also love the wash-- more of a distressed dark grey than a black. Gave them a little edge. The only thing I didn't like about the fit was the cuffs (wide at the bottom)-- I just wish they were a true skinny jean instead of a straight cigarette. I ended up wearing them cuffed at the bottom to mediate the issue.
A bit too snug for me. The 28 was better
The jeans were too long for me to wear, but they fit well everywhere else

links_reviews_title: Wore jeans on the weekend and for dinner out.
links_reviews_text: High waist jeans that were slightly snug in the waist but loose elsewhere. Lower leg was too loose and slightly too long for me. Nothing special but fine for everyday wear.
Man, I should have bought these, I loved these so much. They look like toddler pants when I held them up but magically they fit. They suck everything in and make you look great. They are magic.

For me, fit was good - not too low- enough stretch, heavy material. Winter dressing for work and play here mostlly black pants plus top and jacket. I can get away with black jeans at the office, but IMO these jean a tad too casual for my office environment - not quite jet black still, but i do love them for casual weekend.

links_reviews_title: Paige jeans are the best jeans
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with these jeans! High waisted and super comfortable love the material but that's expected with Paige.
Really liked this pant, but was a couple sizes too big. Unlike a lot of straight leg denim, these have a lot of stretch, which means I would've been better off with two sizes smaller
Awesome jeans

links_reviews_title: Cute jeans, comfy, a little short for tall girls
links_reviews_text: These for me very well, loved the high waist. I did end up cuffing them with flats because they were a little short on me (5'9"), I also wore once with boots. Wish they weren't so expensive!

links_reviews_title: Love the way Paige Denim fits!
links_reviews_text: Great pair of basic black jeans. High waisted.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and fits well! Goes great with lots of outfits too.
links_reviews_text: I like the wash and the fit in the waist and through the legs. My only problem is that I'm on the tall side (5'8") so these are a bit short for me, they hit right above my ankle.
I ended up not wearing these jeans since they were larger than I thought they would be. I liked the length, but just needed a smaller size. They are good quality, a faded black, and were soft.

links_reviews_title: Losing weight - wanted to try some jean sizes.
links_reviews_text: These jeans were great. Not as short as they appear in the photo, but still good.

links_reviews_title: High hopes for a black jean but too tight
links_reviews_text: Would not have been comfortable in these all day. Got a slight muffin top from waistband, ugh. Still on a quest for a black jeans that can go to work with me.

links_reviews_title: Fits like typical Paige - great color
links_reviews_text: I gave this 4 stars because these jeans had the same issue as I have with all paige jeans, the fit like skinny jeans everywhere except they are loose at the ankles like a boyfriend jean. I ended up rolling them under to make them more of an ankle length. Otherwise fit was great, thick but stretch denim, high waist and great color.
Love these jeans! They fit perfectly! I didn't have to squeeze into them or do any sort of shimmy/wiggle to get them on over my hips. And they didn't run baggy on me.
I sized up in these jeans(glad I did) fit great, nothing really stand out about these, great for everyday.
Love these jeans they fit amazing and looked good all day.
Loved this fit. Wasn't so tight at the ankles looked great with booties and mules. Would definitely wear again
I also like that they are high waisted.

I rated a 5 because they are nice. However I had to send back because they were too small in the waist. Either I've gained weight which is possible or they shrunk from dry cleaning. Needless to say I'll reorder these in a 28 and they should fit perfectly!
Nice fit!
I love these pants. Nothing else to say.

links_reviews_title: I wish RTR carried Long Sizes!
links_reviews_text: These jeans are a perfect fit.....as long as you are 5'8" or below. They would've worked it I would have waited until winter to rent them, and I could put them with boots. But they hit me just a little too high above the ankle to look right. Great fit everywhere else, though. Very cute jeans!
These jeans fit great and are very comfortable. I love them.

links_reviews_title: The selection & customer service is impeccable!
links_reviews_text: The jeans are great,but the fabric a bit heavy even for fall .
they fit great in the waist, expected them to be slimmer at the ankle. Didn't love how the fit looked on my build, but a nice quality jean!
The lay, fit, fabric, everything made this dress not only comfortable but also I felt so confident
This would be appropriate for work to a wedding. It's flattering, beautiful and comfortable! Very classic! It fits true to size and you can wear a normal bra!
I tried going up two sizes, which was a mistake. This dress was too loose. But it was smart and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I was afraid the dress might not fit, but it was perfect
links_reviews_text: I'm a bigger lady, and the dress was perfectly fit to my body. Make sure you measure your waist, the band around the middle fits true and didn't seem to stretch. Otherwise it was beautiful and I got lots of complements from friends. Simple but elegant and made a great night even better.
hug nicely, flowy, classy
This dress was perfect! So easy to wear and timeless! Loved the A-line cut!

links_reviews_title: Flattering neckline for wide shoulders to dance the night away
links_reviews_text: This is lightweight - but it does not show undergarments through. The dress is well made and has a complimentary draping for dancing.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected, requires Spanx type garment for the best look.

Wore this for a cabaret performance. Very comfortable material and overall extremely flattering. The color was great under the stage lights. I was slightly worried that the neckline would come across too matronly but it is the perfect combo of delicate and sophisticated.

Features flattering lines wrapped in a beautiful color. Even on a bloated day, I looked beautiful. It's so comfortable you'll forget how pretty you look. Only to be reminded by the many compliments you'll receive. Enjoy!!

links_reviews_title: A definite must- picture does no justice
links_reviews_text: Felt so good in this shirt! Wore it to work and a party. Received lots of compliments. Will rent again- almost tempted to buy!
I got so many wears out of this top. It runs a bit big, and I would definitely order a medium if I order again. Beautiful material. I paired it with slacks for work and jeans for play.

It's very loose and flowy! I found the pieces that hung (intended for a low bow) to be awkward and I was constantly messing with them. I absolutely needed a thin tank under this because (a) it's super thin material and (b) the top get pulling down in front. Overall, I liked it as an elevated basic.

links_reviews_title: Love the sleeves, but has a boxy fit
links_reviews_text: All that's great and not so great about this top is in the details. I had a hard time finding the right way to wear this top. It was a bit short, so wearing over pants didn't have great proportions. It's also boxy, so when I tried tucking in, it looked extra wide. The sleeves were divine and the neckline was great, the overall fit was just off.
Didn't wear this. Too long and too deep a v for my short body.
Love this top, the tie part can be worn multiple ways and with or without a cami under making it versatile for work or fun.

I'd personally size down. Didn't end up wearing it as it was too long and baggy. A smaller size would have been better. Got for work but wasn't comfortable as it was low cut. Loved the lightweight fabric though!

Loved this shirt ... easy to wear to work and out. Definitely size down though as it's flowy. Would've bought it if it wasn't so expensive (actually though, how is a thin black shirt so expensive?!) ... will rent again!
I usually don't wear loose fitting tops, but I loved this. The scarf can be tied in different ways so you can make this look a few different ways. Classic top and easy to dress up/down.
Rented for work meetings. It was good but not great. even a medium was really big.
It was a nice shirt for a conference but I can't believe how expensive it actually is since the material is just meh. It was a little big on me but worked.

links_reviews_title: Great piece to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I love how the sleeves gather
Very pretty material. Runs large and the fit is pretty loose. Recommend sizing down.
Beautiful top. Goes with everything. Jeans, skirt , pants. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Too big in chest and too long
links_reviews_text: I don't have a tiny chest but the fit was a little too big. And I would have liked it more if it had been knee length.
Wore this skirt for a presentation at work with a white blazer. Looked awesome. Will rent again

links_reviews_title: Flattering and interesting, feels like confidence.
links_reviews_text: The fit is great, very true to size. I am 5'10" and it was mid shin, which is a length I love. The zipper is great you can make it as conservative or risky as you want. Will rent again.

This skirt is great quality, loved the length as a taller girl. This will definitely be a repeat rental! Usually in pants I'm a 6/8 and the 4 fit me really well with a little bit of room to spare so I'd say it runs slightly large
This mile high skirt is so fun. It puts a little bit of bite into your work wardrobe.

I find Theory typically runs small but this item was definitely true to size with plenty of room despite the narrow design. The long zipper is super elongating and flattering. Wore to work with a sweater and heels. I'd love it with a tee shirt and sneakers to brunch as well!

links_reviews_title: Really edgy skirt for office or otherwise!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this! Very edgy skirt for office (or can be dressed down to wear on the weekend or a night out). The fit was perfect and the zipper made it very high fashion. Would recommend for anyone! I think it would fit best though on taller frames.

The size I got fit but wasn't flattering. I think it would have been cute if I sized down, but would have been too restricting. I couldn't walk unless the bottom was unzipped to allow for my legs to move. I like the idea of it, but just wasn't for me.
Nice skirt but there was little mercy on the curves. I would size up if possible.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear for multiple occasions
links_reviews_text: Long lean high waisted cut without much stretch holds it all together

I wore this literally all weekend. One day I will buy this for sure. The only size available was a L so I went with it.. I would probably size all the way down to a A or M just to have be a little more form fitting.

I've been waiting for this moment to arrive and it finally has. Anine Bing at RTR and with a classic sweatshirt nonetheless! Loved it so much I bought it immediately. Gets better and softer with wear! Definitely on the shorter side, but with higher waisted pants or leggings you're in the clear.
Loved this!!! So cool and so comfy.
Cozy. Chic. So LA. Buying ASAP.
This was too long and I ended up folding up the waist and under the hem. I sized down but the bottom band was weirdly tight. The material was suuuuper soft and comfy though!
Super cute.

Was so excited to see some Anine Bing on RTR! I was so pleased when I got this (with tags still on - brand new!!). Got so many unexpected compliments from random people about how they loved this sweatshirt. Anine Bing definitely has that ~cool girl~ vibe we all want. As someone who's on the petite side, this sweatshirt definitely ran super big + long, but was easy enough to tuck into jeans!
Super cute and comfy.
I adored this rental- really wish I could afford to keep it! Fun fit, warm, comfy, perfect. Highly recommend
such a good sweater to just throw on & still look super stylish - will definitely rent again!
Great casual but trendy sweatshirt. Fun to rent because I'd never spend 200 on a sweatshirt. :-)
I wore this almost every day! I got a M to achieve an oversized look (I normally wear a S). Very on trend and I would have bought it if the price wasn't so high.
Wish I got the medium because the waistband was tight around my waist for the more oversized look. Looked cute with skinny jeans or leggings!

links_reviews_title: Really loved this skirt - perfect for winter!
links_reviews_text: Skirt fits true to size! Great length and perfect with some high boots for work or going out!

links_reviews_title: A solid skirt for the Winter season
links_reviews_text: A cute and thick skirt for the office setting. Sits on me high waisted and goes a bit past my finger tips.

Fabric is thick (almost like a burlap sack but lined inside so not itchy) and best suited for fall/winter. Fit was great and the length was perfect! Completely appropriate for work even without tights. Though it did ride up when sitting down, so keep that in mind. Pockets are an added bonus!
Great design & material. A little short, so wore it with opaque tights. It has pockets!!
This is cute but if size up since there is no stretch/if you have a hint of hips. The pockets bulged out at the end of the day which wasn't very flattering

Love this skirt! It fit like a glove, was very flattering, and still comfy. A bit on the shorter side, but still looked very work appropriate with tights. Thick material and very well made. Note - creases and wrinkles a bit after you sit for a long period of time!

I'm 5'6'', about 140 lbs with an athletic build and usually wear size 4 or 6 jeans. The skirt was tight around the waist but otherwise fit perfectly. I have long legs so skirts tend to look short on me but this was the perfect length for work. The skirt had pockets too!

links_reviews_title: Would probably look great on someone petite
links_reviews_text: This was a nice, thick skirt that fit well. I just don't have the body type for this kind of skirt.
I rented for work - definitely more of a winter look than summer - I paired with black tights and a black top. I like the detail on the skirt ....will def rent again

I rented this for work, the length was great and the material was sturdy and thick, great for the cold weather. I do wish I'd sized up to the 2, the 0 was just a little snug on my hips which made the pockets on the skirt look a little odd.
Perfect for work, got compliments

Skirt is long enough to be professional, but short enough to still be sassy and cute. I have a larger butt and athletic thighs, so I was nervous about the fit because most things today are made to fit more slender people, but it fit perfectly. Definitely fit true to size.

I wear a 4 in most brands, but I often size down to a 2 in Tory Burch, so I guess that fit about average for Tory Burch though I think it runs big in absolute terms. Cute skirt for work. I wore with boots (inspired by the picture!) Turtleneck is from RTR Unlimited too!

I wore this for Christmas, and it was nice and thick for the cold! It did run a little bit big for me, but still worked! It's got the trendy buttons, but still very classic looking. Overall, I liked it!
Fits good. True to size.
Overall fit is true to size and good length. Thick fabric but after sitting most of the day definitely wrinkles up

I really liked the idea of this skirt more than the actual skirt. The pockets on the side are unflattering for anyone who has larger hips. It's a cute shape though and a nice fabric for winter. Would be too short to wear to work without tights.
Perfect for the fall (thick material) and a great staple for work. Will rent again!
Great work skirt for the awkward not winter but not spring yet transition.
Modern cut, strong construction and fabric. I did a chinky sweater, tights and boots but could have gone in any direction.
fits a little big, wish i had rented size 2, long enough to wear without tights for spring/fall
Great fit!
I usually can't really pull-off wearing a sweater with a skirt because it overwhelms my small frame. I wore a pastel-colored sweater with this skirt and loved it!
Didn't wear this one. I may try again and size up but I'm usually between a 12-14 and this had no give so was super super tight on the hips. Sent back.
The fit was too small. I ordered up a size, but I have a big butt and It still didn't fit. I wasn't able to wear this item.
I've rented this before and love it. great for winter months.
Rented this for work and can't wait to wear it! Great length, not too short and not too long, and it's a thick, nice-looking material. Two thumbs up!
Pros: Nice fit, nice wool material. Worn with black sweater, tights and booties. Cons: A bit short but its ok when worn with tights.
Great for casual or you could dress it up.

links_reviews_title: Fab skirt, very flattering and classy
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews I thought this was going to run big. It actually fit me perfectly (in fact a little snug). Would rent again. I might even try a size up next time. Hubby loved it. Paired it with a tucked in turtle neck and knee high boots. Looked great!
Loved this skirt. Versatile and classic. Good length for boots or flats.
This skirt is everything and I was my best basic fall bitch in it. I paired it with a black top, black tights, and brown boots. YASSS.

links_reviews_title: fun mini that even a mom can wear
links_reviews_text: it was super thick and great quality. it sit too high up on the waist for me. I'm a 10/12 and this was a 12 and it was not near my hips.
I wore this to work twice and would have bought it if the price was a little lower. Nice thick material, well made. Neutral enough to go with just about anything. Sizing is accurate.
Favorite rental to date, wore it three times and received compliments twice. Wore with a turtleneck, tights and boots one day, and a button up shirt another. Pockets that held my phone nicely.
I wore this several times and got a compliment each time I wore it. Really cute for a cold day or a seasonal transition day where it's chilly in the morning and warmer in the afternoon. Loved it

Runs large. I'm never a 2 in other brands. Based on reviewes I ordered a 2. Loved the fit but was small on me in the waist. If I ordered the 4, would have fit my waist but would have been big in body. Im not curvy, pretty straight shape. 133 lbs. 5'8".

links_reviews_title: I wore this skirt for multiple occasions. Vacation and everyday.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit, great quality fabric. Pros: easy to style, great fit. flattering Aline skirt. I am apple shape and is very flattering.

links_reviews_title: This material is so classic. I paired it with a black turtleneck and boots.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well

Deep red. Soft material. Not itchy at all. Big turtleneck. Plenty of room. Overall classic nice red sweater and - especially for the retail price - it was surprisingly one of my favorite sweaters I've rented this season! Sometimes I let myself think that if it's cheaper on here it won't be as good. Well that's not the case with this one. This is a great, cozy sweater rental! And I wore it multiple times to work and around the house to eat chicken nuggets.

This is a good one! I'm short so didn't mind the slight crop-- if you're taller you might find it on the short side. Comfortable weight (it's not a terribly cold winter so I'm not overheating in this one) and it's not itchy. Overall, a nice sweater- love the marled look. Wore with jeans and black fryes for casual Friday.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater to add to the mix
links_reviews_text: I rented this sweater with unlimited because I was starting to get tired of the sweaters I own. Decided to wear with my hair up because the neck was a lot for me. I liked this for a one time rental but wouldn't buy. Fits true to size!

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater. Wish it was a little longer.
links_reviews_text: Nice everyday wear sweater. Comfortable and warm. Only con is that I wish it ran a little longer. I'm 5'7 and thought it was just a little on the shorter side.
This was a great sweater. I wore it repeatedly. The color was very rich in person.
The fit is quite baggy but it's very warm and comfortable. Loved wearing it with a pair of skinny black pants.

links_reviews_title: The cowl neck was really oversized
links_reviews_text: I loved the fit, feel and color of this sweater but I couldn't wear it because the neck was huge! I couldn't roll it over to make it stay and didn't really know how to make it work.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun, oversized sweater. Will definitely be renting this again!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this sweater! The turtleneck part was perfectly slouchy and thick - same as the rest of the sweater. All around a great sweater, pairs perfectly with blue or black jeans!
This was a perfectly fine sweater, but neither the fit nor the fabric nor the color was anything beyond ordinary. Very average in every respect.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color, comfortable material and oversized fit!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, stylish
This sweater has it all. Trendy silhouette, beautiful rich color and soft cozy feel.
Comfy and warm sweater. Slightly oversized but not huge.
Loved this sweater. I ended up wearing it 4-5 times! So cozy and comfortable:

Love love love this sweater! May buy it. It's warm enough for those cold winter days but also not too heavy for the fall. Highly recommend. Got a small and I'm 5'3 118lbs. Still a bit oversized but that's how I wanted it.
This is the best blazer I've ever worn. Glad I read the reviews and sized down. It has a bit of give so it didn't feel tight, just perfectly fitted. Will rent again!

This jacket fit perfectly and was quite comfortable to wear the entire day. I like the longer length. My only complaint was that I wish it were a little more structured. It felt a little "floppy" around the bottom and therefore a bit more informal.

links_reviews_title: The pop of colour was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little boxy for me, I'm thinking a small might have fixed that. But otherwise loved the colour! I also loved the length of the blazer, I'm tall and it was still long!
Great pop of color for work. I loved this.
Tailored fit, lined, more crepe style than structured. Pair with a bold lip

I wore this for NYE w a black jumpsuit and felt polished and comfortable. All of the pictures from reviews , including my own, gave me the impression this looks more masculine/androgynous , but it doesn't look that way in person, in my opinion. Hope that makes sense . I'm 5'7 and the sleeves were perfect length for me . This runs true to size

links_reviews_title: Pop of color and a great fit!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color of this jacket for a pop of color during the winter. It fit true to size, but could be a little snug in the arms with a shirt with sleeves. I have a long torso, so I loved that the jacket was longer, but beware if you are short waisted. It is a great casual jacket and the material is comfortable for all day wear.

links_reviews_title: Super fun pop of pink in the office!
links_reviews_text: Loved this look! Great fit and really fun with jeans!

Great jacket! I wore it while giving a talk on climate change and felt very powerful. It has slight shoulder pads which I didn't mind but might not be for everyone! I had to iron the lapels and they didn't really want to stay put but other then that I was a fan!
Love, love, LOVED this blazer for work. The color is to die for. I'm normally a small and the XS fit nicely with a tank under.
Wore this out to dinner with a friend with jeans. Liked the fit, brought a pop of color to my outfit. Jacket was true to size, but is pretty long.
To long
I love this coat! Great color and nice structured fit. Liked it a lot. Very solid rental.
Added this to leggings and a tee to make it more formal for work. Comfy, breathable and fun color. Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore this with jeans to work and the color was a stand out during the chilly winter day.
links_reviews_text: The color of this jacket is georgous! It fit perfect and was very figure flattering. I would absolutely rent it again.

I have literally never received more compliments on anything than this jacket. My students (I teach high school) are still talking about how much they loved my pink blazer a week after I wore it! Really wish I had taken a picture. I paired with a black shirt, black pants, and snakeskin block heels. Can't wait to rent this again!!

links_reviews_title: Wore it oversized and looked cute with a shorter black dress.
links_reviews_text: Cute with the sleeves rolled up.
I rented this and loved it so much I wore it twice and considered keeping it longer. It fit well and the the texture of the fabric was good quality. I am sure I'll rent it again.
I rented this thinking it was hot pink. I received it new with tags and fit was great, but more purple than pink, which was not what I wanted.

Don't usually wear LuLu studs. Have a lot of Lucy and Athleta. Runs smaller in the waist than those brands I think and longer in length. Thought was too long for me in legs and waistband. Enjoyed wearing and I like the design a lot.
These leggings were beautiful, high quality, and a fun but subtle pattern. Everything I want in a legging and I will totally rent them again!

I didn't expect anything special with these but they are nicer than the average Lululemon legging. I rented them because I wanted to see if I could pull off a lighter color in a legging. The material is different--unless it was really cold, I wouldn't want to work out in them but they are step up from my black leggings I usually run errands in. The description mentions cashmere which I figured was inaccurate it but I could see how they have some cashmere in them. Lululemon is so hit or miss but these are a hit.
Love these, if they were cheaper I'd buy. They look a little like denim and are so comfy. Love !
Super high quality ponte fabric. Lots of compliments on the sleeve details. Runs a touch short so you need to wear tights under it if wearing for work.

links_reviews_title: Fun for holiday party at work
links_reviews_text: Comfortable sweatshirt like material
I rented this dress for the Celine Dion concert and it was absolutely perfect! I am 14 weeks pregnant and this dress made me feel like I didn't even have a bump!

Very cute dress, nothing too flashy and the sleeves add a nice flair, the one thing that surprised me was that it's fairly a line and not very snug around the body, so you could size down.the one drawback to the sleeves is that the buttons are really cold on a winter day, so I had to wear a longsleeved shirt underneath because it was really distracting!
Understated Thicker stretchy material Comfortable and unique Fit great on me

I usually wear a 4 or 6 but the XS fit. It's a bit short for work but I wore it to a work dinner. The fabric is thick but really nice. I love the detail. I am a big a tori Burch fan. This isn't her usually style but I loved it.
This reminded me of an elf dress for the holidays. I didn't wear it.
Gorgeous and easy dress. Be warned that hemline is much shorter than you may think!

links_reviews_title: This dress is better than expected in real life - I love the thick, stretchy fabric.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a bit shorter than I expected and a bit tighter in the stomach. Loved the sleeves - not too baggy.
Pretty dress, great fabric. I wore this to church with boots and received many compliments. It is very comfy.

Loved this and it was very flattering. Definitely skimmed right over any problem areas. My only tiny tiny complaint? The accents on the sleeves are actually metal. I wore this on a very cold day and these little metal pieces were FREEZING cold against my skin all day long... :( That said - it's adorable with black tights and booties and I will definitely rent again!
The best dress for a birthday ever! I got lots of compliments on it at work.

links_reviews_title: It is well made and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: the sleeves are really beautiful. It is a snug fitting item, so know that or go up a size.
Dress is straight which didn't flatter my figure - boxy looking. Fabric & color was beautiful & the gold detail is pretty.

links_reviews_title: Wore on thanksgiving - beautiful and flattering
links_reviews_text: So flattering. No brainer, easy to wear dress.
I loved this dress! Only issue I had was that the XL was kind of big. The sleeves were super big on me that I had to roll them up. Otherwise, I loved this dress.
The fabric and the make of the dress look really qualitative. The details on the sleeves are super chic and pretty. It runs true to size and is well cut.

The sleeves make the dress and keep it from being an ordinary black work dress.It was a bit boxy, but I probably needed to size down. Depending on the cut, I normally wear a 14 or 16 because of my bust size size so if I rent again I will try the large.
Nice thick material and clings to you the right amount. I liked the dress in person even more than I thought I would when ordered.
Great detail and luxurious fabric. I felt wonderful in this dress and received a lot of compliments. Paired with black tights and boots.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress - professional look that is on trend.
links_reviews_text: I love the thicker material, it wears very nicely and has a complimentary fit if you are curvy and a little short (I am 5'4"). I like the looser sleeves that still fit nicely and didn't look too bulky on my frame. It is a little short, so would recommend wearing black opaque hose for a work situation. Very nice dress, I may have to purchase this one as a nice work dress for upcoming holiday parties.

links_reviews_title: Weird gold design looks like thumb tacks!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so unflattering. It ran really big. I thought from pictures that the gold would be a fun touch. However, they were huge and looked like tacks. I never wore it.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, just not my style.
links_reviews_text: Size up. Tight across the rear if you are hourglass.
Very pretty and professional dress. Wore it for a work event and received alot of compliments. Material is a soft, but thick, cotton. Sleeves are gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but a bit too short for me to wear to work.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, but didn't get to wear it. I'm 5'9 and thought it was a little too short for me to wear for work.
If you have curves, this may not be flattering on you.
I intended this for work thinking it was a bit above the knee but it was upper mid-thigh. The sleeves were neat though not as pretty as I expected. The bodice was a bit snug for the size. Never wore.

I love everything about this dress. It is flattering and comfortable with a little glam on the sleeves. I wore it to work and received a ton of complements from co-workers and strangers alike. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is awesome! The pictures do not do it justice.
links_reviews_text: Fits a little small but nothing to worry about - absolute perfection in terms of quality. Very fun dress!

It was too small for me but I knew that was a risk when I ordered it. I'm a 5/7, size 10/12 and was just hoping it would run large or be more fitted on me. it was leggings-level tight on me. I didn't wear it, but it would have been a great understated piece with a fun flare to a LBD

links_reviews_title: Loved the fabric and look of the dress. I received compliments all day.
links_reviews_text: Hits you in the right areas. Looks great for work.
Loved the fit, loved the texture, I really dug the sleeve details.
I wore this for work and received many compliments. Cute sleeves!

links_reviews_title: Sleeves too short, not for me.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves on this dress stopped four inches before my wrist, and I typically need to buy in the petite section to get the right long-sleeves, so that's saying something. Definitely not for me. The patterned fabric is beautiful, but it would look better on someone a bit taller.
