Perfect for working from home and doing a video conference. Not too distracting but necklace is classy and unique. High quality fabric. Not five stars because the shirt really is short, so you need high waisted pants.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this sweater and the neck is interesting and unique.
links_reviews_text: I don't have a long torso and it's a little short so I had to wear a tank top underneath. Slightly tight across the chest, but I think a larger size would have been too big.
Fitted sweater and not super long.

Pretty much what you see is what you get with this sweater. No big surprises. It was a tad short and because it's also fitted, it created a bit of shelf look with my bust. But still was more or less okay.

links_reviews_title: Not so basic basic. Super warm and flattering. Length is a little short

links_reviews_text: This sweater is magically flattering. See By Chloe just knows design: the fit hit perfectly on every contour, laid perfectly right all day, and it didn't bag or sag. The color block and fit kept what could have been a boring, neutral knit into day of feeling like a million bucks. I got compliments everywhere I went. For fit: I am 5'4", 34 D, an 8-10 on top and 10-12 on the bottom.

I wore this three separate times - twice to two separate work events and once for a more casual dinner. I got lots of compliments each time. The material is very high quality and it doesn't wrinkle easily, which is important to me because I travel for work and have to pack a suitcase every week. By the third wear it hadn't stretched out at all. It is pretty heavy so it was great for this time of the year and it will be a future rent come winter time.
Fit true to size, fabric was comfortable, classy look.
tight as pictured, but ALSO still undersized. size up!
Where usually I wear a medium I needed an xl for this. But it was beautiful and warm.

links_reviews_title: Runs super small and very short

links_reviews_text: Not a good pic because couldn't pump at work in it well. But cute and very wintery
This unique, asymmetrical top fit me perfectly, and I got so many compliments. Would rent again.
I liked this sweater so much more than I thought I would! It is a nice, warm basic with just enough interest at the color to elevate an outfit. I would definitely rent again.
Saw this in store. Great quality. Classy. Runs small/short in torso. Size up.
Loved this sweater. Fitted, contemporary style. Wore with dark jeans and booties. Very, very nice. Compliments all day long.
Beautiful asymmetrical sweater. Fits true to size. Fabric lays nicely and I received tons of compliments on this all night.
I loved this sweater! It's sophisticated and looked awesome with work pants, jeans, or a skirt! Would totally rent this piece again!
The fit and feel of this sweater is fantastic. Fitted, but material heavy enough to be forgiving. Not itchy!
I typically wear a Medium and had to get an XL, so this runs pretty small.

links_reviews_title: pretty but a little too fitted. nice material
links_reviews_text: runs small
Very elegant and versatile. Can be worn with pants a skirt or jeans. Feels rich and expensive. Well crafted.
Material is soft and comfortably warm. Classy and elegant.

links_reviews_title: Great looking sweater. Got some compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and flattering. The only thing I did not like was it was a bit itchy.

links_reviews_title: It's very good and fits me very well
links_reviews_text: fits well
The fabric is great and has an interesting weave/pattern to it. I had thought it would be long. It tends to creep up so I wore a tank top underneath.
Very comfortable for work, but wasn't a fan of the tie.
I rented this for work but would Be good to go out to dinner in.... the tie is a nice detail - makes it really interesting. Definitely would rent again
Beautiful soft fabric and fits great. Very flattering and goes well with skinny jeans and skirts. Would buy if it weren't so expensive!
Loved this sweater, it was beautifully tailored, soft, and not bulky.
This sweater felt great! Soft with just the right amount of weight. Personally, I should have sized down, but that was my mistake. The front tie was a nice detail and I'd definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fits on the smatter end. Sleeves and shoulders on the M did not work for me
Detail is cute but overall plain
links_reviews_text: Definitely could have sized up for this sweater for a longer fit everywhere. Was a little right for my taste. While the detail in the front was cute, the sweater overall was ok to me
I wasn't sure what to expect with this top but the color was beautiful and the style was so flattering!

Very comfortable, true to size top. I wore it with black pants for work but would also look cute with skinny jeans. It's light enough to wear with white jeans in the warmer months. I didn't double knot the tie, because I thought it looked too bulky, so I did have to adjust the tie throughout the day. Overall a nice top that I'll wear a few times before sending back.
Got tons of compliments on this! Loved it super flattering and comfy. Definitely will rent again.
nice fit - lots of compliments
Loved the color and style of this top. Great for work and casual. Super comfortable and fun!
Really cute and fun detail for a casual day. I am tall with a long torso. It was a little short for me, but the length would probably be a nice hip length for someone a little shorter
Received many compliments.
great fit
It's exactly the kind of stylish sweater that dressed up the jeans for work dress casual. The knit is soft and flowed nicely around the waistline.
This sweater is super warm and doesn't itch you like some others. If you are on the taller side, i would recommend a size up because the waist does expose your high waisted jeans zipper/button.

Very soft and lightweight, great quality. Only negative is that there is a gap at the top of the knot where you tie, showing stomach. I had to use a safety pin to close. The first picture in the app makes it look like there's a layer of fabric behind the knot, but there isn't. The model photos show better. If you wear high waisted pants it wouldn't be an issue. I love it though. So cute and totally comfy.

Not as cute as on the model. The tie straps are much longer than pictured so you have to double knot it which makes it much less cute. Also the tie position is pretty high (even on my short body). I had to wear with high waisted jeans to cover up for work.
great fit, comfortable, wore it several times

links_reviews_title: Super cute! I wore it multiple times.
links_reviews_text: This can work well with jeans for a more casual look, or with trousers for a work attire. The only thing I wasn't expecting is that there is an opening right by the knot, so it shows skin. It also runs on the shorter side (not the sleeves, the overall length of the sweater).
Love this sweater! Wore it with jeans, a dressy skirt, and slacks. It looked great with everything. The side tie is flattering and unique. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved how this felt and looked!
links_reviews_text: The material is so comfy and I loved the detail of the tie at the waist. I wore this with jeans and will keep it to wear one more time before I return it.
However, the sweater I received was stretched out, pilling and ready to be retired.

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater. I could wear it for work and play. It is very flattering.
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Coat was a great accessory for a rooftop event
links_reviews_text: Loved the coat. It's a bit thinner and deconstructed. And I was disappointed that there was a lot of scratches on the buttons and signs of wear and tear.
Loved this one- was comfortable and stylish. Lighter weight but able to pair with a scarf if it's a little cooler

I normally shy away from plaid print coat as it tends to overwhelm my frame. But this Amanda Uprichard plaid structured fitted coat complements my frame very well. I love the fitting, the lapel and the high slit front style. I love how I could wear it with my casual outfit.
It is an awesome coat that is stylish and comfortable! I revived SO MANY compliments on it! Really felt great wearing it!

links_reviews_title: This coat is incredibly versatile (indoor/outdoor, daytime/nighttime) and gets so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Superstar coat! Beautiful colors and textures. The only thing is that it is a close fit for sure. I can only wear very thin garments underneath. However, this gives the beautiful appearance of a well tailored garment.
Great coat. Warm but need to wear a scarf because it had a v neck
Super cute coat with great detailing on the buttons. A little tight in the arms if you're wearing a sweater underneath, but overall a great wardrobe addition.

Love the fun red color in checkered design. Go up a size for more room on the shoulder. I'm usually an XS but picked S for this one. Wearing a sweater inside and fits just right! XS would be very snug.
This is a beautiful coat and the colors are amazing. I received a ton of compliments and it was easy to just throw on to make an outfit look great. I will defiantly rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great winter coat. Even more beautiful in person
links_reviews_text: An in between warm. Not light but not super thick.
I got SO much use out of this coat! Perfect for dressing up or down and lots of compliments. Would definitely rent again!
Loved this! Reviews said runs small, I disagree I could have gone for M but got Large which was OK in the end given snowy weekend in NYC so layering was necessary.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this fun statement coat!
links_reviews_text: Heartbroken to return this. So fun and made every outfit over the holidays extra festive. It was perfect for DC with our mild winters, but don't rent this thinking it's going to be warm. Definitely lightweight. Ran a little small- I'm usually a medium, but the large was pretty fitted.
Beautiful standout piece, great in the cool fall months but due to mixed material not warm enough for winter. Runs a bit small in the shoulders, couldn't close it entirely.

Coat is deceptively warm for how light it is, and I'm in the Midwest (it snowed on Halloween and I just added a scarf and gloves to the coat). The color is so vibrant and fall ready, I loved wearing it. Zero stretch and fitted in the shoulders, so make sure your collar isn't popped before heading out the door.
Lots of a great comments when I posted this look on Instagram!
Looked worn out but still got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: Too tight in shoulders/underarm region. Not very warm
links_reviews_text: Got this to wear for a fashion show in nyc very disappointed. It was too tight in shoulders/underarm region. Not very warm

I loved this coat. It's length makes it look upscale but not dressy- though I was able to wear this to business meetings without looking too casual. Not overly warm. It's got something a little more special than just a basic plaid coat, I got lots of compliments on it. Would rent again. Broad shoulders should go up a size.
Love this! Great, fun, piece to dress up an outfit. Wore this to work, then transitioned to dinner with my girls. Compliments all around!
Loved this coat. The medium was a good fit but I could not comfortably wear bulky sweaters under it. I especially loved the print and length

This coat will get you noticed immediately. It's vibrant and makes you stand out. I loved how comfortable it was for running errands/being out and about. It is true to size and very flattering. I wore it on a few warmer winter days in the upper midwest with a solid fashionable scarf to keep my neck warm, as the coat is open inthe upper chest area.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous coat. A little small on the bottom half.
links_reviews_text: Buttons are fabulous and the tiny hint of midnight purple in the plaid really makes it.
Brightens up the winter, but lightweight. Complements galore. I sized up but found it small across the shoulders
Fit tight in the shoulders and around waist; good for weather 45F and up.

links_reviews_title: I probably received 5-10 compliments each time I wore this jacket
links_reviews_text: Must rent! It's TTS. Goes with everything and contemplated buying the coat.
The coat was size extra large but ran a little small it was a tear in the back seam
I was worried that a long coat would be overwhelming for my height, but it fit perfectly on my shoulders and frame! Very cute coat!

This coat looked amazing in my engagement picture photos! I left it unbuttoned and received so many compliments. Everyone asked me where I got it, the only downside is this was definitely tight. I usually wear a s-m in coats and this was too tight that I could barley button. Size up!

This is stunning and something that I did not want to take off. I wasn't at work for five minutes before someone came up to me and slathered me with compliments, asking where I got this. Interestingly, when I said "Rent the Runway", the first thing my colleague said was "Don't they only do wedding dresses?" That said, I would happily get married in this coat. I have to say it does run tight. I'm a solid S in pretty much everything these days but this coat in Medium is snug as a rug.
This coat was thinner than expected based on other reviews. It also runs ridiculously small. I could button it but it did not lay flat - and I was only wearing a T-shirt. No thanks.
Was told it looked like a 1980s couch cushion but I loved it so much! If the weather would have cooperated, I would have kept it longer
Light weight & runs small. The XS doesn't allow for you to wear layers under it

This coat is wonderful. The pattern is more complex than appears in pictures and altogether creates a really classic yet trendy line. The only reason I took off a star is because it had no pockets. That was pretty inconvenient a lot of the time...especially when I didn't want to bring a bag with me.
Love the shape it adds. Not heavy.
Gorgeous print and color, but a medium was too snug. Size up
Gorgeous fall coat, crisp as the fall air. Great fabric choice and design. True to size.

Really cute and sophisticated fit. The longer length makes it possible to wear with leggings. I wore to work with black pants and my only complaint it that it got wrinkly after sitting for an hour. From the top up above the wrinkles, it looked great!
Really nice dark blush color (that I haven't really seen before) so it definitely freshened up my usual work look. I'm 5'4 and the small was a little long in the arms but wasn't a deal-breaker.

I am in love with this blouse! The color is SO flattering and the fabric drapes beautifully. I usually wear a small / medium and the medium fit perfectly. I wore this tucked in because it's a tad long, but that's generally the case for me. Definitely want to buy this one.

links_reviews_title: Pretty top, just more oversized than I thought it would be!
links_reviews_text: From the pictures this top doesn't look super oversized, so I ordered a medium. The medium is so big on me! In tops I am in between S and M usually, and I wish I would have gotten a small. The sleeves are sooooo long and I have really long arms! I still wore it once to work because the color and material are gorgeous! If you want an oversized look, order your regular size. If you want it to be more fitted, definitely size down.

The color of this shirt is so pretty! I love this color for winter. It's like a muted dark blush pink. I don't love the collar but it is a personal preference. I wore it with high waisted pants and it would have looked amazing with some pointy high heels but I wore some chunky ones to walk easier. Worked great for work and play. Material didn't stain or anything easily but it does wrinkle a little.
Loved this so comfy and versatile, perfect for a bump!

links_reviews_title: All the fun in this most easy to wear on trend day dress
links_reviews_text: Great dress with ruched top- no bra needed :) Straps have buttons so works if your short or tall

The only size available was a 3R. I looked at the notes and the length is same for all sizes! Thankfully it fit. I'm usually a Small or size 2/4. I wore this dress 4 times during my one month rental. It was perfection. The style, fit, comfort, material, ease of wear. I just loved it so much. I got so many compliments on it!
Fit was great- wore during the middle of my second trimester and was beyond comfortable. Enjoyed wearing out for Saturday errands and will throw on a jacket for work this week!
Fit true to size, so easy to wear during late summer days with a pair of sneakers or sandals. I have a small bust so it worked perfectly.

I found the pattern + color to be a little blah and the dress a little tent-like on my 7 month bump but overall it was a good option for errands and lunch on a Sunday. I have narrow shoulders and the straps slipped down a bit even on the smallest button but it was super comfortable and lightweight. My husband really liked it too!

Such and easy and comfortable dress to throw on in the summer! It is lined so it's not see through at all but still very lightweight. The top fits perfectly and works with a regular bra (probably a balconet or Demi bra best). Absolutely loved this dress and wore it a bunch around town!

I loved how versatile this was for summer - I think I got more wears out of this rental than I have anything else!! Wore to church, work with a denim jacket, dinner with friends...it is just darling! Easy to wear, lined, and fit great! I was worried about the bust emphasizing my chest but it ended up looking great!

Absolutely loved this sweet adorable gingham dress. It runs small altho I fit in both the size 1 and 2 and am a true 6. If you have a large chest, it will take up a lot of the smocked top so size up. The fabric is soft and gauzy- perfect and trendy for a summer day or night.

Forgive the awkward photo Loved this lightweight, comfortable dress - perfect for Texas summer, and a great length for shorties like me (I'm 5'1"). Received compliments both times i wore it. The only thing that could've made it better would've been pockets. Couldn't bring myself to spend $400 for a cotton dress, but I would've purchased had it been at a more reasonable price point.
Cheaply made. Not flattering even for a sundress.

links_reviews_title: It broke while I was wearing it lol

links_reviews_text: The straps were adjustable but still a bit long. Other then that it was great! It was super easy and fun to wear. Would definitely rent again.
The tiering on the skirt and the length of the smocking make this dress super flattering and little more modern than the dress looked on the hanger.
I wore this several times and several ways. It's really light and comfortable.

The print is cute and the dress is too in theory, but it really isn't flattering- made me look legit pregnant haha. The top part doesn't hold the girls up too well without a bra either, which most smocked tops do a great job at. Just ehh.

I packed this for a week at the beach and wore it so many times. It's really airy, and the form fitting top stopped right at my waist making it really flattering. I didn't wear a bra with it, because the stretch of the top is actually pretty supportive. If my life was a little more like my vacations I'd have never sent this back.
Only rent this if you intend to wear it as a bathing suit cover. It would need a slip otherwise.
This dress is so fun! The fit is very flexible (flowing bottom and stretchy top) and this dress is so comfortable for hot summer days
So easy to wear and a great length for a shorty like me. Wore it to work with a jean jacket, to a party with white heels and over a bathing suit. Super versatile and lightweight
This oversized sweater is wonderful. Super loose but so beautifully designed that it looks cute and cozy.
Loved this oversized slightly asymmetrical sweater. Warm, cozy, fun to wear. Great option for a cold day!
Perfect soft cozy oversized sweater. The asymmetrical hem was a nice detail. This is about as close to leaving the house wrapped in a blanket as it gets, and it's wonderful
Great work sweater! Not too warm so it's good for the in-between winter and spring weather.

I LOVE this sweater. It's so cozy and chic. Yes it's a little big but I think it's supposed to be. It's beautifully made and the diagonal hem makes it unique. I lived in this while I had it and will definitely rent again if I can next winter.
Wore this a few different days and it was very versatile. A little itchy because of the wool, but very warm!
Love this sweater, it can be dressed up or down! It was interesting how the front was longer than the back, but I think it added something nice to the look.
Oversized fit that still looks tailored, felt super chic + comfy. The back side is shorter than the front so it can be worn either way.
I love the simplicity of Vince clothing, and this sweater did not disappoint. It was not itchy at all. It is very heavy, but that's what I was looking for!
The sweater is longer in the front. Big cozy sweater great with leggings. I actually wore it backwards one day and liked it more.

links_reviews_title: Cute forgiving sweater with many details
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater. Some pilling but nothing crazy. Lots of details. Uneven hem which is cute. Not scratchy. Very warm. Wore with leggings.

links_reviews_title: Cozy, comfy and good style piece
links_reviews_text: It's lower in the front than in the back but the slits on the side are nice to break up the pattern. It's a soft sweater that I'd wear again for a cozy weekend or something relaxing. Worked great with heels and jeans for work.

links_reviews_title: Giving me all the ski lodge vibes
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a lunch date with my girlfriends on the first snow of the season and it was perfect! However, it was very itchy! I wore a T-shirt under it and that helped a little. The sweater was in beautiful condition and there was even a tag on it! The color is to die for and easily matched with anything but I chose to wear with black leggings and black boots. I felt the pattern was so beautiful on its own I didn't need to wear jewelry -- also looks very prone to snagging. Would definitely rent again for a casual winter occasion!

links_reviews_title: amazing, comfortable and high quality sweater
links_reviews_text: I wore a small and it definitely was not tight. Sleeves were a little long but it looked ok to roll them up. Longer length was great, very comfortable. not itchy at all. Wore to work. Received lots of compliments, didn't want to return!

This sweater was very beautiful in color, knit pattern, and on body. My only problem with this sweater was the opening of the neck. This felt a little tight and was slightly uncomfortable. I only wore this once because of the neck. Otherwise I liked the sweater and it was not itchy.
This is a cozy sweater for cold weather. It's not particularly special but comfy to wear
Runs large :/ size down. Wish I read reviews. Gorgeous sweater and diagonal lines would be flattering had I gotten an XS
From aspen to steamboat to denver this sweater looks great. The med is pretty big and roomy but it would look weird if it were tighter.
Unfortunately, the shape of this sweater just didn't work for me. It was too baggy throughout and too long for my 5'6'' frame, without looking stylishly oversized.
Sweater was way too big and not flattering on me.
It does the job but not the best Vince sweater

links_reviews_title: Love it! just different a month, and it is beautiful
links_reviews_text: Great fit, casual, warm and not itchy.
This fit great and was super comfortable. I have a petite frame so tops can be hit or miss but this was a hit.
If this was a little cheaper, I would have bought it! Super comfortable and cute! It's a bit chunky but it's awesome for very cold days! I would recommend

links_reviews_title: It was a bit too big and bulky
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't re-order this item
Over sized cozy warm sweater for Cold Weather. You'll probably overheat in any temp over 40 degrees. :)
I wore this on two flights and got compliments from strangers on both! Great cozy piece to wear instead of a coat or jacket.
comfortable sweater. a little itchy because of the wool. Great for cold days

links_reviews_title: This is such a cute sweater. Great for casual weekends and working from the coffee shop.
links_reviews_text: It's intentionally oversized, so it has a great casual vibe.
Beautiful knit. But too big around the waist. Gives it maternity effect. Too long in the front.

Fits true to size. Lovely asymmetrical detail perfect with skinny or boyfriend jeans. The neck is quite high unless you double it over. Not quite the traditional cable knit as it looks in the images. Still a great casual jumper!
Cute, but definitely needed to size down. The fit is supposed to be slouchy but can look frumpy.

links_reviews_title: So soft and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: loved this sweater. Easy to wear casual with sneakers or dressed up with jeans and heels. Definitely will rent again before Spring comes.
Well made and stylish sweater. Classic with a twist.
Would buy it if it was a little cheaper! Great sweater!

This sweater was a great addition to my wardrobe. I was able to wear it with quite a few things and it fit well - oversized but not sloppy. I did wear it with a t-shirt layered under it, but it seemed soft enough that I’m sure I could have worn without.

Love. Would buy if the live wasn't so high. Enjoyed the warmth, quality, asymmetric fit. I'm 5'8" 135 lbs straight/athletic body type and wore a small. It was perfectly (oversized) fit and the Arms were long enough.

An ivory cable knit / fisherman sweater is a classic for a reason. This one has nice sharp cabling but with a lighter weight and a bias cut. It is like a figure-flattering twist on the chunky Aran sweater. Wish I owned it.
Good, cozy everyday sweater. It's a little funny that it's longer in the front than the back. Wore many times.

Interesting pocket and side seam details on this relaxed, soft denim. Needed to tighten my belt a fair bit to keep these up. That may just be me or perhaps is attributable to its relaxed fit. Either way, I'll probably be keeping these for a while - definitely recommend renting these after I've had my time with them!

links_reviews_title: Good top from the front, but total show stopper from the back.
links_reviews_text: Normal looking top in the front and you can see the side detail but even better from the back. Good for, and could've easily dressed this up with skinny black pants and heels for work.
The fit is comfortable and it's a fun upgrade for a top.
This was a fun option for a weekend in the mountains. It fit my 33 week bump so might be too oversized in normal circumstances.
I'm typically a small but it was suggested to go down a size and the xs fits comfortably. Love the color and the small ribbing.
I love detail on side. The stomach area has a lot of fabric so I feel like that made it a little unflattering

The sweater has a simple silhouette and is made with a smooth yarn/thread. The asymmetrical shape covers flaws in the body and gives this an elegant and casual look. One con was that the side that's long is actually heavier, so it shifts the sweater a little to the side including the neck hole. And one side of the sweater also feels heavier. I like the look though due to the asymmetry of the weight I didn't wear if as often as I'd thought.

links_reviews_title: Unique piece with a lot of comfort!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this top! The extended fabric on one side is a fun little element that added a little extra something to an otherwise usual black pant work look. It did stretch out in the arms throughout the day and I feel like I could have sized down to the medium. Loved the color and the soft stretch of the material and, of course, received compliments!

This is a great sweater that you could wear all year round. It's a great navy, stretchy ribbed fabric that isn't see-through. Definitely considered buying it! Sleeves were a little long on me, but it looked fine when they were cuffed. I wore with jeans and black booties, but I could also see this looking great in the spring with white pants.

links_reviews_title: LOVE! Great casual top with flair
links_reviews_text: The cut and style of this top is so awesome. The sleeves are long and the fabric and style is incredibly comfortable. You can dress this down or up with jewelry and the type of pants you wear, but the side flare and design makes it a really fab top. Too much to buy, or else I would have.
Neck line was very large. It was tight in one of the arm outs. Just wildly uncomfortable. Did not wear.
Runs big, but very practical and comfortable

links_reviews_title: It's cute but way unconventional; even more asymmetrical than it looks.
links_reviews_text: It fairly warm/heavy
This sweater has a weird fit, mostly caused by the heavy fabric and long side ruffle. It sags to the side and was generally uncomfortable. Icky synthetic feel. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shape, too broad in the shoulders for me
links_reviews_text: Flowy cut that's very flattering. The shoulders were too broad for my frame. The material is a little itchy and stretchy.

Wore this to work. Nice weight and good for disguising tumm issues. Felt like it was a big for me (this is the size RTR) recommended. I'm a full busted 12 at the moment. Also, sent on a regular hanger so there were shoulder dents. It was meh overall. Maybe a size smaller I would have felt a bit more satisfied.
The side pleats wouldn't lay properly and formed a giant 90-degree angle of fabric at my hip.
I loved this top for work. I wore it with black pants and boots. The side tail is lovely and makes the top interesting. I loved the stretch of the fabric. It runs true to size.
Very long, slim fit. The angles hem went down past my knees on my 4'11" frame and the shoulders were very narrow. Sort of a slinky texture to the fabric too.

links_reviews_title: A bit more odd than in photos
links_reviews_text: Maybe if I were taller this would've looked better... seemed odd on me. I still wore it, but the drapey side part was much more pronounced and not as swingy as I expected. Wouldn't rent again.
This has a great flowy feeling to it but the side that falls lower (the left) had a funny fit in the armhole.
I like the asymmetrical cut but the sleeves bunch up at the shoulders.
Fits really well. Long cut in the sleeves. I’m long-waisted, and it’s plenty long enough that it doesn’t ride up. Love it!
Paired with spanx perfect black pant--loved it.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is fantastic. Well made. Wore it both for work and with jeans.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected, very comfortable.
runs a little big, the sleeves are also long

links_reviews_title: Extremely cozy, perfect for a travel day
links_reviews_text: I needed something a bit chicer for a travel day: this sweater was perfect for my winter plane rides; albeit a tad large. Wore it ~4-5 times over the course of a couple of weeks.

I loved everything about this top. The drape, the weight, the color, the fabric, the fact (personal quest) that it is machine washable. I want to own it but for the cost. Why must Mr. Lam be so expensive, Universe? Why???

links_reviews_title: Weird fit, nice color and material
links_reviews_text: Might be better for shorter people but it hit at a weird place on my torso so I didn't wear it. The material and color are beautiful.
Different and unique. I bit baggy in the front, not in love but it was ok.
Nice color fun and different

I really loved this sweater. Beautiful quality, comfortable, and a little different. Ran super large though. I'm usually a 4 and have broad shoulders but this sweater was way too big in the shoulders making the sleeves too long as well. Definitely size down. An XS probably would hv worked better

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and hid my bump!

links_reviews_text: sleeves are extremely long. runs big and looks frumpy on. was hoping it was cuter than the photo on the model - it was not.

The fabric is a weighed fabric and the bottom lining and the arms constantly pull you down. The shoulder stitching point is in a really unnatural place from actual shoulders and because the fabric was pulling it would stay in an awkward place. The fit was really off and the experience wasn't comfortable.
Got the xs and it was huge - definitely size down. Ended up not wearing it.

I needed something to round out my unlimited subscription and nothing was speaking to me. I rented this on a whim and was happy. It's warm and was perfect for a casual Friday at work. I would recommend sizing down. I'm a size 12 top and the medium was the perfect choice.

links_reviews_title: Super cute jean skirt with an edge
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly...a little short on my tall frame but not too short. The fray and V in front make it different and edgy. Would def rent again!

Fit well in the waist and hips, but unfortunately the back of the skirt between the pockets pooched out. It made me look like I had a little tail! Unsure if I just got a funky skirt or if this skirt just wasn't designed for bigger booties.
I wore this multiple times and almost wore it to a work function- but saw someone else wearing it there and they looked great in it too. Such a flattering fit, fabric, color.
Animal print for the win. This dress is so flattering and a stand out color! Loved the flow of the material and the cute ruffle details. Will definitely rent again!

Loved this dress! I wore it at least five times while I was renting and it looked great with sneakers, combat boots and booties. I ended up buying it online after I sent it back because it's that good!
Could be dowdy but nips in at the waist ... I know ppl have said this runs big but it just fit me on top with my broad back and boobs (I'm a size 10-12) and they say L fits size 8
Very comfortable, I get like I was wearing a long nightgown to work hehe. I rented in my normal size but should have sized down. It fit ok in the chest and shoulders but the body was way too big.

I don't think the photo does it justice. I'm usually a medium. The small may have been a tiny bit too tight on the chest (32DD) but it fit so well everywhere else that I'd probably stick to the small if I had the choice. Also, I got lots of compliments on the color :)
This was the perfect dress to go out on the town in. So comfortable and looked stylish with black leather jacket. Spacious but still flattering. Would definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: Love- Even cuter in real life
links_reviews_text: My first day back after an RTR pause and I was quickly reminded why I love it so much. So many compliments! I don't think the photo does it justice. If you are in between sizes, don't be afraid to size down
This is such a fun dress! Definitely runs large, but I didn't mind it. Great for wearing for a long day to stay comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Bright red print and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was a lot brighter than I expected. I wore to work with a leather jacket and booties. While it's very slowly and comfortable it's super baggy. I felt like the shoulders and arms fit perfectly and the remainder of the dress is definitely more oversized. Someone had pinned pleats in the front which I think made the dress look less like a giant bag so I left them. The fabric is very soft but thin. I feel like I have pretty average shoulders and this fit well. I'd rent again.
Roomy, gorgeous color and details. I rented the M, BIG mistake. Had to pin it to win it. Great twirl dress too. Would be fabulous for V'day too!
Love the print and color. Definitely mumu like so a great option for a big meal!
At 2 months postpartum this dress was perfect to hide all my problem areas but still make me feel confident.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a work holiday party
links_reviews_text: It's loose and easy, but the print is edgy and fun. The sleeves are on the long-ish side and the fit ran large overall. I loved the medium, and now want to try the small.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Wore to work
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on this. Super comfortable and great fall print. Wore with boots to work. Runs a bit big but glad I got this size given it was comfortable
I LOVE this dress! The poppy red color is gorgeous and I especially loved it paired with sneakers for a cool girl casual vibes.

links_reviews_title: RTR EMPLOYEE REVIEW: Edgy but Feminine!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to work paired with black leather boots and a black leather jacket. The color is beautiful and the fit is nice and relaxed. I probably could have rented a size Small but I didn't mind the extra room. It's a great fall dress. Could definitely be dressed up or down! Highly recommend adding it to your <3 list!

didn't get to wear this because I bought it right before corona hit and my event was cancelled- but this is the best dress ever. the M fit perfect- I am normally a M or L, runs slightly big and is super flattering. Wish I had purchased this!

links_reviews_title: Fit is strange especially if you're busty
links_reviews_text: The seam hit in a very strange place (right across my chest) and was loose in all the wrong places. Super sad because I had high hopes for this one.

links_reviews_title: So fun I feel like the dancing girl emoji
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a work event. Very fun. Runs big. I'm usually a M and the S was still roomy but flattering.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering dress and fantastic print!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. It fit perfectly, was so flattering, and the print is fun. I wore to work then out to a holiday dinner with friends and I received a ton of compliments. Will definitely rent again!
Loved this fun dress!! Wore it to work and received so many compliments. Fits great all around

links_reviews_title: Fun and bold dress but also c comfortable
links_reviews_text: Versatile dress for a dinner parties. Chest and sleeves fit true to size but dress itself is loose and almost like a shift dress (ruffle accent around waist helps create some silhouette).

links_reviews_title: Great maternity dress for baby shower.
links_reviews_text: fit nicely. soft fabric. very comfortable.
Rented for a work event - it transitioned seamlessly from day to night. Comfortable yet flattering!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and pretty. Paired with black leather belt that accentuated waist line.
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 8 and designer suggests large. Dress was a bit loose fitting for me but super comfy and so flattering. LOVE the designer!
Easy to wear, lots of complements, will rent again.
The fabric on this is so soft, and doesn't wrinkle easily. Love the print! Not too low cut and a great length.

links_reviews_title: Like the pattern, way too big
links_reviews_text: The red and black snake pattern is striking and the material is soft and comfortable, but RTR recommended a size large for me and I am swimming in it. I normally wear a medium, so I think the recommendation was just off. I will maybe try this again in a medium
This has a great print and fits comfortably. It's a slightly oversized fit, so the small was perfect for me. I wear a 4 in most brands and occasionally a 6 in Reformation or HVN.

links_reviews_title: Easy dress; feels like a nightgown in a good way.
links_reviews_text: Tighter on top, flowy and long!

links_reviews_title: I love this, I am 5 feet tall and it's a great maxi dress for me.
links_reviews_text: Looks like the photo, not tight and great for formal events too

I accidentally ordered it in a size L vs. M and it still was flattering, so comfortable and perfect for work. I got tons of compliments and will absolutely be renting again. Most likely in size M next time :)
Perfect for fall transitional weather. Love the easy fit. I got nothing but compliments all day. Definitely a must-order!

The color and the fabric are gorgeous. The fabric moves beautifully. However the dress runs large and is very tent-like. I wore it with a wide black belt but the placement of the ruffle made it look a bit weird.

This dress was everything for a long day of meetings that went into an evening work gathering. Received tons of compliments. Print was vibrant and fabric was quality. Worn multiple times before returning.

I wore this to work and had compliments immediately upon entering. I am typically a Medium, but only the Large was available and I went for it. It fits loose of course, but the dress is already flowy so it worked really well. I'm sure the M would have been more fitted. The fabric is soft (although on the thinner end) and the pattern hides any wrinkles created throughout the day.
What a winner of a DVF. So very comfortable and professional with a bright pattern. Fit is TTS but has some stretch, so no need to size up. Would love to own!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress for work or night out
links_reviews_text: My first DVF dress and I love it. Pattern is fantastic. Unique but not over the top. I wore to a presentation and it was exactly what I wanted. I was able to wear it with both cream/white shoes and black. It's very comfortable, but I did have to wear spanx and slip. Light-medium weight fabric--not suitable for summer but can be worn the other three seasons. I am tall (5'10") and loved that it was past my knee.
Just love DVF dresses. So lady like. We are just back from a long vacation; I gained a few pounds. The knit in this dress is form fitting but forgiving. I added a pair of spanx, and it was perfect !

links_reviews_title: Love love this dress. Super comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_text: The dress has a thin knit sweater like fabric. I needed a slip even with tights. It was a bit too for fitting for a conservative office but I loved it so I wore it anyway. Overall a great dress and will rent again.
The belt is a little bit awkward, maybe because I'm short-waisted it was hard to get it to lay flat. Nice fit, pretty colors, flattering. An interesting print for a one-timer.
Sexy but work appropriate. Loved this dress and would consider buying. Material is not that thick, but hides flaws well with the pattern and gathered waist.
Fits great, professional look and fun print!

This dress is a very light wool knit (superfine). I didn't realize from pictures. Great work dress with tights and boots. The ties are real ties that can be tied in front or back. Nice conservative winter winner!
This dress was sexy and classy. A great length and print for work. Can't go wrong with DVF!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress and it's fun print
links_reviews_text: What a fun dress to wear. Hugs every curve in just the right way. Love the high neck, long sleeves and longer skirt length. It all works well together.

The dress was comfortable and had some stretch to it. The ties were long and could easily cinch the waist as tight or as loose as desired depending on how you feel that day. The only downside for me was that it is made of wool - may be itchy by the end of the day
This knit fabric is perfect for the chilly office but it was clinging to my knees. It wasn't enough of problem not to wear but that's why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars.
I love and will purchase this dress. It is so comfortable and cozy. It has bold and beautiful colors and I got compliments galore.
Beautiful striking pattern in a lightweight wool material, perfect for fall or winter. Not itchy at all (and I'm sensitive).
The perfect cold weather dress. Comfy, flattering, and versatile. In love!
Wear supportive shape wear and you're set!
Fabric is a sweater material so warm but love the vibrant colors and comfortable.

Absolutely LOVED this dress. Amazing print, fabric and fit. Vibrant colors. The belt makes it. The fabric is a gorgeous Marino wool so if you're like me and don't read details before you rent, beware it could get a little toasty in a warm season/climate.

I rented this for work. The material is a thin merino wool, which has some natural stretch. I got compliments on the bright pattern, and even though it was long (below the knees) I still found it flattering on my athletic/curvy body. For reference, I am usually between a 2 or a 4 and I wore the XS.

links_reviews_title: The pattern is AWESOME! Very form fitting for me - would size up. Wore with a long black vest.
links_reviews_text: Very clingy. I couldn't have worn it without a jacket/vest - needs shapewear or jacket camouflage. Looked great, though, with high black heeled boots. Definitely a cool dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun and classy dress for work
links_reviews_text: Received loads of compliments and felt really great in the dress! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Slimming, sleek style with an unexpected pattern.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I got a ton of compliments on it. The material is super soft and stretchy in a very forgiving silhouette. Worn with wedges.
Too bad this was not made for my shape. For some reason I thought this was a two piece.
Dress needs a lining or one must wear a slip. It clings. The pattern is lovely but again...it clings!

links_reviews_title: Yes DVF to this print and fit - curves ahead!
links_reviews_text: Love, love, love DVF dresses since I started using RTR! I felt really sexy and feminine in this dress because of the way it hugs my curves. I will rent this dress again to wear to work or networking event for sure. I love the print and colors as well - a winner!!!

Work this to the office with black boots and a black blazer. Fabric was thinner then expected but a great dress none the less. Would be perfect for late spring or early summer based on the weight of the fabric.

This dress is a a beautiful color and a fun winter work dress. It is made of a very thin wool and hugs every inch so be prepared to wear Spanx or shape wear. It looks great paired with black tights and booties.
Couldn't wear it as it was totally see through. Maybe this one was worn a few too many times.
Didn't wear was a bit on the busy side!

links_reviews_title: Warning: This dress is long and clingy!
links_reviews_text: Not for short girls or girls with hips.

This was a great dress for work! It’s the perfect kind of dress to rent because it really stands out so it’s not the sort of thing I’d want to wear that often. Love the pattern and I got a lot of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Fit and feminine. Classy as DVF always is!
links_reviews_text: Curve-accentuating though not tight. Classy. Thin so weR a slip or tights in cold weather. Many compliments. Color and print on dress is eye-catching.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Perfect in every way.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great

links_reviews_title: Fit was awesome and the print was an nice update for sometimes boring work wear.
links_reviews_text: stretchy and will work for work and everyday.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, professional, and just a little bit sexy.
links_reviews_text: Lightweight (but still warm) merino wool with a gorgeous and super wearable print.
A bit tight but very flattering. Ties around the waist hide tummy and muffin top!

Beautiful fabric and colors; got tons of compliments. Thin sweater material; wore spanx under but bc of pattern didn't show flaws. Wrapped long sash around waist almost like a cummerbund and it created a very flattering curvy silhouette.

links_reviews_title: Flattering but fitted and required shape wear
links_reviews_text: Dress was great for work but I did have to wear spanx since the knit fabric is thin fitted. Tied waist was figure flattering. Geometric pattern was modern and vibrant. Wore with black booties
Fit great!

links_reviews_title: Loved this so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Perfect, flattering, comfortable, quality cape. I loved it so much I bought it. Rent this!
This cape/cloak is amazing. Thick, high quality, elegant. I may buy this one, it is definitely an amazing staple piece. I love that there are pockets and also arm holes which make it more functional.
Good quality heavy fabric. Makes you look formal, received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Chic look but not winter friendly
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of this cape and had a bunch of compliments on it. The inside of the cane is actually a button vest which did highlight a little shape rather than looking like a lampshade. The fabric is a super thin knit. I would definitely wear it in slightly warmer weather but the slightest breeze had me shivering.
Super cute over the top coat or sweater for every day wear, holiday parties, winter layer, pretty much anything… Highly recommend it
Is a very classy and beautiful Cape. But it is not very warm, there were some cold nights where I had this on and I was freezing. So make sure to wear a long sleeve shirt or jacket underneath

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This cape is amazing! I loved it so much I had to buy it. It's the perfect cape that's in between a sweater and little jacket. Perfect for a cool fall or spring day or a day at the office.
Heavy and well made. Looked great with skirt and boots as well as jeans. Will definitely rent again.

So great in theory but it wasn't very flattering on a curvy body - just sort of stuck out straight and the arms are quite big so it was hard to tell it was a cape. The arm covers slid over to the side as well. It was better when open instead of buttoned up but then the arms are less obvious

links_reviews_title: It feels great, keeps you warm if it's cold. Feels a bit heavy when you pick it up but comfortable.
links_reviews_text: AMAZING!!! Highly recommend, my boyfriend is getting this for me as a V-day gift. Super happy!
Absolutely loved! Would rent again! Dresses up any outfit. Not warm. Will rent again at warmer time of year so get more use of it. (Winter in New England is not a good time to rent this).

links_reviews_title: I wore this a lot and had compliments every time I wore it.
links_reviews_text: Loved it.
I love this cape so much. It's beautiful and stunning and I am contemplating buying it. Just gorgeous

links_reviews_title: Really spiced up a normal work day and made me feel trendy and sophisticated!
links_reviews_text: The second I walked into work I received many compliments! It's a great fit, flattering, and comfortable.

I got so many compliments when I wore this suit to work, it absolutely made my day! I went out to lunch and someone actually came out from the kitchen to tell me how much they liked it. I was very tempted to keep it but it was a little too pricey. I would definitely rent it again though!

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual suit for work
links_reviews_text: I rented up a size due to availability and definitely could have worn the smaller size. This light weight jacket has a center hook if you choose to wear closed.
Wore this beautiful blazer to a meeting at work & felt great! The fabric has a little stretch, and it's structured without being stiff. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute blazer to spice up work wardrobe

links_reviews_text: Wore this for work. Kept my tennis shoes on most of the day and put heels on for a couple meetings to dress it up. Very comfortable. Great print!

links_reviews_title: I loved the way this fit! So cute and stylish for a day on the convention floor.
links_reviews_text: I went with a size up and likely could have gone with the zero. It still looked really cute and I loved the way it fit.
I work in the entertainment industry and go on lots of meetings and this blazer is perfect for being your own boss and feeling ready to take on the next project!

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, will rent again in the spring
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and got a lot of compliments. The fabric is a bit thin, so it's probably better suited for a spring day vs a January day in Boston. The pants are a bit cropped on the ankle.
The fabric is a thin cotton and this suit is meant to wear in warm weather. The jacket is lined but the pants aren't.
Great piece for any work wardrobe! It's comfortable and adds shape to structured dresses!
This jacket has a nice shape with some small shoulder pads and a hook closure in the front. I like the scrunched bracelet sleeves for something different.
I loved the permanently pushed up sleeves, doesn't button. There's a fastener in the middle

links_reviews_title: Much better in person than in this pic
links_reviews_text: Professional and stylish -- loads of compliments. I kept the blazer to wear with jeans after returning the pants.
Veronica Beard does not disappoint. This was a nice pick me up for a day at work. This will be excellent with black jeans in cooler temps too.

A cool look exterior that cones full circle when you take it off - plaid on the outside with a striped lining sets off the form fitting shape. I rented the ensemble hut held back and paired it with black trousers and sleeveless tee.

links_reviews_title: So excited to wear Veronica Beard!
links_reviews_text: I love this designer's work wear pieces. This blazer was no exception.

This is a great jacket. It's unique and fitted and fun. The sleeves do NOT pull down. I like it though. This is not a typical V beard with the zipper and dickie but I loved it anyway. Wore it three times
I wore this black to work with an all black outfit. I loved the print. The fabric was soft and comfortable, but still structured. I recommend!

This fit very nicely and doesn't feel boxy at all, which I usually struggle with in blazers. I like the hook closure at the waist instead of the buttons, as you still got the look of the buttons but with a cleaner silhouette. 4 stars only because I hate sleeves that feel too short to be full sleeves, but too long to be short sleeves. That was mildly annoying, but I would definitely rent again. Also appreciated the full pockets so they were actually functional!
Great cut and print. Looks great with jeans.
I loved this blazer and would rent again. I'm seriously considering buying this blazer.
This blazer has lots of interesting details. The fabric is light so better for warmer weather. I had also rented the matching pants but felt that it was too much to wear them together.
Nice jacket looked nice with formal pants and with jeans. Is slightly larger / loose around the waist
Looks cute with ripped jeans and a tee. I was surprised that the fabric is kind of summery.

I rented these for a business trip and but decided both the pants and the blazer were too much for the office. Last minute, I decided to wear the entire suit for drinks, with a tee shirt underneath. I got SOOOOOO many compliments! The blazer is lightweight enough that I was able to wear it in Florida without dying! And it moves without being stiff. All in all, I have no complaints! It worked pretty well for an impromptu happy hour.

links_reviews_title: Really loved the coat but it smelled
links_reviews_text: Great cut and fit!
Wore for work and loved it. Really nice quality and fit was perfect on me

links_reviews_title: This jacket is so adorable! Just need to size up one size and it's golden!
links_reviews_text: A teensy but tight in the torso

I wore this blazer to a work meeting paired with black jeans, pumps, and a basic black cami for a casual yet professional & polished look. I added gold jewelry and belt to lend some sparkle. True to size as there was plenty of room in the size 6 on me, but it did not look sloppy. Would rent again!

This blazer is comfortable and cool - great for summer! I ended up ordering a size (or two) larger than usual - just because it was so great looking and I wanted it. If it was available, my usual size would have been a better fit.

Fun print, lots of compliments. I sized up like I always do in blazers for broad shoulders, but felt like I had plenty of room. Will wear a size smaller next time. I wore with a black tee and jeans. Will rent again!
Small through the shoulders, loved the details on the body & sleeves. Very well made

links_reviews_title: Second time rental, love it as much as I did last time.
links_reviews_text: I rented this piece again because I loved it so much the first time. Such a unique yet still work appropriate blazer. My mom commented that it looked like a tailor made it just for me - the quality is very noticeable. Would love to buy, I'm keeping an eye on this one for a sale!
This blazer flattered my strong hourglass shape and fit my waist well, but it does have strong, 80s-style shoulders. Be sure you like that shape when requesting this blazer
Seems short for my height and it wasn't able to close. The matching pants in "my size" were too big too.

This wasn't available in my usual size 4 so I rented a 6. It was a little big, as expected, so it appears to run TTS. The sleeves are permanently scrunched which was great (Veronica Beard jackets are always too long in the arms for me, so this eliminated to need to roll up). Nice light-weight jacket that was perfect for summer.

links_reviews_title: The tiniest bit big but ultra-comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: Be prepared for an adorable look. It's a little big, I could have sized down, but I got tons of compliments and I would buy it in a second at a lower price.
Very high quality, nice fitting blazer for work or can be dressed down with jeans and a tee shirt
The shoulder pads were not too much! Just enough to really pull it together and make it look nice

links_reviews_title: This was nice for a casual WFH sweater. Easy to throw on comfortable and like the different colors.
links_reviews_text: Loose fit super comfy.
soft and fits great
Great for a lazy weekend. Can dress up with leather jacket if needed. Comfortable.
Nice design
I love this little top! It's soft and comfortable and pairs well with jeans or leggings. Might consider buying!

It was as cute on as it was in the pictures! Love the color blocking. I got it new with tags (yay!) and it fit perfectly, perfect for a slight front tuck into black denim for a casual work day look. Turtleneck fit is loose, not constricting at all!
This isn't a statement piece, but it's on trend and comfortable. It was an elevated casual look for me.
Average turtleneck!
I didn't like the bag with my outfit. Otherwise, it's a very nice quality item.
This is my new go to bag. I am considering buying it!

look, I love a good poly stretch. this dress, however, is made of a thick, cheap feeling poly stretch!! I was bummed. this particular fabric makes the print feel very lame! no offense to dress barn, but this is the type of mass produced material you'd find there. because of the material, and that is a fake wrap, it doesn't hang on the body like a pretty spring dress should. if it had been a light poly, it would be beautiful! happy I rented this during a wfh period :)
This blazer was great for a networking mixer I was hosting. Fun but professional, I got tons of compliments on it!
Have a bit of gold thread so wore during holiday season for a little extra fun. Great quality fabric. Would recommend for a work or fun outing.

links_reviews_title: Hard to give this one back..
links_reviews_text: I loved this for a work party. Fits like a glove, smaller in the arms if you have bigger arms. Fit me great. Wore with black pants and a white top.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blazer but too sparkly for work
links_reviews_text: I loved this blazer! The colors and fit are beautiful. Got it for work for a business casual environment but it was too sparkly. There are definitely lots of gold threads going through it. Ended up wearing it for dinner with friends and it was perfect.
Enjoyed wearing this to work! Lots of compliments. Perfect for right before the holidays, because there is some golden thread.

links_reviews_title: Nice jacket, but not flattering for large chest
links_reviews_text: Liked the material a lot, has a dash of sparkle to it. But felt it was a tad too snug, and seemed like it amplified my boobs spilling out above the closure, so I didn't wear it. Would have liked it if I had a smaller chest.

links_reviews_title: An elevated basic for night out or work night dinner.
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a Friday night out. Needed to leave work and immediately go to dinner and show. It has metallic thread so it's not your average blazer. Like all Amanda Uprichard pieces- structure is impeccable.
Fit true to size, looks great. I'd rent it again.

I never got to wear this jacket before I had to shift to working from home. Still, I tried it on and was planning to wear it to work over a black sheath dress. It's dressy and probably best for a more formal environment and/or evening event. I love it though!
I got a lot of compliments on this blazer. I do wish I had sized up as it runs a tad small. It's a show stopper with colors and uniqueness.

links_reviews_title: Very bright gold thread so too flashy for work
links_reviews_text: Is a nice jacket but didn't feel comfortable wearing to work as very bright. Was also small and couldn't button the jacket.
Love the material and overall look, but runs small. I have small shoulders and a slim upper body and the Small was still too tight. Had to send back without wearing. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a work blazer
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work event and got a ton of compliments. The gold threads add a nice touch and it's fun. Runs slightly small so I'd recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Could not Wear Way too Small!
links_reviews_text: I loved how this blazer looked, to me there is never enough sparkle and I was ready to wear this to work this morning with black pants and a black sweater. I ordered the large as suggested and I could not even get it over my arms yet alone onto my body. There is no way that it would have buttoned and was pulling in the back. I am very disappointed as I really liked this. I do not think the XL would have even fit me based on how small the large was and I do not have big arms, I am quite petite and normally a size 10-12. I would say that if you are above a size 8 this won't work for you. So sad.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jacket not for long arms or big busted women. Too short in the sleeves didn't wear
links_reviews_text: Runs small across chest. I'm 34DD it's really snug but I didn't wear as the sleeves were too short. Beautiful jacket, very sparkly

links_reviews_title: Lots of admiring stares and compliments!
links_reviews_text: Bust and arms fit snugly (definitely order in advance to try on and possibly exchange for XL)
Love this, got lots of compliments. A little tight in the bust.

This is a beautiful blazer. Tons of texture and multi-colored threads so you could wear it with any color. There is a prominent gold thread which makes it pop for sure, but lends itself to a more formal event. I found the small pulls slightly across the chest, which isn't unusual for me, but fit me more like an XS. If I was a slightly less busty, it would be perfect.
This jacket is much mire "party" attire than what I took from the images online. I rented it for work and did not wear it because it was too flashy. Probably great for a night out

This is a gorgeous jacket, but note that the cold is very prominent, and it's probably too dressy for work. However the main problem is that it runs extremely small. Are usually wear a XS or S in jackets but this one in S was too tight to wear, especially in the arms.
I loved this jacket. It was really warm and perfect for work in January. Only issue was it wasn't the perfect fit for my fuller bust- I wasn't able to wear the jacket closed.

links_reviews_title: I wore this on a work trip and mainly liked it. Looked good.
links_reviews_text: The glittery texture in this blazer really made it special. I usually get a L, but this XL fit on the snug side, so be mindful of fit details. My biggest complaint was when I took it off to use as a blanket on the plane, the scratchy fabric was very uncomfortable. Wearing it, the lining kept the fabric from the skin. So don't wear if you will be snuggled up to someone.

links_reviews_title: Pretty colors, but runs way small
links_reviews_text: I was excited to wear this to work, but it ran way too small in the arms and chest. I'd recommend sizing up. Colors are pretty
Super chic for date night. Worn with a blank silk tank & skinny jeans. The only downside, the collar was slightly itchy. Fits great in the arms.

Didn't expect the gold threads to be quite as flashy as they are in person. Might have been able to wear this to the last day of work before the holiday, but otherwise too much for a professional setting.
I liked the fabric but the sleeves were too short to wear, and they can't be rolled back, so I couldn't wear it
Beautiful quality. Got lots of comments. I wore the jacket a couple times. Unfortunately it runs small. I Usually wear size 12 and I couldn't close this jacket.
Not just normal tweed, shiny tinsel like stuff woven in. Cute for holiday parties. If you have muscular arms/shoulders, it will be tight...

links_reviews_title: Color is more beautiful in person
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect work blazer. It fits well (not good for an oversized look, if that is what you want). It is think and warm. And the gold threads make it look so luxe.
It wasn't work appropriate for me. More for a holiday event.

As another reviewer noted, this is a sparkly jacket, gold is shiny/metallic. I would recommend this for evening/going out/holidays. I would not wear to my office, but maybe that's just me. Beautifully constructed TTS blazer
Note - this is brighter and more metallic than in the photo. It's cute, but not great for a formal business meeting in my opinion.

Rented this just as a colorful blazer to wear at work, what I got was a party jacket. I could see wearing this to a holiday party with all the sparkle and color. Definitely too much for work. Not a bad blazer, but not what I was expecting.
The metallic thread is pretty obvious on this one. Cute blazer but a little small, I would size up if I re-rented

links_reviews_title: Great for work with a touch of bling
links_reviews_text: Loved this blazer. Easy to wear. Can wear it with dress pants or jeans.
I'm usually a 10/12 in jackets - this fit tight, and i should have sized up

I rented this for work but never ended up wearing this as it was too bodycon without the fabric being compressive enough for a curvy figure. The slits were much higher than expected; had it fit better, it would work nicely with tights and a cropped jacket for an office setting.

links_reviews_title: This dress caused me to get hit on while voting
links_reviews_text: Great everyday dress! Probably wouldn't recommend for summers in Texas but it was great for the overcast weather we've been having. Perfect fit! I wore it when I went to vote and a volunteer followed me out to my car to ask me out lol
Mixed prints can wear a variety of ways
Love live this. Keeping it to wear again. The fabric is thick and warm. It looks great without the sweater but weather was really cold. Works with a blazer, too.

Loved this dress so much. Wore it on a mild winter day and it was perfect with knee high boots. Got tons of compliments. Slits go up a bit high so not ideal for work but super fun for a brunch or date. Would definitely rent again. It stretches out a bit in the waist and hips as the day goes on

I wore this to work twice. One as a skirt (photographed) and again to a conference where I was presenting as a dress. Both times got raving reviews!! I almost didn't want to send this back. DEFINITELY a show stopper!!

Loved this dress! Wore at 17 weeks pregnant with second baby. Super comfy, stretch and flattering. Shows off the bump and sits tight in all the right places. Warm fabric so great for winter date night with a jacket. Loved the high neck, highly recommend!

Work this dress for work with leggings and boots in the winter. The material is a thicker sweater-like material so I'd still to wearing it in cooler months. Be aware the slits on the side do go up a bit high so this dress may need to be worn with leggings depending on personal or situational modesty The material is somewhat stretchy so fit my larger bust but I would recommend wearing with a shaper for those that don't have a narrow body type especially since this only goes up to size L.
Day to night, dress up or down, it's perfection!
Paired with long sleeve shirt under - added a belt for proportion. Many compliments throughout the day.

Dress is a body con fit. I wish it was a little more flattering for my body type, but overall it was really cute. The slits on the side are pretty high so probably not for work but was really cute for Christmas party

links_reviews_title: This Animal Print was perfect for party, dinner or even work with the right blazer!
links_reviews_text: I may have been better with an XL, but dress is very stretchy and comfortable. I wore with heels to dinner one night then leather boots another for a party. It's very comfortable and shows off my legs. I wish I could buy it, but for now I'll just rent it from time to time!

links_reviews_title: Love this. Stretch to fit perfectly. Great pattern and shape.
links_reviews_text: I would wear this every day.

I rented this piece while 29 months pregnant and the fit was horrible! The arm holes were quite long on me, making my bust look saggy, and the slits in the leg caused the bottom hem to ruffle weirdly (I think because it was being stretched by my belly). Nice, quality dress overall but would not recommend for pregnant women!
Wanted to love this dress but it isn't as I expected the fabric is a bit rough and isn't most flattering

I absolutely love this dress. It fits perfectly and the stretch in the heavy fabric is just enough to not worry about it getting baggy over time. I am considering buying this dress and will be holding on to it for now.
Great
Fit is like bodycon, but not overly sexy for work. Wore with thigh high boots so it's not too much leg either. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for the right occasion
links_reviews_text: Great looking dress! I rented the L and found it a little too big on top but fit nicely otherwise. It's a formfitting knit, but nothing a pair of Spanx can't smooth out. I didn't end up wearing it, as it wasn't right for the event I had, but my daughters and husband LOVED it so might have to rent again for the right one!

They didn't have my usual size small in stores but it looked like it ran smaller so I tried the medium. I'm glad I did as it fit perfectly! If you have hips, I'd definitely say size up. It does have a good amount of stretch but I felt like the medium fit perfectly without being too skin-tight. I don't usually like animal print but this print is beautiful and flattering on! I wore it for date night with a black long sleeve shirt and tights underneath. Would rent again!
Everyone loved this dress - including me! Very comfortable too :)
Got a lot of compliments whenever I wore this dress. It's a comfortable and flattering dress. Highly recommend.

I'm a size 4, small 34A and usually wear size M dresses, but glad I sized down to a S! Super comfortable and classy dress. The slits aren't obscenely high. Great for a date or even the office with black tights.
Comfortable, wore with tights (side slit is a bit high without tights)
Loved the dress. Was worried it might be too loud for work but was great with a blazer or sweater over and transitioned well for post work drinks.

The detail is pretty on front but back is different texture and like a solid blanket with no shape. Not flattering from behind at all and only so-so from front. Warm but it's on you to hold it closed; no buttons.

So warm, so cozy, so soft, not heavy, beautiful. The only annoying problem is the people stopping me constantly to talk to me about the coat. I have been wearing it daily. Like even for school drop off. In my pajama pants.

I rented this jacket for a 1920's themed wedding and it was perfect! The material is soft and luxurious. I was surprised at how warm the jacket was, we were outside in cool temps and I felt nice and cozy. I am 5'3 and the jacket hit at the top of my calf's. I read the reviews and sized down to a xs which was roomy but not too big. If I lived in cooler climates I would have purchased this jacket in a heartbeat!
Ran a little bit but still great for a NY broadway night. Would rent this again but a size smaller.
I rented this jacket for a business trip to NYC in December. I am OBSESSED. It's a big jacket- it's not tailored, and that it why I love it! It is very soft and comfortable.
I rented this for a wedding but it ended up being hot that day so instead I wore it out for a friend's birthday cocktail night. It runs big - size down.

links_reviews_title: Not sure I can send this back...
links_reviews_text: So incredibly glamorous, cozy, and soft. I am completely smitten with this coat. Do note that it hasn't got buttons or any closures- be prepared to pull it right for extra warmth and snuggly-ness!

links_reviews_title: Can I keep as a blanket?
links_reviews_text: So comfy and warm on a chilly fall night. Hits mid calf and is definitely more formal. Went perfect with my Gatsby themed gala attire. Side note - pockets are really deep, my phone got lost.

Warning...it has no button or snap or belt...no closure of any kind. Perfect oversized design...not too crazy big. Handy big pockets. Loved the two different kinds of 'fur' front and back. Good for Fall. Would have to wear something warm under for Winter.
So beautiful! It was an effortless, oversized piece that could be very formal or worn with jeans and booties. I wish I could have worn it more, but due to COVID we haven't left the house.
A little too oversized in my opinion. I had people telling me it looked like a robe on.

Wore this coat to a formal affair and it was so warm and comfortable that I didn't want to take it off. It was very large for me but since over sized coats are currently I still wore it. I got lots of compliments! Would rent again.

I got this for a funeral, rented XL so I had some room for fitting over dresses. This coat does not have any zipper or buttons, no way to cinch the fabric at all, so what you see if what you get. Not sure if an L would have been any different, I was looking for a large coat but wanted some shape to it- this has none. Things like this make me very glad for RTR bc has I invested in a coat I would have cried! Just unfortunately I looked like a walking wig- it's seriously so huge

links_reviews_title: Perfect for casual and formal occasions
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat! The material and texture had an Old Hollywood elegance. One friend who I hadn't seen in awhile hugged me and said, "You're so soft and fuzzy!" I wore it with jeans to a corner bar with friends and also to a family reunion. The only issue was that I wished I had gotten a size smaller. It was big and boxy on me but I wore it anyway. I can't wait to try it again in a smaller size.

This coat is amazing and I've kept it all winter. It's oversized and soft and feels like wearing a blanket. Because it doesn't close it's not the warmest coat around but the oversized fit allows you to wear plenty under it. The faux fur pattern on the front is interesting and different. Loved this!
I didn't end up wearing it because I didn't need it, but it would be perfect with any formal dress.

I kept this coat for multiple weeks as it worked well for dress and also with jeans and combat boots. Super soft and warm. My only criticism is the "mixed fur". The front has a beautiful texture and the back is plain. So in the mirror I felt it looked like two different coats almost- a dressy front and casual back. It does run large- size down.
Heavy fur coat, nice oversize shape, soft
Too big, size down for sure

links_reviews_title: Love! love this oversized, fun furry winter coat!
links_reviews_text: People stopped me on the street to compliment this coat!
Comfortable and warm coat, felt luxurious. No closure/belt

I've gotten so many compliments on this coat. It looks like genuine curly lamb and feels expensive (because it is LOL). It feels more evening'ish but I've definitely worn it with business clothes during the day. It will be coming with me to Paris in a few weeks!
Can't believe I don't have a photo of this one considering I held onto it for over a month. Great, classic coat. Considered purchasing even with the price. Size down.

links_reviews_title: So comfy but like a robe
links_reviews_text: Very comfy but I did feel like I was wearing a robe. It can be dressed up for a formal event but I just wore it to work and for running errands It definitely runs very large Be aware it doesn't close (no buttons or zipper)

links_reviews_title: Did not wear this. Too big & didn't like the velvet material.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this because I was swimming in it. It was very big and reminded me of Cruella De Vil.... The material is sort of velvet-y and I didn't like that. It was huge on me and I got an XS. I wouldn't recommend this rent. It kind of reminded me of something an old lady would wear.

links_reviews_title: its a really classy and super cozy coat. would buy it if it weren't so expensive
links_reviews_text: baggy
Perfect Coat to wear to a formal event on a cold night.

links_reviews_title: Day to evening fall transition coat
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat! Effortless glam for day to evening wear for fall transitional weather. I received tons of compliments and strongly considering purchasing. Definitely recommend renting as this is my first review.

Got the coat for a holiday party, and ended up keeping it for a couple of weeks. Perfect for wearing over party clothes but it can also transition to work (assuming you have a fairly formal dress code). It doesn't close and runs big, so keep that in mind.

links_reviews_title: This is a bathrobe with fur in the back
links_reviews_text: When I put this on, my husband started laughing and said "it looks like a VERY expensive bathrobe" and I knew immediately I wouldn't wear it lol. There is fur only on the backside, which is odd. It also doesn't close so it's not ideal for truly cold NYC days. It's very cozy and long. Not my style, but I can see how someone might style this bathrobe well for a casual day haha
Ordered during third trimester, looks like a bath robe. It says oversized in description, should have sized down... it's enormous.
Soft, beautiful and warm! Definitely runs large.

Yes, it is oversized, but I think it is supposed to fit that way. If you want a slimmer fit, you could size down as this may overwhelm smaller gals. There is another faux fur coat by Unreal Fur available that does run smaller and is less volumous. That said, this is truly a unique high quality coat and will be sure to make a statement. Note, it does not have any closures to keep it closed.
Beautiful coat but it's very oversized. I would order again but size down.

Loved this coat. I rented it for a quick work trip to Chicago. It was warm. It was bright. It was beautiful. Coat runs true to size. It is an oversize look, so I liked it best open. It was great for a lot of layers.

I absolutely love this jacket. The color is gorgeous and the perfect pink to wear with everything. I've gotten so many compliments. It fits a bit oversized but I love that look. Length is perfect. 10/10!
Works totally rent again!
