Wore this coat to work on Valentine's Day in this outfit and then paired it with a Sexy LBD for valentines dinner. Was perfect for the occasion - would rent again in spring for color!

Amaaaazing feel, color, quality and fit! I got sooo many compliments and felt amazing (and happy with the pop of color!) every time I wore it. Love it and think about buying it even now as we enter spring. I'd say is true to size but definitely in the slouchy look. However, probably size down. I rented it in a second ocasión but in S instead of XS and was too slouchy.

This winter has been really gray and cold in Minnesota… This came just in time for a short quasi-warmer spell a.k.a. high 20s and lower 30s. With a chunky sweater there is plenty of room and it'll keep you warm in that kind of weather. Obviously it's not gonna be for the deep freeze. However I just love being able to wear a thick fun sweater and a coat because right now I only have one coat that I can wear a thick sweater with. This is so fun and so bright and I love it so so much.

This coat might be my favorite ever. It is the perfect fashion piece for a trip to NYC. It's oversized, so definitely size down. Super warm for 30-40 degree weather. Stands out without being too much!

I will try this in a smaller size when available. I found it to be an inverted triangle shape, with super broad shoulders and arms, yet a normal-sized hip. I am busty with narrow hips, so this should have been no problem for me . . . but really, I looked like a linebacker in it.

An annoying part about winter is everyone looking the same in their heavy coats. This was such a fun way to add a pop of color to my normal wardrobe of all black everything. My only complaint is the the shoulders feel super wide in this coat, but if you don't mind an oversized fit it's great!
This was definitely oversized, but very cozy & comfortable.

The other reviews are a bit negative but I LOVE this coat so much. Definitely has a bit of an oversized look but it's not too baggy. You can actually wear a chunky sweater without your arm circulation getting cut off. Will rent this again!! Huge fan

Loved the raspberry color for fall/winter transition! I wore this to work as well as to a nighttime networking rooftop event. This was an oversized boxy coat that runs large (which I didn't mind for the outfit) so will need to order a XS next time to see if it fits better since I'm petite. I wore it on a 30ish degree day in NY and hat to pair with a turtleneck scarf and gloves and was able to stay warm. That said, for extremely frigid days I'd go with a puffier coat.

links_reviews_title: Easy shape that pairs well with just about everything!
links_reviews_text: As many have said before me, this has an oversized fit. The fabric isn't that heavy, so much so that I could possibly imagine wearing it on a cool spring night. This shape went well with just about everything I wore for the whole month that I held onto this, so it's extremely versatile too!
color is outstanding, lining is a treat. however, it fits like a bathrobe with zero tailoring at the waist and no split in the back
Gorgeous coat but the sizing recommendations are way off. Just get your normal size if not a little smaller.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this coat. It ran far too big.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this coat. It ran far too big.

links_reviews_title: Love this. Adds a pop of color for dress or everyday.
links_reviews_text: The fit is large, but the collar can pop, as well as the color. Love this coat and can be dressed up or down.
Gorgeous oversized bright raspberry coat! I wore it with everything. Feels super lux. A must rent.

links_reviews_title: Surprised how much I love this
links_reviews_text: During the winter I'm typically in all darker shades or black so having this coat is a little bit out of my comfort zone. But I absolutely love wearing it. The color is a deep rich pink. It's definitely looser fitting but can be worn for anything - errands or work or a night out. It isn't very thick but fine for the mild winter we've been having in NJ/NY when you pair it with a thick scarf and sweater.
It's a beautiful jacket but it's oversized, so it didn't suit my height.

links_reviews_title: Lovely coat and color but not good for cold winters!
links_reviews_text: The coat is a great oversized coat and the color is beautiful. However, wearing it in NYC during January was a huge mistake--the two front buttons are not nearly enough to keep the coat closed and the wind out. May be better for spring.

It's huge. I'm all about an oversized coat, but at 5'4" 118lbs (slim athletic build), this was still just too big. The drop shoulder and boxiness might work on someone taller, but my height and size were just swallowed by the coat. Wanted to love it because the color is gorgeous, but just not the right coat for me.

The color was very nice and popping, perfect for a winter. The cut is cocoon like, which naturally gives a "oversize" vibe, but I am still surprised to see how big it looks on me. I guess it is just not my style.

links_reviews_title: Finally a tasteful pop of color to add to my everyday work looks!
links_reviews_text: The fit was absolutely fabulous and quite flattering. I loge a good structured coat! With a thick sweater underneath, this coat was perfect for the Boston weather. It added a nice pop of color to my monochromatic looks! Would rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Oversized but hard to move in
links_reviews_text: Beautiful bright pink color. The oversized pockets hit me at the wrong place and even though the arms were wide (good with bulky sweaters) I found it difficult to move my arms while driving. Just not practical for me!
Beauty. Love the rich color
This dress was great. Warm and had a nice stretch to it. It was perfect for work.

Wore this for a real estate open house. Felt confident and supported in all the right places. Asymetrical flap at waist really disguises a full belly and hip area, such as mine! Neckline is super flattering for a fuller bust. The scuba knit is wrinkle free and form fitting. Inside is meticulously lined with a breathable fabric that's slick for comfort, acts as a substitute for a slip. This is my "go to" power suit lately.

I wore this to a special presentation for work. I had to travel a lot in this dress, and I loved that it didn't wrinkle!! It fit like a glove! I have large upper arms, but it fit just right. The neckline was a tad bit lower than I'd like, but I wore a minimizing bra with it and it looked business appropriate this way. I did wear spanx pantyhose with it to make sure I didn't have any oddly shaped bumps, but the neoprene material really didn't need anything. I adore this dress!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a tea party and got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: So comfy, nice flattering stretch. Zipper gets stuck at waistline but it wasn't a problem. Want to own this versatile piece!
This dress added some fun to a work day. It is on the thick side and is perfect for cold weather.
Took a while to find something just right but loved this dress. The material and make is high quality scuba type material that smooths over everything
The fabric is thicker and so comfortable, no spanx needed. I wore this for 12 hours at a conference and it was comfortable all day. Loved it
This dress is very comfortable- curve hugging. I did think the neckline was a little low for me for work- I work a scarf with this dress to the office.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!!! Would be amazing for an interview or speaking engagement.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs a tad small but fit according to recommendations.

I really really wanted to love this one, especially because of the ruffle details in the midsection for my tummy (which do help), but the material makes it very hard to put on without help (the zipper in the back plus lack of stretch=ehh) for getting it on..and my stomach did show on the side without the ruffle, I thought it would hold in more. Also! I am chest heavy and in this dress my boobs were mildly inappropriate for work. Very cute just think it's for someone less curvy than myself follow me! @courtcarterdejesus :)
Loved this dress. Felt like a boss. Slightly warm for Florida "Fall" but it was fine inside.

This fabric is heavy and not breathable but it came out of my suitcase with no wrinkles! And the ruffle at the waist is super fun and flattering. The neckline was lower than I would normally wear to work but i think it was ok for one day. I would love to purchase this dress but I'll have to stick to renting for now.
Loved the material and got so many compliments on it. Didn't wrinkle on my various drives. Also my super small boobs didn't ruin the outfit like they normally do!! Highly recommend.

Fit was perfect and so was the material. I would 100% rent again. This designer never does me wrong. Fit true to size. I rented for corporate headshots. This is the dress you want but not for buying just to wear sometimes. The perfect rental and price.

This dress is a true scuba material - pretty thick and spongy, for lack of a better word. I was it was a bit tighter so that it appeared more sleek Overall the dress fit well, but I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too tight at the hips for me.
links_reviews_text: Too tight
Pretty dress. I got lots of compliments. The fabric was really thick so I wouldn't recommend for summer. I'd rent it again.

I wore this dress to a big work meeting. I traveled in it to the meeting and it was the perfect choice. The scuba material made it comfortable and not wrinkled. I got compliments from strangers in the airport!
Didn't fit. So make sure you order the right size. Bummed. Really. 1st order. I'll get the next shipment right.

I normally wear an 18 or 20 in dresses, but 20 or 22 in pants, so decided to size up a size to maintain the smooth sheath look. That turned out to be a good choice. While I was worried at first that the top looked boxy on me due to size, it quickly settled in - it looked appropriately highly structured. The fabric was great for a winter dress, and the overall effect was super professional. I would absolutely rent again for #bosslady days.
Really wanted to like this but it was too tight in the hips...may size up and try again before it gets too warm.
It was a beautiful dress and thick fabric but a very awkward fit for my body type. Shoulders two wide, neckline too low, unflattering length.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and great structure
links_reviews_text: The scuba like fabric is great for hiding the little bumps and panty lines. I got a ton of compliments. I usually run in 14s but got this in a 16 and it fit like a glove. Only downside is the v neck makes things a little booby for the bigger chested girls
I planned on wearing to judge the interview portion of a pageant, it is way too big to look good unfortunately. Would have been a great choice if I sized down!

links_reviews_title: The fit was very flattering on a curvy body. Very classy.
links_reviews_text: Thick material, no sweat would show through. Perfect cut.

links_reviews_title: Great for photos. Fit nicely and flatters a curvy shape. Was a bit difficult to zip without help.
links_reviews_text: This dress would be good for work with a blazer, although the neckline is a bit low. Great for weddings and other occasions. The color is beautiful and would be flattering on any skin tone. Also, it was great on length for tall women
Great fit, loved the material.

links_reviews_title: Felt elegant and refine for an alumni reception; perfect dress for a confidence boost.
links_reviews_text: Pros: The fabric is absolutely luxurious and its weight is very flattering for plus size bodies. I liked the asymmetrical peplum detailing, but the highlight of this dress for me is the tailoring through the shoulders and décolletage. Haven't decided if I will purchase, but will likely rent again. Cons: None.
Fit great, hughes my curves!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, the material is comfortable, the neckline is elegant- absolutely loved it.
links_reviews_text: I'll rent again! It was perfect.
The material is very thick and it also runs large, so this dress felt bulky and huge. It also gapped a lot in the chest. Did not wear.
very elegant. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, sexy dress. Wish it would have fit me differently. Wrap in front hides a little "belly".
links_reviews_text: A little too low cut for me. Could have been a little too large in the shoulders for me.

links_reviews_title: Leading a business meeting, I felt confident being the center of attention
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress, great fit. A little loose across the back. Perhaps because I'm petite.
The shoulder fit was odd, but it ran big everywhere else which means I can actually go down a size which is nice. It looked good overall!

links_reviews_title: Everyone really love this dress. I haven't had what I consider a power suits or power dress in a lol
links_reviews_text: They didn't have the size that I needed so I went up a size or two. I usually wear a 16 or an 18. This was a 20. it still fits so well. I absolutely adore the fabric. I believe it's kind of scuba knit. That kind of fabric is thick and forgiving 2 anything you want to hide. The color was perfect and I love that peplum. It was even cuter because it was half a peplum LOL. Everyone immediately love me in this dress. I am probably going to rent it again in the future.

This dress is wonderful! I wish I could afford to own it. The material is thick high quality and true scuba material that hugs your body in all the right places but still hides flaws. It is a great choice for fall as it's a thicker fabric worth 3/4 length sleeves. I paired it with a black jacket for work. It came slightly below my knees in flats which was perfect for my style but taller ladies may find it too short for work. I sized up, I am normally a 12 but got a 14 based on the recommendations of others and it fit me like a glove. I would recommend sizing up. The little ruffle at the waist is great for hiding your stomach if it's a problem area for you. I wore a cami under it as it was a bit low cut for work but for going out it would be fine. The dress can easily go from day to evening.
It looked great! Form fitting. Appropriate for formal occasions. The material itself is soft and high quality. I received many compliments.
Classy dress, but made for wearing in the later fall and winter. If you have a tummy it will highlight this.
Can't even zip up.
Really awesome around the ankles. Makes you look tres chic! Comfy. A bit wide of a waist, but just wear a belt and you're good!
Def casual, good overall fit.
32R should fit me, given measurements, but these were too tight - couldn't do up the buttons. Otherwise super cute. Wish I could have worn them!

Very good quality and lovely fit (if I stood still). I returned these before wearing them as they were a bit snug in the thighs when I tried them on. As others have said, there's zero give, so I went up a size thinking that I could accommodate the stiffness, but it just resulted in a saggy waist. I'd recommend these—just for someone with smaller thighs :)

links_reviews_title: These jeans were very small, much closer to a 0

links_reviews_text: I normally wear 27-28. I couldn't even close the 28. But it is great quality and they overall would have looked nice
I'm a 16, wear 33s from madewell and 14 or 16 from Loft . Couldn't get these on. Too bad. Love the look.
Obsessed with these jeans. I'm usually a 27 and the 28 was perfect. Started to feel a little stretched out by the 3rd wear, but they don't feel like they have any stretch to them
Really like these! Definitely size up, they have no stretch and run a little snug, especially in the hips/thigh. Good quality!
I'm usually a 25 or 26 and got the 26 which fit great. The length is a little long on me but cute to roll up. I love the grey wash color
Im a true size 27 and these felt more like a 26. They have absolutely no stretch or give, so keep that in mind as well. Still super cute though, so I'll rent again in one or two sizes up next time.
I am an nanny and wore these while rolling around with a 1 year old. And they aren't stretched at all! Love!
Excellent fit, form and wash (color). Pair was showing some rear in the back end- but still a decent pair.
Perfect for regular wear. Not at all thin. Great silhouette.

Overall, I liked the wash of these jeans but prefer a higher rise. These were too low rise for me and made me uncomfortable throughout the day. I prefer a higher rise so I feel more confident when I'm out and about.
These jeans are so comfortable I'm not taking them off!!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable at beginning of day
links_reviews_text: Jeans are super comfy and stretchy to start day, but by the end of the day, the jeans were stretched out and didn't look as good.
Super comfortable and would definitely rent again.

Loved the jeans but I started the day with a comfortable fit and ended it by needing to pull them up constantly. They stretch out quite a bit. I'd probably size down if I wanted to try this Jean again.

links_reviews_title: These were so easy to wear - dress up or down - love them!
links_reviews_text: The only issue i had with them is, yes, they did stretch out a bit after wearing a couple times...

links_reviews_title: Loved the jeans but they stretched out quickly
links_reviews_text: These jeans were so cute! I loved the darker wash and the details on the back pocket. They fit really well but stretched out a lot throughout the day. I'm usually around a 27, so maybe I'll try a smaller size next time.
The fit is perfect. Comfortable - did not have to pull up all the time like some jeans.

These jeans are soft and stretchy, and a great length - just long enough without needing to fold/cuff. Super cute with flats or dressed up with heels. They did stretch quite a bit, so would recommend going smaller if you're in between.

links_reviews_title: Love these pants!!! Mother is my go-to jean brand!!
links_reviews_text: They should be ankle for most people, as I am 5'10" they are a bit shorter, but so cute and comfortable!
I love Mother denim and this pair is as comfy as I expected. Only 4 stars because I didn't find them to be that flattering. Good every day staple though!

links_reviews_title: Great jeans, fantastic fit and super comfy
links_reviews_text: Loved these jeans; they look small but that stretch is truly magical! Made me feel really fantastic but just a tiny bit too short for me with longer legs! Otherwise great jeans, worked well with my closet for a casual Friday.

These jeans fit true to size for me, I ordered my normal size 27 and they fit like a glove. They are buttery soft and very stretchy. The only con for me was that they were a bit too cropped, I am 5'7. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Too long. Lighter wash than expected.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for everyday wear. The jeans were too long and got loose during the day. I would size down. The wash is also lighter than what I expected.
Solid pair of mid rise, medium wash denim. Extremely comfortable. Only downside is they stretch out a half size with wear. Love the raw hem!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear... soft enough for quarantine WFH if you want to feel a bit professional
links_reviews_text: I like the wide-leg style and soft fabric of these a lot. I usually wear a 4-6 and am a chronic sizer-upper, but I ordered a 4 based on review that said they're sized to the waist and not hip. Unfort, these were not accommodating on my hourglass hips... I would still say they're TTS as I am often between sizes. I am 5'4" and would wear these with 2+ inch heels. I still liked the style of these and if I have a chance to wear with heels, I'd try again, one size up.
Fits true to size. Super versatile. Only problem was the hem had come out so I had to pin it back up.
I'm obsessed with these trousers. This is one of the first rental pieces I've gotten that I don't want to return!! They're incredibly comfortable and super easy to dress up or down

I wore these for a work day. And I love them so much I am going to wear them to a weekend birthday party before sending them back. They are super soft, great quality and fit well. The material is fairly thin so not for a winter day unless you wear tights underneath.

Sooo soft and comfortable I actually felt like I was wearing my pajamas to work it was great. The pants are extremely loose and flowy throughout the leg so pick your size based off your waist!! I usually wear a 4 because of my thighs but I have a smaller waist and so with these pants the 2 fit much better than the 4!

links_reviews_title: Not my normal style trousers but LOVED!!!
links_reviews_text: I wouldn't normally gravitate towards plaid wide leg trousers but I decided to give these a try and I'm so glad I did. I paired them with an oversized blouse and sneakers for a more fashion look and I loved it. I am 5'10 and normally wear a size 2/4 pants and these fit great and were long enough which is usually a challenge for me.

I rented these for my trip to Paris. I'm usually an 8 but these were a touch big. I'll definitely rent again but maybe go for a size smaller! They're also pretty long so you have to wear a small heel with them depending on height.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed. So comfy - will rent again.
links_reviews_text: These were so cute with a bodysuit and vans. Could dress it up for night time with booties and a sexier bodysuit too. Would buy these if they were less expensive. 100% will rent again

One of my favorite rentals so far, without a doubt!!! I wish I had taken a better picture (came out really dark and I tried adjusting the lighting edits), but these pants are a beautiful material and I felt soooo confident in them. I wore them 3x to work, and bought a similar pair from Zara afterwards because I loved the style so much! Great for work, but would also look really cool dressed down. Will rent again.
Great pattern, fit, and overall look- just loved it!
These pants are great but they get loose by the end of one wear. Next time I would size down.

links_reviews_title: Great pants, didn't like the pleats.
links_reviews_text: Loved the pants, the pleats didn't work for my waistline though.
Fun, navy and gray plaid pants. Looked cute with a white blouse and wedge.

links_reviews_title: Rented for bridal shower in SOHO.
links_reviews_text: They're Awesome! I'm going to buy these. They fit great! Very thin, could wear tights under winter. I wore with the Cedric blouse and Frye boots. Received so many compliments! Great outfit!
Ran large, very long inseam. Versatile, able to wear with several colors and color combinations.

links_reviews_title: Fit beautifully - thinner material, not itchy.
links_reviews_text: Overall great pant but unremarkable.

I loved these pants! I wore them a few times- with a turtleneck and boots for work, with a T-shirt and cropped cardigan with sneakers on the weekend. Got many compliments each time. Lightweight fabric with a high waist, but dark navy color can be worn any time of year.
Fit perfectly! Surprisingly comfortable. The high waist makes it very flattering. Had to wear heels due to the length.
SO SOFT!! and for a wide leg pair of pants, surprisingly versatile

links_reviews_title: Feels like I am wearing PJ's but stylish for any event.
links_reviews_text: Great pants for a taller woman. Easy to pair w navy or grey sweaters. Perfect for work or out to dinner. LOVE

Got tons of compliments whenever I wore this, they were super fun. The length is on the long side (wear heels) and I think because of that, the pair I got came with a torn hem that I had to tape up. I also found I had to iron these between wearings. But other than that, loved these and would rent again.
Great fit. Great pants. SO much fun to wear.
Loved these for work, fit true to size. They are very light weight but wrinkle a little easily.
Loved these pants, would've purchased but too expensive.

links_reviews_title: Cute cut - thin fabric, so not perfect for cold days!
links_reviews_text: Great work edit with a light sweater
it was a little too casual for work but it was really nice for a weekend out with friends

links_reviews_title: So cute for work! Definitely size up.
links_reviews_text: Usually I am a 4/6, but I am glad I listened to the other reviewers in regards to sizing. I am 5' 10" and these are the only pants I have ever ordered that are long enough to wear as is without being cropped. Love love love them and would definitely rent again. They are very light and soft, so comfortable to wear at the office all day!
Went a size up due to other reviews, but probably wasn't necessary. Length was perfect for me - wore with 3" heel boots

links_reviews_title: Good work pant, but you have to be tall or know how to sew.
links_reviews_text: These pants run true to size, I am sure, though this meant the 8 was a bit big in the waist (I am usually in between sizes 6 and 8). Add to this the fact that the pants are very very long, and I had to temporarily hem them in order to wear them. The fabric is a bit thinner than I had expected. That said, they were very cute with a heel, and worked well for my board meeting.

These pants were high waisted, super flattering fit and really soft material! Wore with a white cashmere turtle neck and gold belt at work, got at least one compliment every hour I'd see someone new in the office!! My only complaint: these babies are LONG. Like, thank god I had 3 inch heels to wear long. Will definitely need to be fashion taped if you're wearing with flat shoes, i"m 5'7 for reference

links_reviews_title: Love these but they are too short!
links_reviews_text: These were beautiful, fit perfectly except they were too short for my preference. I wanted a bit of puddling but even with chunky sneakers, it just looked awkward to me. Might be better with an ankle bootie or if you're a couple inches shorter than me. I'm 5'8 and they hit right at my ankle.
I love the fit of these pants and the style. I wish they were a little thicker, because I live in MN and it gets cold. But that's my own fault!

links_reviews_title: Received two compliments about these pants!
links_reviews_text: Overall - Looks nice and has pockets. A little tight in the back.Surprisingly, not lined

links_reviews_title: The fabric and the print are great.
links_reviews_text: I loved the pants but couldn't wear them because they are too long for me. I might buy them so I can get them hemmed. I love the pants.

These pants are amazing. Felt like a powerful business woman wearing them. They are a bit long but I am 5'7" and rented a size four and was able to wear them with flats. Heels may have been a bit better though. Waist is true to size and the material is so comfy. Felt like I was wearing pajamas all day
I normally wear an 8 and I got a 10 and it was a little tight. The pants were too long also. Wish I could have worn them. They are really nice.
I thought these were going to be heavier, but they are made of very lightweight material. I didn't wear them but they fit well and I'll try again when the weather is warmer.

links_reviews_title: Wasnt able to wear them. Which was very disappointing bc i so excited about renting them.
links_reviews_text: The fit on the waist was tight and the length was way to long> i would have to be 5'9 to wear them.

Great item but was too short for me as a dress. Might try again in the summer with biker shorts for some coverage but liked it as a layering item instead. Ran true to size but def be warned about length- check PDs for measurements.

links_reviews_title: Picture does not capture the cool factor!
links_reviews_text: I love Ganni, and i love this dress. It is super comfortable and stylish. The details like stitching, pockets and buttons set it apart from being just a black denim shirt. The fabric is soft, perfect weight - not flimsy, stiff or thick for a denim. Loved everything about it.

This shirt dress showed up fresh with tags on and I was so excited to wear it. I am 5'11 and was worried about the length, but the 38 worked out just fine and fit well throughout the body. Ganni is one of my favorite brands so I was very pleased to see this added to the selection of options. Great for work or play!
It was an ok dress. Casual and kind of cute.
Love the long adjustable cross body strap. Cute purse. 2 sides open up.
Size up. They run very small! I am between sizes , got the larger size and still very small.

links_reviews_title: Thought it was black but it's actually blue! Still love.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and the buttons are very flattering IMO. A perfect example of something I would probs never buy but love to rent.
Nice blouse for a night out or work...very thin material so be sure to layer in cold weather!
Good quality silk blouse.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and fabric. Did not wear as sleeves too long
links_reviews_text: This runs large so size down. I ordered a small but sleeves were way to long.

Loved this. It is navy, but I ended up wearing it under a black skirt suit for a work conference. It looked great, was comfortable all day and I got a lot of compliments. I also wore it with jeans later in the night.

links_reviews_title: The perfect amount of pink and purple!

links_reviews_text: This is definitely snug in the waist and shorter than I typically wear. Fun dress
I love the dress, but the cleavage area is too open. The clasp does not hold at all. I would recommend it for a night out but that's all.

This dress was adorable. I wore it for a networking meeting that I was running and it looked cute and stylish. It was really comfortable too. I was so happy with it. If I wore it again though, I would wear a camisole or lace bralette underneath because it was definitely low cut.

The picture says it all: this dress is a lovely color and a great fit. I have broad shoulders but didn't find the puff sleeves too much. The deep v neckline was flattering and not too deep for me for a date, but definitely too deep for a work or family event. The length didn't feel short at all with tights underneath. Extremely comfortable, even after a multi-course meal. I plan to rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and easy to wear! Great for leggy ladies!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! We were filming at an all day festival so I had to be able to move around a lot and still feel cute for 10+ hours straight! I'm 6'3 and loved how my legs looked!
Loved the print and received multiple compliments in the office! This runs just a little big, if you're between sizes I would size down
Beautiful fabric and ruching on the sides, hiding minor tummy mistakes. The neckline is pretty low though. The puffy sleeves are cute. All in all, I felt good in it.

This dress is perfection. Just the right length to show off your legs without being scandalous. Boob coverage even for the large chested. If worn with tights and a tank/shell, it could work for the office.
Wore this out in Vegas. Was perfect - cute, flirty and comfortable

This dress is really fun. I ordered a size up than my usual because the bottom is fitted and I have large hips - and the bottom fit perfectly. The top was a little large but still wearable. The ruffle detail is beautiful, as is the print. If your stomach isn't flat, you will definitely see it. The fabric is very silk with a lining and feels very luxurious, even compared to other Parker dresses I own.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this dress. This is the second timeI have rented it and I love it!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is really soft and comfortable. The style is flattering. I usually wear a 0-2 and in this dress I had to go to a 4-6.

This dress is super cute and can be multi-seasonal. Pair with tights and booties during colder months and bare legs and strappy heels for warmer months. It's comfortable and fits well - love the print and the detail on the sleeves.

The dress is super cute, but it was just too tight. RTR suggested an 8 or a 10 for me and I ordered the 8 which was, unfortunately, too small. The button at the chest would pop open unless I held it shut! Might return the size 8 and try the size 10, but may just pass on this one. Very cute and fun dress. Material seemed like it would be comfortable to move around in all day.
Loved the style and quality but it runs small.

Beautiful colors and fabric, and the dress fit nicely. I wore with high-heeled black sandals, could also be worn with black tights. I pushed up the sleeves and they stayed in place because of the ruching. The only complaint is that there is a little snap that holds the faux wrap top together, and when I moved too much it popped wide open. Cleavage city and I was on a first date, so a little embarrassing. I sent back after one wear for this reason.

Fits true to size and very flattering. Great for petite sizes. The ruffle on the side made the dress very forgiving for those who may be self conscious about their middle area. Loved it and would def rent again for a similar occasion!
If you have bigger boobs, they will be popping out a little. I have 36D and I had a ton of cleveage so I couldn't wear it. The fit was true to size and it was comfortable. Hit mid thigh
Very colorful. I got a lot of compliments. Low cut but a little cami worked well. Would definitely consider wearing this again!

links_reviews_title: Big in chest, right through hips
links_reviews_text: I sized up to give myself room through the hips... it ended up being huge through the chest, and pretty tight through the hips even after sizing up. It's definitely best suited for a straighter body type unless you like your dresses to really cup the booty!
Kinda tight for me! But fun and pretty. Low cut, def needed a cami
Best. Jeans. Ever.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not a great fit for hourglass shapes
links_reviews_text: Was really excited about these and overall no huge issues. I'm typically a size 27 and have a very small waist but a wider bum and hips, so I struggle with fits for bottoms. I liked the elastic waist so was hoping these would be a bit smaller in the midsection. They had a big gap in the back for me and were quite tight around the bum area which is pretty revealing ... needed to wear a long top to cover up the back.

links_reviews_title: Love! Super cute albeit somewhat casual.
links_reviews_text: Cool, hip easy jean. Very flattering from the back with no pockets. Somewhat flattering from the front. Not very high waisted, but high enough. I have a long torso so the higher the waist, the better. My only issue is there isn't a ton of stretch and they felt a tiny bit constricting at times. They're a little thick so seem like a casual jean. I think they'd look great with a cropped tee and sneakers for an every day outfit. I loved them and would consider buying if the price went down.

links_reviews_title: I never wanna return these jeans!
links_reviews_text: To. Die. For! These are so flattering and the pockets are really big, they held my iphone with ease.
mom jeans done right. warning: no back pockets but when worn high-waisted the fit is still flattering. cool seams down the front and a paper bag waist for good measure.
Pretty thick denim. I love how these are just different enough to make my outfit feel edgy.
I found these true to size. The waist has an elastic stretch that hugs your waist. I probably could have sized down, but I liked the relaxed feel of these jeans.

I'm normally a 28, but know this brand runs small. Only a 30 was available so I thought I'd try it. The 30 fit, but idk if the 29 would have. The jeans are cool, but they're more straight cut than skinny, which I didn't love. Overall, very cool, runs small, would maybe rent again

links_reviews_title: So this is how it feels to wear $$$ jeans
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous! The elasticized waist was a stylish addition... I love the fit and the quality is fresh.
Fit perfectly. I'm short and have issues with length and these were perfect.

Liked the style a lot but they didn't fit exactly right and I ended up feeling like I had to keep pulling them up. A smaller size would have been too tight in the legs. I think they'd fit someone with a straight or skinny figure best.
I rented these in a size up from my normal size and they buttoned, but were so tight and unflattering I didn't end up wearing them!
I usually wear a 29 and sized up to a 30. They fit perfectly!
Both in the waist and hips

links_reviews_title: Cute comfortable jeans but stretch our throughout the day.
links_reviews_text: These jeans were super cute but they did stretch out as the day went by. I sized up for more of a mom jean look which fit perfectly at first but then the waist along with the rest of it got baggy. Only wore it once because of it but I'd definitely size down as they stretch.
I always wear a size 26 in jeans but these were a little tight in the butt! Super cute and will definitely be ordering in a size up

Great update for me - the crop was just right. The pockets perfect and the front seam a great touch. Easy to wear. Perfect with a bootie. Got compliments. Typically wear a 29, so these were slightly big for me, but they felt great anyway.

links_reviews_title: Great jeans if you go up a size
links_reviews_text: If you want a fit like the model you should definitely go up a size. I read the reviews and got one size up and they fit perfectly and were really cute

links_reviews_title: Best pair of jeans I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: Words cannot describe how much I love these jeans. I will cry when I return them haha. They are by far the most flattering and comfy jeans I have ever worn.
True mom jeans, elastic and all! Cute if that's your thing. I did go up a size in these. Fit like other Mother brand jeans
Fit great under oversized sweaters

I read other reviews stating that these run small so I opted for a 27 instead of my normal 26 and they were right ! I'm not tall, so these jeans weren't ankle jeans for me. For reference I'm 5'4" with a 30" inseam and they were the perfect length. Love how they're high waisted and the elastic band waistband was great. Loved them so much I'm considering buying them.
I'm usually a 28 but went for 29 for a baggier fit and they were great

links_reviews_title: They are a cute take on jeans.
links_reviews_text: No back pockets with give them a different look and I believe they had an elastic waste. They were comfy and cute.

Love these jeans. Run true to size, I am a 27 or 28 and rented the 27 in these given the elastic waist. They were a bit tight but loosened up as the day went on. Good change up from basic jeans! Will rent again.
The guy does run small especially in the butt and thighs so make sure to size up a size.

links_reviews_title: Cute but just not for me!
links_reviews_text: They were actually super cute but none of my shoes looked right with them so I returned them the same day I got them. I might rent them again if I figure out that fashion dilemma!
If you need extra stretch in the thighs or hips, either size up or look elsewhere.
Thick sweater and fit true to size. I am 5'6, 130 and size small was perfect. This is a nice hunter green color. Overall it was very basic and comfy but it could be dressed up.

links_reviews_title: Wore with LNDR pants for a monochrome athleisure look
links_reviews_text: It is a little oversized so I probably could've gone done one size, but I still didn't feel like it was too bulky, even with the large!

links_reviews_title: Love, love so comfy and can wear with anything!
links_reviews_text: Now this is a sweater I would buy! Color is true to pictures on site, so warm, soft, and comfortable but can dress up or down. Considering buying!
Great basic sweater. Nothing special but nothing wrong.
ok

I really like the deep green color of this sweater. It was a welcome change to my mostly monochromatic wardrobe. The fit was great - at 5'0 I'm pretty short, and both the torso length and sleeve length were just fine for me. Would rent again!
Cute sweater. Great for everyday
Very cozy but also sleek

links_reviews_title: Great Brunch Top with the girls
links_reviews_text: Great color for winter/fall and so warm. Not itchy at all and was a great top to wear to brunch with the girls!
Nice basic hunter green sweater. Pretty warm, may be a little scratchy without a shirt underneath.
Super comfy loved the fit and the color
Easy to roll up the sleeves, could wear it with or without something underneath, when it was chilly, I wore a turtleneck gold sweater underneath. Dress up or down both works!

links_reviews_title: Kept me warm and it was really comfortable
"Looks like a high school sports jacket" -- my boyfriend
links_reviews_text: Super warm, really high quality. Surprisingly flattering on broad shoulders. Love everything from this brand.
I loved this so much I purchased it. Just different and cute and looks great with jeans. Just a. Fun and super cute jacket

Really liked this jacket, but it was definitely too big. I probably could have sized down, being petite, even though I'm busty. I wore it around town and it kept me warm, but it also worked with my formal dress for a wedding. Overall nice quality and got lots of compliments!
Cute jacket! I could have used the large for extra room. I received tons of compliments on it.
A bit small but so soft and comfy
Great jacket for casual date. I would rent this again since it was good fabric and looked nice for a chill date. Note- it's navy not black :)
Stylish and cute size.

Love this jacket! It fits my smaller upper body really well, as other Medium bomber jackets on RTR have. Plenty of arm and shoulder room for movement, and just wide enough at the bottom to zip over the top of my hips. The dark navy almost looks black in low light. It worked well with black jeans and a wool cardigan underneath. Sort of a vintage school kid vibe. The faux fur feels amazing doesn't overwhelm the shape or look.

links_reviews_title: LOVED it! Received so many compliments! Didnt want to give it back.
links_reviews_text: Both good looking and warm and cozy!

I love this jacket! The fabric is really soft and it's warmer than I expected. I sized up from my usual size due to availability and I'm glad I did because I like the oversized look with this. It's a little cropped so it still hits right at the top of my hips. Works with my larger bust.
Absolutely love this sweater. It's oversized without being overwhelming on my 5'1" frame. Pom poms and other knot detail add a lot of interest to this cream colored turtleneck. Considering buying it!
Very cute and great to wear to work for the cold winters

This sweater was a bit of a let down. I really liked the cable-knit detailing, but that was about it. The color is more off white than in the photo and the material was itchy, especially around the high turtleneck collar. Overall, wouldn't rent this again.
Great everyday sweater. True to size, warm, and cozy. Great with leggings or jeans. Would rent again.

Rented this just to wear around on the weekend. I liked the details, it was soft, and fit well. Took of one star because it was a little grayish, not a true white or cream. Would consider renting again this winter!

This sweater is really soft and I love the detailing in the front and sleeves. It is pretty boxy and not the most flattering, especially on a short torso/full bust person like me. BUT I think a little French tuck helps style it and make it a bit more flattering. Would definitely consider renting again in the winter or even buying.
Great sweater for when you want to add a bit of texture to an otherwise neutral sweater, very cozy! If you are in between sizes and want oversized look, size up! This is TTS and not flowy.

I had high hopes for this sweater but it just wasn't for me. The torso and arms were too short, and overall it was too tight. It was also very itchy. I had it on for about 3 seconds before I had to take it off.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater! I was able to dress it down and dress it up!
links_reviews_text: Wore it for Christmas! It looked classy with the accessories and shoes I wore. Other days it looked like an everyday sweater depending on the bottoms and the shoes. Loved it!
Loved it, cool neckline.

I got this hoping to wear to work on cold days (I sit next to a window). the sweater did not disappoint - it is incredibly warm. Unfortunately, it needs to be a lot colder outside for this to be useful (I'm in the southwest). It is cute. Fair warning - it's sort of itchy, so prepare to wear lightweight shirt underneath.

A short body sweater. Perfectly nice but nothing special. Around the neck and arms have large spaces in the knitting so the cold air gets in unless you are wearing a long sleeve beneath. Worked with nice jeans for a night at the theatre.
Great cream sweater. I wore something under it bc it was a little brisk that day and it has small holes for details
Living in LA we don't get very cold weather so this was perfect for a "fall" day.

links_reviews_title: Boxy and itchy but earned compliments
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an outdoor fair and was complimented on it - but it's a little too boxy-shaped. I might size down, if you don't mind it being a little short. The color was a bit grey, but I'm not sure if that was the color it was meant to be, or if it's already faded from dry cleaning. And the neck is a cool style, but a little itchy. You can cope with it but after a few hours I was ready to take it off.

links_reviews_title: I love Xirena, they always have amazingly soft pretty material and classic cuts.

links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, so flattering!
Comfortable with just the right amount of stretch. Excellently made. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket for a new work look!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly over a fitted, thin black turtleneck! Sleeves are cropped so I just rolled the turtleneck sleeves over to make a little cuff :)
I will rent this jacket again. Fit very well. I'm between an 8 and 10 for jackets. For this brand 8 fits great.
I will rent this again. It's perfect for a day of meetings.
Perfect work blazer. Not too heavy. Very comfortable. Easy work style.

links_reviews_title: great jacket for work or casual event. Got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: fits really well and I like the fabric design.
I wore with jeans for a little more casual look but had multiple people at work ask where I got it from and they all loved it.
Perfect staple for work.
Wore this with the pants to work a few times. Great alternative to a boring "power suit". The jacket fit nicely even with a full bust.
Great blazer. Good fit. Good for work or going out. Cute pouf on sleeves
Great fit, perfect blazer for work
This jacket was great for every day and work. I really enjoyed having it in my wardrobe.

links_reviews_title: This was a great piece for work that fit well and looked polished and professional.
links_reviews_text: This is a great blazer for everyday wear. I paired it with jeans and it looked great, but it could also be dressed up.
Did not wear this jacket. Nice fabric but overall very oversized.

links_reviews_title: very nice. Worked with many outfits.
links_reviews_text: Very nice piece.

links_reviews_title: Cute blazer but runs large and less fitted than pictured
links_reviews_text: This blazer is cute and well made but I found it ran a little large - I'm an 8 in dresses but usually order a 10 in blazers and jackets because I need the shoulder room. I feel like this one looks a little too big on me and I probably could've gone with the 8. It's a little less fitted/tailored looking than in the photo as well but that could be due to the size.
Dress was too small for me. I wear a 4 in everything normally from RTR.

I love the dressy look of these track pants. The zippers were cool. I wish they had a drawstring waist because they run a little big and I had to keep pulling them up. Fun and I found several ways to style them - check it out at @itsminefornow

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern, LONG in the crotch!
links_reviews_text: Ended up wearing these running errands. The crotch is extremely long, and should be shortened like 2 inches.

Initially got these pants for lounging and traveling but ended up wearing them to a concert I loved them so much! Very funky. I have larger hips/butt and smaller waist but these fit me great! A bit lower than high waisted but definitely not low rise. Will rent again strongly considered keeping

links_reviews_title: Love these, had to sneakily cuff them.
links_reviews_text: I love the fit and look of these. Be warned, the material is thick, more like sweatpants. They're also long so I had to roll the hem under. But it stayed like that all day and looked fine.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy but SUPER low crotch.
links_reviews_text: These are good for a cooler day (thick/warm material). The crotch is super low but the waist is too big to pull up and wear high waisted. Overall cute and comfy but prob won't rent again due to the funky fit.
An elastic waist and baggy crotch is not flattering on me (is it on anyone?). Ok to wear to work one day but a quick return.

These track pants are super thick, so not ideal for summer. I thought the pattern was fun so might order in a small. I'm normally a medium but it was too loose in the waist which is not noticeable in the picture but when walking it caused bunching in the crotch that wasn't flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cutest track pant you'll ever wear!
links_reviews_text: Fit really well in the waist and length for me. Adored the print and wore to work a few times styled differently. Couldn't even tell they were track pants when on

Love these pants. Lots of compliments! 4 stars instead of 5 because what some reviews don't share is that they have a brushed interior, so they are really great for fall/winter. I rented them in the summer so will be sending back after one wear (in AC all day) but will definitely rent again in the fall. They fit true to size, however the front rise (front seam) is very flat so they create a bit of a camel-youknow if you have curvy thighs. So I would only wear a longer shirt that covered it. Otherwise they are a great statement pant!

I really loved these pants!!! I got lots and lots of compliments and they were incredibly comfortable. They are a bit thick for hot weather and I had to think about how to style them but I loved wearing them. Would rent again for sure

links_reviews_title: fun for once in a while
links_reviews_text: i wasn't completely sure about these pants when i got them, but i decided to try them out. they were cute for my business casual work place paired with a t-shirt. i got a LOT of compliments (like, people stopped me in the hallway). the pants were thick though, and almost too hot for the summer, which is odd because they're definitely summer pants with the florals. i ended up liking them, but only for a once in a while thing!
Received so many compliments on my Kentucky Derby outfit! The pants were so comfortable, however, very large in the waist. Great length.

These are great and are a cool pattern so you can get away with wearing them to work (if you work at a more casual place like me). They are warm, so don't wear them on a hot day if you don't want to sweat. All in all, super great!

Loved these! Fun relaxing style. Perfect for a tasting room by the beach where the vin is chill. The color and print are just as pictured. The waist band is elastic, but the rest of the pant has no stretch! The pant legs run a little long. I was able to pull these up a little higher and wear them kind of slouched over my ankle. Would highly recommend renting. You'll want to keep them forever.

links_reviews_title: The waistband needs elastic or a drawstring!
links_reviews_text: I tried these pants in a large first, I always error on the large side, especially on bottoms that may be snug through the thigh. The large literally fell off of me so I tried a medium because the print is SO cute and the fabric quality is excellent. The medium was still too large in the waist and these are meant to be worn high waisted so they kept slipping down. All that extra fabric in the crotch was not attractive. They really need more elastic or a drawstring. So I'm giving up on them, maybe they'll fit someone with a long torso.

These are true track pants, in that they are a stretchy/neoprene sort of material, but because of the print and the fit they can be dressed up as regular pants in most environments. Very cool, very comfortable, although the fit was a bit off for my body. I am a typical thin pear-shape, and the XS felt true to size in most aspects but was quite tight in the lower hip/upper thigh area. The pants are not high waisted (more of a mid to low rise) and the waist as well as the first 4-5 inches of the pants were plenty big, and if I went up to a Small I’m pretty sure that part would be way too big. Because the pants are stretchy (not super stretchy though) it was not a problem, but it was just kind of a weird place for them to be tight and if you are wider in the hips or have a booty, you may want to size up although beware that if your waist is small the top part may be big. If you have more of a straight or narrow-hipped body, these pants will probably fit great. The length on these is pretty long - I’m 5’6” and they were slightly long on me, although you can unzip the leg to avoid them pooling or scrunching around your ankles. If you are petite, they may be a bit long, although they do look very chic with a heel.

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern but fit was off
links_reviews_text: Read reviews and rented a med accordingly. Pants were loose at waist but very tight across the booty. For me the fit was just off and wearing them was not comfortable. I wore them once and sent back. Maybe they are good for small-butt-ladies? I do love the print though! Colors were perfect. I styled with a bright yellow t and flip flops because it feels like almost summer in CA right now!

These a great, funky pants that I definitely wouldn't regularly consider, but RTR makes me braver in the fashion department. These are a heavier weight! Definitely good for a cool sprint or fall day. They would definitely be too hot in the summer, despite the bright bring. Super comfortable. I wore on the weekend with a denim button down and sneakers for the weekend and then flats and I white button down for a casual work outfit. I'm considering buying them! They are cozy + elastic waistband = win. Though, the crouch area is a bit weird, as others have noticed.
These are fun pants that I got compliments on. They are comfortable and fit true to size. I typically wear a 4 in Rag & Bone and the S fit great.

My husband hated these pants, so I made sure to wear them often! I dressed them up with a navy turtleneck sweater... it was very easy to find tops to wear with them. They definitely provoke a response... I loved them
I got so many compliments on these pants! They are super cute and can be dressed up or down with cute sneakers or booties.

links_reviews_title: I ended up trying them on but not wearing, I'll be returning them instead.
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews, I ordered the small just because the medium seemed like it would be too big. I still had the weird drop in the waist, but they weren't the relaxed fit I was hoping for.
These pants are very thick jogging pants. They look fancy, but are a bit thicker than jogging pants like Adidas. They are very cute and can somewhat be dressed up. They are too thick for a hot day.

links_reviews_title: I love the colors and the sweetness... but I wonder if I shouldn't have sizes down
links_reviews_text: I got a small to avoid the fupa that another subscriber described with her typical size but that didn't work perfectly either. No fupa but they didn't have the movement that I know the proper size would have given. The pattern is pretty. I fashion taped the leg hems because I wanted more of a cropped look and it came out much improved.
Cute, comfy & surprisingly long enough!

These were cute joggers just not what I was looking for. I thought they would be lightweight but they’re pretty thick. Definitely too thick and hot for summer, but might work for fall! I thought they fit true to size and gave them five stars because I did like them, the fabric was just too thick for summer.

links_reviews_title: Definitely statement making. Wish fit was better.
links_reviews_text: Waist was larger than other Rag & Bone pants. Wouldn't stay up which made them fit strangely because they aren't designed to sit on the hips.
Thick material, though, so not ideal for hot summer days. Can be dressed up for work or down for the weekend. The waist is very comfortable - lots of stretch. Would definitely rent again.
The pattern is nice but the small was quite large and baggy. I am not a huge fan of the material either. Has a thick and sticky texture.
A little tighter than I like my joggers to fit in the butt but cute overall for a one time wear.
Way thicker than I expected them to be. Impossible to wear in NYC's brutal summer, I'll try again in the fall...

links_reviews_title: They were too big so I had to keep pulling them up. Super cute though. Heavy material
links_reviews_text: Love the athleisure cube of these track pants. Cute floral material and fun zips at the ankle

I rented these to wear to work in the spring/summer, but the fabric is a heavy nylon similar to old school Adidas track pants, so they were too heavy for the season. They fit cute so I would rent these again when the weather cools down.
Too heavy for the summer months. I would look again in the Fall/Spring. But, definitely runs large and need a medium. Large was way too big.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, Cute, and So Many Compliments!
links_reviews_text: These pants are amazing, if they weren't so pricey I would have kept them immediately. The elastic waistband makes them super comfortable, you can dress them up or down (wore them to work with stilettos, wore them to run errands with sneakers), and I got so many compliments both times I wore them. Will definitely be renting them again! One note, I'm 5'5" and in heels they were the perfect length, with sneakers they were a bit long but I made them work.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable. A little thicker than I would have liked.
links_reviews_text: These were super comfortable and fit just right. They weren't too long. The material is thick polyester like.

links_reviews_title: Really cute with navy top to match stripe down the sides or a white top.
links_reviews_text: These pants are a nice thick fabric. I don't recommend them for hot humid temperatures. I could have sized down because they are loose and were a bit too long on me. They were fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Dress it up or wear it casual
links_reviews_text: I wore this with a little sweater to work and got loads of compliments. Very comfy. A little high waisted but I'm tall so it worked for me.

links_reviews_title: DO NOT RENT THESE! Super uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: This was the worst rental ever. The pant is a cheap plasticy feeling "knit" that when stretched, has a white inner sheen to it. Every time I sat and looked at my thighs, I felt gross. The fabric is not soft, it's scratchy. Wore once and couldn't wait to get them off
Too big sadly. I’m 5’6” 125 pounds

links_reviews_title: I want this in a medium. It's so big
links_reviews_text: It's stylish but looks like a sack on me.
Go down two sizes. Could not wear this.

links_reviews_title: Nice looking and fitting sweater. Wore it multiple times.
links_reviews_text: Felt good in the sweater. It was baggy in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Cute and easy for a winter weekend.
links_reviews_text: It definitely leans more towards a cover it all up look so I liked it when I put it on, but by the end of the day felt like I was swimming in a poncho.

links_reviews_title: Loved this, paired with the Veronica Beard pants. I wore to work and casually.
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected. The cut covers a multitude of sins.

When my mom says something looks good, especially in black, I know I've found a winner. So comfortable, but doesn't look baggy. Wearing it multiple times before returning. Would buy, except trying to limit purchases and just take more advantage of TRR these days.
Very baggy.
This was gorgeous! I wore it all around Barcelona in mid February and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great to throw on as a layering piece. Really high quality.
links_reviews_text: It runs true to size, so the large was great for layering but a little bulky. I will probably get a medium next time.
The sleeves on this jacket are a wee bit too short for me and it has a funny leather smell that makes me wonder... A subpar version of the awesome Veda jackets carried by RTR.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED this jacket. I wore this for day, night, and everything in-between.
links_reviews_text: The jacket is gorgeous and adds a touch of edginess to any outfit without it being overbearing. Additionally, I liked how it had minimal hardware.
So stylish. The leather is rich and soft. The wide lapel is a nice touch. It is warm enough. I really liked the the long sleeves are wide enough so it's easy to wear a sweater underneath.
Great quality and fit. So comfy and so cute. Highly recommend. Might even need to purchase for myself!

links_reviews_title: Cute everyday wear that looks trendy, and a fun way to space up the outfit!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 14/16, and this was a little big but comfortable! i was able to wear a winter sweater underneath and it fit really well. If you want a more fitted look, I would suggest going a size smaller.
Really fun, comfortable and warm. Enjoyed it. Wore this non-stop for weeks.

Excellent quality jacket. There is ribbed, stretchy fabric along the underside of the arms (which makes the jacket more comfortable than your usual leather jacket). However, I wish the picture/description indicated that the collar was ribbed. I thought it was a Sherpa type fabric. I also wish I had sized up to a Medium.
Haven't worn the jacket anywhere but it is in perfect condition and fits great. Can't Wait to wear it.
This was a nice very warm sweater but the hangers it came on stretched out the shoulders and made it impossible to wear correctly.
Cozy for a cold winter day. The cable knit adds a bit of bulk. Comfortable.
A little scratch so wear something thick under it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a cozy winter day
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater for a casual day at the office. It pairs perfectly with practically anything and is so loose and comfy that I could wear it every day. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Fine, but stitching can make you look more top heavy
links_reviews_text: I tried to copy the entire outfit. It was very nice, but this cardigan's weave will make you look more top heavy.

links_reviews_title: Excellent fabric and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I'm 29 weeks pregnant and this sweater was easy and comfortable to wear with denim or leggings. Nice, warm, versatile staple.
I got so many compliments!
Maybe a little too youthful for me but so fun and comfy. I usually wear a 4 but the 2 even felt big. Would have liked to try a 0.
Length good but really didn't love this.

links_reviews_title: I wore this one three times, including work, training, and hanging out with friends.
links_reviews_text: I sized down as advised by other reviewers, and the smaller size worked and was still roomy. This dress was so comfortable, and I received lots of compliments each time I wore it. I loved wearing it! The second picture shows the colors a little better.

The colors and pattern of this dress are nice. The fit is quite loose, so it would be a good idea to size down. It was very comfortable, and I received several complements, but aI didn't find it very flattering on my figure.
Wore this for work and it's beautiful. Only negative is it runs a little large but Kate spade size 6 runs a little small. Would order again though

Overall, the print is cute, the length is great, and I loved the sleeves! BUT I usually wear a 6 in dresses, but this was huge on me. Had to pin it in the back to take in some of the extra room around the waist. I'm 5'8, 145, with a 27" waist for reference. Size down!
Could size down or wear if 1-5mnths pregnant!

Absolutely loved this dress, ended up keeping it and wearing it more than once before I sent it back. It fit so well and was just loose enough to be comfortable all day long. I got tons of compliments while wearing it. I also loved that it fit well over my broad shoulders and muscular arms which is often hit or miss for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for Romance and Art in Florence !
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress with flowing skirt. I dressed it up with a belt to make it a little more for fitting.
Fun and work appropriate. Quite roomy.

I am size 6/8 and an 8 was sent. A 6 would have been perfect so I simply belted the dress to control the excess fabric in the back. This dress is more purple than the images show but very cute detail and comfortable
This dress is super cute and light weight however it does run large. I paired it with a sweater to make it look better . I received a lot of compliments

Cute dress! Good length (I'm 5'11") and really beautiful color. I generally wear a size 8, but I have wide shoulders for my waist size and knew there wouldn't be any stretch in this material. The 10 fit me well in the shoulders but was definitely big in the waist, so I ended up safety pinning it on each side to bring it in a little. The ruffles and flow made the pinning easy to hide.

I rented this dress to wear to work for a client meeting. It is cute and comfortable, but sort of hangs on my body at my waist and in chest. I do have a smell chest so maybe that's why. I had to wear a cami underneath because it was too low cut on me. I would rent again though!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress to change up work with a little color
links_reviews_text: The material was light fit and great for wearing in the summer. I also really liked the color and received several compliments at work

links_reviews_title: Cool pattern with unique color patterns
links_reviews_text: This dress is much more flattering in real life than in the photos. It is fun and unique and fit comfortably.

So comfortable and cute! I wore sleeves pushed up. But I'm showing it down in the photo. Neck was adorable. There is a keyhole that is a bit revealing, but with a small bust or some fabric tape you're good for work.
It was a little tight around the rib cage, but otherwise was a great fitting dress. The colors are out of my comfort zone, so renting was a fun way to try bold prints/colors.

links_reviews_title: The perfect summer, fall, or spring work dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! I received multiple compliments and was really comfortable wearing it all day at work. The light flow material was cool in the summer heat when outdoors, but kept me warm enough in an air-conditioned office. I was nervous that the 8 would be tight under my armpits but it was the perfect fit. The sleeves were the dress highlight. I will definitely look to rent this again in the fall!
Very comfortable, flowy yet fitted in all the right places.
Loved the color and pattern the fit was just a little big but was mostly because of the babydoll fit which wasn't extremely flattering but super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Pretty Kate Spade- caution runs very large!
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty dress! Runs pretty big so Would definitely size down.
Not the biggest fan of the print, but the brand does no wrong when it comes to cute basic dresses. Super comfy, flattering and light
I'm not a huge fan of brown and blue but I absolutely love this dress with the combo of purple and cream.
Lovely, easy breezy dress for work or everyday. Would also work for new moms with a little bump. Would rent again!
Wish it were more fitted at the waist. But still a fun dress

The dress fits perfectly. I love the pattern and the fact I can wear different color shoes with it. My plan is to wear my open toe blue patent pumps and gold jewelry. It is a nice addition to my work clothes. The ruffles make it very feminine and the sleeves are perfect for transitioning weather. Definitely would add a wide belt.

links_reviews_title: Runs Big. Going to try again in my real size
links_reviews_text: My size was gone, so I opted for s larger one because it's worked in the past. Not this time. Waaaaaay too big all the way around. This is a very large 16, at least in the waist.
Loved this dress! True to size and good length for any occasion.

The best thing about this dress is it doesn't wrinkle at all. It is very easy, breezy, and just generally super comfortable. I probably could've sized down, but the flowy fit and being a tiny bit oversized on me actually worked for my hectic workday. I got a lot of compliments too.

This dress came with tags on. I love when that happens! I wore this dress on a casual workday with some knee high brown boots. The dress is a synthetic material. It was a bit staticky. I got a lot of compliments on the dress. It was almost to my knees (I am 5'11") and the sleeves were 3/4 length. It is zip-up in the back and has a clasp at the top. The elastic in waist hit a a good spot on me. It was a very comfortable dress in a way that you just forget you are wearing it. I didn't have to adjust it or pull it down. Loved it. Another KS winner.

I was so happy when this became available in my size and snagged it immediately! I normally wear a size 6 or 8 but this is very forgiving. Wore it to work and got soo many compliments. Perfect for work on a spring day and/or happy hour! Will definitely rent again

I'm going to buy this one, but a size smaller. Fits like a baby doll style dress, overall large & loose. Very stylish, easy to wear with sandals (as I did the first time) and with brown knee high boots as I did the 2nd time. I received SOOOO many compliments!! Size: I have a large chest, 34DD, and it fit perfectly, but do know the front opening is low & cleavage will show. You might want a bralette underneath. Length: I'm 5'4, wore 3 inch heels, and it was right above my knee.
Love the colors! A bit large, would get a 2 next time. Received several compliments, fun for work!
This size runs a bit big. It fits like a babydoll on me, but I am large up top. It was super cute and I really liked it. Will rent again.
Lovely print but runs large

links_reviews_title: Pretty but too big, no shape

links_reviews_text: Too large in the waste and chest
A tad loose fitting but I think a size down would have been too short. Very pretty dress, lightweight feel and very comfortable. Am excited to rent again!
